No ETA given regarding possible delivery date, nor was the supervisor able to even ensure that the item was definitely on site... I was also told that the trailers are not accessible and they cannot pull the item for me to pick up. Very poor organization and salty, jaded customer service staff. Avoid like the plague.Date of experience: December 06, 2018

Name: Kati Bourrie
Review: I made the mistake of trusting purolatorI made the mistake of shopping through a company that uses Purolator to deliver. I get a notification Monday (December 3) night from said company letting me know my package has been delivered. Awesome, right?! Delivered in a snowstorm, without my street being plowed, with no tire tracks, no visible signs anyone has been to my place at all!It took me 2 days to track down where my package was (Edmonton North facility) and I have no been on hold for 25 minutes and counting trying to find out if this is actually true. As according to my tracking information, my order should be somewhere on my property since they magically delivered it on Monday. I get it, the weather was atrocious on Monday. But to notify me it was delivered and forget to mention by delivered you actually meant still sitting in your facility where you don't actually plan on delivering it is infuriating. That package is my daughter's dress for her Christmas concert, which is happening today. So thanks for that one. She is wearing a borrowed dress for her afternoon show as by the time I figured out where her dress was last night you guys were closed and since I can't actually get anyone on the phone to confirm my order is actually where I think it is (30 minutes on hold now) I can't trust that I'm going to show up there and have it be at a different facility. Merry Christmas.Date of experience: December 06, 2018

Name: Mario D'Agostini
Review: Cant even ring the doorbell when they drop off a package!!From my experience they have been on time if not early but get really upset when they dont even ring the bell when they drop a parcel at my house! Theres been numerous times when I've been home and because they didn't ring the bell I didn't know the parcel was sitting right outside my door. I know they are in a hurry but really not even ringing the bell?? Every other courier at least does that. Due to all the thefts happening, youd think this would be a minimum standard.Date of experience: December 06, 2018

Name: M. J.
Review: Package Stolen Due To PurolatorI had 1200$ of items shipped to me. Didn't realize it would be Purolator delivering. At first they couldn't deliver because they "didn't have apartment entry code", even though it was literally just the apartment number they had to punch in. Sent them an e-mail telling them the code, asking them to punch it in and alert us when they attempt next deliver.The next day I check casually, note that the package says it was left in the main doorway, a LOBBY to a large apartment complex, a 112lb 1200$ parcel. I was not alerted it was delivered, so it was hours later that I checked my shipment tracking... Guess what wasn't in the lobby of my busy apartment building? My package.Spoke to someone in live chat. Told me that "Because it didn't require a signature that they could just deliver as long as it was on the property, and they aren't required to alert the tenant or individual that their package has arrived". So angry its unreal... And couldn't even yell at a regular person, because their phone lines make you wait over 45 minutes, resulting in requiring to use chatDate of experience: December 06, 2018

Name: Ryan Trudeau
Review: No attempt to see if anyone home2nd time Purolator was suppose to drop a package off at my place and they didn't even attempt to see if I was  home. They left a note on the door that they stopped by and no one was home but they didn't even knock. Both times I was home as well as my 70lb dog and we didn't hear them at all.Date of experience: December 06, 2018

Name: Petra Axolotl
Review: Driver Skipped DeliveryI ordered a TV from Amazon two weeks ago. It was one-day shipping but Purolator never picked it. A week after the original order, Amazon realized it's not going to happen and created a replacement order.This time the TV was picked up in Alberta and transported to Quebec. I check the status in the morning and it said "On vehicle for delivery". So I decided to stay at home to wait for it. Around 2pm, I checked the status again, and to my surprise, it became "Shipment refused or could not be delivered", although I had been waiting all the time.I called their customer service. After about one hour's waiting on the line, I explained the situation to their agent, who was not very surprised. She even said it's probably because the driver did not have time to deliver every package so he just drove back to the facility. Apparently it's a common practice with them.UPDATE: I talked to Purolator twice after the skipped delivery. Both times they promised it would be re-delivered the next day. And unsurprisingly, it did not happen. The third time when Amazon's representative called them, Purolator confirmed that it was already on its way back to Alberta. Amazon had to create a replacement, for a second time.SOLUTION: It is possible to ask Amazon's representative to add a note to a particular address that a carrier should be avoided. Most representatives don't know this possibility. But it exists. I had to talk to several before such a note was added to my address.Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: LouTube0987
Review: Very slow lately and no updates on…Very slow lately and no updates on their tracking site.Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: Jolene
Review: If any of you want to apply for a…If any of you want to apply for a position at this PLACE, Think AGAIN!!!!!I was EMAILED TO MEET UP WITH A MANAGER, NAMED LINAFOR AN INTERVIEW.WENT THERE EVERYONE LOOKED DUMB FOUNDED.LINA HAS BEEN OFF ALL WEEK,BUT SHE EMAILS ME TO COME FOR THIS DEAD END INTERVIEW.  SO THEY DUG SOMEONE OUT OF THE BACK,PROBABLY THE JANITOR TO INTERVIEW ME.VERY NON PROFESSIONAL DID NOT KNOW HOW TO CONDUCT AN INTERVIEW.WAS TO BUSY TALKING CRAP.SO BE WISE PEOPLE AND DO NOT APPLY THERE.I HAVE BEEN TURNED DOWN 2 TIMES.AND NEVER APPLYING WITH THIS COMPANY EVER AGAIN.                       PREJUDICE BUSINESS.Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: S Fitzgerald
Review: This company is 91% owned by Canada…This company is 91% owned by Canada Post. Is that enough of an explanation? The true Canadian alternative, with real service, is UPS.I sent a package to NJ from southern Ontario. The package tracking shows that it went to Buffalo, to Detroit, to Buffalo to Detroit, to Buffalo to Detroit ... yes THREE TIMES, and now it shows it's "In Transit" but nobody knows where it is, or what that means!!!I could have walked it there faster.The package was "guaranteed" to arrive Dec. 3rd. Today is Dec 5th and nobody knows where the package is or when it will arrive.You will wait on the phone for 45 minutes for some rude person to tell you this. They suggest you use "live chat" to make it faster. Guess what? "Live Chat" is a no-show. Live Chat is about as fast as getting delivery from Purolator. And get this -- their "guaranteed" delivery does NOT guarantee if you use their Ground Service.Any one think this sounds oddly familiar? Like Canada Post familiar? Like the nightmare of your (postal service) dreams familiar? Avoid this company like the plague!Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: Dennis J McCann
Review: Driver outright lied about weather delays.Sent my medication out for delivery. Returned to facility. On the truck again after a two hour wait on the phone to reschedule. On the truck again the next day - all day during a beautiful, sunny day. At the end of the next day, at about 4:15pm it was returned to facility due to bad weather. Being a meteorologist, I asked a manager what - aside from a sunny day what the bad weather was. There was none. Caught lying.Stay away if you can. Nothing seems beneath this business (term used loosely).Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: Abad
Review: Absolutely useless customer serviceAbsolutely useless customer service, delayed my shipment 3 times even though I repeatedly told them I couldn't afford to have it late. Was told my address was incorrect but after waiting 30 minutes to talk with a customer service representative was told nothing was wrong and the shipment would come the next day, and then was again told address was incorrect. Just awful.Date of experience: December 05, 2018

Name: Lee
Review: Incompetent CompanyI ordered a laptop and it has been estimated to arrive on Monday. Monday comes and I do not get a message until 6PM that it was rescheduled for Tuesday. Tuesday comes and again at 6PM, I receive another message that "Receiver location is not located in a Purolator service point". I see Purolator trucks drive by all the time, this is a bull excuse. Customer Service via phone takes an extremely long time, absolutely pathetic. Don't expect your packages to arrive remotely close to the estimated date.Date of experience: December 04, 2018

Name: HonestAverageConsumer
Review: Honestly Kinda Good!Honestly, I understand where people are complaining. I also did not receive my package, but that was because I was late. I received the slip and was very mad at myself. Luckily, the driver decided to come back one more time, and I was home! Normally these things don’t happen! This was during the postal strike affecting Canada post, and my package was delayed 1 day. Only bad thing was tracking was not updated often, and you have to keep refreshing the page.Date of experience: December 04, 2018

Name: John
Review: The entire management team from top to…The entire management team from top to bottom should be fired.Date of experience: December 04, 2018

Name: Bhavneet Toor
Review: Shittest Service Ever!If possible, I would give 0 stars! The most shittest company ever.Date of experience: December 04, 2018

Name: Azhar Akbari
Review: Worst ever service that I've usedWorst ever service that I've used. They show you so much attitude and don't want to deliver big items like TV or appliances, they force you to go to their office to pick your item. Even then they don't help you load the items in your car. I will make sure I don't use this pathetic courier ever.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Raad Jandali
Review: I've noticed whenever my package is…I've noticed whenever my package is over sized, the drivers don't seem to bother delivering it to your door, they just slap an attempt delivery notice, or carry it in their van for a few delays until he decides when you come and pick it up. Don't bother complaining to the company it's useless. Thankfully the concierge at our building often catches him leaving attempt delivery notice and notifies him the tenants our home. Best thing you can do is complain to amazon customer support, and hopefully amazon rethinks it's relation with this of shameful company. Please complain to the business bureau as well with proof about any wrongdoing.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Francesca
Review: "Attempted delivery" not even madeFollowed tracking information for a package from Amazon. Received an update that Purolator an "attempted delivery" was made, however, I was home that day and did not receive any calls or buzz in requests.  The update (via email) also indicated there would be a notice left on the door, but there was nothing there.  When I called customer service, I was on the phone waiting for at least 30 minutes only to be told that some sort of traffic in the City had hindered the driver from coming to my building (so no one actually physically even came to make a proper delivery attempt).  Ended up having to ask them to contact me when it arrives at their depot (an inconvenient distance from my apartment) since I didn't want to "miss" their "attempted delivery" again. Disappointing experience as this is not the first time this time something like this has happened.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Edwin Alexander
Review: Canada post is on strike but delivering…Canada post is on strike but delivering faster than Purolator. Website tracking is absolutely useless since it does not update.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: LLL
Review: Customer service "hotline" asks you to…Customer service "hotline" asks you to wait more than 30 minutes, useless live chat (what kind of service just close your request w/ the reason "no agent available"??)Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: M
Review: My package has been delayed for 4 days…My package has been delayed for 4 days now, and they can't tell me where it is. It gave me an estimate for a delivery time, then that was pushed back to the next day, then the estimate just said "not available". They have no idea where it is or when it'll get here. Their live chat agent told me there have been dates due to "weather". I live 6 miles from their facility down a single stretch of major road, and the weather's been fine this week. They feed you company line after company line because they have no idea how to run a business. I have no idea how they're still open or why any company uses them.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Johnson Hao
Review: garbage servicePackage lost few times, submitted claims but are ignored by them. Don't expect anything to be delivered at your door, it could be damaged, lost or anything.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Sarah
Review: On Monday Nov 26 I shipped a package…On Monday Nov 26 I shipped a package from London, ON to Quebec. I was told my package would be delivered by the following evening. Tuesday evening I received a notification that the package had just arrived at the sorting plant in London at 7:17 pm and that it was “in transit”. Wednesday morning I checked the tracking on my package and it says “in transit” and “estimated delivery time not available”. After multiple calls (holding for at least 50+ mins), Purolator still had no answers for me. Nobody can seem to give me any information as to where my package is! I feel that nobody in this company actually cares. I will note that the item I shipped is valued over $1600 and is time sensitive as I won’t qualify for a refund if it doesn’t reach its destination in the next 7 days. I would like to know who is going to pay for this? I’ve been given the run around all week and the emails I’ve received from so called customer service are short only stating we are working on your tracking your package. I will never trust Purolator in the future or use their “services”. I highly recommended that if you are considering Purolator that you look into using another company so you can avoid these headaches. I sincerely wish I had of read all these reviews before choosing Purolator. Judging by the amount of terrible reviews here I’m not expecting much from this company.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Omar sherrif
Review: I really hope the drivers loose their…I really hope the drivers loose their jobs.Date of experience: December 03, 2018

Name: Connie
Review: Terrible! Avoid at all costI honestly rate lower if I could. They didn't leave a message when they couldn't enter the apartment complex. Tried getting in contact with them the night it was suppose to be delivered. But it's been 5 days and I still haven't had a reply back. Live chat was stupid because there was no agent available despite it being a LIVE CHAT. I can't believed that the company I bought stuff online from is using Purolator. Worst company ever.Update: I've just tried calling them hoping it'd be faster. Since tomorrow is Sunday. I doubt that anyone will pick up. But what's the point of having a toll free number if you're not going to have people stationed on it. Screw this company, honestly. I just want my package.Update #2 Finally got in contact w/ an agent through live chat. That experience was terrible. She took forever to reply to a simple hello. I had to wait 4-6 mins between each response (for simple questions). Once she put in a request for pick up, she couldn't even answer a question about who can pick it up. (I sent my package to a friend's house because I'm never home). Decided to pick up my package because this company CAN'T DO SHIPPING even though that's what their company is based on. I just want my package and this is the fastest way to get it because this company sucks. Next time if any site I order online off of uses this company, I am cancelling my order. (Would of cancelled this one too but I really need it).Date of experience: December 02, 2018

Name: Miquel
Review: Very bad experience! This company does not provide a good serviceThey have been postponing my delivery for 3 days. For 3 days I stayed home all day waiting for the delivery that did not come. Today it's the same thing: tracking says the package will be delivered today, we'll see what happens. They are very unprofessional and not trustworthy. I would not recommend this company to anyone. On top of that, I was on hold for more than 30 minutes on the phone trying to contact them before I decided to hang up. This is unacceptable!!!Date of experience: December 01, 2018

Name: Erica Young
Review: I am extremely aggravated with…I am extremely aggravated with purolator. They came to deliver a package and claimed it was the wrong address called me once left me a message and made it nearly impossible for me to get back in contact with them to claim my package. In results my package was sent back to the original place I ordered from and will not be receiving what I ordered because of lack of follow up. Extremely upset and hope that anything I order online does not come shipped with them.Date of experience: December 01, 2018

Name: Krysta James
Review: I worked for the company before HAD…I worked for the company before HAD ZERO negative things to say about this company. Decided to apply again got a call for an interview got the job on the spot. Printed and filled out paperwork as they said to do ot ASAP so i could get started. All to just get a call on Friday afternoon to say they cant support the position offered because someone "came back" complete bull. You cant waste someones time like that especially a single parent. I use to refer people to Purolator ALL THE TIME now i wont even think twice to give them a bad review. Poor  HR professionalism. Very disappointing.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: wow
Review: Literally the worst experience I have…Literally the worst experience I have ever had with a shipping company. They lost my package and none of their customer service reps give half of a crap about you or your package. No one in the company cares about the money you spent and there is absolutely no accountability for their absolute terrible service. I have never dealt with a company this bad in my life. I have talked to over 15 customer service reps constantly being given the same scripted answer and none of them make any effort to actually help me. I am never using this company again and I pray for anyone else who has the misfortune of coming across this abysmal company. I hope this company implodes due to their gross incompetence and terrible treatment of their customers. Shame on all who work here.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: Kyle Kershen
Review: Worst shipping company I have ever…Worst shipping company I have ever dealt with, lost packages missing shipments. They take your money for expedited shipments next day. 3 weeks later they say when we have time we will deliver it. Snakes and lies that's what puraltor is all aboutDate of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: BNP Zindabad
Review: If I could give 0 stars I wouldIf I could give 0 stars I would. First off, their tracking website doesn't even tell you when the estimated arrival date is. They have live chat hours on their website, but there is never an agent available. You call them on their customer phone line, was waiting for so long I just hung up. They probably don't even have any customer support people. There's finally an update to the tracking number, and it says I have to go pick it up because I wasn't at home. I was at home all day, no one knocked on my door. The driver didn't even leave any notice or anything like that. Now I don't even know what to do since they have no way for me to contact  them. AVOID Purolator. You're better off with Canada Post, even if they are on strike.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: Daniel Xia
Review: About a month of trouble and 10+ hours wastedQuite an unfortunate saga.  I ordered a 40 inch TV on Amazon.ca on November 23, 2018 that was supposed to be delivered by Purolator on November 26, 2018.  The order did not arrive, and at one point, was reported to be probably "lost" by Amazon.  Purolator's own web site changed the status to "delivery date not available."  I spent more than 10 hours trying to reach someone at Amazon or Purolator who can explain what the status of the delivery is.  Unfortunately, everyone I spoke with was unhelpful.  Eventually, a replacement order was placed via Amazon.ca on December 6, scheduled to arrive on  December 10.  The original TV then arrived (without any notification from Purolator) on December 8 (12 days late), and when I tried to cancel the replacement, I was told I couldn't; the replacement arrived on December 13 (3 days late).  The end result is that I had to spend additional time returning the replacement, which was received by Amazon on December 20.  Frankly, this sort of unreliable service is more of the rule rather than the exception for Purolator.  Unfortunately, this experience also means that I likely won't order any large items through Amazon again, until it is clear their delivery service is up to par.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: Zwei Lee
Review: Had a package that was to be delivered…Had a package that was to be delivered from amazon to my house, it was a dumbell set. It kept getting rescheduled for the next day by the delivery person, until it was lost over the weekends. They found it Thursday morning about one and a half week after when the package should have arrived, and told me it should be delivered today. I stay home for the day, and no delivery. I work two jobs and still do full time school, it was hard booking off an entire day for this expensive and fragile shipment (valued at $400 dollars!). So I just wasted a whole day, and my package has not been delivered. I can only assume this package has been lost, and that the local depot is just incompetent. The tracing agent tried her best, and this is the result. However, for a business, this is unacceptable.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: AceOfBase
Review: False PromisesI was supposed to receive my package on Tuesday (Nov 27), whereby the status showed "Out for Delivery".  NOTHING.  The next day, the scan showed "Out for Delivery".  NOTHING.  I wasted two days at home waiting for a packaged that never showed up.  Amazon, STOP USING PUROLATOR!!  Called Purolator and got flakey excuses and no guarantees.  The item is now being investigated and still has no one assigned to the case after 24 hours.  Just terrible.....Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: Alan Chiang
Review: attempted deliveryattempted delivery? what a joke.someone at my home had to book the entire day off due to an unavoidable inspection and you can't be bothered to knock on the door?stop falsely advertising yourself a delivery/courier service and label yourself as a warehouse. I'd be less upset.Date of experience: November 30, 2018

Name: Megan
Review: AVOID PUROLATOR AS MUCH AS POSSIBLEPurolator delivery is straight up a joke. I ordered something online a few days ago and without any prior notice, Purolator left a note on my apartment's door saying they had made a delivery attempt. First, the attempt was made at 10:38am. I can safely say that the majority of the Canadian 19+ population is either at work or at school at this time of the day. The fact that they only made ONE delivery attempt and asked me to pick it up myself at a warehouse 1.5 hr bus ride away from my apartment is beyond ridiculous. If I need to spend 3.0 hours on a bus just to pick up an item I bought online, I might as well have bought it in store. But fine, I get it. this is this company's shxtty policy. But couldn't the delivery man have at least notified me ahead of time so I could alternate arrangements? I received absolutely no texts, no calls, no emails. Absolutely nothing.I am a college student having classes from 8:30am-6pm on weekdays. It is just impossible for me to pick up the parcel myself during their business hours. And they only hold your stuff for 5 days too. Like the heck?! I guess Purolator is really nice to their employees. One delivery attempt per parcel and they can just chill at the office and wait for frantic customers to pick the parcels up themselves. Honestly, I wish I could give zero stars to this company. 21:56Yes this is not a typo. I am typing this complain while being on hold on their customer service hotline. 23:07. Yes on hold for 23 minutes now. it is currently 6:37pm and I believe their business hours are til 7pm. I would not be surprised if they just keep be on hold for 45 minutes so they can play me the "Our customer service is currently offline. Please reach us again tomorrow at our business hours." message.Don't ask me try purolator.com first. I tried using their live chat function MANY TIMES. Each time this pop up" Your chat request has been canceled because no agents are available." Erm excuse me?! Why would you even offer this function if it is never available anyways? And here I am now, being on hold for their customer service line while ranting on here. If there is one thing you definitely need to know from my experience with this delivery company, it is:**********************************ATTENTION PLEASE*****************************AVOID PUROLATOR AT ALL COST. Their delivery service sucks and the customer service is non-existent.P.S. A little update. I have officially been on hold for 34 minutes now.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Mohandas
Review: Attempted delivery - receiver inaccessible. - Liars!Waited all day at my home in silence with a view to the side walk and quiet street from my work station, freshly fallen snow on the sidewalk, a note on the door (a few feet away from me) saying "Knock loudly, I'm home." No knock at the door, no tracks in the snow. It's now 5pm and the package delivery status says: Attempted delivery - receiver inaccessible. Liars.This has happened to me before several times. These guys are most probably headquartered in the Central African Republic.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Brian BUrke
Review: Strike action by Purolator? 91% owned by Canada PostI ordered on Amazon and my package was held up in Ville st Laurent Quebec for 2 days and arrival scanned 4 times about 11 hours apart. Then it went to the Ville St Pierre office where it has been arrival scanned 7 times over 3 days.Eventually, Amazon conference called me with their local Purolator service rep - they are swamped by Black Friday packages and can't arrange for pick up because of the mass of packages on the floor and trailers waiting to unload. My package should be near the front of the line.Good old AmazonDate of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Jean-Francois Van Damme Vincent
Review: This is 2 days in a row that my…This is 2 days in a row that my tracking says: Delivery rescheduled for the next business day. Also says: Delayed due to missed delivery. I was home all day yesterday and today, no one came, no one left a card. I beleive their systems are delayed but in no way was a delivery attemp made.I tried calling, waited for 45 minutes and the line was not answered. I try to chat with customer service and i get a message: No agent is available at the moment. I sent an email, i got the message: We will answer you within 48 hours. My package was supposed to arrive yesterday the 28th.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Mike Ruszczycki
Review: Hashtag #PurolatorFail2018My package was supposed to arrive on NOV 28th. I called and was placed on hold for an hour to be told that it was not going to get delivered that day, and that there was no guarantee that it would get delivered the next two days either. They are holding my property hostage. Hey Puro"later" We should at least be able to pick up our packages.This is not the first time Purolator couldn't handle their job. BTW Canada Post own's 91% of Purolator, which explains their crappy service.Please join me by using hashtag #PurolatorFail2018 Good Luck my Friends.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: s.Schandl
Review: be careful when sending parcels with…be careful when sending parcels with purolator because they LIE when they find something in your stuff they can't identify they tell you its on hold because the LABEL FELL OF WHEN YOU KNOW FOR A FACT YOU WROTE THE ADDRESS ON WITH PERMANENT MARKERDate of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Saranya Vr
Review: CheatersThe drivers never attempt a delivery but simply put a pick up note and the pick up address is like 29 km away from my home. I was available at home all day , expecting the package. You know what, Purolator!!, Enjoy the items in the package.That's my charity. I cannot waste my time to pick up the items and i am never again ordering anything from Amazon.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Tri Huynh
Review: Badly managed!I missed the delivery on Nov 20. They left a note. I called on Nov 21 to reschedule the delivery. The agent said they can try it again on Nov 22. Sure enough, nothing happened. I gave them a couple of days and waited until Sat. Nov 24, I called and the agent said the request for re-delivery was only issued on Nov 23 for next business which means I had to end up waiting until Monday Nov 26. He said there's no note saying why there's the time lag on the request. So basically when I called on Nov 21, nothing was done until Nov 23. The shipment had then been delayed by a week. Oh and they didn't show up on Nov 26, they showed up on Nov 27 instead. For such a big company, they are surprisingly badly managed. Also, with the Canada Post strikes, you'd think that they would grab the opportunity to showcase better services and gain more businesses but noooo...... speechless!Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Jim McMullan
Review: The absolute worst courier company on…The absolute worst courier company on the planet.  They say they attempted delivery but that is a lie.  There is no way to contact their customer service.  I will not patronize any on-line retailer that uses purolator.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Logan
Review: How do I give this "business" any…How do I give this "business" any lower?Terrible customer service that basically makes you think your parcel is just out cruising from one warehouse to the next while no one working there has any clue where! Paid for 1-2 business days and ordered last week. Spend at least 1 hour on hold before giving up.Chat never seems to be working then when I finally got through was told it had been pushed back another day (at 10am) and that she couldn't guarantee any delivery dates after.Then asked if they deliver weekends she said "we do deliver some packages but I cant tell you which ones"...utter madness!Unbelievable that we're almost into 2019 and this embarrassment is still (lack of a better word) in "business". Huge gap in the market for anyone wanting to start a reliable delivery company I guess.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Sugar Plum
Review: I was suppose to get my delivery Wed…I was suppose to get my delivery Wed Nov 28th but no show. I checked on line and now it is saying, delivery not available. I am diabetic and had to cancel my app yesterday and now again today. I tried calling their line but that is a waste of time. You hear the recording and then it instantly goes to a busy signal and nothing after that. I have also tried to live chat but that to is also not available. But there is NO problem with their freight line. That works perfect. After talking to my cousin she contacted  a friend of hers who worked for them and said that they did that on purpose so that customers could not contact them as they don't want to explain and leave you in limbo so that you do not know when you will get your delivery. I have used them many times and had no problems but as of now, I will no longer be using them.This is not how you conduct business . We pay for our delivery and deserve an explanation and a CORRECT delivery date.  I can not go to my doctors as my parcel needs a signature. This is not right and their business is going to really suffer. There are hundreds of complaints which will hurt them. But that is on them, not the customer.......Good luck to them. I am not spending another dime on their poor customer care and poor service.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Katerine Almonte
Review: 1 star= 0 star...1 star= 0 star.... They just suckkkkkkkkkk.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Jason
Review: I won't use againPackage 3 days late, tracking info says they attempted delivery, but was home all day.  No updated tracking info on website, no idea where it is.  Tried calling customer service, after 30 minutes on hold, I gave up.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Derek
Review: Worst delivery service bar noneDriver supposedly attempted delivery yesterday. Left a slip marked, ready for pick up today after 3:30 (no pickup center marked on the slip and contacting "customer support" is next to impossible.Went to pick up center in Burnaby today and the person working there is informing me that package is still on the truck for delivery (not certain when are they going to deliver since it is 8:00pm now).When you have 95% of customers give you a bad rating you now you are doing an absolutely horrible job (it is a miracle how they are still in business). Since this is a third time that I have dealt with them and they do not miss an opportunity to disappoint, I will NOT buy anything online if they are using Purolator as their delivery service.PS.Vincent - Social Media Coordinator, you must be the busiest person in the whole company, copying and pasting that one response and tracking our packages ... what a joke!Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Lisa Ann
Review: This is the worse experience ever....Purolator is scum!This is the worse experience I have ever had with a courier service. It’s been 4 days now for a next day delivery and and still have not received my parcel. It takes over an hour to be able to speak to someone in customer service, and when you do get through, the operator sounds like he’s drunk and had no clue what he was doing. You can never get a straight answer.Purolator has done this to me twice before and vowed I would never use them again, yet here I am expecting a parcel from them through your Columbia Clothing.This is appalling as there is absolutely no descent customer service from them whatsoever.This is my 3rd day taking time off from work to receive this package and it’s wasn’t a cheap purchase.I have a strong connection with a reporter for a local tv newsroom, and I will be launching a complaint which will go public if I don’t have my parel delivered by tomorrow. I have had enough of these lazy reps and drivers who are getting paid to do their job. How would they feel if someone stole or dumped their parcel leaving them high and dry.I am DONE with these people.I will be going public and I have many friends who are willing and waiting to join me on this.GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER PUROLATOR...or you won’t be in business for too much longer.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Tim
Review: Bought 3 weeks agoBought 3 weeks ago, still waiting. Package keeps being pushed back further and further.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: J F
Review: disgusting customer service..disgusting customer service... tracking says attempted delivery... although the driver did not try buzzing in and didn’t even bother to leave a pick up tag... call customer service... hold message says the wait is 10 minutes... fast forward 50 minutes later.... a rude customer service rep finally comes to the phone and says that they don’t deliver to condos... the driver won’t look for the buzz code... and they don’t leave call tags at condos... not even an apology... if i know any online orders shop through purolator... i will cancel and rather take the time to go to the store... especially after the experience at the pick up centre... 30 people waiting... and only 2 people servingDate of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Chuck Ma
Review: UnprofessionalI was waiting for a delivery as the tracking number showed “on vehicle for delivery”. Fast forward to the afternoon and the status becomes “arrived at sort facility”. The driver did not ring the buzzer nor leave a delivery note. I hope misfortune befalls on this company.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Hulkhogan Roy
Review: Boucherville delivery center from…Boucherville delivery center from purolator is really slow im really disappointed by this servicesDate of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Marguerite E
Review: Worst service everWorst service ever! Second time in a row a package was supposed to be delivered by Purolator where the delivery person just loged a second attempt on the website without even going to the address. Previously the time was even logged in  advance....What's the point of getting something delivered of you need to pick it up at their depo. Customer service is also non existent. Call to their service number doesn't get answered and person at the depo acts nonchalant about the whole issue.Date of experience: November 29, 2018

Name: Ricardo Prodon
Review: So I ordered last saturday nov 24 2018So I ordered last saturday nov 24 2018, and my package should be todays shipping but hasn't receive yet. I've been keep tracking. They estimated my package Nov 27 2018. But still in transit until now and its nov 28, 2018. This is my first time having trouble with my package. Never trust PUROLATOR for your package.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Maya Hontas
Review: The worst of the worstdelivery and customer service…The worst of the worst customer and delivery service. I called and was put on hold for more than 30minutes and got hang up. I called the second time!!! And waited for more than 30min just to get hang up again!!!!! Never depend on them to deliver your parcels because it will never arrive on time and the another worst part is you have to pick up somewhere really far and inconvenient. I’m very disappointed and I will do everything I can to avoid using their service.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: caitlyn
Review: Been four days of pushing the delivery back...Been four days of pushing the delivery date back with last minute notice. The first day they said the attempted delivery, but the address was wrong so they couldn't. When I went on the live chat tech support to make sure my address was correct they said it was, the driver must have made a mistake. Considering I was home all day it doesn't seem like the delivery even attempted - just said that I had a wrong address and brought it to the sort facility about a 40 minute drive away. I don't have a car so asked for them to reattempt delivery and they said they could two days later, which was fine, but now they are saying that it might come tomorrow. They're not really sure when it will come and said to just wait around and they'll try their best. Considering returning the item through Amazon since it was pretty expensive and who knows if I will ever actually receive it.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: AnonymousButAngry
Review: Total negligenceI’ve had a few unacceptable experiences with Purolator. The worst and first was when I sent an express delivery package containing crucial medication to a family member and made sure to specify the importance of the package upon drop off. The package was MISPLACED and I received minimal support from the company in trying to locate the package despite seriously mounting anxiety about what could happen if the receiver would not receive the package within the flex time we had given ourselves to send the package. Luckily we ended up being able to replace the necessary drug despite it not being readily available at most pharmacies. Nevertheless, Purolator did not take the urgency of the situation seriously, considering someone’s life could be gravely affected without the medication. I got to the point where I considered whether I should contemplate legal action. A delivery that should have taken maximum 2 days ended up taking 10 and I was left in the dark the entire time - presumably because they had no information to share (?) - despite desperately communicating my concerns to them. I vowed never to use their service again but unfortunately I made a rare purchase online and didn’t notice Purolator would be the delivery company. Just now, I was trying to contact a representative from the company to address a complication with the delivery of the package. Despite the system telling me I would be on hold for 5 minutes, I ended up being on hold for 2 hours without any update about waiting times. During that time, I tried contacting them online in various ways and every method I attempted didn’t even allow me to submit my messages. In that time, I decide to cancel my order through Amazon who helped me resolve the issue and cancelled the order within 5 minutes. I stayed on the line with Purolator in the background just in the hopes of eventually trying to submit a complaint and to see how long it would ultimately take. This experience confirmed that I have never had a worst experience with a company before and despite not being the kind of person who writes reviews, I felt the need to share, albeit anonymously. I hope others will reconsider using their delivery service upon reading this review, though I feel it will only end up being a way to vent my anger more than anything.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Paul Cobham
Review: Worst courier serviceWorst courier service,  I would give a zero star rating but cant do that on this site. over the last year 99% of all deliveries have been severely late  by more than a week. Absolutely useless, excuses lies about attempted delivery, breakdown of vehicles, packages left at side of road on garbage day and package gets lost !!!   the list goes on and on, try and avoid using this company at all costs, pathetic company....Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: So Young
Review: Purolator is the worst delivery company…Purolator is the worst delivery company I've ever seen. Every time I have to deal with them I have a bad experience. Just this week-end, I ordered 2 orders with my Amazon Prime account. One order came one day after the expected delivery date, and the other said it was delivered, but I never received the package and I had to contact Amazon support to be refunded. Its just a quick exemple of how bad they are. I have tons of bad stories about them since the last 10 or even 15 years. Hope Amazon will stop to be dealing with them because if not I'll cancel my prime membership.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Keith
Review: SloooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooowShipment from Vancouver to Vancouver on vehicle for delivery Friday, November 23...STILL HASN'T ARRIVED!  Online chat offline during business hours, telephone chat > 1 hour wait, and no response via email.  HORRIBLE!Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Murray Goldberg
Review: Purolator is appallingPurolator is appalling. Really - it is amazing how bad they can be. They came to deliver a package, and left a door knocker saying I had to drive 20 miles to pick up my package (even though there is a pick up point near my house). It took an hour on hold with them to get through on the phone to them. They said the driver made a mistake as the package did not require a signature (it should have been left) and reluctantly said they would send it back to my house - in four days. Well, 6 days later, another door knocker saying I have to drive 20 miles!!!! Aghhhh - now I have wait for hours on the phone again. And sadly - this is just the latest in a string of horrible service from them. Amazon: PLEASE STOP USING PUROLATOR!!!!Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Husain Chappalwala
Review: Worst courier service I have ever seen…Worst courier service I have ever seen in my life a less developed countries courier service is 100 times better than these crap Purolators, they have been harassing me for my parcel since 5 days now and I have wasted two whole days sitting home think now it will come and it never shows up they just don’t bother and the company doesn’t even know where the parcel is anymore. Screw them they should shut down and do a favour on the resident living.Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Katya T
Review: Says attempted delivery but noone cameSays attempted delivery but noone came. We were all home. Slip says pick up at some location, I went there, package was not there. The teller told me this is third time that happened today. Not using this company ever again!!Date of experience: November 28, 2018

Name: Adam Stern
Review: Never deliver on timeNever deliver on time. Tracking number shows an attempt was made, when one never was. Incredibly frustrating every time I have had the misfortune of dealing with them.Date of experience: November 27, 2018

Name: Sobhan Kouhestani
Review: Despite the low rating, it was perfect.Everything was great for me. A sweet and humble lady delivered my 50" TV on time. Also, the online tracking website was updated every minute, and the customer service agents were very supportive.Date of experience: November 27, 2018

Name: Andre
Review: Amazon please stop using Purolator, Really Horrible for Two Day PromisesSo I order a Television with Amazon Prime the usual Free Two Day Shipping on Friday 23, 2018 at 7:17am. To my surprise the package still hasn't been picked up yet on Tuesday 27, 2018 at 10:00am by Purolator. I don't know where my package is and it's an delivery over 500$. The tracking system is completely Garbage it does not tell me where exactly my package is only it's from and to address. I'm completely shocked that Amazon would use this parcel service as its a complete waste of their time, effort and money and to that I suggest for all reading to Contact Amazon and get compensation for prime benefits.  I've already contacted Amazon and they apologized and Gave me a 10$ promotional Code for the late Delivery and ensured it would be delivered today, even though I don't think it will be coming and to that I will contact them again and demand more compensation for the late parcel delivery.Date of experience: November 27, 2018

Name: Sam Chand
Review: I dont even want to give a starI dont even want to give a star. More like minus 100. WORST SHIPPING COMPANY EVER!!! They loose your items and lie to you about attempted deliveries and delivers items to wrong locations. So frustrated!!!! Over and over again messing up on deliveries.Date of experience: November 27, 2018

Name: Seb Rivher
Review: Worst shipping experience everI usually shop with Amazon and the courriers they use are great. This one time I bought from a  reputable store on Thursday for Black Friday deals. Today, I track my package and see that delivery was attempted but rejected due to the address not existing. My office building is in a roundabout so I figured maybe they didn't see it.I chat with someone online to be told that they attempted delivery to the wrong address. I tell the representative this is not my address and is not the address I gave in my order. I ask if they can attempt another delivery today, they can't, company policy says they must deliver to the address on the package. So I ask why did no one call me to ask me, my number was on the order. I am told and I quote "It doesn't matter", IT DOESN'T MATTER? Yes it does matter, a quick call would have at least let me know hey there's an issue. I get that they don't want people constantly changing the addresses and avoid theft but a little common sense would tell you if the address doesn't exist....call the customer. I am told I must wait until the next day. I go back later to check and the tracking status has not been updated.So I ask another representative what's going on and I am told the same spiel. I ask if she can make sure that it goes out tomorrow, she can't. I ask her to at least try, she says the other rep already sent a request. And now I'm being told it might even go to WEDNESDAY! That's insane. It would be one thing if I had missed the delivery or gave the wrong info, but it's not that hard to simply do the right thing.Date of experience: November 26, 2018

Name: AbdelRahman ElSabaa
Review: It sucksIt sucks, cant talk to them and even cant know where is my package now?!Date of experience: November 26, 2018

Name: Mathew Tarling
Review: Next day shipping my A**Next day shipping my A**, more like maybe sometime next week with no recompense.Date of experience: November 26, 2018

Name: Hooi Fang Lim
Review: BAD BAD BAD experience with PurolatorBAD BAD BAD experience!They've never knock or ring the bell. I was expecting two package to be delivered by Purolator and I received none of them on the first attempt.One of my package was stuck on the vehicle since Saturday and now they told me that my address was not correct. I have used the same address for plenty of deliveries before even with Purolator and have no issue. Another package status clams attempted delivery- no receiver available when I was at home and heard no knocking or door bell. There was no even notice left on the door. I contacted them via live chat and asked them to transfer my packages to closest depot in downtown, but they only offered a mobile pick-up truck and they can only re-direct my package to their downtown depot with additional charge. I live in downtown and I don't want to pick up my packages from to their depot in Etobicoke, so I rescheduled another deliveries on Tuesday. Let's see how it will go. (cross my finger)Date of experience: November 26, 2018

Name: Howard Wright
Review: Dismal Customer Service-They Don't Deserve to be in BusinessThis company doesn't deserve to be in business. On September 23, we issued a cheque which was one of a sequence in payment of 3 invoices. All the cheques in the sequence prior to and after the one issued to Purolator have cleared the bank and yet this one seems to have been lost. This is before any job action by Canada Post so the likely explanation is that it was mislaid by Purolator. In early October, Purolator refused to accept  a package citing the "overdue invoices". Next thing we knew, there was a demand for payment from a collection agency based in Quebec. Since the cheque had not cleared by the end of October, A new cheque was issued on November 9th for all invoices to date, including the three in question from September. This cheque cleared on November 19th. On November 23rd, they refused to accept a pickup, citing an unpaid invoice from November 9 (which arrived after the second cheque had been issued). Purolator has refused to lift the hold on the account until an invoice for $18.96 is paid, despite the fact that the original error was in all probability due to inefficiencies in their own Receivables department and the fact that we have had an ongoing business relationship dating back to 2012. My advice is put them out of their misery and don't use them. There are many better alternatives out there.Date of experience: November 26, 2018

Name: Lucas Fombuena
Review: Absolutely disgusting serviceI look out the window to see the purolator delivery man pull in, fanstastic theres my package ive been eagerly awaiting. But nope, the driver doesnt even step foot out of the vehicle and drives off. Moments later i see in the order tracker: Delivery attempt unsuccesful. Not even a ticket at the door. I cannot even describe how furious i was. I then proceed to spend two hours waiting to get a customer service agent on the phone who tells me the only options are to wait until the following monday for either a new delivery attempt or pick up. I ask for the manager, nice man named Simba comes on the phone and reasures me we will find a solution. Perfect! Somebody who can help. Nope. He tells me hes sent emails to the purolator pick up locations manager and that one of them will call me as soon as they get the package returned so i may go pick it up that evening before they close at 8:30pm. Nobody calls so so i decide to drive 3 towns over where he told me it will be returned by the driver. I get there just before closing but apparently the driver still hasnt returned... this is 6 hours later. So after wasting my entire evening dealing with this garbage courrier company, i find myself livid beyond belief and still have nothing to show for it. How Purolator is still in business is beyond me. Im absolutely sick to my stomach.Date of experience: November 24, 2018

Name: Julien Savard
Review: Have an important document waiting to…Have an important document waiting to be sent to my address, I paid for express shipping as I need the document quickly. Tracking only shows my package as having had a shipment label created. It's been 4 days and still nothing. Hasn't been picked up, no updated info on my package, nothing. So i decided to call and get some answers...I've been on hold for 95 minutes already!  Simply unacceptable. How do you you run a business like this? More than happy to take my money, but not sending my document, that's your end of the deal! Last time I ever use you, I will send my business elsewhere in the future. Also Please don't answer me with an automated response of how sorry you are and that you will look into this for me, that is also very unprofessional. Take the time to answer me like a real human being.Date of experience: November 24, 2018

Name: Lenn May Malvas
Review: Usually I ordered in amazon with no…Usually I ordered in amazon with no problem until purolator happened to be a carrier in its SUCKS! I chose the 2 day shipping for supposedly birthday gift that didn't arrive. They keep on leaving a note that they attempted to deliver but there is no ring in the bell. Giving their instructions which is very common sense. I reschedule for the next delivery and the same thing instead of ringing the bell and give the parcel to you, they leave a note telling you to pick it up what the heck! People choose to deliver it to their door because they can't able to go outside for a reason! If I could give no star I would! they don't deserve even for a 1 star.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Rotimi. O
Review: I am going through a nasty trauma…frustrated clientI am going through a nasty trauma simply because I want to receive my package from Purolator. I ordered a package of  about 50kg from Bestbuy online on the 14th of November 2018. Bestbuy sent me email that same afternoon that I should wait 24hrs before tracking the package. Less than 24hrs, Purolator attempted to deliver the package on the 15th November by 10:13am, I missed the by whiskers and less than 30mins after I called the customer service to reschedule delivery and I was given date of 19th November which was Monday for delivery . I had to stay at home in order to receive the package but Purolator was no where near. Same thing happened on the 20th, 21st, 22nd and 23rd November , I called their customer care line everyday and after waiting for several mins, I get the same response from them “we are truly sorry for the inconvenience , we shall make sure it’s on the truck tomorrow” without any positive attempt. Incase they want to deny it I have reference number 8507372 as evidence , likewise I have complaint number 8493133 and confirmation number 8493127 as evidence. I am still expecting my package without any forseeable date of delivery. I wrote bestbuy to complain about Purolator and they promised it will be delivered in 2days and it’s counting without success. I am really frustrated.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Esther
Review: Can I give 0 stars?Best word to describe my experience: wow. Just wow. Waiting for an Amazon delivery. The package was supposed to arrive on Wednesday, and I received a notice from Amazon that there was a delay. Saw an attempted delivery yesterday. No notice card this morning. Now suddenly, online tracking is showing that my address is incorrect and to contact Purolator. I tried contacting Purolator. Have been on  hold over 1 hour now. I wrote them two e-mails. I'd laugh if I wasn't so angry.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: J P
Review: Tried to pickup package with multiple…Tried to pickup package with multiple identification I have a unique name ..my drivers license address erased due to use.  I am a senior executive and have business cards health card etc etc ..clerk refused to release pkg wo id with address..kept quoting policy.o asked to see supervisor and was told no they will tell you it’s policy. I’m an anglophone the woman rudely said “blah blah blah” “ listen to me”It’s the policy ...stupidity not policy how about common senseDate of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Nick Rankine
Review: The driver didn't ring door bell or bring package to doorThe driver didn't even bring the package to my door. I have security camera video of him walking up to my door and putting the tag on my door without ringing my doorbell. On the tag he wrote that it was delivered at 320 pm yet he didn't show up until 430pm WHEN I WAS HOME. now I have to drive halfway across the city to pick my package up which I should already have! Absolutely horrible service.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Phil
Review: Putting the lator in deliveryThis should be a 0 star rating, I wish amazon wouldn't use them. They have never delivered on time. Its always a logistics problem, bad weather, different excuses. Update... still trying to track my package, only 50+ minutes on hold despite being assured queue time is under 5 minutes. Tried live chat, disconnects after telling me no agents are available.To run a company this badly takes considerable dedicated focus and skill. 95% of the time its a fault with management.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Bill Smith
Review: I had a very important legal document…I had a very important legal document to be couriered to me.  I waited several days thinking that the sender took their time sending it. Sadly the sender used Purolator.  The driver showed up at my house once during business hours.  I'm sorry, but I work for a living and wasn't there.  He left no message, no card, instead dumping my document at a Purolator depot a 40 minute drive away from my house.  It sat there for a days before being returned to sender.  I called my sender wondering where the package was to find out it had just been returned that hour.Purolator, this is totally unacceptable.  We entrusted you with an important document. You take it, disappear with it, no indication where it is, and return it to where you got it 5 days later expecting you added value???  What kind of a business are you running???  Keep this up and you are the next Sears.  I cringe every time I'm forced to have to deal with Purolator. You are owned by Canada Post.  Do what you do best.  Stick to snail mail.  Btw, thats how my document finally got to me.  Snail mail. 0/5 stars.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Channelle S
Review: First time, bad experienceI'm very upset and disappointed with Purolator's services. I was expecting a delivery today but was told it was delayed and would come tomorrow when I called to ask why it wasn't out for delivery. Purolator said they attempted to deliver but I've been waiting all day and didn't get a buzz. There wasn't even a slip so I have to bus to pick it up. I read numerous bad reviews but I wanted to give the benefit of a doubt. Unfortunately it seems to be true. Purolator in fact claimed to attempt but did not. I'm not sure I'll be attempting their services again.Date of experience: November 23, 2018

Name: Kim
Review: Horrible experienceHorrible experience. I was waiting all morning for the package to be delivered, and they didn’t even ring the buzzer to my apartment (my buzzer works). All I got was a notification from Amazon that Purolator had made an attempt to deliver the package. I went down to the lobby and there was a slip that said that “we missed you”. No you didn’t! You didn’t even try to deliver it! I was home all morning, I never left! It is extremely inconvenient to have to go to the Purolator office (especially since I don’t have a car) and if I wanted to pick up an item I wouldn’t have ordered it online, I just would have gone to a store! I also called their phone number and was on hold for a while before I decided it wasn’t worth my time. I sent Purolator an email but they said it would be within 48 hours for a response. I called Amazon as well and within 5 minutes they had contacted Purolator to get the package delivered tomorrow! Thank goodness for Amazon, and hopefully Purolator delivers tomorrow. Maybe I will have to camp out in the lobby.Date of experience: November 22, 2018

Name: Svg
Review: When in chatWent in chat - no agents available. Called and got disconnected after waiting on hold for 47 minutes. Emailed customer service - no reply. Yes, my address is correct, and No, you didn't attempt to deliver.   I contacted Amazon and they sorted you out for me - finally got delivered. AND now, yet another parcel is going on the same track as the previous one. You telling me it is an incorrect address, blah, blah....I have contacted Amazon again this morning and again they have said they will deal with you and get it sorted.  THEY know what good customer service is, unlike you guys.ANYONE who has a package coming from Amazon and you are getting the runaround from purolator like me, please contact Amazon about it and they will help you out.  They will also deprioritize purolator as a shipping option.  Enough complaints and Amazon will boot this useless shipping company out the door!Date of experience: November 22, 2018

Name: Jennifer Allman
Review: One of the worst logistics company!One of the worst logistics company. If only I can rate 0 - I will. Customer service is very unfriendly, unprofessional and rude. Looks like they don't have proper training or they just don't practice it. Very bad service!Date of experience: November 22, 2018

Name: Stephanie McDonald
Review: next day delivery 3 days late and no help.I was supposed to recieve a shipment on tuesday it was for meals that have ordered I still have not recieved the package and ITS THURSDAY . the meals have probably gone bad by now. I even offered to go pick up the parcel yesterday and they said ok someone will call you to pick it up NO ONE EVER DID.  I was even told that the delivery guy didn't even try and deliever the meals (he just skipped it at 11:41 am on wednesday appearantly).Date of experience: November 22, 2018

Name: Andy-Raye Grapine
Review: NO STARS!If it was possible to give this courier zero stars then I most certainly would, you would even take a day off from work to make sure you get your package but even when you give CLEAR AS DAY instructions you would track the package only to see "delivery attempted" I don't know if they're just lazy or stupid. Two consecutive days they have failed me and my family.Date of experience: November 22, 2018

Name: Jiae Choi (Emmie)
Review: I have tried to contact Purolator…I have tried to contact Purolator through chat, email and even phone number only to be on hold for 2 HOURS and no service. Horrible customer service that doesn't care about you at all.Date of experience: November 21, 2018

Name: Matt Stewardson
Review: excellent serviceI deal with purolator daily for work. Allways on time and damage has been very rare. Only one of the bigger couriers that will pick up the same day I call. Very happy with their service.Date of experience: November 21, 2018

Name: Mannsi Khuranaa
Review: I sent a courier to an address which is…I sent a courier to an address which is there from last 30 years but for whatever reason Purolator mentions - ADDRESS INCORRECT !!!The horrific story does not end here so I call there Customer Service Number to get more info and opted for automatic call call back. I get a call back after 45 min which is fine but the irony is that I was again put on hold and then the call was disconnected automatically.Date of experience: November 20, 2018

Name: Michael Burton
Review: Repeatedly poor customer serviceRepeatedly poor customer service. Failed to deliver packages. Customer complaints not taken seriously and never followed up on. 100% the worst shipping company in North America. Do not use them.Date of experience: November 20, 2018

Name: Bijan
Review: not holding my breath for purolator to get their act togetheri typically have around 6-8 parcels delivered to my address in a week; we are a big household and there is always someone home. On top of that I have security cameras setup outside and get notfications when motion is detected.  So when purilator claimed that they made an attempt to deliver my package I was infuriated when they clearly did not. They did not come anywhere near my house. If i wanted to pick up a delivery, why would I buy it online - Ill just go to the store. The fact that this is so common, makes you think that it’s normal business practice and the company is fully aware of it. Im not holding my breath for purolator to get their act together; but I refuse to do business with any online store that does business with purolator.Date of experience: November 20, 2018

Name: Valentina
Review: Worst shipping company in this cityWorst shipping company in this city. Its a pain having to deal with this irresponsible company everytime I buy something from Amazon. They have delayed my orders several time for stupid excuses like “they can’t find the address” what is that? And if we ever buy something heavy, they wont even leave at my door in the second floor but they just leave it downstairs in the sidewalk for everyone to see risking my package to be stolen while we are away. YOU ARE EXTREMELY LAZY AND IRRESPONSIBLE. Start doing your job!!!Date of experience: November 19, 2018

Name: Staci
Review: Horrible service OMG!Horrible service! I have no idea how long my package was sitting in the lobby downstairs of my building (because tracking shows zero information) but all that was left was an opened empty box! Now I have to try and get my money back. I can't believe how bad purolator delivery people are, now I never want to order anything from any company that deals with purolator! I always require a signature, why would they leave it in the lobby? I can't believe this happened!Date of experience: November 18, 2018

Name: Jeff Hut
Review: They don't even try to deliver itThey don't even try to deliver it, have to pick it up the depo every time. Website can never find my order. Phone number puts you in hold forever. Absolutely useless company. Zero service.Date of experience: November 17, 2018

Name: Phil
Review: In the past couple of months we've had…In the past couple of months we've had terrible service from Purolator. The driver has failed to deliver 3 out of 4 orders entirely. All the while we have UPS and FedEx delivering to our door flawlessly. We are beginning to wonder if the driver simply doesn't attempt to drive up our lane way or if he or she simply doesn't like us. One failed delivery led to us sending our electrician home because the Pier Light based never showed. Incidently the lights did arrive on time by a different carrier. We are going through renovations and continue to order items on line. I now wonder if it's possible to choose a specific carrier when ordering. I feel bad writing this but it's extremely frustrating.Date of experience: November 17, 2018

Name: Sascha Ferley
Review: Horrible Service with Non-deliveryHorrible Company that doesn't even bother delivering. We had a package shipped from Amazon and knowing how bad they have been in the past it still holds true to this day!They claim the package was out for delivery, but delivery guy never even showed up at the doors. We have a full camera system and a concierge but never showed up. Then claiming they couldn't deliver. As instructed by Amazon I contacted Purolators call center only to be placed on hold when stated (15 minutes) waited over 2 hours before hanging up. The company is a sham and I wish us taxpayers wouldn't have to support another crummy Canada post company!Date of experience: November 16, 2018

Name: Christina Ann
Review: Interesting that Purolator would not…Interesting that Purolator would not try to improve their company after the many reviews they have here.  It is quite disappointing that in this day and age that a company would not want to improve.  I have many deliveries brought to my door almost on a weekly basis and the ONLY company that I ever have issues with is Purolator.  I do not live right in town and they pick and choose when to bring out my packages and when to have me go all the way to town to get them.  Their reasons have been the following: the road is too bad: every other truck as well as mail delivery has never had an issue.  When I brought this forward 3 times, when I had to pick up my package, I heard things like "Oh he's a new driver." , "We don't go down a road if there is too much snow." , "Ohhhhhh, no we don't deliver down there."  Seriously?!!! You just dropped something off last week and on many other occasions!  This latest incident is unbelievable.  I order 2 items from amazon.  I receive a phone call the day it is supposed to be delivered stating that I have a package to pick up.  Okay figures, once again.  Then that day, they deliver one of the items and not the other.  The next day I receive another message: You have an item for pick-up.  So in the end, they delivered one but won't deliver the other?!!! What a disorganized place!!  From now on, when I have a item to have delivered I am going to request that they not use purolator and if they insist, I will not be buying from there.Date of experience: November 16, 2018

Name: Nathan Cashman
Review: Purolator is the worstPurolator is the worst! I had 3 monitors and a computer shipped to arrive yesterday(Thursday) Somehow, with all 4 pieces on the truck they only brought the monitors! My wife signed while I was a work. I should have told her it was four boxes, but the electronic pad she signed said 3 of 3 and she asked the driver, who confirmed that these are all the packages to be delivered to the house. I called yesterday to see if they could contact the driver to have them come back. I was told they can't reach their drivers?!?! I find it difficult to believe that their drivers are are out on their own with no communication to their depot/dispatch. Called again this morning and now an 'investigation' has been opened. This is COMPLETELY unacceptable because this shipment was from my work to set up a home office to start on Tuesday. I'm so p1ssed and will never use purolator ever and I will be making sure everyone who will listen will know not to deal with you.And don't you dare 'thank me for my feedback' Thank me by being a company that does what you're supposed to do!1diots!Date of experience: November 16, 2018

Name: Belal Howidi
Review: Never deliver on timeNever deliver on time. Every other shipping company delivers by the day they state. Purolator constantly fails to deliver my items on time, not once did I get an item on time from Purolator, ridiculous.Date of experience: November 16, 2018

Name: Laura Zerebeski
Review: Purolator / Unable to fulfil expidited delivery, falsified/erroneous tracking information, no follow-upThis has happened twice for my last two deliveries but IT NEVER USED TO HAPPEN. For years, Purolator was an efficient and reliable delivery service. Then something happened in the summer or fall of 2018.Two packages have gone missing. The first time, the package arrived about a week after it was promised. The second time, I paid extra to have the package of documents sent via expedited delivery, which was futile since  I have not yet received the package (now a week late and counting). For both packages, the tracking information shows that my address was "incomplete" and needed to be confirmed. Both times, I called and was placed on hold (about 10 to 20 mins) and confirmed that the address on package is correct. "Must be a scan error, " the agent said.The expedited package is a 3-day guaranteed shipment so I had the supplier call and ALSO confirm the address is correct. Purolator agent checked, agreed, and said it would be shipped on schedule. It says right there in the tracking information: "Shipment scheduled for delivery next business day."However, the package was not delivered, it is a week later, and the tracking information shows that my (already confirmed) address "needs confirmation" again and cannot be delivered.This is unacceptable.Both I and the supplier have intervened. Purolator and many other delivery services have delivered to my house before. The address to my house is well-marked and clearly visible. It is a quiet street with lots of parking in a central area in a major city. In fact, I received a package from Amazon on the same day the Purolator package was due to arrive.I then emailed Purolator at their customer care email; they responded within an hour and said they would investigate and get back to me within a few days. I had high hopes! So I waited to post this.Alas, it has been a week. No package, no Purolator response. Meanwhile, the package is still in "Incomplete" purgatory and I am on hold AGAIN for an agent (30 minutes so far).There appears to be no hope for human intervention. The supplier already refunded my expedited shipping fees but I still do not have my package.Tracking information:First package: 606091005060 - received a week lateSecond (expedited) package: 606135860983 - not yet received (one week late so far)Reference number for the follow up request where they said they would contact me by today is CS-8434634.I suppose the next step is to contact the supplier and get a complete refund for the documents which sucks for both of us.My theory is that Purolator Vancouver/Burnaby recently upgraded to a fully automated and failure-prone tracking system which has limited options other than blaming the customer or supplier for the system's constant misfires. Any tracking updates appear to be in the wee hours of the morning so the delivery people cannot be blamed. Robots are taking over the world and they are going to kill us with frustration. And, just as I typed that, at 36:30 minutes on hold, the hold system stopped playing that awful music and hung up on me. There is no recourse. We are doomed.Date of experience: November 16, 2018

Name: Bruce Barton
Review: Horrible companyHorrible company. Here in Moncton if you miss a delivery then you have to drive almost all the way to the airport to retrieve it. My wife and I shop online as we are very busy with our business only to have to drive to the opposite side of the city. What a joke. Get with it, this is not how it works these daysDate of experience: November 15, 2018

Name: HJ
Review: Terrible serviceTerrible service, equally bad customer service. Went to track my parcel and I have a notification that the delivery had failed as there was no receiver available. I was in the house the whole time so either the driver didn't arrive, or didn't knock very well. The driver left no note to say he had been so I contacted the Purolator live chat where I got through to a very unhelpful and frankly quite cheeky customer service advisor. My two options are apparently to get the parcel delivered in 2 days' time or pick it up 'whenever it becomes available for pick up'. Quite frustrating given the fact that my parcel was supposedly at my door half an hour ago. I asked when the parcel would be available for pick up and why we could not pick it up today and the agent was quite rude and terminated the chat. So now I have to wait another 2 days for the delivery which is ridiculous, given that I have paid for fast delivery. The salt on the wounds was the rude and frankly unacceptable standard of customer service by one of your agents. Manners cost nothing. Won't be using your company's services again. Fully deserving of the terrible reputation.*** Edit ***Later spoke to a helpful agent over the phone who advised me that the driver had in fact went to the wrong address and attempted to deliver my items there. Lucky nobody was in at the time or my items may have been stolen. My only options are to wait another 2 days for my item to be redelivered (hopefully to the correct address this time) or for me to wait until they call me to let me know when I can pick my item up. The depot is only 20 mins from my house yet the it can't be delivered sooner than 2 days after the driver tried to deliver it to the wrong address. Hardly satisfactory.Date of experience: November 13, 2018

Name: Iris
Review: Extremely disappointed!!If I can give this company zero star I will. This is my FIRST experience with Purolator. I ordered my baby’s chair from amazon to be delivered the next day. I badly needed it. And yes, it is supposed to be delivered on time if only Purolator did their job. We live in a private apartment (no one can go in unless you have an access in the building) and normally with FedEx and UPS, the deliverer always call us ahead of time so we can go out and wait for our package to arrived. (They are even calling us multiple times if we missed their first call) My package is supposed to be here by Saturday 11/10/18, the deliverer from this company left a note in front of our building saying they missed us. (They never called). 11/13/18 I tracked my package online and it says it will be delivered by 9pm today. My husband went out at 10am only to see the same note from this company saying they miss us. Seriously!! Are they expecting us to wait whole day outside just to get our package? We tried to call them but we can’t talk to anyone of them. Extremely disappointed.Date of experience: November 13, 2018

Name: Suzanne Sung (Suzi Sung)
Review: Purator get your act togetherCurrently standing in line at Purolator on Thurlow and West Pender (Vancouver). Despite the line up being huge, it’s seems as though the staff are on a mission to be the most inefficient workers ever. 2 people have already walked out. One of the guys at the desk seems angry that it’s so busy yet has no intention of getting the job done quicker. Finally been served, no “thanks for waiting “or “sorry for the delay”. Seems this branch needs more staff and more training on customer service.Date of experience: November 13, 2018

Name: Maha
Review: Extremely inconvenient experienceExtremely inconvenient experience. I placed an order from the UK from amazon Canada for urgent items to be delivered to my sisters in Canada. This was our first experience with Purolator and... NEVER AGAIN. My sisters had to miss their classes and stay at home waiting for the items 3 days on end and nothing came, no parcel, no delivery note, no phone call.
