I called Purolator from the UK and bag a 30 minute conversation at my expense and to no avail. Sent them emails but the issue was not resolved. Eventually i had to contact Amazon and get 6 the items returned. This company made me cry!Date of experience: November 13, 2018

Name: sam
Review: BAD EXPERIENCE!! I HOPE ALL MY ORDERS WONT USE THIS AS THEIR DELIVERER.They tried to deliver last Thursday, I was waiting for the whole day, driver did not arrive. Tried to redeliver again on Friday, driver did not arrive again. He doesn't even leave a note. And I was using live chat to follow up and get information regarding my packgae. All customer service was so RUDE. They even ended the chat without notice. While im still typing! Shauna H. & Rebecca G.Date of experience: November 12, 2018

Name: Kevin Lao
Review: twice in a week thanks PurolatorUnsuccessful delivery of two different package in a week, this people don’t even try to deliver they just leave their sticky note on your doors. Ate up too much time just trying to pick up my first package, and now my 2nd one will be delayed. Too much time and resources getting consumed because of this lazy courier driversDate of experience: November 10, 2018

Name: Garry Kukuy
Review: TerribleTerrible, terrible service! I was at home waiting for delivery when the driver arrived , did NOT bother to ring the door bell at all and just put a sticker on the door that I have to pick up a package somewhere else. The customer service line puts you on hole for 30 min and there is no way you can reach them! DO NOT USE PUROLATOR SERVICE!!!Date of experience: November 09, 2018

Name: Joe Average
Review: Once again Purolator fails to deliverOnce again Purolator fails to deliver. This is becoming a chronic issue. The latest is still ongoing. My order landed in Purolator warehouse Monday night (Nov 6). In normal circumstances and with reliable couriers, I would have received this Tuesday. I didn't. Wednesday, tracking still shows Tuesdays message "Delayed due to sorting error". Not delivery Wednesday either so I initial an investigation. Tyler Allen reaches out & spews some excuses. He contacts me again at noon to advise "I checked with the courier manager and have included his response below. He says the driver will deliver these pieces today.". Another lie. I waited around all afternoon & no delivery. I'm still waiting.Should Purolator themselves see fit to respond to this, I'm not interested in excuses or claims that you're unusually busy. I don't care. You have a systemic problem with the management at Nanaimo. I've been a regular customer for nearly 20 years & have seen poor service degrade to worthless. I have no beef with the drivers. They have been exceptional. The high rotation of drivers says a lot but proof is when you question the drivers about delivery issues. There is a strong sentiment being put forth that most, if not all issues, are the result of the Nanaimo nitwits at the helm.EDITED 11/09/2018 in response to Purolator's comments:The shipment arrived this morning. If you truly want to do something about this mess, replace management in Nanaimo. It's apparent to me they are beyond their skill set.Date of experience: November 09, 2018

Name: Karen
Review: Would prefer a O star ratingWould prefer a O star rating. Horrible workers. Horrible customer service.Driver drove past my house as I was waiting for delivery.  I then tried to call their phone line 5 times. Nobody answered.  I was on hold ...with silence...for about an hour when I gave up on anyone answering.  I then did an online chat with a very cold rep who didn't even try to say sorry in any way.  Brutal...horrible customer service.  And I will now be picking up a delivery that was supposed to come to my homeDate of experience: November 08, 2018

Name: Jackie Aa
Review: If I could give this company 0 stars…If I could give this company 0 stars I would.  I ordered something off Amazon that was supposed to be delivered with two-day shipping but it never came. Although, they scanned it saying delivered and signed by authorized whoever.  There were 2 people home on this expected delivery date and it obviously didn't arrive. I made a complaint online and was told it would be tracked to only be told that it was indeed delivered. So lying is a part of your moto eh? I didn't even have a choice picking this courier.  Guess it was picked due to the Canada Post rotating strikes.  Well I would have rather got my package late from Canada Post than not at all by purolator.  Thanks for nothingDate of experience: November 08, 2018

Name: Richardson Fred
Review: Since everyone is scolding Purolator, here's my honest experience with themSince everyone is scolding this company. Here's my experience with Purolator, that happened literally 5 minutes ago. I was woken up at 9am by heavy knocks on the door, looked out the window and seen the distinctive Purolator van. Rushed outside in the snow without my t-shirt on, I was greeted by a very, very nice guy. He was down to Earth, he didn't mind that the signature was a bit different because the product was on my mum's name. Was easy to talk to and the main thing is that my ordered product came in DAYS. I ordered it a few days ago then bang, it's already here. Though do keep in mind there was no estimate of delivery but I was willing to give them time to estimate it, but it caught me off guard how quickly the product has arrived. Overall, an overwhelmingly positive experience! Thanks.Date of experience: November 07, 2018

Name: Hair Pinner
Review: The absolute worstThe worst. I ship items everyday with Canada post and Fedex. Just opened a purolator account ahead of the Canada Post strike and guess what? First shipment is lost. Tracking shows delivered in a different city. 40 mins waiting on hold and they act like nothing is wrong. Its showing delivered sir. Its not delivered. I will be closing my account today. I spend $3000 a month shipping and Purolator won't get $1 of thatDate of experience: November 07, 2018

Name: Krysha
Review: Do not use this company. Ever.Going on 7 days waiting for a ONE DAY DELIVERY. My tracking page has 11 entries on it all because you left my package in a different city. You know, a city I don’t live in. This is, by far, the absolute worst company I’ve ever dealt with. I chose you because I needed a quick delivery. Now that I’m aware of your extreme incompetence, I realize that was a huge mistake. Pretty sure carrier pigeons could have done a better job. Whelp, going to post this all over the internet now so everyone can see it. Special bonus for the places that allow screen shots so people can see how illogical and infuriating this process has been. Visuals for the win.Date of experience: November 07, 2018

Name: Nimisha Chowdhury
Review: The delivery guy was a no showThe delivery guy was a no show, didn't leave a slip anywhere at our apartment building. I had to take time off work to pick up the parcel, since Purolator doesn't let anyone sign off on deliveries or have options for a safe drop off like DHL. The shipment tracking page on the website is not helpful either, you only get one email notification if you sign up for it but if the driver doesn't show, the function is useless. All I was told was the parcel couldn't be delivered, no immediate alternative or solution or follow up.Date of experience: November 07, 2018

Name: Michelle Chen
Review: Lots of 'shoulds' but no 'wills'The delivery guy was a no show, didn't leave a slip anywhere at our apartment building. I had to take time off work to pick up the parcel, since Purolator doesn't let anyone sign off on deliveries or have options for a safe drop off like DHL. The shipment tracking page on the website is not helpful either, you only get one email notification if you sign up for it but if the driver doesn't show, the function is useless. All I was told was the parcel couldn't be delivered, no immediate alternative or solution or follow up.I then chatted with livechat to have the parcel delivered to an authorized holder. Their support is rude but helpful. I guess. Answered the questions they can give a standard response to, but pretended my other questions weren't there. The tracking didn't get updated with my request after 24 hrs so today I called their service line - why make us have to punch in our tracking # if your agents are going to ask for it again anyways?! After 20 mins on hold,  the lady was rude and cut me off when I was explaining our situation. She was more interested in making excuses for the company (probably SOP so I wouldn't blame her completely) than helping me ensure that the parcel will be indeed dropped off at the new location - and that the terminal has received my request from live chat support yesterday. Mind you the tracking wasn't updated w/ the new request even after 24 hours so I was just trying to make sure. And now I have to wait another 12 hours because 'the terminal should receive the request by tonight and the tracking info should be updated.'When you operate a delivery business where there's a hard 5 - 6 biz days for holding a parcel (when a delivery wasn't even attempted in the first place) 'should be there' or 'things can happen' or 'the tracking should be updated' are NOT professional responses at all! I don't want 'shoulds' - I want to have the peace of mind that my parcel WILL be delivered where and when it says it WILL be. Big difference.Date of experience: November 06, 2018

Name: spencer steffens
Review: worst experience everworst experience ever.  Amazon uses them and every time it is Purolator my order is screwed up and several days late and most times box is damaged.Date of experience: November 06, 2018

Name: Michael J Oakley
Review: Purolator is the worst courier service…Purolator is the worst courier service I think I've ever had the misfortune to use. I ordered collection/next day delivery of a parcel for between 12 noon and 1pm. The courier arrived for collection 3 hours later and stated that the shipment hadn't been paid for. I paid for this service by Mastercard which was confirmed on an email they sent me. So long story short I paid almost $40 for a service I did not receive and it's too late in the day to make alternative next day delivery arrangements. Your company is a joke! Look at how many awful reviews you have received and are continuing to receive on a daily basis. How you haven't had to fold the company due to not enough people using your service yet I don't know. But that will happen soon. AVOID.Date of experience: November 05, 2018

Name: HEMAN
Review: Worst Service.To be Honest Worst Service.They never come for delivery. They just stated that we attempt for delivery but receiver is not available. If they come, they even don't knock the door or call the receiver. Worst Experience in my first 2 shipments.And also if we call customer then we have to wait for 20 min. To be honest, they don't understand value of time.Date of experience: November 05, 2018

Name: Sam
Review: PUROLATOR - DANGEROUS DRIVING INCIDENTSA speeding Purolator driver skidded on my street doing a U-Turn and drove up over the curb and across the front lawn. The driver then floored it and sped off. We have little children that play on these lawns, and elderly folk that walk by the curb on this residential and normally quiet street. So what the Purolator driver committed is a very dangerous and reckless act. It really shocked me.The carelessness of the driver also caused property damage, but the driver did not stick around and fled the scene. I contacted Purolator and waited and waited and waited on the phone on hold. Finally spoke to someone, they assured me they would take care of it.Less then one week later it happened again! A Purolator driver recklessly drove up on the curb and across the lawn. UNBELIEVABLE!Coincidence? Could it be the same driver? Could it be payback because I called in the first time to report the violation?WHAT IS WRONG WITH THIS COMPANY??? Obviously not concerned with reckless endangerment of the public, obviously not concerned with committing acts of vandalism and fleeing the scene. I called the police. Not sure what to expect now, someone should stop this company from doing this again.Date of experience: November 05, 2018

Name: Serge Gutan
Review: Tracking App misleadingTracking shows transfered to delivery agent he never showed up today. Called to ask to pick it up myself from their depo and was told nothing can be done. Wasted all day waiting on them. It's so frustrating how they operate. Item was delivered Saturday. Not overly upset because with Canada-post rotating strikes it's only logical to cut them some slack. I normally wait a day or two before writing a not so positive review to allow for sound judgment.Date of experience: November 03, 2018

Name: F Z
Review: The worst service compared to other…The worst service compared to other carriers, paid for one day express service, but got many days delivery.Date of experience: November 02, 2018

Name: Steve Pelley
Review: HorribleHorrible. Driver left a tag to pick up my package. So I drive a half an hour only to be told it was not there. I called customer service, waited on hold for 30min and they tell me it is at another depot another half hour away. They would not set up a time to deliver when I would be home after they screwed up. Terrible customer service. If I had had a choice of courier I would have chosen ANY other service.Date of experience: November 02, 2018

Name: Sara
Review: Maybe train your handlers to treat the…Maybe train your handlers to treat the packages with more care. My bos was packaged so precisely with bubble wrap and the whole 9 yards and beyond and your crew still managed to break something.Date of experience: November 02, 2018

Name: D G.W
Review: The driver doesn't even bother to stop…The driver doesn't even bother to stop the truck in order to leave notice, crappiest delivery seen , avoid it at all costs possible.Date of experience: November 02, 2018

Name: Donna Bentley
Review: Unacceptable serviceThe past two packages that I received this month had to be rescheduled for delivery.  I was home both times the "we missed you" card was left on my door and could EASILY hear the doorbell.  I also have a Purolator sticker on my outer door allowing the courier to leave packages that require signatures.  I also do not understand why I cannot have a courtesy doobell ring when they leave the package so I do not have to worry about theft.  I was home both times the package was left.  Today, I was behind my door so I could not be seen but I saw the truck outside my home and the package in between the doors when I opened my door.  It would take one second of time to ring the doorbell and leave.Date of experience: November 01, 2018

Name: Pétrina Rose Valentine
Review: By far the worst company to deal with…By far the worst company to deal with you're better off with Canada Post.It's pretty bad when Canada Post is better. An important letter was mailed for next day delivery on October 29,2018 scheduled to be delivered on October 30,2018. On October 30 at around 7 pm I wondered where my letter was. I checked my tracking number and there were NO UPDATES at all. It just stated that it was in transit expected for Oct 30. I tried calling Purolator... Good luck with that! Their machine said I was anticipated to wait for 10 mins... I stayed on the line for 34 mins and gave up! At this point I thought maybe their live chat would be better.. FALSE. The representative Vanessa M came across as rude and couldn't give a s***. I provided her my tracking number and literally look her 13 mins to get back to me. When she did it was a "It has been delayed and will be delivered tomorrow (oct 31)". When asked if there would be a valid uncontrollable reason as to why they wouldn't be able to refund part of the costs due to the service paid for not being provided, she answered with a "Unfortunately there would not be a refund due to a mechanical failure." EXCUSE ME?! I can understand delays due to weather, given that NO ONE can control that but a mechanical failure? Shouldn't Purolator make sure that their equipment is ready to provide the services paid for? Even at the very least have a backup plan. That's s**** service if you ask me. I took the morning off work on the 31st to be home for when the envelope arrives and guess what? The phone call I was promised when it would be sent did not happen.... The best part... I was home WAITING for this guy and he didn't even f**** knock on my door. I went to take the trash out and found the notice on my door. The best part, the driver didn't even THINK about knocking, ringing the door bell or even writing the time he stopped by. I had to go online again and check my tracking number which showed it was "attempted"  to be delivered at 11:43 am... it was 11:52 am. Like, way to friggen go Purolator. After reading other peoples reviews, I'm flabbergasted that you're still in business...Date of experience: October 31, 2018

Name: Meagan
Review: I wish I could give this less than one…I wish I could give this less than one star. Purolator is pure garbage. I am still currently battling with them to get my package and have been for the past 3 WEEKS. This companies employees don't know what they are talking about, lied to me multiple times, and when I asked what can be done to fix this and right this, they literally said nothing can be done. This company is useless and should go under. I hope they go bankrupt and everyone gets fired.Date of experience: October 31, 2018

Name: Lucy X
Review: All my past experiences with Purolator…All my past experiences with Purolator has been absolutely horrible.  I don't know how a company can function like this.  Do the delivery personnel receive ANY sort of training AT ALL?  How is it that I can provide the SAME address to ANY OTHER logistics company and they're able to deliver, yet when Purolator gets the SAME ADDRESS, the shipment gets lost because the address is "incorrect"?  My order is about $1k and they can't even handle this with proper due diligence?They asked me for my building's buzz code, I gave it to them.  Apparently they didn't even bother using the code because I never got a goddamn call.Date of experience: October 31, 2018

Name: Pat
Review: Terrible serviceTerrible service. Envelope Richmond BC to Kelowna BC shipped Friday and now Tuesday and all Purolator says is "in transit".I will never use these guys again.Date of experience: October 30, 2018

Name: Sarah
Review: Still waiting for a delivery to arrive…Still waiting for a delivery to arrive at its destination. It has been hell organizing it from the very beginning. I called in to get an early pick-up and that didn't happen and when the pick-up drive came he bitched about the way it was scheduled but I wasn't even the one who arranged that. I was told it would arrive on Monday but it's two days late with no estimate of when it will arrive and the whole delivery cost $400 and they don't even care!! They just blow me off on the phone and say they can make no guarantees by ground. That just seems like a flaky way of not caring about customer service. Really really poor and expensive shipping company. Last time.Date of experience: October 30, 2018

Name: Eric
Review: the driver never left noticethe driver never left notice. I called the customer services trying to complain, the lady was so rude. She said you should always ask your sender to provide the tracking #, and track it online. It's not our fault that you dont have the tracking #. I was just asking the driver to leave a notice so that i won't leave the package at the office for days without awarenesz. Is it that hard to leave a note? if I can rate 0, i wouldnt give 1 star at all.Date of experience: October 30, 2018

Name: 中原マリ
Review: If you live in an apartment, forget about it.My apartment doesn't have a buzzer and apparently, this is according to Purolator, my package is literally undeliverable. But even though they say this, they will try to deliver the next day anyways. Apparently drivers aren't allowed to have cellphones? But surely it's not illegal to use your cellphone while parked. Truly horrendous.Date of experience: October 27, 2018

Name: Sarah
Review: $90 express package (5 pieces of paper) can't even get delivered on timewhen you pay a ridiculous amount of money to express ship some legal documents with a guaranteed delivery of 10:30 am AVOID Purolator.  Not only do they not withhold their end of the deal, they have no idea when your package will arrive and make you wait on the phone for over an hour in an attempt for a refund.Refund experience: Spoke to a rude younger lady who said it was MY fault it wasn't on time because I didn't drop it off on time.....It was hand delivered to the facility and I was told it will be there first thing (10:30am) Thursday morning.  I am currently still on hold, Friday at 9:15am with what I hope to be a more competent person (she seems helpful thus far) trying to get my money back for thisSide note: weather is certainly NOT to blame.NEVER EVER using this service again and will make sure no friend or family does eitherDate of experience: October 26, 2018

Name: Allan Kidson
Review: Unacceptable Service & Another…Unacceptable Service & Another Dissatisfied Customer Whenever Amazon uses Purolator to ship an item, the drivers make NO attempt to buzz my apartment even though I was home and anticipated the delivery. I get a tag on the front door saying it will be available the next day at a location that isn't even close to my home. Other delivery companies ring my buzzer # and put the 15 seconds of effort in to do so. This is an EXTREMELY frustrating situation to be in as receiving this package was time sensitive in nature. The last time Purolator was used, they made THREE attempts to deliver the package on three different days but never even rang the buzzer, nor tried to call my phone, to try and get in on any of those attempts. This is complete waste of time for the driver and for me. I had to go online and track the package after several days to see what was going on before I was even aware that they had made a single attempt.I never leave reviews for products or services, but this consistently unacceptable behaviour by Purolator has me filled with frustration and resentment that I have to deal with this. It's time to make some changes, Purolator.Date of experience: October 25, 2018

Name: Wojciech Sawicki
Review: If there is a rock bottom, they rank a few miles beneath it...Just about the most frustrating experience imaginable. I've ordered an item with Amazon Prime, specifically choosing two-day guaranteed delivery as we're ONLY able to wait for the courrier on Mondays. So what does the courrier do? They NEVER rang the buzzer, just stuck an "attempted delivery" notice on the front door, with instructions to pick the package up at their Montreal shipping center the next day (October 23rd). Customer service on the phone couldn't do anything to turn the lying driver around for another (REAL) attempt. Fine, pickup it is, that's a day late already, but fine, I can forgive that much. So what happens? I waste hours getting to the shipping center, only to be told rudely "The package isn't here, it's on a truck for delivery tomorrow". The girl behind the counter then proceeded to INSIST that I've called to request another delivery on Wednesday, October 24th!!! Absurd! NOBODY will be there to receive it, and NOBODY made such a request - a fact confirmed by a quick phonecall right there at the desk. Once called out on this lie, she became even more rude. NO apology was offered, just outright insulting attempts to somehow blame me instead. And of course, the usual claims that nothing can be done to undo that catastrophic screwup (what's the point of her job then, anyway??). So at that point not only it's two days late, but THREE days late at least! Surely enough, another "attempted delivery" notice was stuck on the front door today, despite making it abundantly clear to the company, on two separate occasions by then, that NOBODY IS THERE. Their only chance was MONDAY and if only the driver did his damn job, we wouldn't be having this problem. If only they followed their own notices and held the package for pickup, we would only be a day late and we wouldn't be having this problem. If they weren't blatantly lying and making things up, we wouldn't be having this problem. As things are now, I'm not even sure I'll actually be able to finally pick up my stuff tomorrow (three days late), or will I end up wasting my time again? I have NEVER yet seen such a convoluted mess of glaring incompetence and repeated screwups following one another. What's the point of paying for a specific-day delivery if the courrier at the end of the delivery process simply doesn't give a damn, and NOBODY in the whole company can (or cares to) do anything about it.Date of experience: October 25, 2018

Name: Bartu Gürel
Review: WORST SHIPPING FIRM EVERWORST SHIPPING FIRM EVER. I ordered 4 batteries for my e-bike so I can work. On the delivery day, they say because there was no-buzzer number they did not make the delivery but we do not have a buzzer number in our apartment. And the couriers do not carry a phone to call the customer before they arrive. That is why they won't do the delivery and because of them, I will lose 4 days of work which I could save a lot of money. I am a student and I have a school. Do I have to wait for them to come to my apartment 24/7 ? Just give your couriers a communication gadget called "CELLPHONE" so they can contact with the customersDate of experience: October 24, 2018

Name: Priya
Review: Two times in a weekTwo times in a week , I had the worst experience with Purplator .First one was for  delivery of a TV which I even recorded on a video on the horrible and rude way the delivery person behaved , he refused to deliver my package to me and started running towards the truck and created a scene in front of my apartment . When I said “sir I am going to record this conversation on video and share it online to show how badly you behave with customer “ only then he put his act together and made the delivery .Today my package ref number # I was called at 10:37 and I was at front door 10:39 and the delivery person has already left .Leaving a note that they could not contact me .This is horrible customer service and repeated behavior of dissatisfied customer .I will advise all service provides to not use purolator for their delivery because they just don’t provide delivery service .Very unhappy with purolator . Will share the video on social network to shame the company and request that please respect our time as we do yours .Date of experience: October 24, 2018

Name: Angela Coy
Review: Too bad we can't give them a big fat…Too bad we can't give them a big fat ZERO! Our Amazon.ca package was supposed to be here Sunday, they say delvery attempt was made, but they could not gain access to the building, why, because their driver didn't READ the access panel which CLEARLY states how to buzz apartments!! Called Amazon.ca, we were refunded entire order cost and told our package would be here ASAP. On Monday the Amazon app shows an attempted delivery at 10:34 AM, but I never got a door buzz. I called Purolator (I was LIVID!!), was informed that they did not attempt to deliver, they had however entered our buzzer code into their system. Tuesday, I waited ALL day, watching the Amazon app "out for delivery" then "your package is late due to external factors" ????? Called Purolator, "your expected wait time is 7-10 minutes, HALF AN HOUR LATER a customer service rep answers my call. Driver ran out of time to deliver our package and returned to warehouse?!?! Called Amazon, like there is much they can do about it, but customer service agent said that Purolator and Canada Post were a 50/50 if your package will be delivered. Sent off an email to Amazon as well, looks like Purolator is hanging by a thread, I truly hope that this is the end of their contract with Amazon!!! So here I sit for a FOURTH day waiting, what is my time worth?!?!?! Wonder if our elusive package will arrive today? Your delivery service is ridiculously poor!!! Teach your drivers to READ buzzer instructions on apartments!!! And leave delivery attempt slips!! Was told you don't leave them at apartment complexes anymore as they tend to fall into the wrong hand, I call BS as you have to provide government ID to pick up packages anyway!!! And please don't insult me with your "Terribly sorry for the inconvenience" crap you post to every comment here.Date of experience: October 24, 2018

Name: Jassi
Review: Worst company everHey Catherine, just out of curiosity, why dont you guys improve your service. You have 1 star rating by people...your senior management should die of shame by now. I wonder what miracle is keeping this company afloat till now. Every time my parcel came via Purolator, the driver never delivered it even if I was home. Last week my gf's parcel was delivered to wrong building and she had to ask Amazon for refund. Everyone is saying same thing ...your drivers never deliver the parcel...How come CanadaPost, Fedex and UPS drivers are doing it better than you? They aren't hiring aliens...are they? I am waiting for the day Purolator as company will be dissolved because then Amazon wont send the parcels via you guys anymore. And don't worry I a don't need to give you tracking number because i know its useless. I guess I will ask Amazon that why they are still using this terrible serviceDate of experience: October 24, 2018

Name: Rie Kanaoka
Review: The service is terribleThe service is terrible. How come why amazon still uses purolator?Although I was at home all day,they didnt even try phone or buzz at all and just left delivery notice. Why do I need to pick it up just because they didn't work on their duty ?UpdateThe customer service contacted me and tried delivery again. But the delivery left notice without buzzing again.  I couldnt have it before I leave for travelling. Their service is so bad.Date of experience: October 23, 2018

Name: Evan
Review: Abosolutely terrible.I dread every single time Amazon uses Purolator. Mutliple times they have given my packages to the wrong truck and they are delayed by several days. Today they claim they attempted to deliver package. Which of course it was serval days late but no one every used my door bell or knocked on the door. Avoid abosolutely terrible service. It's sad that the garbage intertellicome service beats Purolator almost every time ><Date of experience: October 23, 2018

Name: Shiven Pathak
Review: Seriously I’m Fed up off PurolatorSeriously I’m Fed up off Purolator. They are worst than Canada Post! The customer service wait time is horrible.. their services are horrible. I don’t know why they are still working? Me and my husband were downstairs all the time waiting for a courier and it’s 5 p , they left... I don’t know when did they came! I didn’t even got any call from my intercom. And from last two time they are coming directly upstairs and leaving the “missed you” note. If this is happening everyday then am I paying for delivery charges?Date of experience: October 23, 2018

Name: Kelly Fernandes
Review: Late shipments on a consistent basisThis was the last straw.  Once again Purolator missed a shipping date 1 out of 3 packages being sent together.  This shipment had much needed equipment to complete a health and safety assessment for worker health.  This is not the first time however, I will be picking up all my own equipment from now on as I can trust myself and not this horrific courier company.  I cannot believe they have a 1 star rating and are used by major governments and organizations.  The worst part, there is no repercussions.  They essentially state "whoops" and that is it.  They should be fined every time they mess up.  I understand being late due to weather or something but losing 1 item in a batch of 3 (2 were delivered) is just ridiculous.Date of experience: October 23, 2018

Name: Eric L'Italien

Review: DO NOT SHIP WITH THEM!DO NOT SHIP WITH THEM. they f**ked up everything! they absolutely obliterated the items i sent, the box was falling apart by arrival, everything inside was torn to pieces, and they refused to do anything about it now i am out 300+ $$ because of their incompetence.Date of experience: October 22, 2018

Name: Primary Residents
Review: Unbelievable poor serviceUnbelievable poor service. I had a large package shipped from ON to Calgary, with an estimated delivery day of October 16th. Took the day off of work so I would be available to receive the delivery. Checked the tracking website the 16th, still on time. It was due to arrive before 8PM. Even at 10PM on the 16th it was still due to arrive on time. Checked the tracking info on the 17th, it was delayed while in tranist. Did not expect the delivery to be on the truck that day as it was just accepted by the depot late that night. On the 18th at 8AM it was on a truck for delivery, indeed it was but not to my house. Because of the delay Purolator had sent it off to an agent who would handle the delivery. I call mid-afternoon Friday to see where my package it. The agent I talk with doesn't have an update. I was promised a call back that day from a tracking agent, I receive no call back. The 19th I get a call in from my from door buzzer, I'm unavailable to answer. When I get back to my house later that evening, there is no attempted delivery notice, I assume it was not my delivery. But it was, on the 22nd Purolator tracking info is updated. I have been in contact with Amazon and Purolator, and with no real answers. Today is the 22nd, apparently, a tracing agent is working on finding my package, which I've requested to just go pick up myself. I just don't understand how a shipping company can lose a package that's been in the city (Calgary) since the 16th, today is the 22nd.Will the tracing agent call me back today, seeming as they only work 9-5 M-F, and are dealing with 100's of other cases probably not. Purolator needs to hire more staff, to get the job done right. Other than physically picking up and delivery of packages, logistics are the backbone of your operation and you are clearly failing.Also if you're going to contract out shipments ensure an equal level of service, and at least get them to leave a notice of attempted delivery and where the customer can get their package from.Date of experience: October 22, 2018

Review: Don't Lie to Your CustomersI work in an industry that involves logistics and delivery so normally I would understand and be quite patient delays and logistical issues than your average consumer.Long story short - Took a day off from work in order to receive my package from Amazon Prime - I was home the entire day and when I tracked the package at the end of the day it says "attempted to deliver - client requested to reschedule delivery date." Name: Jerich Lim
Review: Purolator delivery system is so bad…Purolator delivery system is so bad that they dont even bring the package to the door with them to deliver it on person, instead they just put up that pick up card that says we missed you and pick the package on a purolator location. I ordered online to deliver it to my place not to pick it up. I wouldve bought the same item if i know i would need to just picl it up laterDate of experience: October 01, 2018

Name: Marc Meunier
Review: Honest reviewI recently ordered PC parts from Newegg, and was assigned Purolator as my shipping company. I decided to check out who "Purolator" were, because I had never been shipped items by them (I usually use Amazon and I'm assigned UPS or FedEx). Eventually, I decided to read the reviews here and to be honest, I can kind of understand why this company is rated 0.4 stars out of 5.I was meant to wait 2 days to receive my items but instead it took 4 days, which is understandable because upon placing my orders, turns out my apartment number was not included. The reason why is because I paid with PayPal and it took that address (which doesn't have my apartment number included in the address) instead of the address I manually entered (which did contain the apartment number) but that's Newegg's fault, not Purolator's.Upon realizing that, I updated my address but the items were already shipped so that didn't change anything. I decided to call their Technical Support number, was told I would be waiting for an agent for about 5 minutes but ended up waiting 30 minutes instead so that's something. After 30 minutes had passed, an agent answered me, he was kind of rude. I explained my situation, and he told me to call tomorrow at 10:00 AM so they would inform the driver of the updated address. Next day comes, I didn't actually bother to wait until that time, and contacted their Live Chat Support at 8:00 AM instead. I was assigned "Elizabeth B" as my agent, and she was a pleasure to talk to and work with. She erased my doubts in 10 minutes of talking, so A+ for Elizabeth. On that same day, my items were coming so I decided to wait until my items arrived because the driver did not know my apartment number. From 9:00 AM to 4:40 PM, I just sat there looking out the window waiting for Purolator to show up, and they did. They did show up, except that as soon as the driver arrived and he realized it was an apartment complex, he left right away. He left so fast that I couldn't even go down the stairs outside to grab my stuff and for the record, that takes about 5 seconds for me. Needless to say, that made me very mad.My tracking number updated to "Address correction needed" which I didn't have to worry about, because Elizabeth said that they would work that correction on their own and re-deliver 2 days later. The next day, I contacted their Live Chat Support again and asked if I could go pick up my stuff myself and I was told that they would send a request for that. The tracking number would update itself when my items were ready to pick up, and it did just do that, so that's nice. The closest Purolator was a 10-minutes drive, which is more than acceptable. I went there, and successfully picked up ONE package out of two. I was surprised they didn't have both of my items, and it confused me. It confused me because the item they had was the one that I had ordered second. I have absolutely zero idea where my first package was and why it wasn't there at the time.I, again, contacted their Live Chat Support asking where the first package was and was told it wasn't at the depot. That's... weird, but okay. I then CLEARLY stated, in English (the language the person was speaking), that they should not deliver it (it was due for delivery on the next day) and that I would instead pick it up when ready. The person understood me, and said that I could go pick it up tomorrow. The next day, my tracking number said that the item was on its way. I was confused, very confused. I, again, contacted their Live Chat Support about this matter and was told that unfortunately they couldn't reach out to the depot or something like that. I didn't understand what that meant, but at this point whatever. I knew that they came late, so I didn't have to sit there waiting AND plus they had my apartment number this time. I went with it.At about 3:00 PM, they delivered with no issue. The only complaint I have is that the driver DID NOT request a signature, which I clearly paid for when ordering that item off Newegg because it cost me $640 so I definitely did not want that to get stolen or anything, so I paid an extra $5 to have a signature required. The driver, instead, left the package right outside of my door. I don't even think he/she knocked or ever rang the bell. That is unacceptable. Now, I trust the people inside of my apartment complex, I know it wouldn't have been stolen but still, that isn't something you do, especially when I've paid out of my own pocket to have a signature upon delivery. The one good thing in all of this is that I had a tab of my tracking number opened on my pc, while playing Overwatch. When the tracking number updated itself, it made a sound to alert me that it was delivered, so that's pretty good, I guess.All in all, my items are undamaged and 4 days waiting time isn't that big of a deal but there's a lot of things wrong with this situation. Had I chosen Amazon, I wouldn't have had all of these issues. I wouldn't say Purolator is not trustworthy, but they have a lot of work to do or rather, common sense to work on.A+ for Live Chat Support. The people I've talked to were all welcoming, responsive and helpful.Would I recommend Purolator? Not really. Think it's pretty self-explanatory.Would I choose Purolator again? No. Why would I when I can have UPS or FedEx and not have to worry about anything. I have ordered dozens of items off Amazon and have never had any problem, I've never even had to contact Support.Date of experience: September 29, 2018

Name: Jeff
Review: I cringe whenever I find out my amazon…I cringe whenever I find out my amazon order is coming via Purolator. Review: Purolator has the worst customer…Purolator has the worst customer service.I saw another post similar to this and had to share now mine.I bought something on amazon and had it shipped to my office with 2 day prime shipping..
