It is very unfortunate as Purolator used to be much much better than they are now, it is so sad to see a Canadian company get neglected and fall apart.Date of experience: September 25, 2018

Name: Randy Toye
Review: Purolator is the worst company at delivering packages.I really do hate Purolator.  I just watched a truck make a delivery 2 houses down from me then turn the corner go down the street and make another delivery.  The truck then pulled down another street and I lost sight of it.  Now an hour later instead of "On vehicle for delivery" my status is "Delayed in transit due to disruption".  I'm not entirely sure what in my sub division is causing a disruption but I could have walked 10 feet to the truck when I saw it and got my package.  Now I have to wait another entire day likely to just be told that I need to come pick it up.  Sure glad I took the time off work to get home to accept the package otherwise I'd have to go pick it up anyway.  You dickwads better be delivering it tomorrow on a Saturday.Seriously, how are you artards still in business?  How?  How does one make money not delivering packages?Every time I see something is delivered by Purolator I just know that I'm going to have to go pick the f'n thing up.  The last delivery we had the driver didn't leave an attempted delivery sticker.  The only reason I knew it was attempted was that the status had changed on my tracking to delivery attempted.  Well maybe next time knock on the door or ring the doorbell because there was someone home to accept the package.So tired of your uselessness.Date of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: Edward Britton
Review: This has been the worst experience from…This has been the worst experience from a courier company I have ever had!!!1 lbs package from Toronto to Calgary, They got it to Calgary no problem but this is where the nightmare begins. So far they have tried  Delivering  this 2 wrong address the past 2 days and to companies that don't even have name close to  ours. The address they are trying to deliver to are 7 blocks away from here. The address are not even close and I cant understand why they cant get it right. Then now they have the nerve to say the address on the label is wrong. I called and confirmed that the address is correct on the label and its being delivered to the wrong address in error by the driver. So now its 2 days late and no one is trying to fix this. You would think since they keep making the same error that get this rectified ASAP. NOPE!!! now I m being told to bad and I wont see this until next week. This is unacceptable and as of right now my customers are furious! I don't understand why the driver can not comeback and fix this now. This is not only 1 but 2 errors by Purolater , its not my fault the driver cant read a map (this is the only explanation i could think of that makes sense) and deliver this to the address on the label!!! Its pretty straight forward, the address on the label is easy to understand since its a huge warehouse with 34 loading docks and the building is clearly marked. I kid you not that Purolater comes here every day and pick up. That makes this even more fustrating that they can find this place later today and pick up but wont deliver this box and make me feel like crap when I try to get them to understand common sense......Date of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: PANKAJ GURBANI
Review: They take 3 days to deliver the…They take 3 days to deliver the shipment within Toronto. Their tracking system is pathetic and customer care not at all helpful.Date of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: Tovpa Construction
Review: How are they still in business?I ordered an item from Amazon and when I looked at tracking information I was horrified to see purolator. I've had bad experiences with them in the past, in fact every time I get anything shipped by them. I'm a prime member so I expected a 2 day delivery as usual.Package scheduled to arrive on Wednesday, yet purolator tracking status does get updated until late night on Wednesday that there was an issue with a truck. Their customer service states that it will be delivered next day.... yeah good luck, no updates and no delivery. I get promises that it's already on the truck and will be delivered on Friday. What do you know, purolator is experiencing natural disaster according to their tracking. I look outside and it's nice and sunny. I beg them to just allow me to pick up my package myself, since I don't seem to experience any natural disasters, and they say that it can only be done on Monday.  How is this company still in business?Date of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: Jennifer Dylowicz
Review: They're honestly the worstThey're honestly the worst, and judging by their 0.4 star review, I'm not the only one who believes this. They delivered a package, but I was not there to sign, so instead of leaving a notice, they just sent my package back to the company from which I had ordered, and then HAD THE AUDACITY to charge both that company as well as myself for the cost to ship it BACK to the company. Unbelievably poorly organized company. If you see that your package will be shipped via Purolator, save yourself a headache and don't bother ordering at all.Date of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: Larry Wan
Review: Ordered a package from Amazon…Ordered a package from Amazon yesterday, expecting it to be delivered by Purolator today. The driver made zero delivery attempt and didn’t even ring my buzzer, just left a notice at the entrance and left. So disappointedDate of experience: September 21, 2018

Name: Adam Kahane
Review: When they didn't knock on my doorWhen they didn't knock on my door, they left a sheet stating that it would be at their post office the next day at noon. My order of medication which i desperately need wasn't at the post office and is now lost. The post office phone number goes straight to voicemail, the people at the post office are shmucks who dont know where anything is. A nightmarish experience, do not ever trust puralatorDate of experience: September 19, 2018

Name: Harry Hamdi
Review: The WorstWorst , just the worst. Never happen I receive my order regularll!!! Every time an excuse happen so they can not do their job. Drivers seems don’t know anything!, seems they hired from another world! Adress, rules, ethics.... I don’t know. Someone need to stop them (porulator) working in the industry! Never answer their phones...Delay drop employees pay cheque....Date of experience: September 18, 2018

Name: David Lambert
Review: Oh you want it? go get it yourself. No I won't deliver it. I don't care that I'm a delivery company.Imagine sitting at a restaurant table, you've ordered, and are waiting on the food. Waiter comes out of the kitchen with the food, walks around the dining room with it looking around lost, then goes back to the kitchen. You call him over, ask him where you food is, and he says "oh, I tried to deliver it but I missed you". Logically your response is "I was sitting at the table the whole time?!" and he replies "sorry, you are going to need to go to the kitchen and get it yourself". Now the kitchen isn't 10 seconds away though, your food actually went onto a truck and was brought to another kitchen 30+ minutes away and will only be available for pickup 2+ days later. This has happened with 4 different packages in the past 2 weeks. A delivery company that doesn't successfully deliver packages 95% of the time is not a delivery company, just like a restaurant that doesn't feed you 95% of the time you order food isn't a restaurant, they are just room with tables and chairs that waste your time, give you attitude when you complain, and don't make any kind of attempt to improve. The fact that they are still in business completely astounds me, and why anyone would work with them, or work for them in 2018 is beyond comprehension. I know the response to this will be "what is your tracking number?". My tracking number is "return to sender, get a refund, and never deal with any company or seller that is willing to do business with Purolator ever again".Date of experience: September 17, 2018

Name: Tommy g
Review: Unacceptable service from Purolator in this day and age.I ordered an expensive computer from Dell, which shipped in August. The estimated delivery date was September the 5th. The tracking number page confirmed that the package was on its way, September 4th and arriving on schedule. I live in Ontario and the package was shipping from Toronto (2 hours away from me) One week later after hearing absolutely nothing, my package surfaces. 40 hours away across the country in Vancouver British Colombia. After contacting Dell, I was told that although Purolator had made an error, it would be corrected and i could expect my package in another week before September 15th. Today the tracking site said my package was on the truck for delivery. Hoping to avoid any chance in missing my parcel and having it re-routed or returned to sender, I waited on my front porch the entire day, thinking surely a 3000$ computer would be the first thing going out. The whole day went by without a delivery, and without an update. I contacted Purolator by chat and was told, sorry they didn't attempt to deliver it today, we will update you on Monday the 17th. When I told them that Dell customer service had guaranteed me I would have my package by the 15th, and asked if I could get added to a weekend shipment, they simply repeated. Sorry, update Monday, as if it was a perfectly normal occurance to ship a package from a city 2 hours away, across the country and back, and then say it was arriving that day, and not even attempt to deliver it, or post an update.Edit*** If someone representing Purolator is thinking of adding a response to the bottom of my comment about "Looking into" my case. Be sure that the "looking" will result in "action" that will not result in me canceling a $3000 order with Dell, as I am highly concerned about the condition of the delicate machinery being thrown from truck to truck and depot to depot across our fine country and back again.Date of experience: September 15, 2018

Name: Les
Review: Bad companyBad company ! If shipping is late they lie and say it was the weather or external issues or missed connections? Amazon should shake their head and use a more honest shipper. Canada Post or UPS.Date of experience: September 15, 2018

Name: Katie
Review: Ridiculous companyRidiculous company. I had ordered a package that was to be delivered after 2 days. They attempted a delivery and the tracking updated to say that my address could not be found and needed to be corrected. I contacted their help line and my address was correct to begin with. Then, after 3 more attempted deliveries, all with the note of my address not existing, I contacted their help line again to tell them to call me directly or to leave the package at a depot for me to pick up. They did not do any of this. Instead, they rescheduled a delivery AGAIN which will end up not being delivered, since they did not update or change or leave any note or any update for any delivery person. Completely ridiculous. No resolution, and my package is still MIA. I'm fed up. I've now resorted to contacting the company I purchased my item from to ask them to send my package again through Canada Post. Purolator needs to give up and just die out. The most rude and unhelpful and idiotic delivery company. The only delivery company that doesn't know how to google an address. Stupid.Update*****There is no need for me to contact purolator anymore. I have already reached out to customer service 6 times with no resolution. I contacted the business i purchased from and they have resent my package with canada post.Date of experience: September 14, 2018

Name: Adam Mack
Review: Lying, lazy time wasters.Was suppose to have a delivery today. I always have thinks sent to my work address. Which is a street level store with huge windows and signs everywhere.I saw puralator pull up and the driver had a lot of packages. I popped my head out and ask if he had anything for my name. He said yes....HE SAID YES.But he starts going to the elevator. I assume my package was on the bottom of his pile and thats fair. I can wait. 10 minutes later he has marked my package on amazon as "cannot access door".....really?? REALLY!? its a door...thats open...that has the address in 2 foot tall numbers next to it.So i contact amazon and am informed since the driver just left moments ago they can get him to turn around and go back. So she connects me with purolator. The agent says he needs info from me. Name, address etc. Then say I can pick it up as lonf as i bring letterhead from my company proving i work there..First of my name is ON THE PARCEL second, if i wanted to come pick it up I would have gone to the store and bought the items and not bothered with amazon. Sadly i dont have the time to do that.I ask if he can send the driver back and he said no because...they dont have the address.  Heres how that convo went downIts on the box....No we dont have itBut you do because he was hereWe cant send him back without an addressOkay here it is then (repeat addy to him)Yeah i cant sent him back Why?Cause we dont have the address.Well can you have it sent for tomorrowNo, monday onlyWell that doesnt work. So please send the order back to the shipper.Then im talking with the amazon agent and she thinks it ridiculous. She sends the situation to her supervisor and gives me a refund. Then she set it up so purolator will NEVER be a courier for me again. And that they are possivly dropping them soo. Due to these constant issues.To avoid issues with these lazy couriers simply ask amazon to put them at the bottom of the list of couriers. They will ONLY ship to you if there is nobody else left which is never the case Do yourself a favor and get this set up.Date of experience: September 14, 2018

Name: Nerd Girl
Review: Worst shipping company everWorst shipping company ever! I ordered a cat’s tree on amazon prime and they were the one doing the delivery service. I spoke to a customer service representative prior to the day the shipment would arrive, because I knew I wouldn’t be there and I live in a shady neighborhood, I didn’t want them to leave my 200$ cat’s tree in front of my door, since I knew that it would get stolen. I asked them to leave it to their closest location so I could pick it up OR to ring number 25, which is the janitor. The customer service person told me that they couldn’t ring to number 25 because the address I entered was different, and that even though they fully knew I wouldn’t be there they would try and deliver the package anyway. How absurd is that? Also, she told me not to worry, that if I wasn’t there when they delivered, they would automatically bring the package to their nearest location for me to pick it up. Well guess what, not only did the delivery guy never rang my bell (I know it because its connected to my phone), they also dropped my 200$ package right in front of my door! Can you believe this??? I do not pay for amazon prime to deal with such clowns!Date of experience: September 13, 2018

Name: Brent Tiefenbach
Review: The worst service and company I've ever…The worst service and company I've ever dealt with in my life.Date of experience: September 13, 2018

Name: Rob
Review: Only 1 in 3 Packages Arrived On TimeThree items ordered on August 31st from Amazon were shipped separately all via Purolator with a guaranteed delivery date of September 5th. Package #1 (Hamilton to Edmonton) was delivered a day early on September 4th. Package #2 (south BC to Edmonton) arrived at the Edmonton South Purolator depot on September 5th and as of 8:30 AM was shown as “on vehicle for delivery”. At 5:00 PM delivery was rescheduled for September 6th. On September 6th, the package was back “on vehicle for delivery” as of 8:00 AM. It was delivered at 1:00 PM- one day late.Package #3 left the Purolator sort facility in Toronto on September 4th (evening) and arrived in Edmonton late on September 6th. On September 7th, the package was “on vehicle for delivery” as of 8:00 AM. It was delivered at 1:00 PM – two days late.So, one day early, one day late and two days late. Not bad for Purolator but their driver regularly does not seem to be able to keep up with her assigned shipments some days. Very frustrating if you wait at home all day to make sure someone doesn’t steal a package left at your door and then the driver never shows. I am also wondering whether I should continue to pay for Amazon Prime to get free 2 day shipping if they continue to use Purolator for my shipments.Date of experience: September 13, 2018

Name: Lorne Dyrda
Review: They just won't deliver!!The package arrived at the local depot on Tuesday and sat on the truck for delivery, but they didn't deliver; when I called they said the driver didn't have time to deliver but I would get it the next day.The next day they also didn't deliver; when I called they said the driver tried to deliver but went to the wrong address! The address shows correctly on their Tracking Details page. They said I won't get the package today; but can't tell me when I will get it.Date of experience: September 13, 2018

Name: Soup Minion
Review: Why do they not contact the people expecting packages?Ordered a package Friday off amazon using 2 day shipping. it was expected today (Tuesday) before 8 pm est. It is currently 10:32 pm and I have not received an email or anything saying that there was a delay. The tracking website says it is on it's way. I can't take another day off to wait for a package that was supposed to be here already. Live chat ends at 9 pm and it takes 2 days (whatever that means to them) to reply to a customer support email.Date of experience: September 12, 2018

Name: Onthefly
Review: No AccountabilityNo Accountability.   Left package in the rain on front door step and it was stolen.  Item was a $500 value and a huge box.  per thier own website it says if no one is home they will leave a slip and you can pick it up at the nearest depo,  But when we called they said they have "Lots of policies" and its not thier problem because shipper didnt say "signature required". but no where on the website does it say that items with "signature required" would be the only items covered by this "policy"   Have had several packages left out on the door step by them and everytime we are home and they never bothered to ring the door or knock.    Never had a problem with other  shipping companies.Going to be taking the advice of kevin below and ask Amazon to change my preferred shipper to something else.   And i'd suggest the same for everyone else.   Guess i'm going to have to get a Cloud based security camera system to catch these "thieves", but hopefully it doesn't come via purolator as I wont get that likely either.Date of experience: September 11, 2018

Name: Kevin
Review: AwfulThe worst shipping company to deal with by far. Won't leave inexpensive items but will leave expensive items on your porch which makes zero sense.Also forces me to pick up from a location that's twice as far from my home as a closer location because "its closer for Purolator Depot's" and told me they'd charge me to let me pick up from the closer location.ADVICE: you can contact Amazon and ask them to move Puolator to the bottom of your preferred shippers. Its an easy 5 minute phone call to make!Date of experience: September 11, 2018

Name: Chris Y
Review: Worst company I ever dealt withWorst company I ever dealt with. WOULD NOT RECOMMENDDate of experience: September 11, 2018

Name: Alin Steve
Review: They had one F JOB!!They had one F JOB!!! To deliver the F package. thats the second time that i buy from this company and they always make me wait extra days and make me call them and wait on the F line. F this company it needs to be shutdown!!.Date of experience: September 11, 2018

Name: Chuck Cass
Review: AMAZON CUSTOMERSAMAZON CUSTOMERSGREAT NEWS U CAN DEPRIORTIZE PUROLATER TALK TO A AMAZON CUSTOMER REP THIS WAY U DONT HAVE TO JUMP THRU HOOPS TO GET YOUR PACKAGEYEAH!!!!!!!Date of experience: September 11, 2018

Name: Hanoch Johannes
Review: POOR SERVICE !Very POOR service from Purolator, the driver left a Delivery Notice on My Front Door on Friday, September 7, 2018. ( since I was not home to receive the delivery  when it was made).The NOTE SAID: The package will be ready to be picked up at the Location Address: 30 Aero Drive NE Calgary Alberta at 11:00 AM on Monday, September 10, 2018.When I got there this Morning AT EXACTLY the promised time(11:00 AM), the counter girl  that greeted me was very UNFRIENDLY, NO SMILE, took her  10/15 minutes looking at her computer, walked  back to the storage area, went  back to the computer and 2 seconds later told me that my package is in another location, WITHOUT ANY APOLOGY! NOW I HAVE TO WAIT FOR ANOTHER DAY FOR MY PACKAGE TO ARRIVE!VERY DISAPPOINTED!Date of experience: September 10, 2018

Name: Hendi Lim
Review: Worst delivery company everA few months ago I ordered an item from Amazon, the seller used Purolator for delivery. The delivery man just dropped the item on my doorstep and never bothered pressing the doorbell. The item finally got stolen a couple hours after being left outside and it was all recorded on my doorbell camera. Last week, I ordered a $400 big sized item again from Amazon, unfortunately I did not know that the seller would use Purolator as their courrier. If I had known about it, I would have not bought the item. The item arrived and again the delivery man not once bothered to press the doorbell. They just chucked the item on my doorstep and left it out in the open so people can steal it.Stay away! Use them only if you are shipping out items that are indestructible and have zero value because they don't give a damn.Date of experience: September 08, 2018

Name: qw
Review: Shipped onceShipped once, delivered to the wrong place and was sent back to an address that I don’t live at any longer without contacting me. Said their drivers don’t own cellphones. Second time when I finally got my way to the wrong address and made an appointment. Scheduled between 12:30-1:30, Purolator decided they didn’t like that time and told me it has been changed to anywhere before 5:30. And again nobody came. I called Purolator customer service and was told that the driver didn’t like the address and didn’t want to pick up, and the person made my appointment canceled it without contacting me or gotten my permission. I asked if I should just guess if the driver is coming at all the service dude said yes. I asked are there anything they will do to make up all this mess and trouble they’ve caused me, answer was no. Worse company in Canadian history. What a shame!Date of experience: September 08, 2018

Name: Ash
Review: Can't contact their call centreCan't contact their call centre - Experiencing technical difficulties today ( or everyday)  - and the line disconnects. And their online chat agents are completely USELESS.The buzz code for your building is the defining factor whether this service will deliver your item or not. Even if you provide a direct phone number that you can be reached at to make for a SEAMLESS and hassle-free delivery drop, the driver's won't call upon arrival. Purolator Ground doesn't allow their drivers to call customers.The first Chat agent I spoke with, Janice L., was rude and ended the chat before I was done - she just told me to call the call centre and closed the window. I spoke with two others who provided no solution to ensure my item got to me. Nobody cared, nobody tried to discuss the matter with a higher up to ensure that I got my item since I don't have the means to go pick it up at a location (I ordered a desk). Very rigid policies, no ownership from anyone and no flexibility. Nobody in this company gives a damn. If I see that a business uses them as their third-party delivery service, I'll either not buy or cancel my order - which I had to do in this case.  #diasppointed.Date of experience: September 08, 2018

Name: Roger Cattell
Review: After attempted delivery my package was…After attempted delivery my package was sent to a shipping in centre in Etobicoke - 16 km away and a 52 minute drive according to Waze. That defeats the purpose of using a courier.Date of experience: September 06, 2018

Name: weidong sun
Review: The worst shipper!!!!The worst shipper!!!!! I asked them to transfer my package to their different pickup point several times. Still they did not do it and instead, they shipped package back to the sender. I called them to complain, their excuse is the shipper put restriction on the delivery address. For GOD sake, I am just asking for THEIR DIFFERENT PICKUP POINT, NOT different destination address! Their current pickup point is NOT my address. Why the hell they are able to leave the package over there?Date of experience: September 05, 2018

Name: Jason Wellman
Review: work computer was supposed to show up…work computer was supposed to show up this morning, tracking showed it was on the truck at 8:04 , 9 hours passed at the delivery was upto 8pm , at 5:30 it was updated there was break in delivery and it wouldnt arrive today , and i have to wait 2 more days for redelivery , this happened last week , problem is they didnt come , they didnt try , no buzzer rang , no door knockerDate of experience: September 05, 2018

Name: Alli P
Review: Worst company imaginableWorst company imaginable. If I could give them negative stars I would. I made an order off Amazon. My package wasn’t even sent out for delivery until 10:15am. Unlike others, I went to work today thinking they would leave the package on my door step if my husband or I wasn’t home. Get home from work at 4pm and there’s no package. I check my tracking number and it says it’s still out for delivery. No problem. I have no intention of going out tonight as it is. At about 5:40pm I checked the tracking again. APPARENTLY they “attempted delivery” at 5:18pm. I can tell you right now that that’s a lie. I was sitting in the living room right by the door waiting for it. I do not live in an apartment building so there would be no issues with this driver walking right up to my front door and knocking. As far as their “attempted delivery” goes.... there isn’t even a note on my door giving me options! This guy must’ve just decided he was done for the day and went home and called it an “attempted delivery.” When I called to question this I was told my only options were to drive 1.5 hours round trip to go pick it up or wait until tomorrow. Clearly Scott on the phone didn’t like my response which was to tell the obviously incompetent driver to turn around and actually finish work for the day instead of being lazy. So now I’m waiting for them to deliver tomorrow where HOPEFULLY either my husband or I will be home to receive this package. Don’t worry. I’ve already talked to Amazon who is lodging a complaint also. You guys should consider going out of business since you’re a shady company with horrible business practices.Date of experience: September 04, 2018

Name: Rose Hogan
Review: I have had numerous problems with…I have had numerous problems with Purolator and try not to order from companies that use them.  They will not leave packages at the door if nobody answers the door and then leave a note for me to pick up at a location that is half an hour drive to get there.Date of experience: September 04, 2018

Name: Adam
Review: Worst Customer service experience I have ever had...Purolator Lost my medication..I ordered my meds as per usual from my producer. Paid extra to have it shipped in one Business day with Purolater vs cheaper two day shipping with Canada post. Delivery day comes and no package. I go on the website and send a complaint via live chat. The ladies in the live chat had a supervisor get involved upon my request and had a tracking specialist put on my case. The supervisor calls and gives me the most useless response you could expect basically telling me he can't do anything. Then I am told the tracking specialist would contact me from both live chat reps and supervisor. The Tracking specialist (not sure if you can even call them that) contacts me via email apologizing for the delay and thanking me for my patience. I received that same cookie cut response from her about 6 times and have yet to receive a follow up call or any sort of acknowledgment that my package was lost/mishandled.  The package miraculously arrived 24 hours after filing the complaint (late at this point). Purolator failed to tell me what was happening with my parcel, failed to deliver it on time And failed to follow up with my request to report the issue. I have yet to talk to anyone that can do something regarding such terrible service. They are charging a premium for shipping vs Canada post. I don't see the added value? Why did I pay more for service like this? Should I ask the thousands of unhappy customers that write similar reviews? I will go out of my way to never use Purolator after this and I hope my review helps customers make a similar decision. Don't apologize for our inconvenience.....Do better.Date of experience: August 31, 2018

Name: Mahsa Satoungar
Review: Unbelievably unprofessionalUnbelievably unprofessional, very very bad experience. I don’t recommend at all.Date of experience: August 31, 2018

Name: G Thomas
Review: Consistently terribleThey are consistently terrible - frequently leave "attempted delivery" notices without actually attempting delivery at all. They are also the only carrier that cannot deliver to condo/apartment buildings. When I called them after an "attempted delivery", trying to give instructions for delivering to my building, the staff answering the phone actually did not know what a condo was, and it took a great deal of explanation. In the end they told me that they cannot deliver to condos (Or any secure buildings) because their drivers don't have any way to communicate with a recipient in order to gain access.They are utterly useless as a delivery company, as they will always force you to go pick up any items from their locations anyway.Date of experience: August 30, 2018

Name: mohammad hajikhani
Review: Similar to othersSimilar to others, I took a day off to make sure I am there to receive my package. The funny thing is I was keep refreshing my Amazon tracking page, and all of a sudden it changed to attempted delivary, no one ring the bell, no one nocked the door, no note was left. now I am supposed to drive for one hour to pick my package.  It is an obvious fraud, why they are not being sued !Date of experience: August 30, 2018

Name: Mel
Review: Worst Service all aroundI was supposed to receive my package Monday but it was delivered and not left on my porch. I did not receive notification that I needed to be there for a signature, so i wasn't. So I went on a live chat with someone on Monday and I ask them to change the address so it can be delivered Tuesday. I did not trust live chat was a real human agent so I kept asking for some sort of proof that the change in address had been made. I was being told it was and nothing. I was told they would do it at the depot and that I couldn't do anything about it. Very unprofessional basically telling me that's tough.When you try and click the “ Not available to receive your shipment?” link under the tracking details,  it shows this sorry screen that it does not exist. So what is a customer supposed to do if they cannot receive it, or give alternative instructions? How does that make sense you are not giving your customers any options!!So Tuesday rolls around and I wait all day and nothing. I would have thought that since there was a delivery attempt on Monday at 10 am that I could expect something in the morning since the address change is literally 5 minutes away from the original location. So I wait. Then I leave the office at 6pm and leave an authorization that says my name, address, tracking detail, where the package is from and that they have authorization to just leave it at the porch. I have attached the authorization.Then I get a message saying it was “undeliverable” at 7:22. When Purolator indicates the driver could be out until 8 pm that is nonsense it was undeliverable. The driver simply was too lazy to deliver it. The building was open and available for the driver to drop it off. This was absolutely not the drivers call to just not show up because they did not feel like it. There was no reason it could not be delivered.On Wednesday  I called the customer service number and spoke to someone who did not introduce himself, he was not helpful, he didn’t answer my questions. He basically said that he was leaving a note for the driver to know my hours at the office are until 5 and that I would be leaving a note to authorize leaving the package there. I asked why he could not deliver a message to the driver saying to get here before 5 since Burlington and Oakville are so close. He said the driver picks where he goes on the route.So I have waited 3 days to be told tough tits the driver decides when you get it and Purolator head office has no way of ensuring when I will get it or where. They do not have tabs on their drivers and have no control over if the drivers make their deliveries.I suspect the driver is inputting false records due to the fact that my package was deemed “unable to deliver” when in reality there were no barriers for the driver to drop it off. Purolator should be ashamed they are still in business.Date of experience: August 29, 2018

Name: Joseph
Review: I already filed a complaint but instead…I already filed a complaint but instead of reading and answering my e-mail, it was deleted without reading (my mail app indicated "unread message, deleted") and no reply to it. This company is a nightmare.It's not worth even 1 star, but -5 stars. Due to Purolator, I wasted three days waiting for my order."Your message   To: Service Customer   Subject: Re: FW: delivery   Sent: Friday, August 24, 2018 5:00:41 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada) was deleted without being read on Monday, August 27, 2018 3:10:57 PM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada)."Also, I am afraid, Catherine, you're barking up the wrong tree. Repeating lies in your e-mail has nothing to do with "communication".Date of experience: August 29, 2018

Name: Boyse Chase
Review: The reason the word failure was createdIf you want something on time then never pick Purolator. Don't waste your money on paying extra for faster delivery since it will be delayed later than a normal delivery period anyways.Date of experience: August 29, 2018

How do I give less than 1 star?How do I give less than 1 star?Took a day off so I could remain 1 meter away from my door and window so I could see and hear them coming since 8am. I frequently check the tracking information and it says that delivery is attempted and I need to go to 800 Kipling because redeliver isn't for some reason purolator can't provideThere is no doorbell ring or knock or anything like a delivery notice so I really doubt they even cameDate of experience: August 28, 2018

Name: lallotomax moe
Review: Puralotor is a nightmare as a carrierPuralotor is a nightmare as a carrier. No integrity. I placed an order expedite. The following day the order status showed as "out for delivery" I waited all day for my order and no driver show up. However at the end of day i looked up the tracking number and it was changed to not available status "building access code needed to get in the building "what a lie! What a lie, the driver never attempted delivery. Never ever again  will order and use Puralotor as a carrier. They should  stop stressing customers and have integrity.  they also need to be held accountable for their actions. Bad management can definitely bring down a company and ruined their business. I,ve called their CS and got a bunch of BULL! I was told that my package will be available before 9PM for pick up at their location but all bull! If i paid to expedite and the driver lied about showing up and return the package to their depot, why didn't my order get updated? Hope my package don't get lost or stolen by these unreliable untrusted people.The CEO should look at the bad reviews from customers and step up.I give permission to share my experience on social networks.Will update how this is resolved when i see an update from  Puralotor.Date of experience: August 28, 2018

Name: Nicole Robinson
Review: I will never use this company again.I've used Purolator once and I will never use it again.  I called before I shipped them out and was told that I would only need one waybill because the boxes were all going to the same address.So, I shipped out the four boxes. 2 big and 2 on the smaller side. Three days later I get a call from them saying I needed to fill out a Unaccompanied Goods form for customs. The form was the most confusing form ever. They don't have people trained to help customers with these confusing form. Then they revealed to me that they only had 2 of my boxes there and couldn't find the smaller two. So, after a week of struggling to figure out this form I was told to just fill it out for the 2 big boxes because they found the smaller boxes and they had already made it past the boarder. When asked why the boxes were separated they couldn't give me an answer. Annoying but all good right/ Nope...I arrived in America for my visit and I checked over my boxes and the smaller of the 4 boxes were still no where to be found and the 2 big boxes were completely destroyed. I had a ceramic elephant that wasn't just broken it was shattered. I had a lamp that was broken...a knife set holder had been broken... everything in those boxes I had to get rid of. But to get any money for it you need receipts. If you've had items for years you wouldnt have receipts and thats where they get you. They egt away with bad service and destroying boxes and losing boxes because they know there's a 90% chance you wont have any receipts. I will never use this company again and I really hope they go under for their bad service.Date of experience: August 27, 2018

Name: L
Review: Very Poor Service (-5 stars)My envelope was sent from Markham on the 13th which I should have received on the 15th. apparently, they tried to contact me. This is not true because of no voice mail and no sticker on my mailbox. and apparently was sent back. The company re-sent it on Friday and Purolator said they tried to contact me and such is not the case as they have both now home phone and cell phone. I even went Sat to see if it was dropped off where I've picked up parcels before and no nothing. So, today I get the new tracking number. ... I guess ratings don't have minus stars because it's a ghetto company that should not be in business. I hope they close the shop. I guess there's such a thing as the better business bureau to complain. The service is less than appropriate.Date of experience: August 27, 2018

Name: Dayana Izzati
Review: Painful days for my packageI am done with this service. I hate it. I ordered a coffee table from amazon since 1-2 weeks ago, and unfortunately, my table is going to be sent with purolator. The first estimated time to be expected, nobody came to my apartment. I called them, and they rearranged again for the next business day to try again. The second time, again nobody showed up. I got a call from them and they said nobody is at home; REALLY??? I am at home the entire day and they have the nerve to say nobody is at home??? Again, I rearranged with them for another delivery, and they said this time might be the last time to try to deliver as it is impossible to send again. So today on Monday, after the weekends passed by, I woke up at 6 am and waited by the door for them. The morning was cold and I felt sleepy, so around 9.45 am something, I went back to my apartment for a while for a hot shower. Just as I got to my phone, I received an email saying that the delivery was attempted, but nobody is at home. WHAT THE - AGAIN?!?!?!?!I hate it. I hate purolator. I have no car, and I am a student living alone, just how many times must I be this way?? How am I suppose to carry a heavy package all by myself?? I am trying to reach out to Canada Post right now to see if they could help me. But I cannot stand this stupid service any longer. How is it possible this business is still up and running?? The one star is even the most courtesy I could give to them, just because so far their customer service through the phone is fairly ok and respectful. I may update the situation for this solution, however to anyone using this service, yes you will have a hard time (not unless you have a car maybe there is something manageable thing you can do) to retrieve your package.Date of experience: August 27, 2018

Name: Anika
Review: Was waiting on a package all dayWas waiting on a package all day, tracked it and it said it was attempted to be delievered but no one tried to attempt to deliever it. Called their call centre spoke to three or four different people they had my package out for redeliver which never happened. Then I told them i want to collect it myself from their depot. I was told on many occasions I’d get called back but I never did. I told them not to redeliver because I don’t want the same same issue being told they tried to deliever when they didn’t  so I’d rather collect it and again it’s out for delievery. They can’t soeak to their driver but only page them that’s how they communicate in 2018 apparently. So I’m without my package another two days which was supposed to delievered 4 days ago. At this point I don’t even want them item. Purolator couldn’t care less about their customer service or have any sort of remorse for their customers being treated in such way. They really just need to shut down their company. Iv had problems with them over a year I stopped using them for a while and I fortunatlt I trusted to use them again this one time and it’s thee same issue from a year ago I experienced with them. Inexperienced drivers and people/managers . Will never use this service again. I tried to make THEIR job easy and collect it instead of being lied to but same issue they can’t even communicate amongst themselves properly or take down notes.I’m on the phone to them as I’m typing this and the driver just ‘attempted to deliever’ are you kidding me I’m on the phone to you guys and your driver clearly doesn’t attempt to deliever I’m home on the phone with purolator. Do not use this service unless u really have to please!Date of experience: August 27, 2018

Name: nightfiree3
Review: LovelyI always get the nicest couriers and my packages within 3 days. They were super great at redelivering parcels and then setting me up for no signature required as well!Date of experience: August 26, 2018

Name: Jillian
Review: Not goodNot good. Paid for express delivery which is guaranteed next business day and now it will be 6 days before my order even shows up. I wish Amazon would use better shipping companies. If you want to have a laugh at my expense here is my packages journeys at the Calgary sort facility.Aug 24, 2018 - 9:26 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Arrived at sort facilityAug 24, 2018 - 8:11 a.m. - Calgary, AB - On vehicle for deliveryAug 24, 2018 - 8:06 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Delivery rescheduled for the next business dayAug 23, 2018 - 9:26 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Arrived at sort facilityAug 23, 2018 - 8:18 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Delivery rescheduled for the next business dayAug 23, 2018 - 6:38 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Arrived at sort facilityAug 23, 2018 - 6:24 a.m. - Calgary, AB - Arrived at sort facilityAug 22, 2018 - 10:52 p.m. - Hamilton Airport/aeroport, ON	Departed sort facilityI contacted live chat today (August 24th) and was told it was for sure on the truck to be delivered and the scanning was just a glitch in the system, but now as I'm writing this its 10:30 pm and it's looking like I will not get my package until Monday, unless its lost now and I will never get it.Even my second part of this order which they shipped with Intelcom actually showed up on time yesterday if that tells you anything....Date of experience: August 25, 2018

Name: Rachit Bhanage
Review: PATHETIC"Reciever was not available""Address correction required""delayed due to weather condition"whoa !!I mean do you guys ever run out of Excuses?Ridiculously on top of it, the call center techie online counter questions me do you want the parcel delivered at your door? what ??  I mean that's what you are supposed to do!Sorry, I don't have time to travel to your remotely located office for pick up; just because of your mistake.Call Reference id: 7955102Date of experience: August 24, 2018

Name: Lynn Michaud
Review: everytime i have a package arriving…everytime i have a package arriving with purolator even tho it is schedule same day without couple hours from my home it always gets delayedDate of experience: August 24, 2018

AwfulShipped a package on amazon through purolator. Shipped it to a facility very close by and let my order sit there for weeks before it was automatically refunded, most likely because it was broken in transit. Huge waste of time.Date of experience: August 22, 2018

Name: Fady Amir Adeeb
Review: worst carrier everDate of experience: August 21, 2018

Name: Jeff Bowskill
Review: Should be zero stars!Should be zero stars!I use a service from my pharmacy to deliver medicine to my home. I live in a condo which has a concierge to receive packages for pickup and no one is home during the day. I have critical medicine to be delivered for my daughter and no matter what I do, Purolator will not deliver the medicine. I've spent so long on the phone with them, and so has the pharmacy. It's been a week now. They simply will not deliver unless I'm physically there to sign, no matter how many times both the pharmacy and I instruct them to deliver to the concierge. One operator I spoke to read back to me what she wrote. Her instructions said AT LEAST 4 TIMES to leave the medicine with the concierge, yet they won't do it. I've read the reviews on this site and on 2 others. It's all the same. This company seems to be universally hated by everyone that uses them. It's unbelievable how they're still in business....Adding comments due to the reply below. Both the sender and I were on the phone in conference call with Purolator and instructions were provided, both verbally and in writing to leave the medicine with the concierge. I understand chain of custody, but this issue was addressed. The sender is equally exasperated. We both agreed it was best to recall the order and instead to ship it to my work so I can sign for it there. What really put me over the top was the hours I've spent, while at work, trying to get this resolved by being on hold with Purolator, day after day. And when I finally insisted on speaking to a Supervisor, I thought I would get help, and instead I got a snarky attitude.And to top it all off, for all Purolator’s haranguing about how they can’t deliver because of “chain of custody”, and being unable to change the instructions even if they’re given by both the sender and the recipient and in writing. Purolator then shipped the new package to my work, and one of my co-workers signed for it - not me! What complete hypocritical imbeciles.Date of experience: August 20, 2018

Name: Spajos2020
Review: This company should be closed down.why…This company should be closed down.why they even in this business?.i lost my numbers and i dont remember even once they  deliver the  package  to me personaly.all the time they post a fricking note states that they missed the delivery and i have to drive to the nearest office to pick it up even when i left the note that i am home waiting for it.They put the notice right next to my note looks like teasing me.They dont know or care anything about customer service.Date of experience: August 20, 2018

Name: Maide Carabio
Review: This is the worst courier service everThis is the worst courier service ever. They always leave packages outside my door without even knocking to check if someone is home. One time they told me my package cannot be deliverd because of incomplete address but i checked everything and my address was perfectly done down to the buzzer number. I took this issue to their live chat option and once it was corrected was told that it would be delivered the next day. Next day came and still the same issue so once again i went to the live chat option and this time got a condescending response.Date of experience: August 20, 2018

Name: John Ronald Reuel Tolkien
Review: Avoid Shipping with Purolator as much as possibleThe rating is a 2/5 stars as the Customer Service representatives via "calling" attempted to rectify the issue to their best ability. 2 items are ordered from Amazon:Both in the same time-frame, same address, on Wednesday. Item #1 Is shipped on Wednesday and is received by Intelcom Courrier Canada Inc. on Thursday 4:19am, and is out for delivery at 7:38am.Package Is delivered and signed for as of 11:28am.Item #2 Is shipped on the evening of Wednesday, picked up by Purolator at 8:59pm, item is once again shipped after passing through multiple facilities to the intended sorting facitility. 7:03am Friday, item arrives at sorting facility. Package is then placed on vehicle for delivery in local area at 8:02am, to which the delivery is then delayed as of 10:40am due to a "incorrect address". Calls are made with the Customer service representative to determine the root cause of the issue. Customer service representative informs the client that the item was not delivered due to mentioned issue above, and will not be be available until the vehicle returns to the facility. However, the package will be held so that the client can pick up the item without issue. Requests are made to determine what time the item will be available, to which the customer representative states will be end of day. Client goes to depot for package, only to be informed that the item is still on the truck, and is advised to contact the customer service representative once again.Client once again contacts customer service representative, to which the CS rep advises the client that due to the location of the storage facility the item won't be returned to the depot until after-hours. Customer service representative advises the client of the current options, pick-up the item as of Monday morning, or have the item delivered with a 1 business-day delay on Tuesday. Client requests that the item be delivered on Tuesday with the delay, considering no other options are available. Key points:- One courier maintained no difficulty reading off the address, and delivering the item quickly and efficiently.- Purolator appears to be unable to determine the written address and effectively deliver the item. - Client's aren't contacted via phone while the item is out for delivery (The agents do not have cell-phones)- Information passed between the facilities and drivers is severly deprecated. - Amazon does not offer the option to select the "courier"Date of experience: August 17, 2018

Name: R Z
Review: Thank you the delviery in Don Mills and FinchI'm living in Don Mills and Finch, Pebble byway, the location is somewhat not delivery straight forward from some peoples point of view.I'm in the middle of something important, however I have to write this thank you note to the delivery boy so much.He came with allover his body sweating, I was about running to the front door to take my delivery as I know its heavy. But he almost appeared right after I buzz the front entrance.I have too many to say to thank you to him as I'm so busy to stay at home to wait for my deliveries. The lovely boy is soooo nice, when he said "I know, every one waiting for their deliveries", I kind of feel almost cry. Because I have a long history of dealing with UPS and felt no hope to communicate of the solution, because of their attitude. The delivery company of not just transport your good, everyone can driving, people also paid for service. Percolator at least this young boy let me see their willingness to help. I bless such a nice person and employee. Thank you Purolator for hiring quality employees.Date of experience: August 17, 2018

Review: they don’t deserve a star ratingthey don’t deserve a star rating.  they were trying to deliver a package on a working hours and there is no way to schedule a  delivery..  how can we receive our package at home when you cant even schedule  a delivery..  and  the thing is their pickup locations are very few and far...  you should close your business!!!Date of experience: August 16, 2018

Name: Bilal
Review: Worst everWorst everI have to pick up my delivery all the way from airport. This is just nonsense.Date of experience: August 15, 2018

Name: Vien Chen
Review: No more!I went to the Vancouver downtown location to pick up my amazon prime package for the first time. There was nobody working at the counter when I entered the store, shortly a female employee came out and brought my package out sooner after. I bought 2 small stuff but the package box was huge. I knew it was not their fault but Amazon’s, however, I was with my baby and I needed both of my hands to push the stroller, the box didnt fit in the stroller basket even if I folded it. By the way, I use Uppababy Vista stroller which has a huge basket. I took out the two tiny stuff I bought and kindly asked the lady if she could recycle the box for me. She refused and the reason was because their recycle bin was full. I told her I wouldn’t be able to push the stroller if I carried that box, and asked if she knew any garbage bin nearby that I could just run to throw the box and come back. She said she didn’t know any. So I was stuck there with a giant box and a stroller in the store and she was just not willing to help at all. In the end I placed the box on the top of the stroller canopy and carefully push the stroller out. Their automatic door was not working which made it even harder. And the lady was just there again not even willing to help. After I exited the door and saw all their bins, none of them was full. I would understand if it’s the store policy, but to lie to the customer is just not a good practice for your customer service.Date of experience: August 14, 2018

Name: Lori Murphy
Review: Will never use Purolator again!I recently shipped an envelope overnight delivery to a location 1 hour from me.  The receiver could not answer the door at the time, there was no attempt at re-delivery and they left a note for the receiver to pick up the parcel at their depot 30 mins away - each way.  (back towards my location)   The lack of pick up options in that area is not my logistic problem.  The receiver is not accustomed to shipping process and drove all the way to neighboring city to pick up the parcel the following day. I paid for a service, they did not deliver.   I refuse to pay for the delivery & they refuse to refund me.  I have been shipping in my business for 20 years and will never use Purolator again!  I spoke to a manager, who had no answer regarding the logistics of where the parcel was delivered for pick up.  How can they think this is even remotely acceptable to deliver the parcel to another city for receiver to pick up?  Beyond comprehension and clearly shows me that they do not care about customer service!Date of experience: August 13, 2018

Name: R J
Review: Our delivery guy left a parcel…Our delivery guy left a parcel containing electronics in the rain all day, despite the covered porch available literally 3 feet away from where the box was dumped. Now I have to return the item and wait for a replacement to ship - probably an extra week on an item that I paid for 2 day shipping on. Total waste of time. Purolator are the worst. I usually avoid ordering if they are doing the delivery but with Amazon you never know who it’s going to ship with. FedEx and UPS can be hit and miss, but you know if Purolator are involved it’s going to be a farce.——————Update. I got a response from Purolator asking for more details to this review and have sent pictures which show the soaked box. The response indicated that they are following up because it was left in the rain when a dry place was available, NOT because it was left in the rain which is perfectly acceptable to them. I also see the same cookie cutter response to literally thousands of 1 star reviews, so clearly the message isn’t being acted on...Date of experience: August 13, 2018

Name: Dave Armstrong
Review: Estimated Time of Delivery Not…Estimated Time of Delivery Not Available.... 2 day shipping to arrive this past Friday .... that stops dead in its tracks, company closed on weekend ... what a joke and this is not the first time of unfulfillment  ... Well this totally proves they are a Canada Post company P=PickU=UpR-youRO=OwnLATORDate of experience: August 13, 2018

Name: Woods
Review: How this company is still in business is beyond me.I am literally filled with dread every time I see that Purolator is shipping what I've bought online.I reached out to their livechat prior to the delivery going out that I was having problems with my buzzer at my aparment, so I asked if I could be called when they were at the door "drivers don't call" was the reply. Ok. Fine, how about a time-frame so I can keep an eye out? "Before 6pm"Fine, I can roll with that. I left a note on my door asking them to come up to the apartment directly, and ensured they could get into the building. I then get the notification that they tried to deliver, no success.I went down, and the door was still accessible, and there was no slip on it, so either a) they willfully ignored my simple instructions and were like "f it", or they didn't even get out of the van.I was banking on getting this package today, and now to ensure I have it in time, I have to bus across the city (which will take me like 3 hours there and back).Completely unacceptable in this day and age. And after seeing a number of reviews similar to mine, how this company still has business is beyond me. Hell exists, and it's having Purolator delivering your things.Date of experience: August 10, 2018

Name: Gail Sophia Taraschuk
Review: Horrible delivery serviceHorrible delivery service ! Paid for one day ship by 8 pm tonight ..no package ! After midnight now..no package ! I swear they are incompetent ! Do not do business with these people ! The delivery man must have been smoking weed and passed out somewhere ! Or maybe stopped for donuts at timmy's. I paid for one day because it was emergency diabetic supplies .  They should take their job seriously and stop screwing around ! Disgusted ! Heard a lot of bad stories from other people that used them. From what I can see even on here all their customer service replies to the complaints are copy and pasted like a robot ! Horrible !Date of experience: August 10, 2018

Name: Bean Zetta
Review: Absolutely disgusted at the service…Absolutely disgusted at the service provided by purolator.This morning a delivery came to my acerage a man in a white van sat in the middle of the road and honked his horn rather than pulling into the drive way. My dogs ran into the street at the man honking his horn on a road that has a speed limit of 80km. My dogs do not leave the yard! there was 2 epcor men working out there for at least 2 hours earlier my outside dog barked at the gate and my inside dogs did their business and sunbathed in the yard. I asked the man what in gods name he was doing parking in the middle of the road honking his horn he informed me rather yelled in broken english as he smoked a cigarette in his vehicle that he was here yesterday and that the outside dog scared him. He is an outside dog that's his job i explained also that if he was so scared he could drop it off at the postal service and we would pick it up. He told me to eff off and not to order from them again he threw my package at the ground in the middle of the road for me to pick it up he then put his vehicle in drive and drove into my drive way directly at my dogs in a very aggresive manner as if trying to run them over. He then proceeded to call me a effing b repeatedly and give me the middle finger as he drove away. What kind of customer service is this? Is this the way you think your long term customers should be treated? Your customers are the reason that you are even in business!Date of experience: August 09, 2018

Name: Ryan Lai
Review: actually not too shabbyi use it to transport my gear to my workplace. if i mail it to where i will stay in fort mac,  it arrives fairly quickly. just on time.though sometimes when buying things on amazon, it gets delayed once in a while. but always gets here. i can't relate as much to all of you other people but all i can say is that it actually isn't THAT bad of a company.Date of experience: August 08, 2018

Name: Difa Rbz
Review: Purolator is the worst company everPurolator is the worst company ever. They lie all the step of the way. Telling you one thing in the morning then another at evening. They didn't deliver then said they had the wrong address but we ended up riding that they lied just they would get rid of me. Then they made me wait 2 days to tell me that I could go pick it up at the depot. When I get to the depot that's 45min ffrom my house they say its still in the truck you'll have to come back monday ( in 3 days ). If anyone knows a way or a good lawyer for this kind of case I would be glad to sue them as similar stories happened to my friends.Date of experience: August 03, 2018

Name: aaron lam
Review: Ridiculous service and efficiencyRidiculous service, no idea why the business still exist.  Got the TV from Telus sign up, and deliver by Purolator (no choice of delivery).No attempt by getting into the apartment building AGAIN, no call or any action but just leaving the sticker note only.  There is building manager on duty, readily available whole day to open the door!Called customer service immediately, (note leave at 2pm, called within an hour ) and arrange for a redirect pick up point as warehouse at inconvenient location.  I opt to pick up the 30lbs+ tv myself as I do not trust purolator will ever deliver!  Customer service promise the package will be ready to pick up the next day.  On the next day, it showed redirecting at 2pm.I went to pick up point at 6pm, and it is not even there. Totally unacceptable service and efficiency.  Cannot think of any other service provider come even close yo this bad.Date of experience: August 02, 2018

Name: Leon El Nemr
Review: Incredibly terrible delivery serviceIncredibly terrible delivery service. I ordered a package off Amazon and saw Purolator were the ones delivering it. I was outside, my brother was home and I got called ONCE. The guy simply hung up and I had to call him four times to get him to even talk to me. He told me he had dropped off my package at home and I hurried back there because I was excited. As it turns out, he didn't even RING at my apartment (my brother got a package Intelcom delivered for me) and lied straight to my face. What's worse is that I had to call FOUR TIMES to get the guy to talk to me, before that he simply hung up. Horrible customer service, horrible delivery and horrible company. I wish you could specify which delivery service you can select for your package or at least blacklist this one, because now I have to spend a few hours going to get my package. All because the delivery guy could not be bothered to RING on my interphone. It's like he went out of his way to make my day crappier and also lied about it. 0 integrity in the workplace, so I cannot in my right mind recommend this company.Date of experience: August 01, 2018

Name: A C
Review: Complete disaster and arrogance.Complete disaster and arrogance.Very untrustful delivery, does not keep planned schedule.No notification in case of impossibility to deliver the product.DELIVERY ONLY BEFORE NOON!Have to take a day off or go the the edge of the world to pick up the marchandise from their depot.Simply the worst service ever witnessed.To you message below. Cannot find the way to reply to you message.All I can here from you is ´I am story, nothing we can do, the syste, etc,Simply I am fed up.Delivery, first attempt on Monday.Monday afternoon I call Purolator to schedule a second delivery.Impossible on the next day, Wednesday, today then. Confirmation number received.Today, Wednesday NO DELIVERY. NO MESSAGE, PHONE concerning the cancellation.I had to take a day of today to be at home awaiting a messager.I have spoken, a call to a Pulorator representative:He has been sorry of course. Name: Skinnersblade
Review: I wrote a negative  review on here last…I wrote a negative  review on here last week and got a reply from the social media coordinator so I sent her the information she asked for thinking that they would try to make it right , the cost me a lot of time and money by not delivering overnight airfreight for 5 days ( see earlier post ) . I've got several large shipments coming in in the next few weeks ( whole pallets) purolator shouldn't hold there breath waiting for that buisness worst bunch I've ever dealt withDate of experience: July 28, 2018

Name: Hamza Nao
Review: What is wrong with this companyWhat is wrong with this company? You literally cause more harm than good by existing and take business from legitimate delivery services.I ordered a package on the 20th and it arrived to the nearest city on the 26th at 7 am. Name: Iva
Review: SO SO SO AWFUL AND RUDE!SO SO SO AWFUL AND RUDE!! Tried to open a new account for my bosses business and went through the registration process TWICE and said they didn't even have my information! The customer service is disgusting its like talking to a wall. NO HELP AT ALL. UPS is so much better and helped me in under 20 minutes. DON'T USE PUROLATOR USE UPS THIS COMPANY IS DISGUSTING AS WELL AS ALL THE EMPLOYEES.Date of experience: July 26, 2018

Name: Justin Plourde-Desjardins
Review: I wish I could give no starsI wish I could give no stars. Ordered a new phone through a Rogers reseller in Quebec and unfortunately they had to send it through Purolator ... It was supposed to take 2 days for delivery, and it did, but the idiot that's supposed to deliver your packages can't wait more than 5 seconds at your door after ringing the bell! Else he goes away with the package and you have to call in to reschedule a delivery ... And the same thing happens over and over and over. Delivery man didn't even leave a note or a piece of paper like they usually do. I can't even believe they are still in business. Been having these issues for a couple years now and I pray everytime I have to use Purolator because of the mess they createDate of experience: July 26, 2018

Name: Narayanan Sampath
Review: LiarsLiars. I have still not got the printer shipped by Amazon. They have apparently delivered elsewhere. Not that I care, but now I have to fight with the idiots in Amazon to get my refund.SamDate of experience: July 26, 2018

Name: Ontario Sewing Service Service
Review: 3 Amazon orders in the last month late3 Amazon orders in the last month late, all Purolator. Never have a problem with any of the other carriers.Date of experience: July 25, 2018

Name: Ultron
Review: Pray that you get Canada Post, and that Amazon stops using PurolatorEvery order from Amazon that goes through Purolator never gets delivered. I've been home for every supposed "attempt" and not once have I actually gotten the package. Initially I wasn't sure why some packages were arriving just fine and others I would just receive an e-mail and then later a phone call telling me where I could go and pick up my order, but I eventually found out that the only orders i was receiving were the ones delivered by Canada Post, and when talking to their deliverer, was told that Purolator doens't actually attempt to deliver to apartments. A quick google search yields MANY other examples of this being true, that Purlator can't or won't actually attempt to deliver to apartments.Date of experience: July 24, 2018

Name: Bobbi Borutski
Review: So peeoooedSo upset, tracked parcel on Friday said I had to make appointment so I called and they said my parcel was scanned in as heavy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! really it’s a dress and 3 sandles!!!!!!!!!!!!!! So lady says can pick up or reschedule, she said Monday I stated no I would not be home so Tuesday, well it’s monday and they tried to deliver today!!!!! So again I have to call now I have a guy on phone he says it is to be delivered Tuesday- aaaaaa ya I just said that so why did you deliver today Monday!!!!!!! I know the difference between Monday and Tuesday!!!!!!!!!! So now he says can’t be deliver TIL Wednesday I expressed will be unavailable on Wednesday but he just went ahead and rescheduled for Wednesday after many times of expressing will not be available Wednesday, OMG really maybe retraining is in order you guys suck the big one should have a minus instead of starsDate of experience: July 23, 2018

Name: Dave Ellis
Review: The worst courier everThe worst courier ever! You’d think they’d just deliver them a little late that day, but oh no, your time-sensitive shipments sit at their depot all freakin day and night, and are delivered the next day at the usual delivery time. These people have zero pride in their work. Complete BS!!! Do you and your customers a favor. Use a different courier!!!Date of experience: July 20, 2018

Name: yang liu
Review: It should be No starIt should be No star! It is my fault that I did not hear drive was comming.There were 5 persons in the house, no one heard the driver came. Name: Jamil Daoud
Review: I do not know how a shipping company…I do not know how a shipping company does not know where first canadian place or 100 king st W in Toronto is ... literally can not find the tallest building in Canadaabsolutely the most useless customer service .. not willing to acknowledge mistakes or fix them .. extremely carelessHad to talk to a supervisor to try and get whatever mess they did sorted outDate of experience: July 20, 2018

Name: Matt
Review: I Don't Understand How This Business ExistsI honestly don't understand how this company is still in business. I ordered a package from a company while I was away, and they attempted delivery once, then moved it to their warehouse. By the time I got home (about a week) they had shipped it back to the company I ordered it from.I odered the package again, and requested it not be shipped Purolator. The company said it was not an option, and shipped it Purolator again. Once again, they attempted delivery one time before moving it to their warehouse. This time, I did make it to the warehouse, where there 5 other customers waiting and one very slow employee working. Luckily I only had to wait about 20 minutes, as 2 other customers (there before me) got frustrated from the wait and left. Compared to normal Canada Post or their competitors (FedEx) my experience with this company has been awful. Frankly I hope I never have to interact with it again.Date of experience: July 19, 2018

Name: Shahrzad Ghazisaeidi
Review: I wish I could give you negative stars  👎🏻I can not understand why amazon prime trust this company?!? are they blind to see the reviews and experiences, Are you (the one that answers all reviews in a way that everything is alright!) can not see how unhappy every one is with your company?!?!? how many people should give you 1 star so you change your attitude?This company is awful!! I asked amazon to de-prioritize this company (!?) from my list.Date of experience: July 19, 2018

Name: Marta
Review: Horrible experienceHorrible experience. I was shipping a breast pump for my best friend who is expecting a baby in few days. The shipment estimated deliver July 10, now the status shows package refused!!!!?!? I should read reviews before going to this place. Now I am worry the package might be on its way back to Canada. I spent over 60$ to have that shipping issue and also deal with my friend worry about the timing and fact that she might not get it at all. Now I will need to buy another pump $ 400 + shipping to have a peace of mind that my friend got what I promised her. This is unreal!!! Stay away from this company! I should read the sign, first I went they could not verify her address the second time they did not have a green envelope that always need to accompanying package from Canada to USA, the third time I went there I was finally able to ship it and now it is rejected by recipient!!! Seriously!!! Do not use Purolator. Some news to my shipment it turned that they do not know where the package is, UPS can not locate it neither Purolator. There is a chance it is on way back to Canada. In regards to missing info of my package? Well I had serial number, manufacture company, year of manufacture all listed on the shipping docs how more detail that could be. Seems now I have to pay custom and brokerage fees of additional 41Usd for the used 2012 medala pump, the cost of shipping  plus these ups fees are more then half of the price of new pump that I could order from US Store and ship for free to her, this is really frustrated situation.Date of experience: July 18, 2018

Name: Pallavi Jha
Review: I wish I could rate you a negative.I was about to receive my courier yesterday but the tracker says “receiver inaccessible”.Now how on earth am I inaccessible when I am at home waiting entire day.The next day I called up customer representative to check with them but she only helped me with tagging my courier as urgent.The purolator delivery man also called my husband to get the buzzer code around 11-12 pm.but I am yet to receive my courier and it’s 7:09 pm eve. I wonder with such bad reviews how are you still in the business.Also I wish if I could opt for a courier service of my desire I would never chose you.Date of experience: July 17, 2018

Name: Lauren Melissa Forgrave
Review: Paid Purolator $140 to break a TV into piecesPaid Purolator $140 to ship a TV. I received this item well past the expected date, and it was broken into multiple pieces. The box is literally folded at a 90 degree angle and the TV with it. I am not complaining about a scratch or dent, Purolator had to grossly mishandle this shipment to be able to break a TV into pieces.Date of experience: July 17, 2018

Name: admin
Review: The worst company everThe worst company ever, it is better to close down their office. The CEO should go and dig the terrain instead of being the manger.of course there is another reason why this company is nightmare here is the reason "91% owned by Canada Post"Date of experience: July 17, 2018

Name: D.H.
Review: Horrible company!!! Please Amazon, stop using Purolator!!!I cringe all the time whenever I check the delivery status of my order and see Purolator as the delivery carrier. This scenario is not new to me. It kept happening and I'm sick and tired of it. They're not doing anything at all with this on going problem. I ordered an item from Amazon and the Purolator site indicated that it will be delivered today, July 13. One of the customer service representatives on Twitter assured me that it'll be delivered today and another said it'll be delivered on Monday instead. What a joke!!! They're not in sync and don't really know what they're talking about. I told them that today is the only time I'm available to wait for my package, not only that, I need it this Sunday!!! Their website's tracking system is useless. No updates indicated, just the time when it was shipped out. Why put a delivery date on your tracking system in the first place if you can't deliver on that particular date? Now my package is lost somewhere and they can't figure it out. Really frustrating!!! What's the point of having a delivery company if you can't D-E-L-I-V-E-R. I bet, one of the customer service representatives will reply to this review and will tell me that they apologize and is looking into it and will get the tracking number to look into it the delay. That's all they can say actually. Same response all the damn time!!! SMH.Date of experience: July 13, 2018

Name: Sophie Baker
Review: Worst company I have ever dealt withWish I could rate them lower than 1 star to be honest because they dont even deserve that. Every time I've dealt with purolator, the deliveries have been days late so you can wait all day for consecutive days for a package that repeatedly does not come. Theres no communication when they dont reach your delivery date, the customer service is terrible, they repeatedly lie to you and nobody wants to help or rectify their wrongs. The burden of their errors always falls on the customer and not on themselves, which goes against any customer service principles that I've heard of. Overall, the service is 100% unreliable and the customer service representatives and especially the supervisors are so RUDE!!! During a phone call with a supervisor, I was shouted down repeatedly, lied to and even hung up on. Never ever again will I use this joke of a company and I'd advise anybody else the same!Date of experience: July 12, 2018

Name: Ty Mabee
Review: Worst. Shipping. Ever.They make dumb mistakes, such as not fully reading the shipping address, and then cover it up as a technical mistake. Now my plans are ruined. Thanks Purolator. F*** you guysDate of experience: July 10, 2018
