DON'T USE PUROLATOR EVER!Date of experience: December 12, 2017

Name: sahand azad
Review: They are the most horrible shipping …They are the most horrible shipping company i have ever experienced in North America.  Paid extra for a one day shipping (amazon) after 4 days of delay and checking their website i was informed that they didnt know the buzzer....the buzzer is in the directory, and no other shipping company ever needed it (FedEx, Canada Post, Dhl,....)  ...and then they called the buzzer next day and I let them in but they woudnt leave the packagte in front of the door...so I had to drive for one hour to pick up  with the package from the shipping center. ...next time if it the shipping is Purolator i wont orde.Date of experience: December 12, 2017

Name: Joanne Intas
Review: TERRIBLE SERVICETERRIBLE SERVICE - BEWARE!!! The 3 day service I paid for from Edmonton to Toronto took 7 days!! There were huge consequences for the addressee because of this huge delay. Customer Service was/is incredibly disappointing - it's been almost 2 weeks and after numerous requests, I'm still waiting for a callback from a supervisor... they really don't care! They will NEVER get my business again!Date of experience: December 10, 2017

Name: Rlott
Review: Purolator Christmas Fail!Ordered through Amazon and was expecting shipment (Christmas gifts) Dec8. I have to wrap and then send these gifts by tuesday next for them to be recueved before christmas.Waited all day, checking online for updates. Nothing showed! Sat Dec 9 online shows " check address". Driver either gave up or is lost. We're on a main road. I have to question if the driver wanted to go home early on Friday, or is incompetent. Called in for an update and was told it won't make it now til Tuesday! 3 days more! The package is 3 mikes away! Unlike the rest of the world Purolator doesnt work weekends! So what about Monday you ask? Well by the time they report to the dispatch the trucks will be gone on Monday! If I didn't call Saturday, my parcel would have sat til who knows when for them to call me and ask for confirmation of my address. That would result in my parcel being even later. Horrible service! The real test of a company is when something goes wrong , how do they fix it. Purolator has failed!   Edited. I have responded to the company as requested. Thank you Trust pilot. It took a public post to get some recognition.Date of experience: December 09, 2017

Name: Yasmiell Rodriguez
Review: Sooner or LaterBad customer rep. Useless service and completely unreliable. Lazy drivers and incompetent enough to say they tried delivery while clients are actually waiting at home for delivery to happen and can see that they didnt leave any notices behind. Parcel depot calls me at 4 pm next day, at their closing  time, to tell me they tried to bring parcel but buzzer code was not included in address provided. buzzer and apt. go together, I believe. I ask if I can recover package but they don't open on Sundays and they close at 4 pm on Saturdays. Website says 1 PM. Everything really anti customer with this Purolator. I know some workers even call this company SOONER OR LATER as a joke as they know of the terrible reputation it has. I don't  understand how this company even survives. Probably because they pick up packages coming from the USA to make money and charge for import fees while acting as a broker?  Who knows?UPDATE:Went to pick up parcel and they only had part of it. Most likely, i will need to go and get it again from 90 silver star boulevard packing station. What is the use of this Undeliver unservice kind of deal. Terribly exhausted and disappointed with this parcel uncarrier.Date of experience: December 09, 2017

Name: McLaren JSeje
Review: Can I give them a lower ratingCan I give them a lower rating. First they wouldn't deliver to my PO Box address, then they committed to deliver to my physical address but don't leave the major city!! So I had to go to the major city depot to pick it up BUT I don't have identification with my physical address on it (I had ID, my order documentation, my Purolator tracking number and they would not release my parcel to me). I was to phone "these numbers" and have them change my address on my order - how secure is that and why do I have to call, wait on hold and struggle with people that don't care, cant help and pass the buck. Get your it together Purolator and THINK about your customer's needs. Bottom line is they are getting paid whether they deliver the parcel or not, probably get paid additionally if they can't deliver the parcel and have to return it.Date of experience: December 09, 2017

Name: John S
Review: worst courier in Canada, maybe worldwideworst courier in Canada. Every time I buy something online and I see the merchant is shipping by puralator, I bang my head on my desk a few times. I ordered 2 days delivery from Amazon Prime. Order date: 2017/12/04 Guaranteed delivery date was  2017/Dec 6th. Dec 8, 2017	2:28 p.m.	Toronto (dwntwn/ctr Ville),ON	Arrived at sort facilityDec 7, 2017	10:22 a.m.	Toronto (dwntwn/ctr Ville),ON	On vehicle for deliveryDec 6, 2017	2:39 p.m.	Toronto (dwntwn/ctr Ville),ON	Delivery rescheduled for the next business dayDec 6, 2017	2:23 a.m.	Toronto (dwntwn/ctr Ville),ON	Arrived at sort facilityDec 5, 2017	2:27 p.m.	Toronto Sort Ctr/ctr Tri, ON	Arrived at sort facilityDec 5, 2017	2:26 p.m.	Toronto Sort Ctr/ctr Tri, ON	Picked up by PurolatorDec 5, 2017	12:41 p.m.	Purolator	Shipping label created with reference(s): 1, 60710634, DwRTsmqTk, PUROLATOR_GROUNDDecember 6th, rescheduled to deliver the next business day? But why? Why would it be rescheduled if its guaranteed. Okay fine, i get it things happens. But the next business day was 7th. So why wasn't it delivered?Today is the 8th and it is not going to be delivered today looking the tracking info.I really don't understand why people chose puralator. I hurts their business, it hurts their customers. I hope this company gets dissolved soon or get purchased by any reputable courier.Date of experience: December 08, 2017

Name: Tracy Dunbar
Review: I will never use this company again!!I will never use this company again!!! Overnight means overnight. Sent on Tuesday and still not here. They refuse to load and bring...even  though they come to this office multiple times a day ... I think I should get a refund, as they did not do as they were supposed to. I will be talking to my company about using a different courier and get some real service.Date of experience: December 08, 2017

Name: Mikhail Onishchenko
Review: Terrible!Terrible!How could a company like Purilator exist in competetive world? They do not  know nothing about the thing called "customer satidfaction"."Estimated Time of Delivery Not Available"How this could be ever possible in Canada? In developed country...It ts like "third world" class service.I WILL NEVER USE IT AGAINN E V E R ! ! ! My tracking number is:605448203964Date of experience: December 07, 2017

Name: Louie McNellis
Review: PUROLATOR DOES NOT DELIVER YET AGAIN!PUROLATOR DOES NOT DELIVER YET AGAIN!Well if nothing else, Purolator is consistent. Proving once again that they just fill the pickup depots and cannot be bothered coming to the door.   Yes I was foolish enough to wait Monday and Tuesday in hopes of an actual delivery. Laugh is on me I know and I waited until today so as not to take my frustration out on anyone not deserving of it.. Of course the tracking details are a joke and the drivers think they have their entries down to an art. Oh Yes, delivery was attempted and a time is pulled out of whatever and entered as a fact which it is not. Most likely why so many of us see the trucks stopped in any given area on any day for long periods of time. They need only go thru the parcels they have no intention of actually delivering and mark them attempted. I would really like to know if any dispatch or supervisor actually looks at any completed daily route to compare actual times claimed by a driver. Why is it that a courier company that is based on deliveries has such a bad reputation for not delivering? Gee, could it be that they have become just a lazy transfer company, taking from depot to depot and cutting out "to the door delivery"? Funny enough we are located in an apartment building and if the driver had actually stopped, he would have found me right there waiting for him at the main entrance! He would not have had to do anything more than pull in our parking lot. But of course how was he to know that we were anxiously waiting for the package? How silly that we did not specify that we truly did want TO THE DOOR DELIVERY. I am going to give the driver the benefit of the doubt and believe the package was received in Regina on Monday, December 4th at 10:23am for delivery in Swift Current and was also at the parcel depot in Swift Current for pickup at 10:08am Tuesday, December 5th. But where oh where was it for 21 hours (allowing 2.5 hrs highway travel time) between leaving Regina and arriving at the pickup depot? Yes it was time sensitive. I did try to speak to Purolator this morning regarding this issue via live chat but their representative Karen L referred to the tracking details and basically called me a liar. Through all this I did not share that we are a business. Due to the fact that the sender is a parts supplier using Purolator for deliveries and my next email is to inquire on an alternative delivery service or we will not continue as a customer. IF LESS PEOPLE USED Purolator, MORE TIME COULD BE USED FOR ACTUAL TO THE DOOR DELIVERY     .         Dec 5, 2017	10:08 a.m.	Regina, SK	Shipment delivered to RAYNOR C at: RECEPTIONDec 5, 2017	10:01 a.m.	Regina, SK	On vehicle for deliveryDec 4, 2017	1:47 p.m.	Regina, SK	Attempted delivery - receiver unavailableDec 4, 2017	10:23 a.m.	Regina, SK	On vehicle for deliveryDec 1, 2017	2:12 p.m.	Calgary, AB	Arrived at sort facilityDec 1, 2017	2:11 p.m.	Calgary, AB	Picked up by PurolatorDate of experience: December 07, 2017

Name: R. Y.
Review: Anyone has any suggestion on how to get your package as you plan by using Purolator?This is my first experience with Purolator and also my first time to write review. Sometimes we can not choice delivery company and I want to know if anyone has experience to get package on time with Purolator. I request a express evening service in Nov. 29 because I could not stay home during the day. I want to be sure I get the package in Nov.30. The tracking web page showed my package was on delivery between 5:30pm to 9pm in Nov. 30. But package was delivered at 2:40pm. I talked with the driver and he offered to wait 5min and also told me there is not evening delivery instruction. Obviously I could not get home in 5min. I want to apologize to the driver sine my attitude might not be good because I could not get my package. I call the customer service at 4pm and she sent a request for Dec. 4 evening delivery. I also filled out a request in Dec. 1 in company's website and asked for help to make sure I could get my package in Dec. 4 in the evening which I never got an answer. I had a very busy schedule and two important meeting in Dec. 4. So I chatted with an agent before I left for work in the morning and got an answer that I should get my package in Dec. 4 although the tracking did not show that it was on delivery. I chatted again with an agent at noon and found out my package would deliver in Dec. 5. I was stressed and frustrated because I was afraid that it would be too late after I get the package. So I decided to take 4 hours to pick it up myself and asked if it would be available for me to do that. The warehouse hours was sent to me and I was told I should be able to pick up before 8pm. I checked tracking before I left for picking up and found out the tracking was updated for reschedule delivery. So I called the custom service again and asked her to make sure my package would be available for pick up when I got there between 6:30 to 7pm. She sent a request and told me it should be fine. She also told me I could not reach the warehouse by phone since there is no phone. So I went to the warehouse. I could not pick up my package because it was loaded on truck and he could not tell me what time it would be delivered. I was really panicked because I could not wait at home whole day in Dec. 5. I went to work very early to get some urgent work done and skipped two meetings so I could stay home for sometime. Fortunately I was able to get my package in the morning in Dec. 5. It was not too late for me. I think the company may do not have the service they list or the operation system does not work well. I feel every employee did the job and I feel sorry for them that they have to face custom's attitude.Date of experience: December 05, 2017

Name: Nicholas Powell
Review: Worst Company - ever?!THE WORST, most confused company I believe have ever dealt with. I don't normally review anything as I'm a live and let live kind of guy but the standard here was the lowest I have ever seen and felt I needed to warn anyone that was not aware.I cannot believe they are still in business. I arrived at the door about two minutes after initial delivery was attempted. Found the door knocker and contacted customer service immediately, I was told it was not possible to contact driver and have them retry even though it was only 6-9 minutes after the attempt. OK, not great service but I understand. Was told it was available for pick up next day.Went to pick it up (an hour's drive) and was told it had gone out again for redelivery. Drove home and waited only for nothing to arrive. Called customer service next day, Saturday - was told it had been placed on the wrong truck and had not arrived back at the pickup area yet. Was 'promised' delivery would be reattempted on Monday. Monday, waited in again, checked online and it didn't seem to be out for delivery - called customer service again and was told a mistake had been made yet again and they were sorry but "ABSOLUTELY PROMISED" redelivery would be attempted the following day, Tuesday.Went online early Tuesday to see the package had gone out for delivery. Relief.Checked back a couple of hours later to see if I could get a better estimate of delivery time only to find it had now been delivered to the pickup area.Totally confused, I called customer service only to be told it was available for pickup.Is this a real company? You would have to work incredibly hard to be as inept as this, surely?Never ever gain will I use or buy anything from anyone that uses purolator as their delivery source.Date of experience: December 05, 2017

Name: Jane Skinner
Review: TerribleTerrible.  They told me three different stories re why they had not delivered my parcel.  Bottom line: I never got it.  Abysmal service, the worst ever.Date of experience: December 05, 2017

Name: aDi N
Review: The worse everDate of experience: December 04, 2017

Name: Hailey Mcara
Review: Run As fast away from purolater in less you like your stuff lateEvery time I pay to get fast shipping it alway latter then what the post office can get it to me. Do not use purolater if our just a small fry they do not card about youDate of experience: December 04, 2017

Name: Jay Lee
Review: Purolator  never delivers.Date of experience: December 04, 2017

Name: Maxime de Gamache
Review: Pick up location is 25 minutes away by …Pick up location is 25 minutes away by car of my home.. And they can't come back at a time i'll be home.. What's the point of getting delivery at home then..Date of experience: December 04, 2017

Name: Les Berry
Review: Purolator DOES NOT DELIVERWe had a package from Amazon delivered by purolator. We live on a farm just out side of Red Deer so they don't deliver to us. They didn't even call or anything. Just sent it back saying we refused delivery. Good way for them to rip customers off as they keep the money even when they send the package back.They also will not open on the weekend for the busy season.Date of experience: December 03, 2017

Name: M Kirsten
Review: The worst of them allI order a lot online and so far Purolator is the worst to deal with. I never get my packages on time and most of the time, I have to hunt it down and call/email multiple times before u get a reply. There has been a lot of times when I have to miss work to wait for the package, but it wouldn't arrive. Either that or they would say that nobody was home even though tthey didn't even bother to knock. If this happens once or twice I wouldn't have been as frustrated but this happens EVERY TIME. Its so frustrating to the point that when I know a store uses Purolator to ship orders, I don't even bother ordering from then.Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Neags
Review: Where is my item!!! Disgraceful company!Where is my item!!! Appalling company! I've ordered a TV supposed to be delivered on Tuesday, driver couldn't be bothered to deliver. I followed up to get it redelivered on Friday. No update. Seems the item has gone walkabout - either stolen or broken. Disgusting company, I'll sure as hell be claiming compensation from you and legal claims if it goes any further. Impossible to get through to, slow responses. backwards way of working, no communication.Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Marcin Andula
Review: Company name missing even though 1 item was delivered.I ordered 2 things from Amazon; a cutting board and a cutting board oil.  Items were shipped separately by Amazon with both items due on the same day.  I've had hundreds of items shipped to my office, never an issue.  Cutting board oil came in as it should.   Cutting board never came in.  Upon checking the tracking number on purolator's site, it complained the company name was missing.  ??????  My name was there, the address was there and the suite number was there.  It is not my company buying the goods, it is me.  I don't put my condo's name when I have things delivered to my home.  Outrageous, plain and simple.  The laziness and incompetence of the delivery person is beyond contempt.  I will never use Purolator again.Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Sarah Penpraze
Review: Why Even Bother?It's really frustrating to have to deal with this company. I've had to do so from two major Canadian cities (Montreal and Ottawa) and the only thing that you can count on, is that the service will be consistently atrocious. Let me first make it clear that I never willingly use this courier service, it is unfortunately the luck of the draw with some online orders.I have never once known of a Purolator delivery person who possesses the ability to ring a doorbell, let alone knock on a door. As far as Purolator is concerned, an attempted delivery means that the delivery person was physically present to toss the delivery slip somewhere near to your front door. If you are incapable of telepathically sensing their presence, well, the fault is obviously the result of your shortcomings. Time and time again, I have had to travel to the nearest Purolator authorized agent location to pick up my packages where I will explain to world weary ears that Purolator, once again, did not deem it necessary to ring on my doorbell while I was at home. A sentiment that they claim they hear multiple times per day. I finally decided that I'd pay for a UPS box so that my packages could be delivered there during their hours of operation. Unfortunately, when it came time for Purolator to actually deliver there, my packages got redirected because Purolator can not deliver to it's competitors; a claim which is simply not true and took lots of time and headaches to rectify. Things seemed to have been going well for nearly a whole season but once again, there seems to be some issue with deliveries to UPS. I attempted to clear this up with the customer care line. The automated IVR estimated a 10 minute wait that was actually half an hour long and the customer representative who spoke to me was condescending, dismissive, unhelpful and inattentive. It was like pulling teeth to get her to open an investigation which I'm convinced she only did in order to get me off of the phone.The following day, I received an email asking for a lot of information about my package including it's contents, a question which is frankly, quite invasive. Two full days have passed without follow up and no time frame was provided. The people that this company hires indicates to me that the company lacks integrity and even the most fundamental work ethic. I hope to one day see that change.Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Alaa Darwech
Review: Worst courier system I’ve ever dealt …Worst courier system I’ve ever dealt with. I’ve never had an issue with sending gifts to someone before it was always delivered but Purolator came up with a million issue. First they never contact you on your package’s whereabouts when it ships, you just have to log in frequently or get them to send you an email. They wouldn’t deliver it to the address because they didn’t have the key to the mailbox which every other courier does. After having to redirect the order they sent it to their office so I had to go get it but what’s worse is that they wouldn’t give it to me unless it matched my address but since it’s a gift and was sent to a friend’s address I had to ask that friend to come with me to pick it up. What a lovely way to give a gift right....Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: pischke
Review: Purolator comes through again..Purolator comes through again... /s  Shipping a phone from Burnaby to New Westminster (shipped by the wireless company - I didn't have a choice in the matter - distance approximately 5 miles) - "street number not found". I checked the address the wireless company used and it was correct. Everybody else is able to find our house quite easily - Canada Post, UPS, FedEx, Amazon...  I fully expect when I call them tomorrow I'll have to drive to the other side of Vancouver to pick up my package myself. I honestly don't understand why anybody uses Purolator - I have yet to have a good experience with them.Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Jessica Tebby
Review: Have I been robbed by Purolator????First of all I was shocked to see what a horrible rating this company has. I feel as though my issue will never be solved. So I ordered a from a company in Vancouver a week ago, which was to be overnight shipping that I paid extra for. Of course it didn’t show up! I received a call 2 days later saying the it had been shipped to Calgary instead of Edmonton and it would arrive on Monday. Ok, not great, but these things happen. When it didn’t show on Monday I called the company I ordered from to get the tracking #. When I looked it up it looked like my package was still in Calgary. So the company I ordered from called to see what the delay was and they were informed that my parcel was on its way. Nope! Still not here. Now I have contacted customer service to find out what’s going on. I was told they would look into and get backl to me ASAP. Haven’t heard a word back, even after I emailed again to check on the status. All I can think now is that my stuff was stolen by an employee or this company is truly incompetent! Now the company I ordered from wont reimburse me until the package is sent back to them, because of course its not their fault and I might be out the $200.00 I spent on my order!!!! What a horrible experience, I will never use this company again and I will always check to see if the goods I am buying online are using them. If they are I won’t be purchasing, :(Date of experience: December 01, 2017

Name: Philip Chung
Review: Many rescheduled Attempts. FrustratingSuppose to receive a package on Nov 27th from Amazon; as each day went by it keep on being reschedule to ship the next day. Frustrating part was I had to be home because they can't leave it in of my apartment door. Normally I don't mind going to pick it up at the local depot but since package weight over 55lbs i prefer to get it delivered to my door.Back Story:Day 1: Nov 27; rescheduled for the next business day.Day 2 Nov 28; rescheduled again never left terminal; contacted help desk; Got escalated to a tracking specialist. Day 3: Nov 29; Rescheduled again never left terminal; Tracking specialist contact me back thru email that the shipment has been push back again till tomorrow. Day 4: Nov 30. Status update: Shipment is on its way; however I was not home to receive the package. No notice of attempted delivery slip as well. Absolute no courtesy call from the delivery truck driver to reschedule to a later time or if they can drop it by with my neighbor/building management. Now the shipment is at local depot. Contacted help desk; got it reschedule again for tomorrow between 8am-6pm; Advised that driver is not issue a company cell phone to provide details for when the shipment will arrive.This has been very frustrating overall. I understand that there will be unexpected delays hence the quote "estimate delivery date". But if the driver had taken a look at the previous attempts of reschedule delivery and escalation to a tracking specialist. Wouldn't it make sense to just call the customer on their personal cell phone to check to see what time the customer is available for that day and arrange for a closer delivery time-frame instead of 8 to 6? Isn't it more efficient for both parties? Especially when its come to heavier packages I should give the drivers a benefit of a doubt, maybe they aren't equip with the right tools to view previous delivery attempts and escalation nor are they allow to use personal cell phones to contact customers. I would fairly say from reading all these previous reviews that something has to change. Maybe maybe keeping the customer inform and owning up to the problem and seeing it thru from beginning to the end instead of leaving the customer hanging. Just my 2 cents.I'm not even sure if I'm able to stay at home from 8am-6pm to receive this package.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Jennifer B
Review: Weather delay due to bright sunny day?8:37 a.m.- Package in Edmonton and on truck for delivery today. 10:07 a.m.- Service delayed due to weather conditions, service will resume weather permitting.Edmonton Weather- Bright sunny day. No snow or rain.NOTE- I checked the weather in Montreal, where the package was coming from, and it was fine both today and yesterday. The package was listed as having left the sort facility in Edmonton and on the delivery truck out for delivery. It was after this that the delay due to weather was listed. The update says that service will resume- weather permitting. Weather in Edmonton is very clearly being listed as the cause.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Renz
Review: WORST 1/10Bought an item on Amazon and the courier is Purolator, and guess what instead of delivering my item to my house, they want me to pick it up for them. Their employees must be sitting down there doing nothing. No wonder the rate of this company is almost 0.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Tashriz Rayhan
Review: 0/5 Stay away!This is just so confusing and frustrating! I purchased two separate items and have yet to receive them. I don't know what it is, but I've had nothing but bad experiences with Purolator. The first item I ordered was out for delivery from a location 15 minutes away from where I live. I never received it and it got rescheduled for the following business day. Next day, again it was rescheduled even though I was home all day. Today is the third consecutive day in a row where my package has been rescheduled and I'm starting to wonder if my package will ever arrive.  My second package wont even display where it is, as when I type in the tracking number, it says "Information not available". It was estimated to arrive 3 days ago, at the very least update the tracking number and show me something! Whats more concerning is the fact that Purolator is still a profitable shipping company, I just don't understand it. My experience with Purolator is the same as so many of other people who are having difficulties, I would not recommend using this carrier if possible. Stay away!Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Matt Henderson
Review: Never again!Like so many other people, I've had only terrible experiences with Purolator. I have no idea how such a woefully out of date, unhelpful and inconsiderate company is still in business, let alone profitable.Today is the second day I've taken out of the office to receive a package slated for delivery. Yesterday, the package failed to arrive due to 'high volume' and the same thing occurred today. Their customer support, the poor souls, are unable to offer any information about when or even IF my package will be delivered. I'm unable to be at home tomorrow, but they will not reschedule the delivery for the weekend, and the item will be sent to pickup location an hour from my home when the delivery fails.I'm not even in a rush to receive packages. I just want the company to make a reasonable commitment in line with their abilities instead of making clearly unachievable estimates andinsisting that I just hope they'll deliver the package. The lack of transparency is infuriating, and I'll be cancelling every amazon order that uses Purolator from here on out.Purolator's unwillingness to take any real action on this has been proven again and again, so I'm not interested in speaking with yet another rep who will fail to change this situation or even to make improvements in the future. I'm only writing this in the hope that someone else will see it and choose not to use this company.Edit* I will not send on my tracking number. I had so little faith in your ability to deliver that I cancelled my order outright. Purolator is now returning it to Amazon directly.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Edward Gray
Review: Purolator liesHi, I also live in Edmonton Alberta, and the same as Melvin’s review,   I also got a message about the weather delay. Today was a beautiful clear sky day. I would not have cared so much, but this is an outright lie.What’s wrong with telling the truth? Like, sorry we were too busy and couldn’t get you your delivery on time. That’s sad.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Melvin Melinka
Review: So tracking shows package loaded on …So tracking shows package loaded on truck at Purolator depot at 8:39 am or so this morning (November 29, 2017) for a delivery in the metro Edmonton Canada area. (within a 25 km radius of my home). Get a message from the online company in the evening saying delivery is delayed due to weather issues. Today's temperatures around metro Edmonton were above seasonal normals with clear blue skies... These people can't even lie properly let alone deliver packages. It is the 4-5th time that I've had delivery problems with them. No other company does this. DO NOT USE THEM.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: Antonio Cordeiro
Review: Terrible experience every single timeEvery single experience I had with Purolator was terrible. It's laughable that they are still in business! Their reputation for not delivering is absolutely true. First time I needed Purolator I had to pick the item up myself. This time my shipment got 'delayed' and no reason was stated. An agent told me they had scheduled the delivery for tomorrow, tomorrow comes and surprise surprise they simply 'didn't ship it'. All that and more than 20 minutes waiting for someone to pick up the phone. Unreliable, disrespectful, and overall just terrible service. Stay away from Purolator and cancel your orders when they're the assigned carrier.Date of experience: November 30, 2017

Name: J Star
Review: Have been waiting 3 days for a shipment …Have been waiting 3 days for a shipment via your company.  Every day around 5:30, the status changes to "Delivery rescheduled for the next business day"Been on hold 25 minutes and counting, this evening :(  If there was a lower star rating then 1...Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Jungkyun Han
Review: Worst company ever.Stayed home all day waiting for a package because Purolator doesnt give an estimated delivery time frame. It says the delivery driver was here today at 15:30 but that was when i was eating in my dining room, not even 2 meters from the door. Didnt get a knock or anything, just got a we missed you notice on the door. Took 30 minutes just to get connected to customer service to be informed that they cant come back today. I needed this package today as it is a present for my friend thats going away tonight. Everything is messed up now. Will never use this company again.Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Brayden Viloria
Review: Fingers crossedI was supposed to get my package yesterday as I have one day shipping, the weather was bad so no worries. But today roles around still no package, I checked the tracker it says on transit for delivery since like 9am so I called, gave them the tracker number and the lady there said  "drivers have been having some troubles today fingers crossed" so I guess let's hope I get it today?Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Sheryl
Review: upset with PurolatorI checked the delivery info and it says delivered 12:23pm November 29, 2017 Winnipeg, Manitoba. I checked the area and there is no package. In addition, my delivery address is Portage La Prairie, Manitoba not Winnipeg, Manitoba. So I am thinking maybe the courier delivered it to the wrong address in Winnipeg not in Portage La Prairie. I gave the right address yetI checked the delivery info and it says delivered 12:23pm November 29, 2017 Winnipeg, Manitoba. I checked the area and there is no package. In addition, my delivery address is Portage La Prairie, Manitoba not Winnipeg, Manitoba. So I am thinking maybe the courier deliver it to the wrong address in Winnipeg not in Portage La Prairie. I checked the tracking details and they delivered it in Winnipeg. How come???? I gave the right address though.Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Rose Doria
Review: THE WORSE COMPANY! VERY RUDE!THE WORSE COMPANY!! VERY RUDE! i have been waiting for my package for 2 weeks now. I've been staying my house for 4 days now waiting for my package the whole day, putting my work, school and plans off just to recieve my package, with the phone on my hand, tracking my package every half an hour waiting, also putting a note downstairs at the lobby (back and front door)  with my information (buzzer #, apt#, phone#, name) on it. after waiting for the whole day, finally someone rang in at 6pm, we opened the lobby door and I quickly ran downstairs arriving with nobody there, when looked at the tracking it says that they attempted to deliver it....it's VERY FRUSTRATING, THE DRIVER CAN'T EVEN WAIT 5 mins. for me to come down! and this happened 4times now! i have been calling the customer service for the 5th time! the customer service is very rude saying that the driver is not supposed to stay and wait downstairs for too long when it wasnt even 5minutes before i arrived at the lobby. they didnt bother waiting at all!! WILL NEVER USE PUROLATOR EVER AGAIN!Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Brandon Tsun
Review: Terrible Customer ServiceTerrible Customer Service, The deliverly man Couldn’t even be bothered to call me when he arrived or even wait 5 minites for me walk out my front door and into the lobby. This has been a frausating experience and probably won’t use Purolator again for a deleviery. 1 star for lazy workers with no common sense.Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Neil McClung
Review: Simple shipment of a part for an …Simple shipment of a part for an appliance - couldn't find my address so they shipped the part back to the US...when resent by the supplier, they rescheduled the delivery despite having it on the truck all day. Still waiting for delivery two days later.Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: Zahra Khanmammadova
Review: The worst company I’ve ever seenThe worst company I’ve ever seen. They never knock the door or use buzzer. I was waiting with phone on my hand all day. And they again left notification without using buzzer! And it is not the first even not second but 3rd time the same problem!From now on if I’ll see that shipping company is Purolator, I’ll cancel my order and inform the company that the reason of cancelation is Purolator! I’ll find other ways to get what I need, but never work with this company again. Even 1 star is very good for them. THE WORST COMPANY!Date of experience: November 29, 2017

Name: alejandro lavrador
Review: Skipped work, stayed at home with phone on my hand and ready to open door...Today I skipped work because 2 big packages were on delivery, I don't own a car to go pick it up in the depot that is far away from everything and obviously carrying two 30kg boxes on the metro is a problem.Guess what happened after wasting half of the morning with the cell phone in the hand and updating the tracking webpage every 5 or 10 minutes... The driver didnt knock, or ring, or even call me, he probably just walked to the door, put the notification there and drive away... This is totally unnaceptable. I lost 1 full day of salary because of the dishonesty of one of your employees for nothing. I paid for a delivery service, and not only I did not get it but now I will also lose money to pay a taxi to be able to carry the package that your company should have delivered home on my own, so basically Im paying you, and doing your job.Im completely unhappy about this company, and I will make sure everyone around me knows about it, because Im sure I will not get anything from you, except some empty apology message and bye bye.So to conclude it, I paid 50$ to your company, plus another 40$ that I will spend on a taxi, plus another 120$, to end up having to do the job of your lazy and incompetent drivers by myself.Date of experience: November 28, 2017

Name: Simon Bats
Review: They never knock on the door for heavy objectsThey never knock on the door... like never ever.I've never been able to receive a package on the due date. Always has to reschedule a delivery to my work where it's always open or go to their depot (outside of city center). Which is always a good thing when we're talking about a TV or a heavy object and you don't own a car...Worst delivering company ever.Date of experience: November 27, 2017

Name: Jeremy King
Review: Purchased an item off amazon and paid …Purchased an item off amazon and paid for 2 day shipping. According to tracking, the item arrived in my city on the second day but was delayed for reasons of "Natural Disaster" or "Heavy Weather Conditions". There was a bit of rainfall during the early morning. I doubt a bit of slush on the sidewalks could ever qualify for those descriptions. They could have easily delivered the following day if it was such an issue for them, but it seams they want to wait until at least next week because its been four days since it arrived in my city and I'm still waiting.Date of experience: November 27, 2017

Name: Claudius Zibrowius
Review: Drivers don't leave notices if noone is at home.Drivers don't leave notices, if no one is at home. Today, when picking up a parcel from the local depot, the guys there told me that this was actually company policy, because I live in an apartment. As if that was an excuse!? Surely, they can still leave a note, I have a letterbox!I assume that I have already lost two parcels this way, that never arrived. Now I know why.Date of experience: November 25, 2017

Name: James
Review: Still waiting....With a tracking number, I’ve now watched my package sit on a delivery truck “out for delivery” and anticipating delivery for 3 days!  This is after arrival in its sort facility. So frustrating to deal with this company!Live chat has finally put a ‘trace agent’ to determine where my package is and will contact me in 24 business hours.  It’s Friday. That means could be Wednesday! A week to find my package let alone deliver it from Pickering to Toronto. I wanted to pick up the package myself from their facility but apparently because it’s not a retail space they can’t accommodate pick ups. At the mercy of lacklustre Purolator. DisgracefulDate of experience: November 25, 2017

Name: Cynthia Murphy
Review: I give them negative 10 stars nowI give them negative 10 stars now. My time sensitive overnight delivery will be 12 days late if it gets here at all. It is hung up in a city over a thousand kms away that was not eve on the radar. Customer service promised to rectify it and have not done so. Email sent to the company 3 days ago not answered. Putting a stamp on it and dropping it in the mailbox would have been faster by far.Date of experience: November 24, 2017

Name: Running FL
Review: Purolator Express is guaranteed to …Purolator Express is guaranteed to delivered next business day every location in canada, me generally it from BC to QC, or ON to QC, it could cost you arround 40$, they are on time 50%Date of experience: November 24, 2017

Name: David Lebee
Review: Worst companyWorst company, they are always late in Winnipeg.Always using weather as excuse when its sunny outside.I have 2 reference number advising them of address change before the package arrived in my city and they still screwed up for a 5 min drive change.BAD BAD BAD.Date of experience: November 24, 2017

Name: Sylvain Demers
Review: They are unorganized and slow and late …They are unorganized and slow and late and make errors. FRUSTRATING.After I made a complaint things moved pretty fast. thanks to Trustpilot.Date of experience: November 24, 2017

Name: Van C
Review: Tracking shows my packing to be …Tracking shows my packing to be delivered today but after speaking to live chat i have been told it has been delayed and will not be here as my tracking shows.  What a complete waste of time.Date of experience: November 23, 2017

Name: Jetson
Review: To be honestTo be honest, reading all these reviews on Purolator made me nervous that there would be delays or inconveniences, but there wasn't. Transaction was smooth, and my order came one day earlier than expected on two day shipping!Date of experience: November 23, 2017

Name: Merih
Review: They make little to no effort to …They make little to no effort to contact you when attempting to deliver a package. They simply leave a sticker in the lobby and take off. Ive never actually received a package from them.. EVER.Date of experience: November 23, 2017

Name: Samuel Lam
Review: Very bad customer serviceVery bad customer service. I was sitting at the apartment main lobby for 3 hrs. There were no one came by, and I received a notice from their online tracking, “Receiver unavailable”??? Same as today agiain after filing a complaint. I am the company will close down. They never deliver “NEVER”. Pickup service only???Very upset I wish I can give 0 starsDate of experience: November 22, 2017

Name: Neil
Review: Purolator is utterly useless as a residential delivery serviceI have been at my current address for 18 months and have never seen a single delivery notice from Purolator despite their repeated claims of attempted delivery.Tracking information does not update until after delivery so that's useless to me.It has gotten to the point where if a service delivers through Purolator, I don't sign up. I just cancelled a weekly delivery because Purolator was the only courier available in my area and surprise surprise, not only was the delivery late to the point where they had to deliver it the following day, they "attempted delivery" and left without a delivery notice.What kind of delivery service in 2017 does not give their drivers the ability to call the recipient when they arrive? What if my brother buzzer is being serviced?If I desperately needed something and Purolator was my only option, I would rather drive across the country to pick it up than have them deliver it.Date of experience: November 22, 2017

Name: Ahmed Khay
Review: Very poor service from PurolatorVery poor service from Purolator. Slow service, cancel delivery without justification ...I have had only bad service from them. I would not  recommend using them.Date of experience: November 22, 2017

Name: Ben Dunkley
Review: Terrible companyTerrible company - keep delivering to wrong address!!Date of experience: November 21, 2017

Name: Randy Buchanan
Review: Worst courier in canadaParcel is now 7 days into a 2 day delivery the person in charge of finding won’t even answer the 5 emails and 1 call   Very unacceptableDate of experience: November 21, 2017

Name: Bill
Review: Don't Trust PuralatorI ordered a snowblower from Amazon that was supposed to be delivered in a week. The shipment arrived at the Purolator facility in my city within the expected delivery time. Nevertheless the package has been sitting at the delivery facility for 2 days and, because it is now a weekend, I will not receive my deliver until next week. I order a significant amount from Amazon and have had good deliver service from everyone but Purolator. The lesson to be learned is not to trust Purolator or when they tell you your package will be delivered.Date of experience: November 18, 2017

Name: Brad
Review: IncompetentI don't know how this company manages to stay in business.  On Wednesday a notice was left on the front door of my home that I'd missed a delivery, and an "envelope" was waiting for me at a pickup location that's more than an hour drive in city traffic most of the time.  I didn't know what the envelope was, and the name that the call centre gave me didn't relate to anything I was expecting.  I asked them to transfer the envelope to a closer location, and I would pick it up.  Last night I was called by the pick up location and asked to come right away because the package that has arrived is HUGE and it won't fit inside their business.  It turns out the envelope is a 157lb crate.  In the past when I've had large items delivered the delivery company has called and arranged a time window to drop off the product.  Now Purolator has to pick up the package again (It won't fit in my car) and move it a third time, resulting in extra expense for the company, and delaying the delivery by several days.Date of experience: November 17, 2017

Name: Mike
Review: Would give them less than one star if I couldMade a online order and got a door hanger from Purolator .Called the customer service #  and turns out they only deliver during the day when I work .The closest pick up place is a hour away and apparently the delivery guy cant call  you and have  you meet him somewhere because they don't have a phone .Gave them another delivery address where there is always someone home .Several days later got another door hanger at the original address again ! Called the CSR # AGAIN and they say they  don't know what happened.Gave them the new address AGAIN and the  delivery date comes and goes and still no package. Called the CSR # AGAIN and was informed that they don't deliver to the new address and they handed it off to Canada Post ???  I don't know how these clowns stay in business. This is not my first bad experience with Purolator but it will be my last, i will avoid them at all cost in the future ! WORST SERVICE EVER !Date of experience: November 15, 2017

Name: T VanV
Review: Horrendous serviceHorrendous service. Our box arrived smashed open and the merchandise inside unsellable. Despite multiple claims sent in online (and no indication that the claims had not gone through...) we have now been told we are over the 21 day limit to claim (this was also never mentioned in earlier correspondences with customer service). Shipped the 6th of Oct. Started to work the whole claims process again, after multiple emails and claims on Nov. 10 and nope, no money coming back to us. What a ridiculous policy, especially when we ship as part of our business. I guess UPS or Fedex will be happy to have us.Date of experience: November 13, 2017

Name: Bret Pagnucco
Review: Terrible customer serviceTerrible customer service, lies, lies and more lies. Do not use them, tie your package to lost dog, you have a better chance of it being delivered that wayDate of experience: November 11, 2017

Name: Emily Ponce
Review: Worst courier!  Do not use Purolator!It seems Purolator is living up with their promise,  to deliver consistent bad service.  Received a tracking info at 7:40 am stating that the package is in the truck for delivery to our place.  Since it required a signature I stayed at home to wait for it.  Usual delivery time for most couriers in our area is 2-5 pm.  5 pm rolls in and no Purolator truck.  Called their customer service department and got the same reply.  Yes your package is in the truck to be delivered today by 6pm as per Express Delivery policy.  6pm rolls in no package.  Called them again and agent said yes it is still a go for delivery and they deliver to residences up to 8pm and there is nothing they can do.  Lo and behold at 7:04pm received an email stating that there is a “weather delay”?  What weather delay are you talking about?  There is no speck of snow or drop of rain in Calgary and Canmore and the road in between.  In fact there is no weather or road conditions delay!  I should know as I am the Admin of the FB Group Bow Valley Road Conditions!  What a bunch of liars!  Called their customer service department again and even she cannot explain why the driver will state cannot deliver due to weather delay!  I asked for my package to be re-routed to their drop off point in Canmore and since it is the cut off already for their Depot they won’t be able to do that until Tuesday and I won’t be getting my package until Wednesday!  So frustrating!  And to add insult to injury,  UPS dropped off my other package today at 2pm without any issues.  Purolator is the worst courier ever!  Gosh even Canada Post is way better than you guys.  Surprised you even have a business with the way you treat your clients.Date of experience: November 11, 2017

Name: Caa Jaa
Review: Purolator - When you absolutely don't want it to arrive on time.Purolator - When you absolutely don't want it to arrive on time.   Also really poor customer service - they just dont even care.Date of experience: November 11, 2017

Name: Olga Bobkova
Review: Ridiculous Service!WinnipegI was expecting delivery of my Amazon order. They never showed up in the building I live in. Never called me. No notice left or some sort of a card, nothing at all. However, I received an email in the morning that they couldn't find me so I should reschedule the delivery. Which is a lie. At 5.30 PM They called me and just hanged up. Left a message saying that I should pick up my order by myself. Unbelievable!!! What an ugly service!DCM002905457Date of experience: November 10, 2017

Name: Boots
Review: This is ongoingThis is ongoing, but never have a felt to be considered a liar as a customer, as the mistakes this company is making with delivery is truly stunning and stressful.  I have taken the step of calling their head office to file a complaint.First they get address wrong, reading it incorrectly, so they wanted me to contact them.  I do so, and given so many reasons why it’s not their wrong doing, so after some hours they get address correct and tell me at least on 4 occasions on my phone and via tracking status online that I will receive my delivery the next day.  Yet less than an hour later whilst not at my home they try to deliver package.  I call them yet again and ask them why they decided to try delivery so soon, but I was told at first there was no such statement made that I would receive package next day, so this really set the tone as this customer was wrong.  They tell me the delivery will be next day.A rental truck pulls up by my home, and pulls away a few minutes later.  I had my front door open in case it was purolator using a rental van.  So after van pulls away I thought it was odd, so checked my tracking and sure enough it was purolator who stated it got delayed for delivery, so it could not deliver item.  The delivery person never got out of van.I am so upset by this and it’s the worst delivery experience I have ever known and I have to wait another week to get my item from them.Disgusting and truly worst way to make a good impression, I will never use purolator again once this is resolved.Date of experience: November 10, 2017

Name: ZHIMIN CHENG
Review: Can believe Purolator still running their business.I canceled everything and waited at home for a shipment “On vehicle for delivery”, at the end of the day, it told me the driver couldn’t deliver it because the driver was TOO BUSY AND WORKING TIME IS UP FOR THE DAY. My whole day was wasted and they didn’t even feel a bit sorry, f!Date of experience: November 10, 2017

Name: Fritz Britz
Review: My wife and me had a very very bad …My wife and me had a very very bad experience with Purolator. For me, it was about the School Supplies that I ordered for my children from a School Website, I paid for the delivery and so I am expecting it to be delivered at home. However, I don't think that they have somebody who's delivering stuff in our area as one day I just received a call telling me to call them back; there I have found out that I have to pick it up from one of there office. They told that there was no buzzer code mentioned in the address; however I was totally home and I did not receive any call from the delivery person about the delivery. Common sense, should you are in the way, and there is no buzzer code; call the customer! There I found out that their delivery person are not equipped with one of the essential tool that they should have: A Mobile Phone! C'mon Purolator! I did not mind that first incident.Second, again! My wife a very important document sent from another country where she was previously working. Unfortunately, the local courier's consignee here in Canada is also Purolator. My wife keeps on waiting for a call for the delivery, even visited the condo lobby every now and then to see if there was a sticker on the door for any delivery notice; she did it for one week. After that week, she phone the local courier and found out that it was sent thru Purolator after it arrived n Canada. She had a doubt then that she will be experiencing the same bad service that I had experience with Purolator. She called in the Purolator, and kaboom! they told that the apartment address written on the parcel was wrong, yet why nobody called-in and informed/clarified with her? So we knew that's nothing gonna happen if we are just to wait for them; we decided to have ir dropped to there office again and we will pick it up! Third, when we were at the office; my wife showed a copy of her picture ID! However, the lady on the reception demanded for a document that shows our address; i.e. billing doc, etc. Wow, nobody told her to bring the same when she ask to arranged it for a pick-up. We even clarified with that lady why my wife did not receive a call; and again she confirmed that Purolator's delivery guys doesn't have a mobile phone to call in the customers. Wow again! When we had the parcel we checked the wrong address that they told; there we found out that the wrong address was in the sticker provided by them only. We pointed it out to the lady at the reception; and she did not even apologize for that or provided some sort of empathy to a customer like us who've been experiencing a very very bad service with Purolator. she even insisted that the error is not feom there side. She's was not smiling that could even alleviate what we feel, and just insisted that if we have a complaint; just call in to a certain number. Left the office sooooo disappointed!Date of experience: November 10, 2017

Name: Ahmed Kasim
Review: Worst company when it comes to delivery …Worst company when it comes to delivery and even worse customer service that give you no more answers then what the online tracker gives. The tracking screen shots below shows the level of incompetence they are capable of, and to make it worse, it was the day one release of the Xbox One X- Scorpio Edition. Like put it on a taxi and F**king get it delivered to me!.UPDATE: This is pure BS!, Purolator is now telling me that the package is available for pickup?,  so wait let me get this straight, you completely mess up the delivery and the package spends 3 days in Purolator purgatory, and your solution is now telling the customer to come pickup the package?, the package you were PAID to deliver!.  Oh and this just gets better all the time, I get an email(nov.09) that informs me that the local Manager is going to make sure I get my package today(Nov. 10), well that just makes me feel so special,that the Manager himself is going to handle the delivery of my package. I have to ask myself, Is being a total moron a pre-qualification for getting a job at Purolator?, well it sure seems that way, because I just got a call this morning(nov 10) telling me the package is available for pickup. I ask the person on the phone, what the hell is going on?, I got an email yesterday telling me the manager is going to personally make sure I get my package today. She says well I don't have that information someone in Toronto sent that email, I was like do your departments not speak with each other, someone must have spoken with the manager here in Edmonton you would think. I ask her if she can understand where I am coming from, a frustrated customer who just wants their package, she goes on to tell me they can't control when something goes wrong, like the weather and a break down of a semi-trailer coming from Toronto, to missed connection in Vancouver, to the sort facility conveyor belt breaking down in Edmonton. Inclement weather I can understand, that's an act of god but when your truck and conveyor belt breaks down in succession that's absolutely under your control, its called "planned maintenance".She tells me she will speak with the Manager locally and get back to me. I get a call back later, telling me that the Manager has now confirmed he will make sure my package gets to me today at some point, can't be sure when or if it will actually happen today,as they will try and find a truck to put it on.  We have a 3 day weekend coming up due to remembrance day. Good lord, what a catastrophic blunder of unimaginable proportions this has been, or  maybe this is how business is done everyday at Purolator. Name: William Mitchell
Review: Great ServiceAfter reading the comments here I started worrying about my package ordered at Best buy, but seems like that concern was unfounded. I had a great experience with Purolator, the tracking online was accurate and up to date, the delivery person was friendly and the package arrived undamaged and on time. Great service!Only reason for 4 stars is that it arrived in Mississauga yesterday morning at 6AM and then got delayed until this morning due to missing a connection... seems like there's only one trip from Toronto to Ottawa daily.Date of experience: November 09, 2017

Name: Shariq Siddiquie
Review: Worst and poor service.Date of experience: November 08, 2017

Name: Charlie Zhang
Review: The worstThe worst. Every single delivery problem I've had this past year was with Purolator. They supposedly delivered a violin we ordered from Amazon a month ago, which we never received. They did an investigation and concluded that someone took it from our doorstep, where the driver claimed he left it behind our screen door. We get another one delivered from Amazon, and then two weeks later our original violin (which supposedly was already delivered) arrives at our door from Purolator...First delivery almost always fails because of buzzer code issues as well. I try to explicitly call them beforehand on every delivery just to make sure they have my buzzer code and phone number, and half the time the delivery still fails with "no entry code" excuse. I've literally have the driver call my phone asking me for the buzzer, and after I give it to him, he never buzzes me and then leaves, with the same "no entry code" excuse. I facepalm every time I see that Amazon or Best Buy delivered something to me via Purolator. Why are retailers still using this company?Date of experience: November 07, 2017

Name: Robin Geertsema
Review: Horribly bad serviceHorribly bad service. Ordered two packages at separate times. Both stated incorrect address. Address is correct and used for everything I have shipped to me. They wanted me to give my private buzzer number for entrance to my building which I have never been required to give. There is a sign on my front door for people to call gatehouse to gain entrance. When I contacted customer service they said the drivers were to busy to read a sign at the entrance. I found this completely ridiculous. I will never use their service again. I'd rather pay more for shipping then have to deal with this level of incompetence. No other delivery service has any problems gaining access to my building Edited: The response to this reply is also ridiculous. It was your customer service that informed me your drivers were too busy to read a sign. And now you want to email the same customer service for the same reason.Date of experience: November 07, 2017

Name: Glynis Knowlden
Review: I can understand why they have so many bad reviews.I used Purolator to send a package from Canada to my friend in the UK and I can see why they have so many bad reviews. My package was sent to customs, I was asked to provide contact information for the receiver (which I promptly did) and they never contacted her and simply sent the package back without recontacting me. So now I am out $175 and my hospitalized friend is out her care package.Date of experience: November 06, 2017

Name: Vee Wheatley
Review: Simply AppallingI’ve recently moved to Canada and I hope this is not the beyond appalling service one is to expect here. I’ve never encountered such inefficiency and poor communication in my life. I missed first attempt at delivery unfortunately and a note was left on my apartment door without me providing an access code to the building. I rang back to be met by a customer service agent who was insistent that their policy is not to redeliver but that customers arrange to pick up their package. Fortunately I knew my rights and disputed this: after an exasperating conversation she rearranged delivery. I sat at home the entire day: and at 630pm called and was advised my delivery is still in the way. Of course no delivery and no call. I called the next day to be advised there was a “driver emergency”—understandable but inexcusable I sat again for another entire day waiting!! Apparently a case was filed with the proviso that I would rearrange when I’d be home. Of course there was a supposedly blind delivery without my approval, and no card left. I’ve just been called and a message left to pick up my package after I have made arrangements for a specific date!! I’m a busy professional and this is entirely unacceptable! I’ll never use them again. Absolutely appalling service. What a disappointment. Steer clear. If I wanted to pick up heavy packages I wouldn’t ask for convenient courier service. Rant overDate of experience: November 04, 2017

Name: Phil
Review: Worst delivery company in CanadaI have been waiting at home all day today to receive a $3,000 Dell computer delivery by Purolator. According to the tracking information Purolator has delivered it to a wrong person on a completely different address in the afternoon. I contacted Purolator customer support, gave them the tracking number, they confirmed misdelivery, created a claim and promised the driver would re-deliver the package tonight. I was also supposed to be contacted by one of their tracking specialist ASAP. The package has not been delivered yet and noone has contacted me either. I will try to contact them again tomorrow, and if redelivery is not possible, I will request my money back from Dell or via my credit card company. Good advice: Stay away from Purolator if you can!Date of experience: November 04, 2017

Name: S. Weiterman
Review: They don't even get out of the truck..They don't even get out of the truck... don't leave a pickup slip and agents don't call to advise that package is waiting to be picked up. If I wanted to drive and pick it up, why would I use a courier in the first place??In response to the response from Purolator. My package sat with your agent for 3 weeks. They did not call. Your driver did not leave a notice. This is not the first time this has happened either. What use are your policies if you do not enforce them?Date of experience: November 02, 2017

Name: Michael
Review: Never use Purolator any more....Hi, i never like their service, however ppl in our company kept using them. However recently they truly exceeded themselves. They moved they billing system to  "online" in a way that WE had to download their invoices.  Purolator forgot one thing : to advice us...!!!@#$%???Naturally we did NOT get their invoices WITHOUT EVEN knowing about them. and when you don't get an invoice naturally you do not pay it either...??  Instead of calling us to ask what is wrong ..? Purolator put our account into collection...!!@#$!!?? NICE. Sure we are going to pay our bills and..?? never use this useless company anymore...Good luck "Stronger Together when you partner with Purolator...???  .." ...Not really.Date of experience: November 02, 2017

Name: Ritchie Stirling
Review: I've had multiple orders from Amazon …I've had multiple orders from Amazon via Purolator and I'm convinced it is their policy to simply drop deliveries at depots and feign a delivery attempt. I've spent countless days (not hours) waiting in my apartment only to find a notice of "delivery attempt made" attached to the wall of the lobby and where I can pick it up. The online service of tracking is also a very inaccurate and duplicitous source of information. And calling will only guarantee you an extremely long wait and indignant response frpm some operator somewhere in the U.S.A. It's all designed to wear you down, give up and just suck it up and go get your own package.I plan to contact each and every seller I deal with on Amazon in the future and if they deal with Purolator,  it's a deal breaker.And notice the response below my review: "Mike" from Purolator wants information to "help" only after a complaint of multiple bad experiences which are only part of the day-to-day common service. And you can't even rrspond directly. Just like their website tracking and phone service,  it is set up deliberately to make you give up and suck it up.If you Mike or Purolator are really interested, provide me with your number to call. God knows where in the world I'm emailing and to whom with such a basic and generalised email account to no one specifically. I've already wasted days. I'm not about to make you feel better for extremely poor service.Date of experience: November 01, 2017

Name: David N.
Review: Amazon made the bad courier choice...Amazon made the bad call to use Purolator to ship my PC parts. I paid for 1 day shipping and it was supposed to arrive today. Online tracking updated around 2pm saying that "Address correction required - receiver not found".Now I've had issues with couriers not finding my apartment since it's on top of an office complex. Which is why I always put 'REAR COURTYARD ENTRANCE' in the address line.Speaking to Purolator they tried to pass it off as the driver not knowing what suite I was (it was on the address line) and I called them on their bull**** because my apartment windows FACE the main entrance. No Purolator truck ever came. They kept parroting the same s*** and told me it will arrive Monday, and from the other reviews I see here they'll probably want me to pick it up from their Guelph depot. I live 45 minutes away and have no car.You guys are utter s***, and I bet I'll get the same generic "oh give me your info and I'll help you out" message crap they put on here. I'll never use Amazon again if they continue to use Purolator.Date of experience: October 27, 2017

Name: Kevin Reimer
Review: If i could give a zero star I would.If i could give a zero star I would.Horrible customer service.Date of experience: October 24, 2017

Name: Chris
Review: Worst Package Delivery Company Ever 1/10Having packages delivered by Purolator is really something I really wouldn't want anyone else to experience. They have to be one of THEE worst when it comes to shipping packages on time. I have personally had packages broken, delayed, missing... the delivery guys also don't even bother leaving your package in front of your house sometimes. I was planned to stay home all day one time just to catch the delivery guy with my delayed package which was suppose to come in. With my car out front and showing clear signs of activity, the delivery guy sneaked his way to my front door (not bothered to ring the doorbell), leaves a note to come pick up the package myself and books it.Just don't. Ship with anyone else. Even if it means paying a couple bucks more, trust me. Its well worth.Date of experience: October 24, 2017

Name: James
Review: Better than last timeI initially rated Purolator 1 star because they took my parcel back to the depot, which is very inconvenient. After calling and speaking to a friendly customer service representative, they rescheduled my parcel for drop-off closer to my address. This was a big improvement in the situation so Purolator is starting to earn my respect back.Date of experience: October 24, 2017

Name: augustine
Review: I booked a pickup and delivery through …I booked a pickup and delivery through Purolatorfrom Vancouver to Montreal and my experience was kind of decent.Good Points: Tracking the package through online was accurate.Customer service staffs were very friendly and talk very patiently.Goods I transferred reached good in condition.I really appreciate the service, without you guys it might have very difficult for me to brought my 55 inch TV from Vancouver to Montreal at this rate.Bad points :Delivery person lied to me.He or someone from Purolator called me from their official number (in the phone it shows as Purolator number ) informed me that they are at the front door of my apartment with the package.without any delay, I ran down to collect the item and no one was there.I was running behind all the trucks and persons I saw there.I checked every other entrance to our apartment and nearby apartments and tried to call back in that number it was connecting to the Purolator customer care.it was so cold outside and I skip taking the jacket thinking that if I delayed going down by the time they may leave.like I assumed nobody was there and for 30 mints, I was running behind the trucks and people I saw there.My request and suggestion to the PurolatorPlease look into the delivery services little more attention and provide phones for the delivery persons.it will make both the parties life much easier.I was going through the other reviews, that were you are getting a lot of negative comments.Please work on it.Thanks again for the service.Date of experience: October 20, 2017

Name: Sheila
Review: This is supposed to be a courier …So Purolator customer service replied to the message below asking me to send in my information. Waste of time. All you get is a blurb stating their standard policy BS. Still "0" customer service!This is supposed to be a courier company, right? Aren't courier companies supposed to be faster than postal services? Not! Not only do they fail on fast delivery, but they do nothing to try to send the package at a convenient time...you have to wait around for almost 12 hours! Use your friendly postal service, save yourself some money, and be guaranteed delivery when the item is supposed to be delivered and service with a smile!Date of experience: October 20, 2017

Name: Christina
Review: I bought my friend a  t shirt 3 weeks …I bought my friend a  t shirt 3 weeks ago. It was suppose to be delivered by Purolator. I got an email saying it was delivered. My friend gets home from work and there is no package at the door. He emailed Purolator and they "opened an investigation". They concluded that the package was delivered to the right address under the OSNR. So they needed to close the case. Well guess what a week since the case was closed a neighbour who lives 3 doors down came and brought the package and found it in her mailbox that does not get checked often. So much for your investigation! This is terrible this company needs better "Investigation skills" Because clearly the driver delivered it to the wrong address and it says clearly on the package 510 NOT 516.Date of experience: October 20, 2017

Name: Kendra Fillingham
Review: Worst Customer ServiceI have been dealing with Purolator for over 3 weeks and it has been the worst experience. The depot to pick up packages is very far from my house and I do not have a car. I requested via live chat to have my package moved to a pick up location closer to my house but they did not do it. This package was sent to me by my work so I needed ti sooner then later. I also had been using a shipping label from a previous shipment with my name and address on it and was told that was not proof anymore even though I had used it previous week. They claim the policy had changed two days ago but no one told me on live chat today. Three packages were tried to be delivered but the delivery person did not leave a slip a single time. I rented a car and went to pick up on my package and they did not look to see that it was 1 of 2 so I had to rerent a car a go back. The manager was rude to me even though it was Purolators fault. I will never use Purolator again and if I want to order online from a company and they use you I will not order. This has been the worst customer service of my life. I work in customer service and if I ever treated a customer the way you treated me I would be fire.Date of experience: October 20, 2017

Name: Larry Patenaude
Review: The worst customer service and delivery …The worst customer service and delivery known to mankind! When you're not home to receive the goods, they don't leave a notice, nor do they get back to you to tell you where they dropped it off, and then they send it to a location an hour from your address. How lame can you be!Date of experience: October 19, 2017

Name: L.B
Review: You're making my life less good.K, I gave Purolator another shot, and I feel like a fool. This time, the driver faked a delivery attempt and delayed the package another day. Myself & 3 other people were in the house all day... no attempt was made. Even their tracking system is a joke, I refreshed the page 3 times over 10 minutes and the 3rd time, the status changed to say that a delivery attempt was made 40 minutes earlier... and that somehow, 4 people sat less than 20 feet from the only door to the house missed the delivery. Even the dog missed the attempted delivery. I don't enjoy being lied to.Most stable adults don't. I am going to go out of my way to avoid ever ordering online from a vendor that ships with this dog & pony show of a delivery service. Use any other company than Purolator.Date of experience: October 19, 2017

Name: randy la
Review: RidiculousRidiculousMy shipping was supposed to come today and I knew I had an issue with my door buzz so I specifically put a HUGE SIGN of my phone # and apt # on the front door (impossible to miss it) and when I called the customer service about my shipping. They told me their driver are provided a pager to communicate between other drivers and the service centre but not cell phone. Ok fine, how about your driver contacts your call centre so you can contact me so I can open the door? Impossible, they can NOT do that. I mean a big delivery company such as yours is not able to make a phone call to customers ? It was the bigger joke I've ever heard. I don't know why this carrier still exists with this kind of mediocre services. Just ridiculous.Date of experience: October 19, 2017

Name: Setnara Andres
Review: As bad as it gets...As bad as it gets...1 - promissed delivery one day: failed2 - promissed to contact: failed3 - promissed to deliver a second time: failed4 - promissed to deliver a third time: failed5 - promissed ot contact a second time: failedI have some mottos Purolator could adopt:"Purolator... and you thought it couldn't get worst"or "Purolator... we don't give a s#!t!"or"Purolator... we deliver... sometimes... eventually... whenever we feel like..."or "Purolator: we don't go where everybody has gone before"Date of experience: October 19, 2017

Name: ParKar
Review: Not bad, but...I honestly didn't have too many problems with this service. I had to send in a video game console across the country to get it repaired and from what it seems, that was perfectly okay. The only problem was THE TRACKING NUMBER DID NOT WORK. This made me insanely paranoid, because from my point of view it hadn't moved in ten days. If that was just a problem in their system then, forgiven. If it was someone who forgot to write something down, understandable. However the people helping resolve the issue did seem like they really cared, whether they did or they didn't, that's how it felt.Date of experience: October 18, 2017

Name: Mia Isnot Adog
Review: They never ring the door bell or even …They never ring the door bell or even attempt to hand deliver like they're supposed to and basically you're forced to pick it up in person which is a hassle for someone who already paid shipping and handling because they wanted it DELIVERED AT THE DOOR, as well as some people have disabilities or don't have cars. Worthless.Date of experience: October 18, 2017

Name: Ed
Review: Parcels out for delivery for almost 2 weeks.Absolutely the worst. My items have been out for delivery for almost two weeks now. As all the call centre can say is some time between 8am and 8 pm. I have taken 3 days off work and they never show.  One of the four parcels disappeared so after searching for a week they tell me to file a claim. Next day they try to deliver it. Of course I can't take more time off work now. But why would I take the day off when I filed a claim yesterday.   Once again my order is out for delivery. 7:30 pm and another no show.  I think they don't want to deliver just hang notices on the door so you have to pick it up your self.  Great job for delivery drivers. Refuse to deliver until your customer can't take any more time off work and then leave the delivery slip as they only attempt delivery once.Great work puro, you have the worst service.  Your call centre people just lie to people who call in.  I have been told so many stories (lies) that I do t know what the truth is. My favourite it that you have only one delivery truck in Edmonton.  And the putting you on hold forever to talk to a supervisor who will get it delivered today for the 5th day in a row is very week. Just tell your customers that they are not important.Date of experience: October 18, 2017

Name: Dylan leaman
Review: I’ve ordered my prescription medication …I’ve ordered my prescription medication with one day shipping and delivery it’s now a week later and it was delayed due to a missed delivery this is totally in acceptable and I will not be using this again, I’ve had to wait in stress and anxiety due to or poor service and lazy drivers will not use againDate of experience: October 17, 2017

Name: Jack Brown
Review: I think one star is more than …I think one star is more than generous!!!I sent a package on Friday, October 13th and was told it would be at its destination by 10:30 am on Monday, October 16.
