I actually paid EXTRA for this expedited delivery. Turns out there was some kind of US Customs audit and as of this writing (October 17th) the delivery has yet to be made. I am told by Purolator that since it is "Out of their control" there is nothing they "can" (ie read 'WILL") do about it. There was no mention of the possibility of such an audit when I paid extra. Surely this has happened before. I agree with the previous comment "Worst company ever".  I will not use Purolator again.Date of experience: October 17, 2017

Name: Ann
Review: Worst company everWorst ever company - Purolator! I don't understand why Amazon uses Purolator to do the delivery! Horrible customer service on the phone, the driver came three times and didn't bother to deliver the parcel, extremely rude attitude, 5 days delay of my parcel delivery! I will not renew my Amazon Prime membership if they continue use Purolator as their courier!Date of experience: October 17, 2017

Name: Jeff Smith
Review: Order didn't show upOrder didn't show up. No note on my front door. Got an email from Amazon saying delivery was attempted... called Amazon they called Purolator with me on the line after a few minutes on hold Amazon customer service gave up on that... I have never had a first time delivery successful from Purolator. You guys promise more than you can deliver.Date of experience: October 16, 2017

Name: Lizeth Montoya
Review: Worst customer service experienceWorst customer service experience. Very rude woman at the counter at the Adelaide location.Date of experience: October 16, 2017

Name: David
Review: Get with the timesNow I am getting a sense why there is so much frustration with Purolator.  Why can't I just have my packages left at my door? All other delivery vendors can do this except purolator.  Now I have to wait the weekend.  Also tracking is down on your website and I have no indication if it will be redelivered or if I am expected to pick it up.  Get with it,I am going to convey this experience to amazon as well.Date of experience: October 14, 2017

Name: michal boguslawski
Review: God damn awfulGod damn awful. Tracking said it would be here on Friday the 13th, took the day off so I wouldn't miss the package. At 630 they update the website that it won't be delivered till Monday.... Offered to pick it up myself... no, offered to meet the driver... No. Worst company ever... Now I'll be working 12 hour shifts Monday to Friday and will probably miss all those deliveriesDate of experience: October 13, 2017

Name: glenn
Review: First off I pay 90$ for a 2 lb package …First off I pay 90$ for a 2 lb package that could have been folded and taped to cut down in charges.   90 dollars from Cranbrook BC to Calgary is OUTRAGEOUS!!!!! For that price it better come with a back rub and delivered with flowers!   Then when I tracked the package i was told it was delayed due to some "Mechanical" issue.  Purolator immediately hide behind that reason as said "sorry out of our hands but you know....its mechanical"   I raged that for the price i paid they needed to find a way to get me this package.  I was told that it would be impossible because the package would be in some trailer not sorted yet and could possibly sent the next day or 2! It should be noted that i am the primary shipper of the package but will be billed by the shipper from Cranbrook.  I was told I could not get any more info on the package due to this issue.  I spoke with the shipper from Cranbrook BC who was told that the pack would be coming same day and they "found" the package and if it was not shipped that evening, the shipping costs would be free.    I leave the gate open of my secluded acreage leaving all yard lights on, garage door open and waited until about 640Pm.  I then decide to take a quick shower only to get out at 648PM to see a tag taped to my door.  "LOOKS LIKE WE MISSED YOU"   Yes i was explained the policy of signing for packages but this one was a bit hard to swallow.    I find it funny when the company could be out the massive 90 shipping cost if they dont step up and honor their shipment  and magic....package arrives.   Only to leave a tag that will cause me to now drive into a center to pick up the package.    Remember  all this for 90 dollars for a 2 lb package!!!!!!!!!!   What can i say ...never again......any online shopping with that uses Purolator I will stay away from.   UPS and DHL always come to our acreage and will discretely leave the package or even call me to tell me where and when they left the package..Date of experience: October 13, 2017

Name: Kiniamaro
Review: The worse excuse for a Carrier serviceThe worse excuse for a Carrier service. I hope they go out of business.Date of experience: October 13, 2017

Name: Cori Laika
Review: I Hate when Amazon decides to use …I Hate when Amazon decides to use Purolator, it's almost a guaranteed failure.They do not buzz up, they do not knock, and they don't even leave a notice of delivery or even send an email.I've ordered many products off amazon...Every single other courier is FAR better.I'd rather use Canada post snail mail and wait 10 times the amount of time than have them "Attempt" another delivery. STAY away... demand a different courierDate of experience: October 12, 2017

Name: Blanca
Review: Not even worth the try...Not even worth the try...I am an exchange student who just arrived to Montreal, and I ordered and acoustic guitar through Best Buy. They were supposed to send it via Purolator. When the driver came to the building I live in, he didn't even attempt to come up to my apartment, he directly gave a notice to the lady in the front desk (we checked the camera footage), even though I had given the EXACT address with my apartment number. The time didn't even match the time of the 'attempted delivery' they put up on the online tracking! And even though there is a Purolator branch downtown where I live in, they took it to one that is 15km away! I do not own a car and I had two take a bus and an Uber to get there (an hour and a half journey).Not only this; when I got there, the lady at the counter refused to give me my package, even when showing my passport and the bill from Best Buy with ALL MY INFORMATION ON IT. She was keen on getting an ID with my canadian address on it, which I obviously DON'T have because I am an exchange student living here for under a year. I even showed her my LEASE with my address on it and she still wouldn't buy it; said it could be 'forged'. A lease is binding to all parties included on it AND it is a LEGAL DOCUMENT. Forging it would result on FELONY.  I know this because I study law, and maybe you should try instructing your workers on it. How stupid can you be to think I would forge a lease to get a package I have a receipt for? Don't even care about the response, already found the worst service in Canada and I see everyone here agrees with me.Date of experience: October 12, 2017

Name: Parminder
Review: Absolutely UnacceptableDear Sir/Ma'am, I've got a shipping with Purolator a few times and most of my experiences have been unacceptable, this one however was the worst. I had a package coming from twenty kilometers it contained some important documents. I only asked for it to be delivered in the evening because I work all day. They ended up not showing up, and not leaving any notice. I called them and asked them about it. The package never came and they told me that if I wanted the package I would have to come retrieve it myself. I tried to argue that I payed for shipping and if I wanted to pick it up I would've gotten it myself, however then I asked them to just drop it off at the nearest pickup station to my home. This is when your employee told me that I would have to come pick it up from their office or they would send it back, then proceeded to use foul-language. Never shipping with Purolator again.Date of experience: October 12, 2017

Name: Thistle
Review: the worstone of the worst experiences with a shipping company I have ever had.  Completely negligent in not delivery my package in a timely matter, did not contact the shipper or the receiver when trying to deliver the package, damaged the package, lost items and then invoiced me for more money.Date of experience: October 11, 2017

Name: Laetitia Pancrazi
Review: WORST WORST WORST OF THE WORSTWORST WORST WORST OF THE WORSTSeriously how hard is it to ring a buzzer number!!!!!!! Told me they came by. I waited at home ALL DAY no one came. And I gave the buzzer number and the apartment number and my phone number. They could have called. TERRIBLE! So annoyed and angry to pay for this service! Why do you even exist????Date of experience: October 11, 2017

Name: Jyoshna Kothapally
Review: Purolator NightMareI wish to give no star , or - ratings if available. I ordered things from amazon and it choose purolator to deliver. They dont give us call nor estimated delivery time but they expect us to be at home sitting for them to deliver the package as if we dint have any other work than getting and waiting for the package to be delivered. There customer service is worst they asked to go for pickup only because they attempted delivery and no one at home. If i have time to go for pickup why would i order home delivery wasting money. Disgusting Purolator. They never change they want to torture customers. I ordered a phone and that company choose purolator to send that to me and guess what they just returned that back to sender saying receiver was not at home. Hate this purolator services to core.Then you people please start delivering packages only at evenings and weekends. So that we will be at home to collect the package. They don't have minimum common sense too. They don't even call to customer to confirm.Date of experience: October 07, 2017

Name: kyle
Review: never on timeWhat a garbage company, ordered something last August it sat on a drivers truck for FOUR DAYS, and still no delivery. I had to go to the depot myself and pick it up. Filed a complaint with the depot manager.... and guess what he closed the complaint with no action taken. Three weeks later i went to the unresolved complaints department and they agreed to refund me my money. but it doesn't end there....Ordered a parcel from Toronto it was due to arrive Oct 4 2017, well it actually arrived Oct 6 2017.Date of experience: October 07, 2017

Name: Heva
Review: They never deliver on timeThey never ever have delivered on th date that they should have. And most of the time they won't even leave a notice and then they give lame excuses. I love shopping through Amazon but my biggest complain against them is that they choose Purolator alot for delivery services even though many times I have requested Amazon to leave a note in my account so that my items are not being delivered by them. It gets so frustrating dealing with them.Date of experience: October 06, 2017

Name: Tammy Angela Kindred
Review: I absolutely do not like PurolatorI absolutely do not like Purolator!  Everytime Amazon ships my orders via Purolator, I can bet the delivery will be late by at least one to two days!  I pay prime membership so i can get fast two day delivery!  I have even had Purolator try to justify their late delivery by saying it was "bad weather". I live 20 minutes from the Purolator warehouse!  It was warm and sunny here!  I highly recommend staying away from Purolator!  Worst, worst delivery service I have ever seen!Date of experience: October 05, 2017

Name: Leo
Review: I can confidently and evidently say …I can confidently and evidently say that Purolator is ONLY ALIVE because that stupid Amazon.ca keeps choosing to disgust us customers and use it as the courier. I have absolutely no idea who in his right mind would use this company to deliver anything at a cost.Date of experience: October 05, 2017

Name: CZ
Review: i wish i could give no star at all.i wish i could give no star at all.no phone call or door know before the delivery, but i was at home the whole day expecting my package which is an piano!!!the delivery status says "attempted delivery". attempted YOUR A*S! i was home and no one knocked on the f**king door!!! now you want me to pick up an piano?! AN PIANO?!!!???!f*** you! Puro LATER!!Date of experience: October 05, 2017

Name: Dave
Review: Shipment from Hell.Shipment left Toronto Sept 28 was due in Winnipeg Oct 2. On Oct 3 my shipment was visiting Calgary. Does Purolator know where Winnipeg is? As of 11am October 5, shipment has still not arrived. I had to complain and reorder from Amazon. Shipment from Hell.Date of experience: October 05, 2017

Name: Nick Burton
Review: Unreliable as hellI paid for express shipping on a package. It's now two days since purolator picked it up and I've been told just now that there's a delay. I won't get an estimated time of arrival till tomorrow at exactly 60 hours after it was picked up by purolator. When I asked if I could get the package sent to a depot so I could just pick it up I was told it's inaccessible. If you have no choice but to use purolator don't pay for express shipping they won't honour it anyway.Date of experience: October 04, 2017

Name: Valerie Houston
Review: I regret shipping with PurolatorI regret shipping with Purolator. My boxes were crushed and mishandled. I had packaged items with lots of bubble wrap and strong boxes. Box Marked fragile too was badly handled. Many broken items. FYI Purolator does not use fragile stickers on any of their shipments. No one told me this when I shipped otherwise I would of chosen another shipping service. All my claims were denied. I'll think twice about using their shipping service again with anything that I care about.Date of experience: October 02, 2017

Name: Figueroa
Review: Worse customer service everWorse customer service ever, they dont coordinate the delivery with the customer and then make the customer to pick-up the package far far far far away from the shipping address.Date of experience: September 30, 2017

Name: Azzyorllarht
Review: Purolator is a very bad courierPurolator is a very bad courier, they don't deliver package, I was told my package would be delivered the next day and this the third day, I haven't see. My Package, my package is already in my state when I tracked it, I stay at Greensburg Indiana and my package has arrived at Versailles Indiana and it 36minutes from Versailles Indiana to Greensburg Indiana, I don't know why it's taking a long time for them to get to me in my city purolator have been in my state since yesterday no yet they haven't deliver my package..... please what's going onDate of experience: September 30, 2017

Name: Terry Foxx
Review: TERRIBLE HORRIBLE UNACCEPTABLE WASTE OF …TERRIBLE HORRIBLE UNACCEPTABLE WASTE OF TIME MONEY AND EFFORT NEVER AGAIN WILL I USE PUROLATOR IM GOING TO RECOMMEND UPS TO MY LOGISTICS MANAGER FOR FUTURE USE SMH x10000 I HAVE TO GIVE AT LEAST 1 STAR BUT IF IT WAS UP TO ME I WOULD GIVE ZERO THIS IS THE WORST EXPERIENCE EVER NOW IM ON THE TRANSIT TO GO PICK UP MY PACKAGE SO THERE WAS NO POINT AT ALL IN SCHEDULING A PUROLATOR DELIVERY. PUROLATOR WHATS UP WITH THAT????????Date of experience: September 29, 2017

Name: Lisa Marie
Review: Terrible experienceTerrible experience ! My package said it was delivered at 9:38 am ! Checked my security cameras, no package was delivered. I also contacted to check delivery address, they have my correct address but no Parcel has been shipped here yet ! The absolute worst experience of my life. Waiting on calls four hours later !Date of experience: September 28, 2017

Name: Becka
Review: No stars is what this company gets!No stars is what this company gets! They are incapable of replying back to emails. Purolator has somehow "lost" my package that I have been waiting for couple of weeks for now. They stated that they had no record of my package being received but when I checked their tracking page with my tracking number, it stated that they have made a label for my package to be shipped. Clearly my package was received by these thick-witted idiots!Date of experience: September 27, 2017

Name: Tommy
Review: I am Never using this service again!I expected Purolator to leave my package at my house as I ordered an Xbox 360 from EB games. I have ordered from EB in the past and have never had difficulties with them. Purolator left a notice of attempted delivery on September 26, 2017. They did not leave the package at my doorstep as I had thought they would. I requested them to re deliver it the next day and wrote a note authorizing them to leave the package at my door. I received the package when I got home only to realize that the package had the wrong component.. and I was given the wrong xbox 360 power supply, and I can now no longer ask for a refund because EB games does not accept returns if the product has been opened. It was also a used product totalling almost 100 dollars. The only options I have are to either get another  360, get the right power supply, or somehow get a refund.  I have called numerous EB Games stores and almost no store has the power supply sold separately and no store is willing to exchange for my console since it is with the wrong accessories. I am disappointed with Purolator and will never use this service again. I am demanding financial compensation for this because 1. EB games does not cover for products which have been opened and I had no idea that my product would have the wrong parts 2. I paid almost 100 dollars  for the product which has no warranty.Date of experience: September 27, 2017

Name: Sasha Sivak
Review: Horrible customer and courier serviceHorrible customer and courier service - Driver forgot to deliver package. Supervisor did nothing but reschedule without guarantee of morning delivery - expecting me to wait around for the third day until 8pm.Date of experience: September 27, 2017

Name: North York ON
Review: EmbarassingHaving to get things shipped by Purolator is one of the worst experiences I can think of. They are the most incompetent, lazy and uncaring delivery service in Canada. Every time I find out a company has used Purolator for my shipping, there is a massive amount of stress involved as I have no idea how I will get out to their warehouse - because getting Purolator to give your package to you at your address is a miracle. I once asked Purolator why their drivers couldn't phone me to contact me when they arrived as was told their drivers didn't have phones. I honestly would not be surprised if the owners of Purolator were unaware of the invention of mobile phones.Date of experience: September 22, 2017

Name: Retrogamegirlygofan
Review: Got my package and when I did a …Got my package and when I did a shipping about a broken video game to a company. I did a waybill. Very fast shipping and now im going to get another repaired item back. I will do buisness again soonDate of experience: September 22, 2017

Name: dean
Review: This company is completely incompetentThis company is completely incompetent! The 93% bad rating says it all. The delivery personal doesn't even try to make the delivery, just leaves a note and when you call them to deliver the package, which they have already been paid to deliver, Purolator wants to charge you again for that same delivery. But if you decide that you will go and pick up the parcel, the employees behind the counter treat you like you are trying to steal parcels even though you have their company pick up card. P.S. Purolator, no one cares about your responses to these reviews, we want you to get organized and remember that we are the customer. Stop doing the same thing over and over again and then saying how sorry you are.Date of experience: September 20, 2017

Name: JK
Review: They honestly deserve negative 5 stars …They honestly deserve negative 5 stars as a rating. I cannot comprehend their messy service at all. I had my first experience with Purolator this year and it started off horrendously, I paid at an express level to get my package shipped within 1-2 days from the Province beside mine to get my package yet they "missed" my house 3 days in a row. I called and complained everyday. One of the reps even told me that they have a rule that they can't miss a delivery 3 times, which is when I had to ASK for a refund on the shipping. They couldn't even apologize and offer the refund I had to ASK MYSELF. The number one thing about Purolator is that their customer service doesn't have the word "sorry" in their vocabulary. Meanwhile I ordered a package all the way from China a few days later and DHL did a great job getting it to me in 2 days from across the globe.So I finally got my package after many days from Purolator which pushed my sales back.  The next two times were exactly the same. Then the recent one was with my laptop. I had a repair to be done and I couldn't escape from Purolator it was paid for and there were no other options. Once again the "failed" to deliver on Wednesday. The next day I was in front of my house and the truck past me at 10:22AM I know the exact time cause I had to take a photo of them since I knew them too well. At home I checked the tracking and saw that it has been signed and accepted at 10:30AM. NO ONE IN MY HOUSE SIGNED IT and it was a stranger's name!!!! This was absolutely ridiculous!!!! My laptop was repaired hence no password and my data was in there. This was so stressful I had to call Dell because I didn't even want to deal with those other people. It took multiple calls for Dell to call Purolator and had them pick it up from the wrong house. They delivered to a house 3 minutes away from mine yet they couldn't drop it off at my house that same day when they made a mistake since the beginning. I had to wait another 2 days worrying if Purolator was actually did their job to pick it up, stressing over my personal data in the hands of a stranger. Purolator is pure trash.Date of experience: September 18, 2017

Name: Curtis Allen
Review: What a nightmareWhat a nightmare. I'll never use this company again. I paid $500 to have some high end equipment shipped to me. This gear is essential for my job, and I've booked clients knowing that I'll have this specific gear available for the job.Let me list the problems- 2 Packages shipped Saturday, Brampton to Kelowna, Delivery on Monday- Monday comes, no package. I'm told they don't have weekend shipping to Kelowna, even though I had the shipper pay $60 extra for that option in store.- Tuesday, only one package arrives. I call Purolator, they say it was never sent, even though I have a tracking number. Put me in touch with a tracing specialist who couldn't care less. Tells me he 'doesn't know what to tell me'. Eventually he confirms it was supposed to ship, but had a different tracking number. But, he doesn't know where the package is.- Thursday, they have a potential match on the package, they'll call me again on Friday to confirm.- Friday. No call.- Saturday, I call, they say it's shipping to me, will arrive Monday or Tuesday- Monday, tracking hasn't changed. It still sits in a warehouse in Toronto. I contact a rep who says, 'oh no, it'll be delivered today.'- Monday afternoon, I contact another rep who gives me 3 different answers: 1. It'll be here on Thursday, shipped via ground. 2. It's actually lost again, they had the wrong address. 3. It was supposed to be here today but wont be here until Tuesday due to a delay. This rep then refuses to answer any questions or verify which of her statements was true. I've been told I'll get a refund, but could take several weeks to make it happen. (I'm not holding my breath). If you're thinking of shipping anything of value with this company, consider stabbing your eyeballs with a dull screwdriver instead, it's more fun.Date of experience: September 18, 2017

Name: Dave
Review: WellWell, Purolator has kept their non delivery to me in tact!! With four different items and two different addresses they have still not delivered anything to my door!!! I don't even know what their driver uniforms even look like!!Date of experience: September 15, 2017

Name: Soheil
Review: I bought an item from AmazonI bought an item from Amazon, and they sent it by Purolator. I was not at home and they left me a pick up notice. The pickup address was their office near my home in Vancouver. But next they I received a notification email that the package is ready for pickup at another office which is 20min drive away from my home!! I called their customer service to follow up and a cold cold voice told me that this a "human mistake"!! They can send the package back to the correct point but this can take 2-3 days (for the original 2-day shipping)!!! She didn't even try to show me that they are sorry for the mistake that they have made!!!Date of experience: September 13, 2017

Name: Crystal Glimmer
Review: Make that THREE delayed deliveries in a …Make that THREE delayed deliveries in a row. If you have another choice - TAKE IT! If Purolator ever represented quality, it doesn't any more. There's no accountability and no end of excuses.Date of experience: September 12, 2017

Name: anthony
Review: $300 for a package that was undeliveredI shipped a large package to the USA from Canada using Purolator. Even though the address was a confirmed address, the package was eventually returned to me, indicating 'street number' could not be found. I paid $80 to send. I just received $147 bill from Purolator for the return shipment, along with a separate bill from UPS, which I have no idea why I received. All this because Purolator couldn't find an established address that's in the system? I don't get it.**UPDATE: Purolator customer service was not only quick to respond to my issue, but they were able to assist me in clearing it up. (An incorrect address was entered into the system). I was very appreciative of the assistance that was provided to me.Date of experience: September 11, 2017

Name: Shirley
Review: Horrible courier serviceI couriered a package  from Calgary to a client in Edmonton using Purolator.  They should have received it the next day. 3 days later my client contacted me to tell me that they had not received the package.  I checked the tracking and it showed my package being at the Purolator depot in Edmonton.  I called Purolator and was told the highway was closed.  I spoke to my client and was told that there was construction near their building but with the exception of Purolator, all couriers were delivering to the building.  I telephoned Purolator and told them the highway was not closed but there was construction near the building.  They said they would try again.  Checked tracking the next day and it  showed my package as being at the depot in Edmonton.  I called Purolator and was told the highway was closed but they would try again.  This time the package did not even leave the depot. I called Purolator and explained about the construction and told them other couriers were delivering to the building.  They were not interested in what I had to say.  I asked for my package back.  I received the package back the next morning and sent it out by FedEx that afternoon. My client received the package the next morning. I called Purolator and told them that FedEx had delivered my package to the building.  They were not interested.  I asked that I not be charged for the nondelivery of my package.  They insisted that the highway was closed and would not remove the cost of the nondelivery from my invoice.  Today I received a bill for Purolator sending my package back to me. So they want me to pay for taking my package to Edmonton and then for bringing my package back.  Can't believe the poor service! This was over 10 days.Date of experience: September 08, 2017

Name: Unknown
Review: I paid extra money to have an amazon …I paid extra money to have an amazon package delivered in one day. After going online to track the package, it says: "Delayed in transit due to road / highway closure".Its quite easy to check highway conditions on the weather network, and a few other sites, there are NO road closures between here at the "sort facility".Even if there was a road closure, which there was not, did the driver just park the car and give up? This was listed at 5am, that still leaves 11 hours to do a 4 hour drive and thus arrive during business hours. Now the package will arrive at the same time it would have had I used free shipping.This courier service is thus a complete waste of my money.Date of experience: September 08, 2017

Name: Bob
Review: Worst experience everWorst experience ever. They just don't care. Ordered off Amazon, apparently the route was 'full' so had to be rescheduled. It was not even 8 pm. Wasted my entire day.Date of experience: September 07, 2017

Name: Jacqueline Steuart
Review: Terrible day trying to deal with …Terrible day trying to deal with Purolator customer service over the phone. Only learned that our order would not be delivered because I tracked the item online. Customer service then told me that because we are brand new to the province without official provincial ID that I would not be able to pick up our parcel. I have proof of purchase, proof of address through lease agreement, photo ID from home province, proof of other amenities recently set up at the new address. Told that these would not be enough. What more can I possibly do? The item we purchase is expensive and needed for work right away. I am beside myself. The driver, if in fact the even came to our address, did not leave a delivery notice. Nothing. I have been met with hostility from customer service over the phone. Absolutely horrible situation. Customer service should be helping to solve problems, not create them.Date of experience: September 07, 2017

Name: Chenxu Shi
Review: If you want your order deliveredIf you want your order delivered, don't choose this company.Date of experience: September 06, 2017

Name: Maeve
Review: Lazy workersSomeone was home the day of the delivery but they never even bothered to ring my doorbell. Just left a note saying I had to go to one of their remote locations to go get my stuff. Unacceptable. Lazy.Date of experience: September 05, 2017

Name: Hiliary Ashley
Review: Purolator is the absolute worst …Purolator is the absolute worst couriers on the planet. You'd be better off with a pigeon.This is just one of my experience ( and my last ) with purolator.  I signed up for Amazon Prime and ordered a coffee press. I got a notice it would be delivered on Tuesday .... i stayed home all Tuesday and nothing. i then got a notice emailed saying they attempted delivery but were unsuccessful and would try again the following day. The following day nothing and then a phone call from a depot downtown saying they had my parcel  to come pick it up. I then phoned purolator and told them i didn't pay extra for Amazon prime to go and pick up my parcel on my dime. They said no problem they would deliver the following day. I told them to tell the driver to just honk and i would come out. ( there is a gate on my property ) The next day at 1:00 in the afternoon i hear a honk , i run out side and its Fed ex with my coffee tables i ordered from a furniture store. I wait and wait till 530 and call Purolator and they assure me the item is on the way and will be delivered by 6 pm. It never came. I phone them in the morning and they said " the driver attempted delivery at 12:30 "  THIS IS TOTAL B.S. !!!! No one was here at 1230. The driver is totally full of it and never picked my package up from the depot at all. Anyway at that point i told them to return to sender i will not drive all the way to their depot to pick up my parcel. I will talk to Amazon and try and have purolator removed from any delivery to this house....if they can't i will cancel my prime. Absolutely useless service if they can't get a parcel to your door. Fed ex and ups have alway got my stuff to me effortlessly. The fact that i stayed at home for two whole days waiting for these incompetent clowns really pisses me off. Dont use purolator people !! UGH !Date of experience: September 01, 2017

Name: Sonny Businos
Review: Think Twice - Horrible ServiceI had a parcel that should have been delivered a month ago and ended up being sent back to the seller.One thing i noticed with the delivery personnel, most of the time they do not buzz. I live in an apartment in a building and one time, I noticed the Purolator personnel just keep on putting Delivery Notices on the door. My experience was the delivery guy just left a delivery notice on my door, and when I complained to customer service, they told me they never knock on the door and buzz only from the main lobby. Then how come he didnt buzz on my apt (considering there was an instruction saying buzz in to my buzz number). I was pretty sure he was able to buzz only to one apt then started leaving notices to the other doors. If these stupid people should only buzz to every apt. they have to come back to the lobby and keep on buzzing to every apt with delivery.I missed my parcel 2 consecutive week. On the third week, costumer care told me I have reached the maximum number of attempts but they will reconsider delivering it on the third week. Same thing happened!!!! I was home all day for the parcel and all I recieved was another notice. I called them again.... and they insisted to pick them up from the site. I live very far from the pick up site so, it wont happen and the fact that we availed for delivery, means we want the items delivered for convenience. We paid for it. Now, customer care told me they will deliver again next week (the reason i kept on asking them on a same day every week, is thats the only time i work from home)... forth week came, i waited all day and no parcel. I called and they said they already sent it back to the seller. Very frustrating...Also, customer care is not really helpful at all. They give wrong information and the last call i had, they gave a wrong issue number, but was able to retrieve my case using the tracking number. The second customer care i talked to was very unfriendly, she assume to much that im not working so i can just pick up the parcel from the site. These people dont own up to their mistakes. So beware.Date of experience: September 01, 2017

Name: TJ
Review: So much for spending $200 for overnight …So much for spending $200 for overnight delivery.The goal was to get a 13lb package of paper booklets to New York city from Brantford, Ontario.  I was told by the agent that indeed it would happen.  Yet, when I tracked the package, it got bungled in Ontario and never even made it into the USA for over 12 hours.  Once it was in the USA (Buffalo, NY) the package got stuck in some sorting place all day long.This means fines for me each day that it does not make it to NYC.  I was considering UPS but went with Purolator.  I am beside myself, and so I wait.Date of experience: August 31, 2017

Name: AA AA
Review: I hope they bankruptI hope they bankrupt so that canada post could take over their service. They're just trouble maker, which offers stupid service.Date of experience: August 31, 2017

Name: Oday
Review: Amazon Ends Business with PurolatorAmazon should end Business with Purolator as this company hurts the Amazon brand by "always" failing to deliver. It is as if the drivers are not held accountable for not delivering packages so they just slap a sticker somewhere and call it a day. It's cute how they want to strike when they offer terrible service from the driver level to customer service & going up.Date of experience: August 30, 2017

Name: Yuanjie Chen
Review: They never even try to deliver your packageI have waited the package the whole day.  Purolator didn't call the number i left or leave a notice of delivery in the lobby at all. When I checked online, it was said "Attempted delivery - receiver inaccessible".  Any other company can just walk in to the lobby, take the elevator to 3rd floor, and deliver the package at unit 301. I just don't understand how come this is inaccessible for Purolator, and it seems that the whole building is inaccessible for Purolator because I don't see any thing in the lobby.I've been tricked by Purolator several times. I know the next step is asking me go to some place 10km away to pick up my package. (but this time I don't even have the notice of delivery)Ref: 0002879549, CA-0541797, X53290[UPDATE]Thanks for the quick reply of the customer service. I have amended rating to 3 stars. I wish I could do different rating for different departments.Date of experience: August 29, 2017

Name: Jon Trottier
Review: Purolator London does not even tryPurolator London does not even attempt to deliver packages to apartment buildings nor does it have the decency to leave a note saying they attempted to deliver anything. Sat out front of my building for 9 hours, watched Purolator show up 3 times and not deliver packages. Called that night to say they attempted to deliver 3 times to me. all lies. the driver made NO attempt to deliver packages. This is the 3rd time out of 3 separate orders that this has happened. will be using FedEx from now on.Date of experience: August 28, 2017

Name: tyler banks
Review: Purolator needs a wake up call!I ordered a tv from telus. Got a sweet deal because I signed up. Knew it would be too good to be true. Sure enough. The driver didn't bother to contact me upon delivery "attempt". Further more he didn't bother to put my pick up slip in my mail box but rather stick it to the window outside of my condo complex. Thus allowing it to be stolen and claimed by someone in my building. The HIGHLY unqualified driver should be fired for stupidity and laziness. It gets better. Trying to jump through the hoops and hurdles of recovery through the depot and the business, their "trace specialist" best attempt to help me was to ask if I could identify the signature of the person who claimed it. Seriously? Real nice detective work. Utterly useless business. Very unhappy Telus even trusted them with my property. Never again will I trust my property with Purolator, I suggest nobody ever use this shipping company unless you want your property stolen and no effort what so ever to retrieve it or replace it.Date of experience: August 26, 2017

Name: K L
Review: Worst CourierIf possible，don't use purolator to ship your package. I ordered almost 270 dollars clothing from Zara.com and it should be deliver on last Friday. The driver not even come into my gate and just said receiver inaccessible. The truth is I stay at home for the full day. And then I called the Customer series asked for redeilver on Monday. On Monday, I'm at home for the full day as well. When I wake up and check the tracking number, I found out it shows 7:47 a.m. delivered at my door. Around 8:15 p.m. I checked all of my door but still cannot find the package. My dad wake up really early and waited for the door bell ring or knock. But no one knock. After I checked all of the door, I checked my security camera and found out no one come into my house from 7 a.m. to 9 a.m. I called the customer service again asked them what happened to the package. They said they will check with the driver. Yesterday, they called me and said for sure that their driver delivered the package at my door. They said maybe the package lost and is Zara's responsible to the lost of the package. They keep changing their answer from the package delivered to my door to the package delivered to my mailbox. I wondering meybe the driver didn't delivered or they lost the package. I'm still looking for the solution from Zara. I hope that one of them can be responsible for my loss.Date of experience: August 24, 2017

Name: Johnson Nguyen
Review: I have never had a good delivery …I have never had a good delivery experience from purolator. Have always had my packages marked as delivered via their tracking service. The disgusting part is that the only thing that actually gets delivered is a noticed stating where my package is. In other words, they do not even bother delivering your package to your door steps. They keep it at the sorting facility only to have you come all the way out on the outskirts of the city. This has happened 3-4 times now throughout the years. Also had a member of the neighbourhood looking around for his package that was marked as delivered only to receive a notice stating he had to pick it up.If Purolator knows you will be away at a certain date, they are almost certainly going to "try" to deliver in that time frame so they don't have to bother delivering it to you. In short, don't ever ship with the Purolator. I personally recommend that no one ever order anything online unless you know who is shipping it since Purolator has never actually delivered any of my packages to my house.Date of experience: August 24, 2017

Name: Déconfiture En canne
Review: Drivers will lie not to do their jobs …Drivers will lie not to do their jobs and send your packages at the depot miles away.Too bad if you paid for a service and lost a day of work to reschedule for that package because the driver didn't feel like it so he just came up with a blunt lie like 'the street is blocked'...Unreliable.Date of experience: August 23, 2017

Name: Unsatisfied customer
Review: WORST SERVICE IMAGINABLEWORST SERVICE IMAGINABLE. If you are ordering something online, and they use this TERRIBLE company, DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME. I ordered 3 things from Toys R Us at the same time, and I received 1 of them. And when I received it, the box looked like it went through 10 hurricanes and world war II before reaching my door step. The delivery person? RUDE AS HELL. I call purolator to see where the F the other shipment was and they fed me the same bs line "we apologize, we'll notify them right away" andddddd still nothing. I spoke on the phone with one of their representatives and he said that he put a notice on my profile and they will deliver it the next day. The next day I wait ALL day by my front door and nothing. At 5pm, I call purolator for a second time now and ask them what's going on. They tell me my shipment is still in the warehouse and was not shipped and that I can go pick it up if I want it or file a complaint in which would take 72 hours for them to get back to me. Then the lady hangs up the phone on me mid sentence and I'm left here wondering what the F is going on. I needed this shipment that day as it was a gift for someone but hey, F the customer. As long as they charge my card and take my money, doesn't matter what happens to me or my shipment. I've learned my lesson. Never deal with these fools again.Date of experience: August 22, 2017

Name: Rick Valois
Review: Bad residential service.I am in Calgary. PUROLATOR has the worst delivery service to residential areas. 2 days from Toronto. 5 days in Calgary truck and still no delivery.  Terrible service!Date of experience: August 21, 2017

Name: Ralph Bartolo
Review: A courier that doesn't deliverAmazon Prime member here. Always had an issue that purolator won't even buzz the building. I just get surprised that they attempted delivery and could not reach me. This is a company that's supposed to deliver, not make me pick up what I ordered 9/10 times. I order lots online and just this week I ordered 3 items. 2 came and I had to pick up because yes I was out working. DHL left a notice at my door. Fedex too. Guess what the third item is?You guessed it. Purolator got it. And worse I was home the whole day. No one knocked called, buzz nothing.Do me a favor Purolator. If you can't deliver don't. Find another thing you're good at. Delivering is not one of them. A courier that doesn't deliver unbelievable! Not even a courtesy to knock on my door or leave a note or buzz. I will give a -10 if there is one. Good riddance.Date of experience: August 18, 2017

Name: Blythe Dresser Heredia
Review: HonestlyHonestly, they have a 0.3 out of 5 star rating which says it all.  I do everything possible to avoid Purolator like the plague.  Canada Post, UPS, Fedex and DHL all have their issues, but none are as incompetent and useless as Purolator.  I read that the staff are paid less than their competitors, which might account for the dismal quality of service.The three times I've been forced to use Purolator in the last two years have all been the exact same:  overnight delivery is paid for, the item's tracking noticed is updated to "out for delivery" and... it never shows up.  One time I spent the whole day waiting by the window for the truck (I learned my lesson after the first time) and late in the afternoon the tracking was updated to "address correction needed".  I called into the call centre and confirmed that the address was always correct (it was), so the driver either A) couldn't find our place (we live in a busy city and our address is very straightforward) or B) just couldn't be bothered.  No hang-tag or sticker.  So I call into their call centre and get a litany of excuses and "we'll page the driver and ask him to go back." ALL THREE TIMES.  Does the driver go back?  Never.  And this goes on for DAYS.The real problem this time is that this third (and final!) time, the item being delivered is urgently needed for a health issue.  So, very, very important.  I even contacted Purolator preemptively about my issues with them in the past.  I was treated rudely and told that I just needed to wait and it would arrive.  Bet you can't guess what happened?  Yep, same thing.  Webchats and calls to managers get disconnected because they can't be bothered.You'd have better luck tying your package to a carrier pigeon than using Purolator.  I'm still waiting for my health package to be delivered and I'm seeing red.  Useless, incompetent company.Date of experience: August 18, 2017

Name: Terence Li
Review: Just receive a package slip that need …Just receive a package slip that need me to pick up package somewhere in Burnaby, when I am living in New West. Called Purolator to see whether they can transfer to any Purolator outlet in New West so easier for me to pick up within their 5 business days holding rule, the operator flat out say NO, you can only pick it up in Burnaby. Well, that Burnaby location only open Mon-Fri, which is what I am working but New West location is open on the weekend. Poor flexibility. Based on this poor experience, I wont be using them to ship out anythingDate of experience: August 17, 2017

Name: Dee
Review: Avoid Purolator for deliveries to apartment buildings !My first time ever writing an review that is positive or negative but I feel that customers need to be aware! I live in an apartment building where my buzzer number is listed in the directory, and it's downtown so lots of people coming in and out. I have been tracking my order through the Purolator website and knew when the item would arrive.  I purposely stayed in my living room to be able to hear the door so that I wouldn't miss the delivery.  I saw the truck downstairs and so I assumed the package was on its way up.  20 minutes later the truck leaves.  There is no notice left on my door or my mailbox.  I had to check online to find out that there is an address correction needed! The same day I received a package from Amazon's own delivery system with no need of a buzzer code.  I understand if a buzzer code is needed to enter the building but I have never had issues with canada post, ups or Amazon's own delivery system.  Only with Purolator.  And there also is no option to add a buzzer number when placing an order through Amazon itself or through any website when ordering items online yet other couriers have no issues with this !Date of experience: August 17, 2017

Name: Tom Ho
Review: Why was my package held for "missing …Why was my package held for "missing country of manufacteurs"?I am shipping my items to university, and one of my packages was held apparently for "missing country of manufactuers". What is this?? Also, my other package was supposed to arrive by August 15th, but is instead it would be arriving on August 21st. What an inferior shipping service compared to UPS; given the choice, everyone should use a difference shipping service instead.Date of experience: August 16, 2017

Name: Manhy Paynn
Review: Don't even knock on your door or ringDon't even knock on your door or ring. Just let a big package in front of your door so anyone can take it... Really really dangerous. This is unacceptable.Date of experience: August 16, 2017

Name: Jason
Review: No issues here.I'm rather surprised by all the negative reviews on Purolator. After I purchased a TV on Ebay and found out that Purolator was going to transport it, I decided to look for reviews about it and felt rather concerned. However, in my case, the delivery was on time,  the driver was nice and the item was not damaged during shipment. I hope they find solutions to all the bad rep.Date of experience: August 15, 2017

Name: twinkle paul
Review: Very rudeVery rude, they need to learn how to speak to customers. Client should be priority. Very disappointed, spoiled my day😞Date of experience: August 15, 2017

Name: Kimberly Bannister
Review: Driver LyingI received an email on August 4/17 stating that my package from Zara was delivered at RECEPTION in St. John's, NL.  I live in Grand Bank which is 4 hours away from St. John's.  I contacted Purolator, they opened a claim. They have been in contact with me 5 times since the claim was opened, trying to contact the driver and figure out where he left it.  The customer service representative was great. However, they are insisting that the package was delivered to Grand Bank even though my delivery Emil states St. John's.  They even had me check with houses on my street to try to find it. This morning I get a call stating that the driver phoned me and I must have given him the wrong address, so they would be closing my claim.  I told them this was unacceptable and am now waiting for yet another call.  I have been very patient, but it is now Aug 14th.  I am out $87.  I am definitely taking this further.  Companies that use Purolator need to seriously consider this carrier.KimberlyDate of experience: August 14, 2017

Name: Jake Shalagan
Review: Terrible experience with purolatorTerrible experience with purolator. Waited all day Friday by the door to receive my package. Checked delivery status around 7 pm. And notified that delivery attempt was made and will be delayed until Monday. Extremely disappointed, as no such attempt was made. Tried to schedule a pickup for my package on the weekend but my package is held in the warehouse all weekend and it cannot be picked up.Date of experience: August 12, 2017

Name: Steven Dalquist
Review: Didn't even try to deliver itDOUBLE UPDATE: Went to pick up my order today and found it damaged. Suitcase was scratched and scuffed. Back down to 1 star. Should have refused it after I picked it up and the box was punctured and damaged.______________UPDATE: After speaking to the customer care rep (who responded to my email in less than 5 minutes, thank you) I've been informed that "missed delivery" means it was rescheduled due to high volumes. Since then the customer reps have been quite helpful and I'll be changing my review to reflect that. However, labelling a reshuffled delivery as "missed" is erroneous and I believe that should be changed to avoid further confusion. Therefore, updating this to 3/5 for the helpful reps but confusing tracking notices and making me wait until 6pm to let me know it's being rescheduled. _______________________________Checked the tracker at 6pm and noticed the update that I missed a delivery at 5:46pm. Funny because I was standing at the front door to my apartment complex at 5:46pm. The driver didn't use the intercom or leave a note. Frankly I don't even think they pulled into my complex. Pathetic service; do not use this company for anything if you have the choice.Date of experience: August 11, 2017

Name: Rémy Tiger
Review: Purolator Montreal will leave your package in front of your door without knocking and WILL get into your building without ringing you!I live in Montreal, so what I say may just apply to Purolator in Montreal.I ordered a bag from Amazon. It was scheduled to come on Friday the 11th. I checked the purolator site with the tracking number, it said it was going to be delivered today. I understand that this may be a mistake on Amazon's part, in any case, I was available for most of the day.I was going to leave my house because I had an exam at uni. I opened the door, and the parcel falls down. The delivery guy just left it there.It amazes me how he got into the building. He didn't ring at MY place, he just came up, he didn't even knock or anything. He just left the parcel in front of my DOOR. ANYONE could have come and picked it up from there.I don't understand why they do that. That's a serious security danger.Date of experience: August 10, 2017

Name: Brian Couture
Review: use canpar or ups. stay away from purolator.Unless you have nothing better to do then sit at home for a couple of days waiting at the door DO NOT USE this company or you will have to drive to there depot to get your package as it is to hard for them to try and do there job. A delivery company that sucks at delivering your stuff. now i got to go pick it up myself in a diff city. i could have just went to the effing store to pick it up myself .absolute BULL CRAPDate of experience: August 10, 2017

Name: Chris Rice
Review: Don't expect answers even if you seek themI've been having my medication shipped with Purolator for the past 6 months, now why is it that until the package is dropped off, there is no tracking details after the package has left Alberta, wouldn't/shouldn't there be a scan when the package reaches my city in Ontario? If so that's been done once. And today I'm sitting here waiting for my medication yet again, with no clue on when my medication is coming in, depots were apparently contacted through customer support but other than an email saying they were looking into it I haven't heard from them in over 2 hours. Now, I'm schizophrenic with a rare form of the condition, your screwing with my medication and now I get to lose mental stability because you losers can't do anything right. Why isn't my package being scanned right, why haven't I gotten a single reply on where my package is, why aren't you guys simply doing your damn jobDate of experience: August 08, 2017

Name: Justine
Review: Awful Customer ServiceI work for a huge company that exclusively does business with Purolator. I was awaiting a very important package last week and received a notification on Wednesday that it would be delivered on Thursday. On Friday afternoon I called to inquire about the whereabouts of my package. I was placed on hold for a collective 3 hours, spoke to at least 5 different customer service representatives and after the first 40 minute wait on hold was transferred to a different department where I was promptly hung up on. After all of this I was told my package (only 5 boxes) was considered freight and therefore an appointment would need to be set up for delivery. I was told that no phone number was listed, however no attempt was made by Purolator to contact my company and set up a delivery. Another representative claimed that because it was freight it could only be delivered to a business, not an individual.  I was then told my package would arrive no sooner than Tuesday. The last representative I spoke to, John Touchey, flat out told me my package was NOT IMPORTANT ENOUGH to go above and beyond attempting to deliver it sooner. I even offered to go to the freight centre myself to retrieve my package and was denied. I don't understand why anyone would pay to use an express delivery service only to have their package held for a week. I am disgusted by the treatment I received from Purolator and strongly encourage anyone who is thinking of using them to try UPS or FedEx instead. I have never had a more frustrating customer service experience and to have my concerns met with rude responses and zero solutions was the icing on the cake.Date of experience: August 08, 2017

Name: Emily
Review: Heads up to any business thinking of …Heads up to any business thinking of using Purolator for deliveries: I strongly suspect that Purolator drivers DO NOT make any real attempt to actually deliver your product to your customer! For the second time in two weeks, we have waited all day for our products to be shipped from Purolator, tracking it regularly and keeping an eye out on the street, only to never end up receiving it. No missed delivery notification on the door and no notice from Purolator. When we check the tracking site it will claim "Address correction required - receiver not found." Our building number is clearly displayed, we are on a main street in downtown Toronto, we have massive signage, and our front door is wide open. How much easier can we make it for the driver to find us? Stand outside with a neon flashing light and dance around?! We called Purolator and they claim that the issue was the delivery was addressed to an individual and not the business -- okay, fine, but how does that negate the fact that the address is the same and zero effort was made by the driver to even check if the delivery was correct? The first time this happened we gave in and picked up our order from the Purolator depot but this is a major inconvenience for us and we don't believe we should go to the effort and expense of retrieving a package that we have paid to have delivered to us! The worst part of this is that we saw a Purolator truck pull up across the street at around noon time, no driver exited the vehicle, and then 5 minutes later our tracking status was changed to "Address correction required - receiver not found." This suspiciously seems like the driver simply decided to not exit the vehicle, pick up our package from the back of the truck, and walk it 10 steps across the street. Lastly, I think it is important to point out that today, the same day Purolator failed to "find our address", FedEx, Canada Post, and an Uber driver all successfully delivered packages to us. Purolator has one job, ONE JOB! And they can't even do that.Date of experience: August 04, 2017

Name: Siva Sivendran
Review: Can't get in touchI try getting in touch with customer service over the phone and the line cuts off. I try chatting with an agent online, agents not available. I try using the website and it happens to be one of the worst, most unfriendly, confusing user interfaces i have ever come across. Does Purolator want business or do they want detractors. I would never ever set up a pick up from this courier. I wish there was an option to provide no stars. 1 star is too much for a company that can't allow clients to get in touch with them or provide them an informative, user-friendly method to perform a simple pickup.Date of experience: August 04, 2017

Name: Peter Dale
Review: Purolator CourierNormally I wouldn't both writing a review but sometimes you just gotta.Amazon shipped a parcel by Purolator the last week of July 2017.Purolator tried to deliver it at 2:45 on Tuesday August 1st here at the office. Unfortunately I was out for a coffee for 15 minutes (just bad timing).Apparently, that’s it, no more attempts to deliver, no message left on the door.We received a message 2 days later on Thursday afternoon sometime that the package was available for pick up in Barrie. That would be 2 hours round trip to pick up a courier package which they've been paid to deliver.I started calling Friday morning around 9:00am. I called 4 times listened to their music for several minutes then the music stopped and nothing but dead air. I waited about 5 minutes each time to see if someone came on, not knowing if I was cut off, no one did. Finally I decided to wait after the dead air on my fifth time…30 minutes…nothing.Called again, it’s now 10:46am. This time pretending to want to schedule a pick up (just so I might talk to a human being which I don't think they have there). Same deal, a few minutes of music then nothing.Great service. By the way; my call is important to them, a customer service representative will be with me shortly…yeah, right!!!Date of experience: August 04, 2017

Name: Kassandra
Review: The 'See ya later' Purloator, terribleI have had nothing but problems with Purolator. I have actually decided to stop purchasing from a company that I make monthly purchases from because I dread having to deal with them. They have caused me to wait on a package days after I should have received it. First off, if the delivery door tag says I will have to wait until the next day to pick up my item... when I go to pick it up, the next day, it better damn well be there, not on a delivery truck that's trying to deliver it while I am at the location it was suppose to be available for pick up. That made me have to wait yet another day!This time I called them to ask if there was time if they could reattempt delivery for the same day. If not i asked that they please leave it alone at the location the label read so that I dint have the above situation happen again. What happens? I get a call telling me my package is available many miles away form me as opposed to the location discussed and marked on the delivery sticker.  They cant follow the simplest of instructions, don't give a call back when promised, terrible customer service and I hate having to deal with them as no one is ever accountable. If I needed my package by a certain day, its infuriating to have to deal with this company that doesn't have it together,.Date of experience: August 03, 2017

Name: Santiago
Review: This company is the worstThis company is the worst, I paid extra to get something delivered the next day. I've been sitting at home waiting to receive my package and when I came down to get my mail I saw a noticed from them saying they attempted to deliver it. How come no one rang the bell or knocked on the door? I now have to pick it up all the way outside the city, on the bus an hour away, because I have no car. No one is able to help me with this, they won't deliver it again until next week. They can't give me my money back so no options at all.Date of experience: August 03, 2017

Name: Ken
Review: I'd hate to give a bad review to …I'd hate to give a bad review to anything. However, Purolator is so bad that I just have to warn others about it. Purolator seems to make a simple delivery such a stressful event for everyone involved. I have a package from dell. What should have been a fairly straightforward delivery is now a 1 week long ordeal of calls and emails.  They missed me the first time since I was at work, fair enough. I can't pick up the package since the notice said I have to go to another city! I requested a redelivery attempt and took the day off. I made sure to look out the window occasionally and even go out to check several times. 4 pm rolls around and nothing. I went out for the last time and there it was, another pick up notice. Apparently the driver didn't even bother to knock or ring the doorbell. Had the driver did that It would have taken me probably 5 seconds to go from my room to the door. Waste of time. Don't use them.UPDATE:After one of Purolator's reps contacted me and offered assistance, my package arrived shortly a few days later after the holidays. I only wish that I didn't have to go through all these channels only for a straightforward delivery like this. Nevertheless, I'm satisfied with the prompt service from Purolator's reps and so I'm changing my score to 3 stars. Purolator! Communicate with your customers, it's very important! And ring the doorbell!!!Date of experience: August 02, 2017

Name: Montrealer
Review: Worst courrier service of them all!I am giving one star because it is the minimum and I can't give zero.Avoid this company at all costs. Amazon, if you read this, move away from this company as a partner. It looks bad for you. Their drivers are scammers, saying "attempted delivery" and never getting out of their trucks. Same as so many other reviewers, I am waiting for a package since yesterday with the "Attempted Delivery" excuse. Home all day, no knock at the door. I have sent Purolator a complaint by email today. I plan on sending a complaint to Amazon as well. They should be aware of the problems that Purolator causes for their clients. There are never or rarely issues with Canada Post or any other courrier service. I hope it's only a matter of time before Amazon and others come to their senses and stop using this horrible, distrustful company. A quick Google search will show the same complaints again and again. I will never, ever use Purolator by choice. Ever. And I recommend you do the same.Date of experience: August 02, 2017

Name: mark
Review: Yet another item "ready for pickup" at …Yet another item "ready for pickup" at facility with no attempt of delivery made.The driver (drivers?) in my area never attempt delivery.  They simply don't show up, there is never a missed delivery note (as you'd actually have to walk into the condo building to leave one).Anytime I see Purolator as a delivery company I know what's coming.Ordered a fan from Amazon.ca and I got an email saying "Hi mark,Sorry we missed you. We tried, but we weren't able to deliver your package today. We'll try again on the next business day. (and a Link to purolator tracking).  No attempt of delivery made and it says it's ready for pickup from their 2600 Meadowvale BLVD location (across town).  This is the last straw, not giving these guys another chance after this.I had to go there before on a few occasions - not this time.  Opening amazon dispute if these guys don't get their act together...Date of experience: August 02, 2017

Name: Rab Concepcion
Review: Fast shippingFast shipping! Delivered at the date it said it would arrive. Really great company!Date of experience: August 01, 2017

Name: Davis MacLean
Review: Never attempt over night or express deliveryI have had taken the risk of over night shipping on three occasions. Each time the order was picked up on a Thursday and delayed for some reason until, at the minimum, the following Monday. The first time it was delayed due to weather (forecast that entire week was beautiful in both provinces). I made the mistake of calling to inquire about this; put on hold for 45 minutes, talked to like I was a moron, and absolutely nothing could be done in terms of a refund. I attempted again (my stupidity) as the only packages I order are medicine I can only get through mail as I am cancer survivor. This time the package was ordered on a Wednesday and was indicated that on late Thursday night there was a delay in transit and the estimated time was not until Monday - this leaves all of Friday and Saturday to make the delivery yet an attempt, seemingly, will not be made. Due to the nature of the contents I usually like to receive my package on time and be treated fairly (I had contacted their customer support team via email this time to no avail). Incredibly unprofessional and thoroughly disappointed.Date of experience: July 28, 2017

Name: Rob McFadden
Review: Canadas worst courier!!Ridiculous that a delivery service thinks that they can only deliver packages between 9-5. For home deliveries this means you have to travel to them/their depot to pick up YOUR packages. Purolator is sinking ship that I would not want to be anywhere near. So now I make Purolator attempt multiple deliveries before letting them know I wont be home during that time. Feel like I have to inconvenience them somehow for inconveniencing me. I also feel like this will help to faster sink their ship... which means I wouldnt have to worry about receiving packages from them.Date of experience: July 27, 2017

Name: Dong Bird
Review: Worst I have ever used.Every time I have used them (always because no other option is available) they delay the delivery or leave a note without knocking. I have watched, on more then one occasion, a truck pull up, and before I can even get to the door the driver bolt over, leave a note on an open  screen door I can see through then take off. By far the worst delivery service if you want your items on time and not crushed.Date of experience: July 26, 2017

Name: Julia
Review: Not doing their job - ZERO starsNEVER schedule a second attempt delivery! If you didn't get your package the first time - accept your destiny and go to the warehouse to pick it up yourself - you'll save so much time!I had 2 boxes to be delivered. The boxes are big and heavy (2 bicycles), so naturally I want them shipped to me, and not carry them, especially because I don't drive. After all, that's what delivery services are for! First, they got split, and one of them was delivered on Thursday, which is fine. The second one came on Friday at 9:20 am, but no one was home, so we got a notice of delivery, which is also fine. We got home on Friday at 7 pm, saw the notice and called them to schedule a second attempt. The person said you can schedule it for any day next week Mon to Fri, they can't give the exact time, but most likely it would be around the same time as the first attempt. So we scheduled for Monday. I took time off work and stayed at home. At 9:20 I called customer service to check when it's coming and was told that 7 pm was too late for them to process the request, so it got moved to Tuesday. Why didn't the person on the phone at 7 pm tell me that it's too late and advise me to schedule it for Tuesday?? I couldn't take time off work again, so on Monday morning I redirected the box to be delivered to my place of work. After taking down the address the person on the phone said "Oh I just deleted it, could you tell me the address again". I did, but it made my suspicious. That person also asked if I want both items redirected. I said there should only be 1 item at this point, but if you see that there's two, then of course, I want both of them, maybe there's some additional one that I didn't know about. I called around lunchtime again to make sure the address is fine and asked the person what address they have on file and was shocked when they read my home address!! The person apologized and said the employee I talked to in the morning just put a note with the new address, but didn't change the actual address. They changed it, I also asked about the 2 times, and they said "I see that one has already been delivered", and I confirmed it. So there was never a 3rd one that I didn't know about, the person on the previous call just confused me. The next day, Tuesday, I check online, and it still says Available for Pick-up. I call again, and I'm told that they are still processing the request to change the address!! I understand that the address wasn't changed Monday morning because that employee screwed up, but does it really take more than half a day to print a new label after I called again at lunchtime and they took down the address properly? Ok, now they tell me it's scheduled for Wed. On Wed morning I check online, and it's still Available for Pick up! Furious, I call and ask why it's still not on truck for delivery. Yet another person apologizes to me for a hundredth time and explains that they are looking for the second item! They cannot ship it without the other item that they can't find! How does the company not know that they already delivered the item? Even I could see it every time I tracked it online - one item has the status Delivered, the other one - Available for Pick up. The confusion about the 2nd item must have originated with the employee that screwed up the address and asked about the second item, BUT that was cleared up later when I asked again and confirmed that the 1st box was sitting in my living room. So I confirm it again, and the person makes a note that there's only 1 item to be delivered, duh. The person says it should be delivered to my place of work tomorrow, on Thursday. At this point I ask them about a note on my delivery notice saying that they'll hold the item for 5 business days at the warehouse. So I ask if they still count these past few days. And YES - I'm told that tomorrow is the last day, and it gets shipped back after that!! I tried to ask what time it would be shipped back, but the person just kept saying, it is scheduled for delivery for tomorrow, or you can pick it up at the warehouse. By then I had been told that "it is scheduled for delivery for tomorrow" several times, and they never followed through, so I have zero faith in the company's promises whatsoever, so I take time off work again, ask a coworker who drives to give me a ride to the warehouse and pick it up myself as soon as I can before it gets shipped back. He drove me there, and he dropped the box off at my place before heading back to work. So he did a much better job at delivery than Purolator did, even though Purolator gets paid for it. I owe him a dinner now on top of what was paid to Purolator for their "delivery" services. The whole thing just caused me a lot of stress about an expensive item almost being shipped back because of rescheduling over and over again, even though it was Purolator's fault every time it got rescheduled.Date of experience: July 26, 2017

Name: Phil
Review: UselessThey deliver only during limited hours (if they do), hold the package for 5 days max including the initial delivery date and then ship it back.  The location is 25 mins from my house and only open for business days; should I be taking a day off to receive something I didn't know I was getting?  Why cant they drop at the post office? Convenience store?  Leave it at the door? No, they chose to go the useless route and return it to their sorting facility in the industrial park.  No info, rude service... Why would anyone ship with this company???Date of experience: July 25, 2017

Name: Aris
Review: Took some time off from work today to …Took some time off from work today to wait for a package. No one rang the door bell and there was no notice left on the door but according to Purolator's tracking tool a delivery attempt was made at the same time I was at the living room. This has happened to me before with Purolator so I made sure this time the tv was off and the window was open so I could hear if there's a truck outside. But I'm positive no truck came at the reported time because I was constantly checking the tracking status and I called customer service as soon as I saw the status update.Date of experience: July 24, 2017

Name: Alan
Review: Avoid by any means or boycott evenThis is the roundup of 3 years experience when Purolator delivering. Rain , Snow or summer sun exposure items are left on the ground in open air and about 5 feet away from a busy sidewalk ripe for the taking! and if that's not enough it takes 5-10 seconds to open the door when the doorbell rings but somehow every Purolator guy manages to drop the items and run to his truck in those 5-10 seconds (I am sure that is not the proper terminology for speedy delivery), some of them don't even ring the bell at all and suffice to drop it on the snow or let the packages soak in the rain. Calling the company is a worthless experience let alone placing a complaint, if Purolator was a free a service I wouldn't want to save 5$ or 10$ for shipping while receiving mistreated or damaged expensive items, Purolator should switch to picking up recycling and trash business with their current service quality and conduct, they won't get as much bad reviews all over the net nor a mountain of complaints.My solution was to call every merchant I intend to buy from right before placing the order and arrange Not sending via Purolator or at least if nothing else works insist on having Signature as per delivery.Date of experience: July 24, 2017

Name: John Zelek
Review: 1 day delivery paid for and was suppose …1 day delivery paid for and was suppose to be delivered today.  No effort made to make sure purolator honours their commitment for their service.  I am told that the parcel did not make the delivery truck and will be delivered monday.  Today this kind of service is unacceptable.Date of experience: July 22, 2017

Name: Quintus Vipsanius
Review: WORST shipping companyWORST shipping company. Order something with Amazon, claim they left it in my porch. DO NOT USE.Date of experience: July 21, 2017

Name: Scott
Review: Looking for packagePackage shipped out of Kentucky on July 16th, last update is July 18th @ 2:13 PM. Is now July 21st, no update 3 days later. Expected to be delivered between Thurs July 20th to Tue July 25th. Yeah, that's not going to happen. What's the point of having a tracking system if it's not updated? Where is my package?Date of experience: July 21, 2017

Name: Mr amit murjani
Review: Worst courier company in CanadaTook a day off for the package to be delivered, no one came, no note left and at the end of the day status got changed to unable to deliver. Tried calling customer service twice no one knows why package was not delivered. Now after reading my review same customer service guy will ask me to provide tracking number. To customer service, before you ask me just wanted to let you know that I already called customer service twiceDate of experience: July 20, 2017

Name: John
Review: Terrible serviceTerrible service.  Ordered a package on Monday.  Paid extra $18 (!!!) to expedite the shipping and was told it would arrive by Wednesday or Thursday.  Package arrive at local sort facility just 2km away from my house on Wednesday, but wasn't delivered - said rescheduled for next day.  The next day, again said rescheduled for delivery and now won't arrive within the promised time frame that I paid extra for!!!  Called Purolator if I could just walk over to the sort facility and pick it up since it has been sitting there for 2 days undelivered, but told that wasn't possible.  What joke!!!  I pay for express shipping and it arrives later than it would have had it been shipped standard snail mail.  So unreliable.Date of experience: July 20, 2017

Name: Nosa Idahosa
Review: Item floating for more than a week and yet undeliveredI ordered an item on Monday and the vendor sent it through Purolator. It was supposed to arrive on a Friday. And it never showed up. No one called me to tell me why instead they simply wrote on their website; ‘delivery date unknown’. I called several times and eventually got someone to answer me. The story was that it was the fire outbreak in BC that delayed the delivery. The next day, I saw that they have taken the item to Toronto while I live in Calgary. Three days after, when they finally picked my call, I was told it was taken to Ontario in error.  I got a call after one week when the item was supposed to be delivered, that it will be delivered the next day. Sorry, that did not happen and as usual, no one told me. When I called again, I was sent to a phone number that had no one on the line. So guess what ‘leave a message’. When I eventually called to speak to a supervisor I was told the machine in Calgary broke down so it will again be delivered the next day. All these so far without any apology. Is this a parcel delivery company or what?Date of experience: July 20, 2017

Name: Lobbo Coulibaly
Review: Really disappointedReally disappointed! I paid for express delivery but there was a delay and I was supposed to travel. And when you call them there is absolutely nothing they can do to solve the issue. Was expecting something important for a wedding... highly disappointedDate of experience: July 20, 2017

Name: Hans Wurst
