Review: Terrible service!!!I was expecting a parcel for the whole day. No one came. Next day got automatic message saying that I have to pick it up from Creditstone road. I had to spend a couple of hours standing in bad traffic to get there. Driver never came to my house! I've checked camera to make sure I didn't missed him.  I would never use their service!!!Date of experience: February 16, 2017

Name: Connie
Review: It shocks me how they are still in business.I don't even know where to begin. Purolator is literally the WORST delivery company I have ever experienced. They have done this to me 3 times so far - either leaving packages outside my front door without notifying me or even knocking. The second time they did that the package was not there, but Purolator claimed that they left it. When I told them it wasn't there, they simply took no responsibility and essentially said they take no responsibility. Honestly what kind of delivery service leaves packages unattended? I've had UPS or Canada Post attempt to deliver my package multiple times all in an attempt to protect my package. This time around I had ordered something urgently, which I needed by a particular day as I was leaving out of town. Day one - they didn't deliver, said the address was "undeliverable or unknown". Okay then. Then I phoned them with instructions on how to deliver it, where to go, who to contact, gave them a back up number, and again they didn't deliver my package. According to the tracking my package is "is still on its way, just delayed due to traffic". Really? That was 5 hours ago. Honestly, how are they even still in business?Date of experience: February 16, 2017

Name: Sarah Wu
Review: The absolute worst service ever experiencedWow.. where to even begin. No matter how bad of service I receive, I have never been bothered enough to write a review. But after this experience , I am compelled to warn future clients from ordering from purolator. This review takes precedence over studying for my exams (I'm a university student) - that is how bad my experience was.Their customer service representatives are rude, incompetent and obviously hate their job. I've spoken to Cassie, Donna and someone else who has straight up interrupted/cut off my explanation more than 5 times in the conversation. My parents spent $75 on their "next day delivery service" but it's been more than 8 days with no sign of the package. When calling them to follow up it was a string of being transferred to different departments and after 1 hour on the phone the only solid answer I had received was (verbatim) "for an unspecified reason the trucks were unable to deliver your package". Literally that was their answer - that they had no clue why.The package was a care package full of food made by my family. My 80 year old grandma hand-made meatballs, buns and meat sauce for me. We trusted purolator to deliver the package the "next day" as per their advertised service. Not only has the food most likely have gone bad by now, purolator refuses to claim responsibility and denies even a simple apology. At several times of the conversation on the phone the representative raised her voice to me to a shouting level, which I had recorded on my friend's phone. I have every evidence of their mismanagement and poor service. I felt mentally harassed, embarrassed and belittled to the point where I was shedding tears of frustration. It's time for clients to take their money elsewhere as purolator truly is an apathetic, low-grade, incompetent and disappointing service. Never, never order from them! Please for the sake of your sanity, wellbeing - stay away!Date of experience: February 15, 2017

Name: Oyinlola Atte
Review: Lazy staff and bad companyI honestly hate purolator. For the umpteenth time, I had to pick up a package at a location just because they wouldn't ring my bell. 101% of the time, I am home. If I am paying for a delivery, then it is because I want it delivered to my house. Why do I have to stress myself to come over to a location again. I could have easily gone to the mall to get it. Today I saw the driver paste a note on the door without even trying to ring the bell. Then he dashed back into his truck. Here in Calgary, you guys need to purge your staff and train new ones to work efficiently. I'm highly disgusted by this company.Date of experience: February 15, 2017

Name: RD
Review: Terrible company.I don't even know how these guys are still in business to be honest. They're so awful. They never knock, just dump your box on the doorstep. There can be multiple cars in the driveway and they still won't bother knocking. They dropped the box off in the middle of a monsoon, without knocking of course, leaving me with a soggy box and junk inside. They don't update their shipping info. I've had something sitting in Ontario for a week now. Just sitting there. Despite the fact that it was supposed to arrive 5 days ago. Do they even work? Like... sorry to actual delivery men out there who work hard for their money, but really?!Date of experience: February 14, 2017

Name: Elle
Review: Terrible serviceI recently had an item "delivered" to my house. No evidence of a package at my house and no evidence that anyone even attempted to access my house (recent snowfall). After a supposed trace, they patted themselves on the back and declared they were not at fault for the lost item. Would only recommend purolator if you dont want to receive your item and want poor customer serviceDate of experience: February 13, 2017

Name: H.M
Review: This company breaks your stuff!!Avoid Purolator at all cost if you pack your stuff by yourself! I used this business a couple months ago when I had to ship my belongings to my new place. When the packages were arrived, most of them had noticeable damage to even outside of the boxes, and it was no surprise that some articles inside were cracked or completely broken, even though they were securely wrapped with bubble wrap. I contacted the customer service department, but they said that they wouldn't be responsible for any damage if I had personally packed my stuff. Heavy duty cardboard boxes were used for half of the packages in order to give extra protection, but this horrible company wore, crashed and dented those thick boxes. I can't imagine how terribly Purolator treated the packages during the delivery. If you are totally okay with spending extra money on repairing your broken stuff or purchasing a new one, and with being horribly treated by the customer service, this business could be one of your options. Otherwise, you definitely want to take your business somewhere else!!Date of experience: February 13, 2017

Name: Raphael Resende
Review: Delay beyond acceptance and uselessThat company was in charge of shipping an online purchase i made. I was staying in Canada for almost a month and they delay so much I'm leaving the country, not on empty handed but also had payed extra to arrive faster. When i contact them it took more than a day to pass me to someone that wasn't completely clueless about what to do, even so the so called Tracing Specialist was also useless and did not help at all. Never again I'll use this service, also if anyone is thinking about buying at B&H I suggest you rethink that, it's from where I placed my order, they too were neither willing or unable to do anything.Date of experience: February 10, 2017

Name: N. M.
Review: Purolator is a third world company operating in the first world.On January 30, 2017, I placed an online order for a television set from Best Buy Canada. The purchase was sent by Purolator, tracking number 330964321153. It was the first time anyone sent me anything by Purolator.On February 07, Purolator’s website promised delivery of the package that day. At 2:51 p.m., the website announced, ‘Delayed in transit’ and that they will make another attempt the next day. It is important to note that I received a FedEx delivery that day; Purolator cannot site inclement weather as an excuse.On February 08, Purolator’s website said the parcel was on the delivery track and that it was on its way. At 2:39 p.m., the website declared, ‘Delayed in transit’ and that they will make another attempt the next day. (February 08 was a beautiful day.)On February 09 (today), the website once again said, ‘Delayed in transit’ and that they will make another attempt the next day. (Does this begin to sound like the movie ‘The Groundhog Day’?) Incidentally, February 09 was a mild and sunny day in Calgary, with no snowfall in sight.In summary, Purolator is a third world company operating in the first world, and I don’t know why an established business like Best Buy would deal with this carrier.Date of experience: February 10, 2017

Name: Natasha Jennifer
Review: Avoid at all costsI ordered my prescription medication online, from Ontario to Edmonton. I order this medication frequently on a monthly basis. Since beginning this treatment and having medication delivered the company that I go through chooses to use Purolator as their delivery option. Every single time I choose one day delivery and it ends up taking Purolator 3 to 5 business days from leaving the facility in  Ontario to make it to Edmonton! One time Purolator lost my package delivered it to the wrong address and refused to take responsibility for the package leaving me out of $200. It didn't matter who I spoke to about the incident nobody seem to care,  and I was left without my prescription and out $200. Every time I call Purolator and speak to a customer service representative all I get in return is attitude, poor service, and frustration! It doesn't matter who I speak to you I feel undervalued as a customer  and unappreciated.  I have asked my provider if there is another delivery company that I could use and unfortunately the only one that they choose to use is Purolator despite my continuous calls of complaint about Purolator.  Because of Purolator I will be switching producers and it's unfortunate that I must change my means of medication and they must lose a customer based on the actions and service of a well-known and reputable company such as Purolator. It is ridiculous and uncalled for.  If I had an option to give them less than one star I totally would. Shame on you Purolator!Date of experience: February 09, 2017

Name: CR
Review: TerriblePurolator was used to deliver my Amazon package. However, citing bad weather they failed to deliver two days in a row. The weather is completely fine, if not a little cold. Their customer service (which is to say, DELIVERING PACKAGES) is hideously subpar. If I had any choice I would never ever use Purolator. This company is a disgrace. Utterly, indescribably crap.Date of experience: February 09, 2017

Name: Taylor Garbutt
Review: Slow delivery for the day your package arrives.It says it was on the truck for delivery at 8:20am. It's currently 3:08pm and still waiting for my package. This company is such a joke!!!Date of experience: February 08, 2017

Name: Kyle Holtby
Review: Nice one...I didn't really expect them to come on time, but what they ended up doing is leaving my 2000$ worth of computer parts outside without no notice. They never notified us and left the parts outside where they could've gotten taken by simply just someone walking up and grabbing them.Date of experience: February 08, 2017

Name: Tejinder Singh
Review: Shipment never deliversSo frustrated with Purolator. I always get delivery attempted when I track the package and it says delivery notice attached on door. I never found any notice. This happened to me 6~7 times. Driver don't know how to use buzzer at all! Customer service just cut the phone when I was describing my problem with Purolator. Just never buy anything from the vendor that ships using Purolator. Even though I have forwarded my calls to another number when my primary phone is unreachable, I simple never received any call and when contacting customer care, they say driver called you but no response. Hell with Purolato, so annoyed.Date of experience: February 07, 2017

Name: Chris Brindza
Review: purolator is the worsti recently had a package lost at a purolator depot. very frusterationg experience. very little customer care support. it was a long process. finally got it figured out......replacement delivery is now delayed....."in transit" again for a week. DO NOT USE PUROLATOR. THEY ARE HORRIBLEDate of experience: February 06, 2017

Name: Alicia
Review: PurolatorA purolator driver backed into the side of my car and reported that it was my fault (it was 100% his fault) after days of trying to contact the manager , he finally contacted me and was extremely rude . I then contacted head office and was told that the driver stated it was not his fault. The driver has reported false information and I now have to pay thousands or have a claim on my insurance for repairs to fix my car for something that I was not at fault for. I am extremely disappointed in purolator and how I have been treated.Date of experience: February 01, 2017

Name: Winnie Stevenson
Review: wring address!My parcel was delivered and signed for by someone other than me--not even my address, it was delivered to another address in another city!! How does that happen! Will never use purlator again! It's safer to use Canada post!! So madDate of experience: January 28, 2017

Name: Victor Y
Review: worse delivery servicezero attempt to knock the door , different  drivers  same problem - struggle with buzzer to access the building , the only way to get the package is keeping watch the front door for the purolator driver arrives . Purolator HR should hire driver smart enough to know how to use the buzzer .Date of experience: January 23, 2017

Name: Roy O
Review: Don't buy from vendors that ship with PurolatorAccording to the Purolator tracking site my shipment has been on the vehicle scheduled to be delivered each day for the past three days. It hasn't happened yet due to the "missed delivery" excuse which is code for "high volumes" (i.e.: Purolator has taken on more business than they can handle).  It seems only logical to me that drivers should continue deliveries until the truck is empty or else put more drivers and trucks on the road.  I've wasted three days of my life awaiting delivery of my expensive Home Depot shipment because I don't want to take the chance on it being left outside my door if I'm not home. Needless to say, I am a very unhappy customer and will suggest to Home Depot that they change their courier company.Date of experience: January 20, 2017

Name: Purolator Sucks
Review: Laziest, most useless company out thereI paid $30 dollars for expedited shipping on an item I desperately needed. It arrived a day later than I needed it to be here and when they "attempted delivery" they put absolutely no effort into doing so. They claimed I didn't give the buzz code to my apartment building (which there is no such thing for the building I live in) however, it is an extremely busy building it is not hard to wait for another person to walk in and walk in with them, OR they could have used their brains and walked in through the tenant office doors like most other companies do. When I called to ask why they hadn't just called me when they ran into this issue they said they don't call clients ever because nobody has phones on route...apparently in 2017 NOBODY that works for Purolator owns a phone...The customer service representative I dealt with was extremely rude and unprofessional. I then asked if it could be delivered to my house the next day as I would be home the entire time and she refused because I still don't hadn't given the access code to my building- even though there isn't one its just entered through an electronic key. She then told me where I needed to go to pick up the parcel which was 5 kilometres from my house. Not having a car I said that was ridiculous and she said thats my only option. So I could either pay 20 dollars to Uber to this location each way, or walk two hours to get there. Since I had already paid a ridiculous amount to get it delivered I walked for two hours to pick up the parcel that should have just been delivered to my place anyways. Absolutely pathetic customer service, if there was anyway I could boycott getting anything delivered from this company again I most certainly would.Date of experience: January 18, 2017

Name: Emily Marie
Review: Horrible companyScheduled for two days to be delivered, both times they didn't deliver. Worst company everDate of experience: January 17, 2017

Name: Tristan Ylarde
Review: USELESS UNRELIABLE COURIER COMPANYYOUR COMPANY SHOULD BE CALLED PUROLATER!!!!!!!!!Date of experience: January 14, 2017

Name: Alyssa S
Review: If I could only give it 0 starsIt completely shocks me how terrible this service is. My order was shipped in the facility and I was notified that the postal code was wrong. As anyone would do I contacted customer service as I was going to fix whatever problem they had. After the longest waiting time (which I expected), they told me the address was fixed right away. The only problem was that because of the address mixup they scheduled delivery for the next week. I was annoyed because I didn't pay 30$ for express shipping only for my order to arrive a week after the day I need it for. I went on their "live chat" and talked to three different ladies who told me different things on the possibility of me being able to pick it up at the location instead. I was told that the request of having my order picked up is being processed but is in no way guaranteed. What's the point then? I am truly unimpressed with Purolator's ability to actually deliver and I cannot trust them with any future deliveries again.Date of experience: January 14, 2017

Name: Shannon Gayle
Review: One day delivery a jokeI had medication being delivered by one day. It is now day three without needed medication, it stayed at the orginal facility for over 24 hours ( I have the screen shot that shows the problems from pick up to now),  customer service was nothing but rude and did not care. I was suppose to be called when my package was found as there is a high priority ticket on the shipment and received no call, I even said to the customer service rep I didn't believe I would get a call and I was right of course. All around horrible service. I will be lodging a complaint with BBB.Date of experience: January 13, 2017

Name: Anonymous
Review: Choose Purolator if you want to lose business, have angry customers, or don't want things delivered.This is the first time I have ever left a review because I felt it was necessary to warn all potential customers who would ever consider Purolator.I ordered from Dell on Dec 26, 2016. Was told delivery would take place on Jan 4, 2017. Dell called and notified me delivery would take place between 8am-6pm and I had to be home to sign for it. I knew I would be away so I asked Dell to have them deliver it on Friday Jan 6, 2017. Dell told me that it was too late to change the first delivery but that they will have them redeliver on Friday.Well guess what? Purolator never delivered on Wednesday. Tracking said it was on truck but then "delayed in transit". Next day (Thursday) it said it was on truck for delivery. Then "delayed due to missed transit" by 10am!! I'm a little peeved now because I had to sit around waiting because I had to sign to receive the package and my time was being wasted as I had work to do. I went on the online chat and they told me "due to high volumes and bad weather" they wouldn't be able to deliver today and said it will be there tomorrow Friday Jan 7, 2017. I questioned them about the weather as all other deliveries I expected from other companies like UPS were arriving absolutely fine and ON TIME. They just gave me the high volume/bad weather excuse again and told me to check back tomorrow by 10am if it didn't arrive. So here we go; ANOTHER day waiting at home on Friday. Instead of doing my errands and things that I needed to do, I stayed home waiting and waiting. Then to my surprise or lack of, it was "delayed in transit" AGAIN. It now says the estimated time of delivery will be on Monday Jan 9, 2017. I decided I would wait one more day and receive it on Monday. But wait! There are more surprises! I went out Sunday morning/afternoon and came home to what? A note on my apartment door saying they tried to deliver and I wasn't there so I would now have to go pick it up at a Purolator location that was not even the closest one to me and that it would be available on Tuesday. Not Monday. Seriously. SUNDAY?!?! Who delivers on Sunday and why would they tell me on the tracking page Monday and then deliver on Sunday? I called them and asked them to redirect the package to a closer depot. However they said they weren't able to due to the city I was in. So I asked them to redeliver which they said they could and I asked them to do it on Wednesday when I could be home to wait from 8am-6pm because THEY CANNOT GUARANTEE DELIVERY TIMES. They said they'll make a note to tell the drivers to deliver in the morning if at all possible.Thinking this was all over and done with, I received another call from Dell on Tuesday Jan 10, 2017 following up with me to inform me that the package is at the depot. I told them that I had spoken to Purolator already and that they would redeliver on Wednesday so we hung up. Moment later, Dell calls again. They called Purolator just to make sure and to my disbelief, Dell told me that Purolator has no record of a re-delivery request. I was so ticked off. The Dell rep then offered to request a delivery again with Purolator. They called me back right away and said it was confirmed that it would be delivered by Wednesday Jan 11, 2017 end of day. I then asked for them to send it to another address just in case the driver was too lazy to use the buzzer that I had given them. I then decided to check the tracking page again and another surprise. They apparently tried to deliver on Monday but "receiver unavailable". ****!!! I was home at that time of delivery and no buzzer, no tag on door, NOTHING!Well, you guessed it! Wednesday came and went by. No delivery. "Delayed due to missed delivery". ONE WEEK LATER and still nothing!Estimated time of delivery: Thursday Jan 12, 2017 by end of day. I'm writing this as of Thursday Jan 12, 2017. I had already called Dell to see if there was anything they could do. They called Purolator and told me they would deliver by the end of day. I don't believe them. Dell reps are great and look after their customers but please PLEASE use a different courier. I realized that I'm not the only customer having to deal with this but seriously, customers need to stop buying from companies who use Purolator until they switch to a courier that will actually deliver as promised.I told the Dell rep to inform the company to stop using Purolator as I will not buy from them again if I ever have to deal with this courier again.It is now Thursday Jan 12, 2017 in the early afternoon and the saga continues...Date of experience: January 12, 2017

Name: Bruce Robinson
Review: Terrible serviceHad a package supposed to be delivered by Jan 5th 2017. Every day after that it was delayed. On Jan 10 put trace on it, told maybe next day then maybe next day again. All this time it was sitting in the local center, just not loaded onto a truck. Finally, on Jan 12th I went and picked it up myself at the center. From ordering and me picking it up it took 18 days .....unbelievable. I could have walked back and forth  to the warehouse with the product in less time. The people we talked with were very nice and tried to help but something is wrong with their system. Hard to believe they have been doing this for so long.Date of experience: January 12, 2017

Name: Ash Frizz
Review: Does this place have managers?Purolator has the absolute worst customer service. I've never been spoken to and treated so poorly? It is mind blowing how such a large company can have such poorly trained staff. It is not their fault, I'm sure they are just following protocol but this has caused me to absolutely never use them again. They have no idea what they are doing...apparently it's a big deal for them to follow up on your issue, and I was essentially refused when I asked to speak to a manager? I was then told one would call me...funny, that hasn't happened? Purolator should strongly consider addressing these customer service issues as judging by the reviews I have read, it a huge issue.Date of experience: January 11, 2017

Name: Colin Crooks
Review: horrible customer service.They have bumped delivering my package for three days in a row, due to driver error. one would think that they would try to make it right. the people at the call center just polity say tough sh$^, you just have to put your life on hold, again. they should start their delivery day with the packages that were missed from the day before. they wont let you talk to a manager or even the people at the delivery center. the regular post is more reliable.Date of experience: January 11, 2017

Name: Brett Harris
Review: The worst company I have ever had the misfortune of dealing withThe single most worst experience I have ever had with a company. First they cannot locate my package via tracking number despite the fact THEY have sent me a tracking number! I say I've called to ask for advice as my door buzzer in my new home is not working currently, could they possibly phone me when they arrive. The answer is a blunt no: the driver does not have a phone. 21st century....delivery company...and no phone - I find that hard to believe! I work in customer service, if a patron asks me to make a phone call on their behalf by God I'll go the very small extra mile to make a short phone call for them. I ask for what I should do therefore. I basically get a lackadaisical attitude response of 'they don't do that' and lazy 'yeah's' and 'no's'. Basically exceptionally poor customer service; no solution, no advice, no help whatsoever. So after being on the phone for over 20 minutes at this point (I was on hold for over 15 minutes)I ask to speak to a manager. At this point the voice of the agent I was speaking to broke a little and it was obvious she became nervous that I was willing to take this further (her douchey attitude changed for the first time).Then I was put on hold for another ten minutes...before the phone call abruptly terminated. I guess they hung up on me. I complained to them via email (which they limit how many words you can write so you can't truly tell them the whole negative experience you have just had) and I never received a response. I then chatted with their online chat team, who also could not find my order via their tracking number), who basically gave me no help...and then surprise surprise, that conversation abruptly stopped - and I went to the back of the queue to wait to speak to a new agent. At this point in this shoddy experience you would expect someone to contact you back - but over 24 hrs later I still have not been contacted. They also expect you to sit in waiting for them to arrive for 10 hours! 10 hours (read 21st century again?). I asked are they in Richmond for 10 hours? 'No they are not' was the reply. So they must be able to gage roughly, if working on a similar route-routine, a lesser time period than 10 hours. 4 or even 5 hrs rather than 10 - that's a whole day! But it doesn't stop there. I'm tracking my package and low and behold at 5pm (its been out for delivery since 7.30am this morning) my tracking number says 'Attention: delayed due to missed delivery". I looked this up on line and basically means they missed me because they were too busy. So they expect me to wait another 10 hrs tomorrow? Who knows! As if I call them to find out what that means and enquire when the hell my package is arriving I'll be on hold waiting for a further 20 minutes to probably speak to some inept or shoddy-attitude agent. It would have been quicker and more convenient for me to bus, train, then bus again to the Bestbuy store, buy the damn thing in person, and then travel the same route all the way home. The whole point of a delivery is for CONVENIENCE and this whole travesty has been completely the opposite. By the looks of all the other negative reviews and 1-star-or-less company ratings I'm seeing online - they obviously could not care less. I will tick the box at the bottom of this page saying 'notify Purolator of my review' but do you think I will get any response?! Hell noDate of experience: January 11, 2017

Name: Jim McEachern
Review: Terrible Service!4 hours on the phone and no resolution. Will not deliver to a rural address and will not ship it by mail! Paid for delivery and still waiting to get my package from Amazon 6 days in Purolators ware house/sad sad sad !Date of experience: January 11, 2017

Name: Bob
Review: GarbageSays delivered, nothing at my house. Made 2 day amazon shipping take atleast 4 days. They also delivered someone else's package at my house so I'm sure they are mad as well.Date of experience: January 10, 2017

Name: Kevin
Review: Useless!Five times in a row now they were late with my package. Driver also pulled in my driveway then walked the package to the mailbox even though the front door was closer, where i was waiting.Date of experience: January 09, 2017

Name: Aswathy Sobhana
Review: Too badGiving 1 star only because it force me to provide a star.Date of experience: January 09, 2017

Name: Alan
Review: Tumbleweeds and Cricket Chirps when you try to contact themPurolator has the worst customer service I've experienced. They obviously don't know how to handle busy times of year. I never have a problem with Amazon shipping via Canada Post but with my Dec 21 order they used Purolator. For a courier company owned mostly by Canada Post, the service is like night and day between the two. Was told the package would arrive by Dec 30. Kept tracking it after they picked it up from Amazon but it never moved past the 'Shipping label created" stage. Tried to contact them but no response, went way past the 48 hour guarantee response time. Finally contacted Amazon and they got back to me within 2 hours and are sending a replacement...hopefully via Canada Post.Date of experience: January 07, 2017

Name: Tar Kavanagh
Review: Bad for business, bad for homeThe worst logistics business I have experienced.  Unreliable shipping dates, no follow up,  waste your personal time and money delivering you own packages.  I wish I could work somewhere and get paid to have somebody do my job for me.  Maybe I'll apply at Purolator and get paid for drinking coffee and say every package is undeliverable?  How do they stay in business?Date of experience: January 06, 2017

Name: eurmione Lisa
Review: I never had good exp with purolatorThe first time I use purolator, my order went missing.The second time I use purolator, the driver "attempted" to deliver my package but I "wasnt home". In reality, I was home the whole day. Instead he put the notice slip in the junk mail box. Good thing I saw it.The third time, I use purolator, the estimate deliver time when from Jan 5 to Jan 6. Then in Jan 6, their truck magically broke down. Plus, I didnt know it took 18hr for a package from Richmond, BC to Vancouver, BC. Now my estimate deliver is Jan 9. If I dont get it in Jan 9, bestbuy (the one who sell the stuff) will hear about it. If they (purolator) cannot get their stuffs straight, it is understanding that they lose their business. I actually waiting to see if they are actually to deliver it to my door on Jan 9 or they are going to just passing by.Date of experience: January 06, 2017

Name: Ken
Review: Not deliveredI am relieved that I am not the only one having troubles with Purolator.  I waited all day yesterday and no notice of delivery.  When I tracked the shipment online, it said no one at home to receive.  I called Purolator and asked them to redeliver but they told me the driver came and knocked on the door, noone answered.  I said he should have rang the bell because if I was upstairs, i might not hear it.  This assumes that the driver has come.  But I am not sure because Purolator said I should have a notice of delivery.  I said the driver might have gone to a wrong house.  Anyway, Purolator said they won't redeliver for items over 70 lbs.    I called best buy where I bought the desk from.  They called Purolator headquarter and arranged a delivery.  Best Buy said the Purolator will try again tomorrow.   But then the local Purolator called and said they wouldn't because it was their policy.  2 answers from Purolator( one from 800 number, one from local purolator ).  I said what will happen is that the item will be returned to best Buy and I reorder from Best Buy and we would go through this again.  Why wastes everybody's time?  I guess Purolator bets on that and charges Best buy again (bec shipping is free for me).  Purolator is in delivery business and it is very unprofessional.  "Knock on the door? ". They need to train their employees better.    Is additional shipping fee is what they hope to get ?    Then good luck to their business.  I won't be surprised when companies started switching their delivery partners.Date of experience: January 05, 2017

Name: Jandb Ho
Review: Worst possible customer service and employee incompetencyI got into a heated argument with the phone operator because the driver did not actually do the delivery. I was home all day and didn't see so much as a single piece of notice. On redelivery, they gave a notice with squibbles drawn on it that looks nothing like letters of the alphabet or any kind of digits, Roman or otherwise. Then the phone representative demanded that I read that to her and that she can't help me if I can't read. Well, what a nice way to discriminate against the illiterate, if I was one. And of course, it really was their employee, the driver, who don't know how to write and pretends that random lines are writing.I have never had other delivery services ridicule me for not being able to read words from ineligible drawings. I don't want to imagine the discrimination I would get if my English weren't as good or if I was somehow disabled.Date of experience: January 04, 2017

Name: Jamie Phong
Review: Complete garbageOrdered things off Zara and apparently used Purolator to ship the package. The tracking info was given so I could track my package. Sure, everything was good. I went downstairs a couple hours later to find a notice from Purolator in front of my building saying to pick it up. That was 2 hours ago and I was given no notification whether it'd be a phone call, a buzz, or even an email for that matter. No contact attempts whatsoever. Purolator doesn't care about their customers. But only with distributors that use them. If I had the choice I'd choose FedEx, or Amazon delivery service. Purolator just doesn't give a damnDate of experience: January 04, 2017

Name: FUCKPurolator
Review: COMPLETE UTTER SHlTOrdered a damn present for my girlfriend for Christmas and the shipping date was supposed to be on the 24th of Dec but the fking package was delayed till Jan 2nd and said it will be here late... FCK FINE ILL WAIT BUT NOPE it fking delayed till JAN 3rd and STILL DIDNT SHOW UP!!!! I called them 3 times about it and literally was on hold for 30 fking minutes and its gonna get delayed AGAIN untill the 4th... in the end I got a sorry if it's not picked up we can't get it to you making so much bull shlt excuses. Every other fking delivery company is driving by my house through the snow and doing their job right: Fedex, UPS , EVEN CANADA POST!!!  you so you care for the customers but that just bullcrap you're saying because you want the company to look good?? well you're the worest out there. I generally Hope this company collapses and go out of business forever. NO ONE AND NO COMPANY SHOULD EVER USE PUROLATOR AS AN OPTIONDate of experience: January 04, 2017

Name: Vasile Nanu
Review: Terrible companyMy package was to be delivered last week,ordered Wensday morning,  it went fast through sorting and shipping, arrived Thursday morning in Guelph  and Friday evening was still there. Today is Monday and still nothing. What a joke. I'll make sure next time the company I order isn't using Purolator.Date of experience: January 02, 2017

Name: Gatluke Chuol Reat
Review: This Company need to go, they are l …This Company need to go, they are lazy, racist unworthy and should be avoided altogether. In London, Ontario Canada. They have a angery management problem. I never encounter a company Like this and I am calling all my shipping Companies to never send my order to Purolator ever again.Date of experience: January 01, 2017

Name: Anastasia
Review: Worst company ever, avoidI paid 20$ to get next day delivery and they delivered the next week. Completely unacceptable, this company is the worst. Canada post is much more reliable and cheaper, I will never order from anywhere that uses this piece of crap serviceDate of experience: December 31, 2016

Name: Anees
Review: FUCKOLATOR ... 0 star companyI wish I had option for negative ratings without even single star. FUCKOLATOR .. Fraud company with fraud staff. They keep lying that receiver is not available, receiver is on vacation. They know who is on vacation their driver decide that who is available and who is not. They never try to deliver and keep updating fake information on their bu****it site.Date of experience: December 31, 2016

Name: Micky
Review: Garbage company with worst customer service representativesMy christmas package never got drlivered, they kept changing delivery date from dec 22 to 23 then 24 then 28 and now jan 3, 2017!Talked with customer service many times, rudest as**ls and bi**es ever. Saw thier truck delivering in my neighbour. Upon telling they say no space in truck for my package, its a shoe box.Told them can come pick up my package, they don't know if can arrange pick up either, took my number saying will call back. Its mid night now, no call. Will never shop ftom companies using this garbage company. Had worst Christmas and going to have a ruined new year too.Date of experience: December 31, 2016

Name: Lane Boghean
Review: These guys are brutal!! Never ever  …These guys are brutal!! Never ever ship anything with them. Sent back my package as undelivered-able but never even left a note that they attempted delivery. Tried to locate the package and got zero help from them. Terrible customer service!!Lane Balgonie, Sask.Date of experience: December 30, 2016

Name: Thomas Liu
Review: Bad!!!Purolator is one of the worst shipping companies. My tv receiver was broken and I called Bell and they said that the tracker for my parcel was on the carrier wednesday and today is friday and still no receiver. They didn't even leave a note or knock on the door.Date of experience: December 30, 2016

Name: Everyday Grail
Review: Avoid them like the plague. Canada  …Avoid them like the plague. Canada Post, FedEx, and UPS are the only acceptable options. I called Purolator to add my building entry code, and each time I was given a service ticket number and a promise that it would be delivered the next day. By the next day, the tracking number would show that the driver attempted delivery but did not have the entry code or some other irrelevant result (package available for pickup, address correction required). Now, repeat this three times and you will see why Purolator has earned a place in my book alongside DHL as the two worst shipping companies to deal with. I will no longer shop with companies that use Purolator. Canada Post FlexDelivery is my new preferred method of receiving packages!Date of experience: December 30, 2016

Name: Said El Jirari
Review: Two times now that I wait home for  …Two times now that I wait home for a package to see the delivery driver get in tbe building, stick a notice on the door and never bother use the intercome nor a phone !!!Date of experience: December 29, 2016

Name: Christopher He
Review: I just don't understand why Purolat …I just don't understand why Purolator has to drive past my city BY 20 KILOMETERS then drive all the way back to my city to deliver packages of our city. Tracking was not thoroughly updated and the fact that you have to be at home to receive the package is kind of dumb. But overall I got lucky and didn't get the worst shipping experience although in the future if there's an option to choose something else I would.Date of experience: December 29, 2016

Name: Vic
Review: They tried to deliver onceMy son was at home when the first and only delivery attempt was made but he wasn't fast enough to get to the door before the driver left. Now they want us to pickup the parcel from another city that is 30 minutes drive away (23 km).. Called customer service and they told that their delivery guarantee is suspended with no explanations. They will try to deliver again but no guarantee... Lesson learned not to use PuralatorDate of experience: December 28, 2016

Name: Chris
Review: DISGUSTING SERVICE. PATHETIC SO CALLED DELIVERY COMPANYSo many times they didn't deliver to my home. They have a computer call me telling me to come pick it up....You call yourself a home delivery company?Look at all your horrible reviews. You guys are PATHETIC GARBAGE  !!!Date of experience: December 27, 2016

Name: Daniel Everitt
Review: Call the better business Bureau against purolatorIf we all call the bbb  a Real investigation against Purolator will take place.. 2x they have screwed up on me. And the latest time over the holidays screwed up meds.. I'm filing my complaint tomorrow with the bbb..  if you take time to read other complaints. Purolator replies with the same copied and pasted reply to each and every complaint..   check for yourself.. Purolator does not care what so ever.. do the right thing   call the bbb  I am   and so is my doctor in bc who also cancelled his business account..Date of experience: December 27, 2016

Name: Carol Allen
Review: Incompetent  companyNever use them. Unreliable, overpriced, lose your packages and terrible customer service. They just lost my business accountDate of experience: December 24, 2016

Name: B. Mouritsen
Review: Horrible! Made "Guaranteed" Package Late For Christmas!Guaranteed means nothing. This company says it is late due to "weather". Funny. Other product ordered on exact same day coming from the same city arrived just fine through FedEx.I tracked down the "redirected" flight with my package on it. It was mysteriously rerouted away from Kamloops for both scheduled times today. Yet, the Kamloops airport hasn't redirected a single other flight. Nor is there "bad weather". They need to be investigated for their deception and questionable business tactics.Date of experience: December 24, 2016

Name: Jenna Conway
Review: Worst company ever, worst customer service everHad text books shipped to me in an apartment building. My boyfriend was called today and informed that one of my packages were damaged. One of the books arrived from amazon very quickly and was apparently delivered god knows where and left outside in the snow for more than a day where it was ruined. I have my own entrance but was told it was delivered to my door, if it had been I would have seen it.  My boyfriend  was told that while attempting to deliver more packages to me the driver noticed the first package delivered was still there but damaged. When I got to the store I noticed that my package had been opened before I even got there pretty sure that's illegal . I was basically told that I need to take it up with amazon even though it is completely apparent it was damaged because of the driver leaving it outside seeing as it is still wet. A second employee came out and escalated the situation, even after I said I wanted them to finish so I could leave. She even threatened to call the police on me because I was swearing. When I said I was leaving she then proceeded to chase me out of the store and had one of the truck drivers take a picture of my sisters licence plate to report me to the police for swearing apparently. Worst customer service ever and worst company ever, I still have one more package that's supposed to come too, so hopefully that one won't get left outside.Date of experience: December 24, 2016

Name: Ashok Sinha
Review: Pure deceipt. Tracking shows items delivered. Not received.I ordered Electric Range Parts from Repair Clinic, US. Order No.9657056-889363 on 21st December 2016. Items dispatched promptly by Repair Clinic by Purolator vide Courier PIN: FWE000144402. I paid express delivery charges for this parcel.Purolator did not deliver the item though I was sitting at the window throughout the day and no one from Purolator came to drop the package and no note was also left.We have CCTV Camera and couldprove that no one came to visit the premises to deliver the item.On tracking at the purolator website the item is showing as delivered.Called Purolator customer care and came to know the parcel is returned back to depot and cannot be delivered before 28th December, 2016 for 5 days. The rep said she cannot do anything about it.Want me to pick up from the depot I am new here and have no car or driving license. Now cannot get my Oven repaired and can't cook for 5 days.Exactly same thing happened to one of my friend few days back.Not a reliable courier and will never book any parcel through Purolator.Simply cheat company. Very disappointed.Ashok SinhaApt.117, 3455 Morning Star Drive,Mississauga, ON L4T3T9Phone: 6476274261Date of experience: December 23, 2016

Name: Jean-Martin Payeur
Review: HorribleHorrible service, 1 time attempt at delivery then ships the product 25 min by car from downtown montreal. Closed for private pickup at that remote location on weekends and on weekdays after 19:00 but keeps the product only 5 days... just HorribleDate of experience: December 22, 2016

Name: Darren Smith
Review: If I could give them negative I would! They suck!1 week late paid for 3 day delivery still no package every day says delayed delay delay worst company in Canada! Why does anyone use this company they should all be fired! If anyone else ran a company like this they would be out of  businessDate of experience: December 21, 2016

Name: Stephen Franks
Review: They do NOT deliver to homes on OshawaTheir service will only deliver during business hours, and they will not leave at the door even with a NSR sticker. This means that the only way to get your package is to drive to Scarborough!   This a a two hour drive this time of year. They should not advertise that they do home deliveries. If you work for a living during regular hours you can never get a delivery. I now actively ask merchants to use any other means, or I do not buy from them.Date of experience: December 21, 2016

Name: Zack
Review: Bad servicePackage has been sitting in the facility of Purolator for 4 days and haven't been shipped from Toronto to Mississauga and most unreliable deliver serviceDate of experience: December 19, 2016

Name: Qing Huang
Review: It is hard to imagine this is 21th century when a delivery service is so bad.It says it is on delivery vehicle for 4 days and it never happened. It never calls you or contacts you by any means. Simply like a dead company.It is such a joke!Date of experience: December 17, 2016

Name: Lena Clark
Review: Purolator ruined my Christmas.Every time I have had something shipped by purolator I have had a problem. This year is my daughter's first Christmas and we were excited to get professional photos taken and used them to create Christmas cards that we had printed online. They were supposed to arrive by December 12th at the latest so I would have lots of time to mail them out to our family.When they didn't arrive on the 12th I checked the tracking and it said they were delayed because of snow. Ok, that's fair. The 13th should still be plenty of time. Still no package on the 13th. I called purolator and they tell me it will come tomorrow. I am not very optimistic but take them at their word. 14th still no package. Tracking continues to say it's in sorting Depot. Call again. An investigation is opened. Morning of 15th someone calls to say they are looking into it. Whole day goes by and nothing. No package or subsequent phone call. I call back and they tell me they have no information and I can't be connected to the person handling the investigation. They don't have phone numbers for them, only email.Morning of 16th I call again. No news. Demand to speak to person doing investigation, oh yes no problem! I'll connect you right away. (Why did I not get the same story the night before?)Leave a message and get a call back fairly quickly. I am told The driver in my area is overloaded and has packages on his truck that have been waiting OVER A WEEK for delivery. No, my package won't be delivered today. In fact he has 100s of people he needs to call back and tell them the same thing. It's such a busy time of year.Finally I ask if there is a way for me to just pick up the package myself. Why yes ma'am, of course that is an option. Ummm, what? I have been calling every day all week and no one even once gave me the option of getting it myself??I cannot believe the incompetence of everyone involved. I understand this is a busy time of year, but the funny thing is... this time of year HAPPENS EVERY YEAR. How has Purolator not figured out that they need more drivers/staff around Christmas? Even if I get my cards today it's pretty much too late for them to be sent out in time. And this could have been avoided if customer service had cared at all about my problem and even tried the tiniest bit to help me.I am disgusted at the lack of concern for late shipments. How can a company care so little about its customers. They should be ashamed.It's safe to say I will NEVER use Purolator again and will actively avoid ordering from companies online who use Purolator to ship. WORST. COMPANY. EVER.Date of experience: December 16, 2016

Name: Brian C
Review: Purolator never even tries to deliver to condosI hate it when I order something online and find out they use Purolator.They and FEDEX never actually try to deliver anything to condos.  I am constantly finding "We tried to deliver and you weren't here" notes on my condos door with dates and times I KNOW I was home.   Unlike UPS and Canada Post who actually try to contact you through the complex intercom. To make it worse, Purolator and FedEx make you go out to the airport to pick up your package if undelivered.   UPS and Canada Post have local drop off/pick up points within a few blocks of my home.    Just terrible service.Date of experience: December 16, 2016

Name: Jeff Bezoos
Review: Pretty bad, but not the worstI had my replacement Fitbit shipped with Purolator. I was pretty skeptical since I've heard so much crap about them, but ot wasn't too bad. Package was supposed to arrive in 7-14 business days and it arrived at my door after just 1 day. Only downfall I had was that the idiot delivery man left the package outside in -20 degree weather and didn't even ring the doorbell. After letting the Fitbit thaw for a few days, it worked fine so I guess it's whatever. Overall Purolater is a pretty bad company but it wasn't as bad as people said it was. It's miles and miles better than Canada Post though. Maybe I just got lucky.Date of experience: December 16, 2016

Name: john
Review: Very BadThis is like the worst company everDate of experience: December 11, 2016

Name: Alex
Review: GARBAGEParcel was suppose to come on Thursday, delayed due to WINDY conditions,,. Then was suppose to come on Friday, their tracking info said it was "on vehicle for delivery", unfortunately it was delayed due to the weather conditions. They don't update their tracking info until 5:00 pm (9 hours after on vehicle delivery status) which is absolute garbage.Date of experience: December 11, 2016

Name: Jay Rose
Review: Terrible service.Waited for a package for next day delivery. It was snowing but it wasn't like the city stopped moving. By 4 pm I start to make inquiries, as the status says 'on truck for delivery' ( at 8 am!) and it has still not showed up - the distance from the depot to me is 5km! I am put on hold repeatedly for a total of 1 hour. When I do finally talk to a customer service rep I am given no info aside from excuses. They actually have no idea where their trucks are or what they are doing. At 6 pm they are closed, and tracking status says 'delayed by weather'. I wonder if they are even in the same city - Canada Post's truck makes it to my place. So now my next day delivery is scheduled for Monday. Next day delivery...oh, plus three extra days. They can't even tell me when I might expect it. No info, no solution and they said my package wasn't 'important enough' to allow me to pick it up. Completely amateur service that ignores your inquiries. I suspect when Monday arrives they won't show up. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY FOR ANYTHING!!!!! Unless, of course, you need to know how not to do business.Date of experience: December 10, 2016

Name: pastelblonde
Review: FrustratedFirst my estimated shipping time was Thursday, then when Thursday came it changed to Friday. Then when Friday came it said out for delivery, 8 hours later it updated as a delay and the date changed to Monday. I ordered my item because I NEED it for tonight (Saturday) this is so ridiculous. NEVER USE PUROLATOREDIT: It's been a week since I posted this review, still no package. Everyday since, my tracking has stated "out for delivery" and every evening its stated "delayed". Never. Use. Purolator.Date of experience: December 10, 2016

Name: Kev S
Review: https:// gyazo .com/07f6ecd4be014b45f641d89be323079fhttps:// gyazo. com/07f6ecd4be014b45f641d89be323079fDate of experience: December 08, 2016

Name: Madi
Review: COMPLETE CRAPEven if you pay extra money for shipping, they WILL NOT get the package to you on time. I am now on my 8th day of waiting for my original two day delivery, and now I am forced to go pick it up on my own as Purolator doesn't know how to deliver this package on time. They stated United States package are prioritized over Canadian ones. Going forward, I know FedEx actually has decent customer service and I will be shipping through them. NEVER use Purolator.Date of experience: December 08, 2016

Name: tristan wilson
Review: It is SO BAD I don't even want to waste any more time on the issue!The service.....Oh wait there is NO SERVICE....Well if they did have service it ......Screw it I am not even going to start to tell you how bad the service is because words can't describe just how bad it is....That is if they had any service!!!!Date of experience: December 07, 2016

Name: marcus
Review: THE WORST SHIPPING COMPANY EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!THE ABSOLUTE WORST OF ALL TIME!Date of experience: December 07, 2016

Name: Cocoa Dread
Review: I Guess They're Aiming For Worst Delivery Service..?Purolator is so awful that it almost feels like there is an attempt to be the worst.  They need an overhaul or else they will not last.  They won't get any contracts from large corporations, and individuals will choose other far more reliable services.  The depots say one thing; the customer service agents say another.  It's terrible being a customer.  It must be hell to work there.  For the sake of your customers and employees, get it together.Date of experience: December 07, 2016

Name: Marston
Review: PuroLATERAfter 7 DAYS and still waiting for a less than 20 km delivery, I can only feel hilarious. And they will kindly give you "On delivery" joke every single day, guess the joke is part of their service.If you hate yourself, don't forget to give Purolater a shot. It won't fail you, probably never.And wow that's one more day passed and still no shiiit happens. I really feel ashamed for them.Think I'm gonna send my resume to them for a job. It must be a deadly easy and relaxing work.Date of experience: December 07, 2016

Name: Rita Neyer
Review: Miserable. Not recommendable.Waiting for package to arrive in time for holiday, over 10 days now. My order had status "On vehicle for delivery" three days in a row. They must simply stop when tired at the end of the day... Anyways, even the 'live' chat didn't work, so not even possible to get in contact (I won't even try emailing).Date of experience: December 07, 2016

Name: Dozer
Review: Wish we can give negative punctuationThis Company is a bad Joke, have been shopping through internet for many years and never saw anything like this. They just don't know how to deliver.. and it's suppose it's their job, they don't leave a note, they lie about fail delivers, or where to pick them up, if the packet was so big, if the agent didn't know it was too big so it couldn't leave it at a pick up point, if we will leave it at some point and then nothing, they only give excuses excuses and more excuses, after one week dealing with them i had to cancel my order with Amazon and deliver through other service... I serously would investigate them because for me this looks like  some kind of fraud or fake company, never never never again.Date of experience: December 06, 2016

Name: Stacy Stewart-McKerracher
Review: If I could give it no stars I wouldHorrible horrible told one minute my package would be delivered today then told an hour later that it won't this was time sensitive bit they don't care.Date of experience: December 06, 2016

Name: Calimero Olol
Review: Worst Company ever, stay awayThis company is a joke, stay away from it, I lost more than 1400 dollars of goods because of them, they r not professional, they have the worst stuff i ever seen in my lifeDate of experience: December 06, 2016

Name: P Singh
Review: Doesn't get any worse than thisI was going to write my experience in detail but when I saw a 1 star rating based on 362 reviews, I realized that messing up is just the way they do things and its not just me that was affected.So, short and simple, stay away and don't use them. ========1. Driver leaves delivery notice2. I call to get address corrected and driver still leaves delivery notice and wrong address3. I call to delivery scheduled and confirm the address was correct and it was driver error, delivery scheduled for a monday (I take off from work)4. No delivery on monday either, no updates, no phone call, no accountability, no service at all, lost money from day off, drove 24 kms to go pick up item.Date of experience: December 05, 2016

Name: Taffy S
Review: Stay awayI always have to deal with some kind of problem when Purolater is shipping my item. Terrible service.Date of experience: December 04, 2016

Name: reaper reap
Review: They gave my package to the wrong person at their reception centerThey gave my package to the wrong person at their reception center, their way of working is not secured, and their customer stuffs r stupid and staggering the worst I've ever seen, This is the first time and the last time I’m going to deal with them.Date of experience: December 03, 2016

Name: Joseph Mester
Review: Delivery guy put wrong date on delivery note. Wend for pickup - package is not there. Very bad service at 1550 Credistone Road, Vaughan, ON, L4K 5N1.Delivery guy put wrong date on delivery note. Wend for pickup - package is not there. Very bad service at 1550 Credistone Road, Vaughan, ON, L4K 5N1. They will not give their phone number even to call and check if package is there. Asked me to call head office 18887447123. Waited over an hour. Gave up. Nobody will pickup the phone at pulorator.Shame on you!!!!Package is lost.Date of experience: December 02, 2016

Name: Peter
Review: Think they Won't delay again?Absolutely horrendousDate of experience: December 02, 2016

Name: Faisal Anwar
Review: "Delayed in transit due to missed connection"Seriously ? How does this even happen ? Shipment was sent out by Amazon 3 days agoDate of experience: December 02, 2016

Name: Slykiz Kizito
Review: Worst Campany everTheir customer service is the worst I've ever seen. Their policy is to not leave a delivery notice if you live in an apartment (WHY NOT?) and the only reason that I know about the package delivered is because I so happened to check the status. What they are supposed to do is call if they cannot deliver it, but they didn't call. The thing says, they scanned it out for delivery at least 3 times, but I am sitting at home, and no one buzzed nor called me!I hate how I have to wait at home, from 8 am until 5 pm for the delivery guy to come.  What kind of window is that?!  This Campany is a joke, i can't recommend it to any one after seing their incompetent servicesDate of experience: December 02, 2016

Name: Ewa S
Review: Worst delivery ever! Twice!The worst delivery company I came across in my life! Screwed me over TWICE! First they confirm that a parcel will be at a given location and then the next day (after 24h!) I get a voice message saying that they failed to deliver it to my chosen location and the parcel is somewhere on the outskirts of the city instead, AND it will be delivered to my location in a few days! I mean, why do you confirm if you know it's NOT confirmed?! I ordered a phone on Nov 27, it got picked up by Purolator on Nov 29 in Mississauga/Toronto. TWICE it was "delayed in transit due to missed connection" and finally reached Montreal on Dec 01 (it's 7h drive from Toronto to Montreal). I was at work so they couldn't deliver. I contacted them the same day, at 2:30 pm asking to change the pick-up location to a place close to my work. Agent CONFIRMED it is done/confirmed and my parcel will be there on Dec 2. Today, Dec 2, at 11:00 am I'm getting a voice message that the parcel is at main pick-up location, on the outskirts of the city, because the depot didn't process my request in time!!! They only had time since yesterday 2:30 pm!! How can you run a business like that? With today's technology etc. is it really so difficult to have effective internal  communication in Purolator!? NEVER AGAIN!Date of experience: December 02, 2016

Name: Ruoyan Chi
Review: the worst company8 days, 4 missed delivery.This is the first time I use Purolator and it also will be the last time.I guess I will receive my package when I go to the hell.Date of experience: December 01, 2016

Name: Viola Ferrera
Review: HorribleJust make sure to never ever ever use their service.Horrible locations, horrible policies and horrible service!Date of experience: December 01, 2016

Name: Kayla M.
Review: Never deliver on the first attempt (they don't even try)I've never received a package on the day it's scheduled to be delivered. Every package sent with them always requires multiple attempts, or begging the local depot to pull my package off the truck so I can come and pick it up.I can't count the hours wasted waiting for trucks that never show up, only to have my tracking updated that there was no answer, or it was "Delayed due to missed delivery".I guess that's what you get for paying for 2 day delivery.Date of experience: November 30, 2016

Name: Cody
Review: Purolator loves to inconvenience customersIf I never have to deal with Purolator again I would be very grateful. What a crap company. Making customers jump through hoops to get their packages. Surprised they're still in business.Date of experience: November 30, 2016

Name: Buster Himan
Review: Worst Shipping CompanyI caught the purolator guy writing the slip that says i wasnt home and when i opened the door he tried to hand it to me!?. They do this every time i dont think that there has been a single time that purolator has knocked they just suck at what they do i mean if i wanted to go out and pick up my package myself i wouldnt have paid for the shipping. If you have a choice never use this company ever they really are the worst.Date of experience: November 30, 2016

Name: Carol
Review: Try knocking the door or ringing the door bell!!!Attention Purolator Drivers:Don't check off the your not home box if you haven't first tried the door bell or knocking on the door.  I can't tell you how many times this has happened where a driver drops off the ticket and drives off.  I have a busy toddler and a 6month old so I'm not watching out my window constantly for them and I don't think I have too.Date of experience: November 29, 2016

Name: Dalton J Cox
Review: Worst shipping company!!I would highly suggest never shipping with these people! They charge additional fees that you as a seller or a buyer are not made aware of. Their customer service is even worse then their shipping. You boxes arrive barely together and look like your item has just been throw around. HORRIBLE !!Date of experience: November 29, 2016

Name: JL
Review: WOW NOT HAPPY!If I had a choice, I would not use Purolator..... EVER. I ordered an item using Disney points for my girls and got a delivery notice even though I was home. I'm a single mom of two toddlers that are sick right now and I don't drive. The pick up is way too far by transit!!! I use coupons and save points to get "free" fun things like this, I was told "Sure we can redeliver, there is a charge for that!" FORGET IT! Send it back to the company when my points are added back I will know it was returned and I can reorder at their expense!!! I have not ever had a good experience with Purolator and will not use them when given the option!!! I do wish companies would give options!!!Date of experience: November 28, 2016

Name: Janine Ali
Review: Too many errors!Repeatedly had problems with this company:  wrong package ID on notice,  wrong driver route, stating I was not home when I actually was, keeping the parcel at a distant location rather than one of many available close-by location; I'm forced each time to call and ask them to re-deposit at a closer location. The workers on the phone are always polite and helpful, I just wish they would improve their procedures and focus more on quality service...Date of experience: November 28, 2016

Name: Boo Radley
Review: The WorstThere is just nothing good you can say about these slow moving and slower thinking imbeciles. They won't release a package even if it is addressed to you. Sounds moronic and it is but they say that it is the policy. But if you are a moron then you should apply for a job because you are qualified and they don't seem to mind being regarded as idiots- it's their policy.Date of experience: November 25, 2016

Name: finnegan
Review: Horrendous service.Horrendous service. Urgent same delievery of a letter. Never got delivered, wasn't even attempted on the same day. Just recieved a $50 invoice charging me to send it back. Absolute Joke.Date of experience: November 23, 2016

Name: Caramel Truffle
Review: The. Worst.Purolator did:- "Attempt a delivery but nobody was home" when I was there, right next to the door- Declare that the package was dispatched "for delivery today" for a few days- Leave a delivery notice where it was the least visible instead of putting it on the door; it took me a day to find it- Tell me, a student without a car, to go recover a package in one of their depositories in an industrial zone, forcing me to walk for more than an hour for a small thingPurolator did not:- do a decent job- be kind enough to die alreadyIf I could give them a negative score, I would. This is the. Worst. Delivery service. The singular worst.Other services took months to deliver me packages, opened and stole items from my packages, bended letters with a "DO NOT BEND" warning on them, etc,  but I when I have the choice, I choose any of these delivery services over Purolator in a heartbeat. I am willing to pay more if it means not using Purolator. I am willing to wait longer if it means not using Purolator. Seeing that my package is handled by Purolator makes me physically ill.Date of experience: November 22, 2016

Name: John
Review: Canadian courier that is 91% owned by Canada Post"Purolator Inc. is a Canadian courier that is 91% owned by Canada Post Corporation,[1] 7% owned by Barry Lapointe Holdings Ltd. and 2% by others." -wiki"You want to know why this company is horrible? Let the government run a business with tax payer money and have its employee policy based around affirmative action hiring and internal promotion to management due to seniority instead of skillset and ability." -Any successful business ownerEnough said.zero stars not an option?!?!?!?! even trustpilot has empathy.I do understand that this type of business you cannot please everyone all the time, its just logistically impossible. The issue is that the other companies do have procedures in place to make problems resolve pleasantly, where as Purolator just doesnt care. its horrendous.Date of experience: November 21, 2016

Name: Jandie Kyrsten
Review: INCOMPETENTI had  a parcel which was tracked as "on truck for delivery" for Nov 9th. I received a call on the 15th saying they couldnt deliver because they didn't have a buzz code so i called back the same day and gave it to them and was told it would be delivered the next day (wed). By friday morning i still did NOT have my parcel so I called again and was told they couldn't find the info so then updated it for a "rush" delivery. Now it is saturday and I have called and they told me they have no record of the tuesday call and the info only got put into their system on the fri with my buzz code. My parcel is confirmed sitting in their "holding area" for delivery (on monday) at the facility right now, which is staffed. However, because the holding area is locked for some stupid reason beyond me I am not able to get my parcel today even though they have staff there. I am also not able to pick it up early monday, even though they have staff. I have to wait for it to go onto the stupid friggin truck and get delivered monday. EXCEPT im on vacation starting monday for an ENTIRE WEEK. So, my parcel is locked up in a stupid cage right now with staff who are "not allowed access" to it  to give it to me, even though this is ENTIRELY THEIR FAULT, and I have to wait another FULL WEEK to get it. Someone needs to give these staff access to the holding area because this is UNACCEPTABLE.Date of experience: November 19, 2016

Name: Johnny Boy
Review: Terrible.Was late, kept my package over the weekend because they couldn't deliver it on a Friday. Paid for fast shipping for nothing. Would not recommend. Also, Danielle C is a terrible chat room operator and is not helpful.Date of experience: November 19, 2016

Name: Garet Yarl
Review: Just badI was supposed to get two games from EB games on the day of release, and EB games decided to ship them via Purolator. These were birthday gifts I was really looking forward to playing on the day of release and during the week-end. They came out on Friday the 18th of November, and I'm stuck waiting until Monday to get them. I woke up several hours early on the off-chance the mail would actually show up on time, and today's been one horrible day.Thank you for not giving me my birthday presents on time, Purolator. I really appreciated wasting a beautiful day indoors waiting for a game that didn't show up.Date of experience: November 19, 2016

Name: Leon Brooks
Review: The lack of empathy is stunningIm not even going to waste my time explaining how horrible the customer service is especially when I called looking for a package that said it was delivered. Bottom line if at all possible pick a different shipping courier....hopefully they keep up their lack of concern or care with people's hard earned money and go out of buisness!Date of experience: November 18, 2016

Name: Stan Gadziola
Review: Do not use PurolatorI have always used Xpress Post and they are great and only $15 for my package. Well last week there was a holiday on the Friday I thought if I used Purolator it would get here faster. Boy mistake I made. Double the price and the envelope was sent lat Wed. November 9. Today is November 15 it is 5 PM and I am still waiting for my envelope. It was suppose to be here yesterday the 14th. I called 6 times and spoke with an agent. The first few told me it would be here by 6PM. At 6 PM I called again and the agent told me for residential delivery they deliver until 8PM. When I got off the phone I checked my tracking number and where it said on truck for delivery had changed from black to red it said Delayed due to missed delivery. Now I am home all day as I am today and still no package. Worst service and everyone that I spoke to had a different story. The last call yesterday I made after seeing the red Delayed due to missed delivery a fellow by the name of Christopher Carter told me the driver couldn't deliver the package and turned back at 5:30 to go back to the Purolator depot ...... Wow .... unbelievable. What has happened to work ethics.Date of experience: November 15, 2016

Name: Gilles Page
Review: Yet another Fake Attempts to DeliverAgain I was met with a "We Missed You" tag on the door. No ringing  the bell. Again the driver simply wrote the tag, tiptoed to my door to leave it silently. Likely because the package was a little too big for his liking. Every time I get a package that is more than 1 foot cube delivered by them I get that scheme!Now I have to pay a cab to get my package. Double pay for delivery at home, NICE. Thanks amazon for using these scammers!Purolator, your drivers are nothing but a bunch of scammers!Date of experience: November 15, 2016

Name: Vince Zhao
Review: Terrible shopping experienceI have move to Halifax recently, and start shopping online for my new home.I primarily use Amazon for online shopping so I get the Prime membership which comes with two-day shipping.I ordered 4 packs of gym tiles on Oct-27 which delivery to me with FedEx on Nov-1 with out any problem (shipping from US).Then I ordered a utility bench on the same day which delivery to me with UPS on Nov-2 with out any problem.As I start ordering more stuff (mattress protector, pillow protector, night stand, etc.) between Nov-4 to Nov-6 they start to use Purolator.These items I ordered goes to two shipments, one says it attempts to delivery to me but not left any note on the building entrance, another simply didn't attempt to delivery. I had four phone calls, one website live chat with Purolator, and two live chat with Amazon attempt to resolve the issue but I still not getting the package today on Nov-14.Purolator tries to let me drive 12km long to get the package half city away, and passes a bridge twice which needs to pay for the tolls.When having a phone call with Purolator, the customer representative is really rude which keeps talking without listening to me, they no nothing about their system and treat you as fool which didn't help.Finally I convince Purolator to send those packages to local store, hopefully they Name: Janine S
Review: Horrible delivery serviceThey often lie about why a package can't be delivered. I was told the road was closed (not true) and that the address was incorrect (not true- Canada Post has delivered to my address in the past with no trouble). They must hire lazy and incompetent people.When they do deliver a package they leave it out on the front porch for everyone to see, even when we have a mailbox at the other door. Very unsafe delivery service. Canada Post is so much better than they are. I hope Amazon drops Purolator. Purolator doesn't even rank one star- I wish I could give less.Date of experience: November 10, 2016

Name: Neil Waters
Review: BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE - THEY DON'T CARE!!!!!!!!Tracking number: CGK000740564 (PRIORITY SHIPPING)Name: Neil WatersTO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN:I am very frustrated and upset about the increasingly BAD customer service that I have received today from PUROLATOR STAFF AND MANAGEMENT. I had ordered some items from AMAZON.CA and paid a high cost for PRIORITY SHIPPING. On 11/05/2016, at 08h03(am), I received a call with an automated message to let me know that my parcel is at an office 30 minutes by car (from my home) asking me to come and pick it up.(I wondered why no one had come to my doorstep to deliver this parcel, when I paid such a high cost for delivery, plus I always have someone at home and the security guard downstairs at the gates was also informed to let any PUROLATOR personnel in for delivery)I called the PUROLATOR number and spoke to a (very busy and dis-interested agent) at 11h31(am) (her name was LAURA or LORNA) and inquired with her why the package was not delivered to my doorstep, she told me that she did not know and there was an error that may have been made with regards to delivery.I inquired with her where the package was and she gave me the address. I told her that I would go and pick it up - SHE SAID OKAY! AND FAILED TO TELL ME THAT THE LOCATION WAS CLOSED!I drove all the way to the LOCATION and it was in fact CLOSED. I drove all the way back.On my way back, I called PUROLATOR one more time and spoke to another busy and dis-interested agent JAQUES and he told me that there was nothing that he could do for me. Basically, HE DID NOT CARE about the inconvenience that was caused to me and all the time and energy and GAS I wasted in the travel.I asked for his manager or supervisor, after about 10 minutes of waiting on hold. A supervisor name CINDY came on LINE.....CINDY WAS THE WORST, SHE DID NOT CARE OR GIVE A DAMN FROM THE WORD GO, SHE BASICALLY TOLD ME THAT SHE CANNOT DO ANYTHING FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE THAT WAS CAUSED TO ME.SHE TOLD ME SHE CANNOT GIVE ME ANY COMPENSATION...SHE DID NOT EVEN APOLOGIZE!ALL SHE TOLD ME THAT SHE WOULD ARRANGE FOR DELIVERY NEXT WEEK TUESDAY AND THAT'S IT!I informed her 3 - 4 times about the inconvenience that was caused to me and explained to her that if the agent would have told me that the LOCATION was CLOSED, it would have saved me a lot of trouble!!!!BASICALLY SHE TOLD ME THAT SHE COULD NOT DO ANYTHING AND KEPT REPEATING HERSELF THAT THE PACKAGE WOULD BE SENT NEXT WEEK TUESDAY.CINDY, IS THE WORST SUPERVISOR I HAVE EVER HAD TO DEAL WITH, SHE WAS INCONSIDERATE, DID NOT EMPATHIZE AND JUST DID NOT GIVE A DAMN!!!! BASICALLY WANTING ME GO AWAY (indirectly)All she said was, she will follow up with the agent who spoke to me and make sure that future customers are not affected! I explained to her that this would not help me as I was already affected and severe inconvenience was caused to me!CINDY COMPLETELY IGNORED ME!!!!!!!!I was expecting a resolution and she did not give me one! The worst part is CINDY did not care, did not want to waste time on me and ABOVE ALL DID NOT APOLOGIZE AND DID NOT SHOW ANY CONCERN!This is the worst experience that I have had, we, as customers pay so much for shipping and handling and I must say that I am a very dis-satisfied customer.I would like someone to reach out to me with a resolution as soon as possible.Thank you, Neil 647 457 0045Date of experience: November 05, 2016

Name: Yes
Review: SlowAlways slow and late.Date of experience: November 03, 2016

Name: Syed A
Review: Terrible serviceI wasted a whole day waiting for the delivery. The courier didn't leave a notice nor did he ring the bell.Date of experience: October 28, 2016

Name: Suzanne Laurin-Seale
Review: awesome delivery guyMy initial experience with the company was questionable because every time they transferred my call it was to the wrong dept.  I suspect the actual phone system is to blame because everything else has been terrific.  I am a small business and needed a fair amount of assistance for a big order going to the USA... the support service was stellar.  I really felt like they cared.  After talking to 6 different support members 5 out of 6 were amazing, more than helpful, friendly, and solved my problems;  which were multiple.
