First my package was returned, because the clerk didn't advise me that they couldn't ship to PO box. Then shipped to a different address and still no delivery notification. It's day 3 and im still waiting, when I paid for next day. Never using Purolator again.Date of experience: July 09, 2016

Name: Scott
Review: Worst courier service out thereThe worst courier service.  I had to get meds delivered for my dog and for $30 it was supposed to be delivered by the next evening.  It was only from Toronto to Ottawa.All the tracking shows is a label was created, that's it.  A phone call to Purolator has a recording saying there are delays due to an increase in volume.  That's not my fu..ing problem, it's theirs.  I'm paying  $30 for them to do their job.  They could have told me when I was at the delivery kiosk that there were going to be delays and then I could have gone to Fedex etc.  It's now a day late and still no delivery. The tracking still shows only a label was created, not where it is.  The Chat on Purolator website has disappeared too and yet their recording says to use the chat feature to talk with them.Don't use Purolator.  I could have driven to and from Ottawa faster.Date of experience: July 09, 2016

Name: Herman Wedemire
Review: Horrible deserves 0 stars if possibleWorst courier service by far .... No tracking updates. Express service already 3 days late. No contact with Purolator.... Stay away by all means.Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: Hussain Mohammed
Review: The worst service you can ever get!!If I could I would have given them a negative review. If ordering make sure you tell the shipper not to send anything via puralator. They probably have the worst customer service ever! No one ever answers the phone and the plays the same message over and over and over again.  The same two line repeated. The fool who decided that it was a good idea to play a voice message while people are on hold should be fired. 45 mins and no one answered the phone!!Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: Jay
Review: No one will even answer the phoneMy delivery was due on Tuesday and now it's Friday, no package. It's apparently in the city but I can't even get through to find out where it is. I was on hold yesterday for a total of 1.5 hours only to be hung up on every time. I called one of the local depots and they will not answer the phone. What kind of a business is this? Terrible is an understatement! Why can't I rate them 0 stars?Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: Richard Adams
Review: Waste your time on holdNever, ever, waste your time with this company. Wait 45 mins on hold before talking to people that can not give you any answers. Respect yourself, avoid this horrid company.Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: Jon Arstikaitis
Review: How they stay in businessI've never been so frustrated with a company before having to wait for a package for them to deliver. They make Canada Post appear as five stars.My package is sitting at their facility and has been bumped for three straight days due to higher volume. The second day after an hour on the phone the girl assured me the package would arrive the next day. Did not happen. This business must be a joke for this company to see how many people they can upset. I've contacted the company where I purchased the product and let them know that as long as they used Purolator I would not buy from them again. Their hands are tied and nothing they could do for me. WE NEED TO BE HEARD AND PUT PUROLATOR OUT OF BUSINESS.Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: Evita W
Review: Live chat rep Danielle C closed our session while i was still typingMy order should be arrived 2 days ago, while i was waiting at home the whole day, the delivery person left a pick up note for attmpted delivery outside the door of my apt building entrance.  I contacted a rep yesterday and redelivery order was sent.  But when i check my tracking number today, my shipment was scanned as pick up for 3 times since the request was sent.  So i decided to contact the rep again.  This rep named danielle c was extremely horrible, instead of seeking for a solution or trying to help me out on this situation, she responded me with "due to high volumes our depots are showing delay" and "i cannot guarantee that they will be able to deliver by tomorrow" couple times(yes i know all the facts, how about telling me something useful?!) Why hire an actual person when they can only respond with copy and paste or auto-macro ? If i dont need help obviously i wouldnt even be contacting you. And while i was still typing, she closed our chat session with case unsolve.  Purolator's customer service is horrible.  Its like banging a door in someone's face and you get still paid for it. Shame on her and this company. I hope she reads this.Date of experience: July 08, 2016

Name: James
Review: Come on!I wanted to have a package delivered to downtown montreal but of course I wasn't home at the time because I work during the day so naturally purolator goes and leaves it a pick-up depot. But apparently the most appropriate depot is 15km away in Lachine rather than any sort of depot in montreal. I don't have a car so it would cost me far more than the contents of the package just to go pick it up. So I tried calling customer service to see if they could do something about it but of course they were  "experiencing a higher than usual call volume" so I waited for over 40 minutes until I just gave up.Date of experience: July 07, 2016

Name: Mark G
Review: Absolutely terribleTerrible. I live in Toronto, and they want me to drive to Vaughan to get my shipment, which is terrible since I don't have a car and the package is quite heavy; all this because the delivery was cancelled - I got a day off from work only to wait for this shipment. The next day I had to work and I missed the delivery - of course, they only try delivering once.Their customer service is basically non-existent. I tried using the Live Chat and it doesn't work (I can never get an available agent), I tried calling, but spent over 15 minutes on the phone without getting an answer.This company is just a nightmare, do you want to get a taste of hell? Try using Purolator.Date of experience: July 07, 2016

Name: Brendan
Review: Frankly the worst  customer service I have seen, really patheticI ordered a computer and it was supposed to be here on a certain day, and it wasn't. All good, stuff like that happens all the time where it isn't on time. Well then the next day, a fairly sunny one, they are like, oh, by the way, we can't deliver your package 'cause it's raining too hard, we'll do it tomorrow.  Now, it's a 20 degree, sunny as hell day, and guess what? Apparently weather is too dangerous to deliver in, and it's gonna be the next day. I've /been/ calling and noone answers, at all, no matter what line I try.  This is stupid, guys, if you have a choice, /DO NOT/ use Purolator. I stress that heavily.  And if you order something and get stuck with Purolator, well then, you're out of luck.Date of experience: July 06, 2016

Name: Thomas Achtem
Review: Purolator will pick up phone on pick ups in second but 1+ hour for trackingI arranged Purolator to ship overnight Ontario to Vancouver. It didn't happen, no biggie. Another day past , site says on truck for delivery, but after that is error on delivery. No biggie, next day site says on truck for  delivery, then failed to deliver at 6:21(were closed and they know that) No biggie, another day gone, again and know it's 6 days and say on the truck for delivery and next line says failed to deliver at 6:19 pm I call and spend over a hour and 40 minutes on hold to find out it's on the truck. i decide to call for a pickup and they answer in seconds. I will NEVER use Purolator unless it's free.Date of experience: July 06, 2016

Name: Owen
Review: "Delayed due to bad weather"ITS 28 DEGREES CELSIUS RIGHT NOW WITH SUN! I SEE CANADA POST DELIVERING, WHY ISN'T PUROLATOR DELIVERING? Frustrated, I paid extra for fast shipping and they delay it for "bad weather"Date of experience: July 06, 2016

Name: Ariel
Review: Rude customer service Worst courier in CanadaThey delay my delivery, well, it's ok. things happens. (Montreal to Ottawa, 2 hrs drive they took more than 3 days) I try to call them to change delivery address because I will not at home for 1 months. I wait for 30 minutes, finally got one customer representative talk to me. I told her I want to change my delivery address, she hung up my phone when I was telling her my tracking number! Ridiculous! I will avoid this courier company as possible as I can!Date of experience: July 06, 2016

Name: Josh Simpson
Review: Puro is cancerThe last time I've had to use these scumbags the driver drove past my house and marked it a missed delivery, then you're on hold for 40 minutes to try and get them to redeliver it because if you want to pick it up yourself it's all the way basically out of town. To hell with these guys, seriously.Date of experience: July 05, 2016

Name: Cunning Lin Guist
Review: Delivered to wrong address... 4 TIMES IN A ROW!Like the title says, the driver has delivered 4 packages to my neighbors. I have to check amazon.ca to see if it's delivered then go next door. Sure enough, it's sitting there. No signature. Didn't ring the bell. Nothing. On hold over 20 minutes to the absolute WORST hold message ever. This company is complete garbage.Date of experience: July 05, 2016

Name: Tyler Holden
Review: A garbage courier, and have been for a decadeI cannot conceive of how badly this company is run. I avoid Purolator as much as possible, but on occasion I am shipped something through them. In 10 years I have never had a good experience. From delivery people dropping off notices without knocking on the door, to the useless customer service team. The only thing consistent about this company is the total disregard for their customers, and their absolute incompetence. Avoid at all costs.Date of experience: July 05, 2016

Name: Kasey
Review: Angry purolator guyWork at an office, scheduled a pickup for 3:30 - 5:30. The purolator guy gets here before 3:30 and I tell him that the envelope isn't quite ready. Immediately he gets frustrated and rudely tells me that he's done at 4:00 so when is it going to be ready? First of all.. why would Purolator let me put in that pickup time if they cant pick anything up after 4:00???! So I say okay give me one sec I just need to print one more thing out and it will be ready (the time is still before my requested pick up time). As soon as I start walking away I hear him grunt and slam something down on the counter as he is clearly angry. By the time I get back and put the envelope together it hasn't even been 1 minute. I give him the envelope and he rudely walks out.. Anyway obviously this is totally unprofessional.. always have issues with Purolator.. I don't know what they are thinking when they hire staff.. Will not use again.Date of experience: June 30, 2016

Name: jeremy
Review: AVOID AT ALL COSTSThe absolute worst shipping service I've ever used! Never again!- They did not even attempt to deliver the package. They just left a tag at the door without even checking if anyone was home to receive, then immediately drove off.- When I went to pick it up the next day (at my own inconvenience -- I thought I paid for a delivery?), the clerk REFUSED to give me my parcel, even though she had it right there in her hands. I showed my ID. The name on the parcel matched. I told her who and where it came from, as well as the contents of the parcel. But for some reason that she couldn't properly explain, she thought it did not belong to me. I still have no idea why.- My request to speak with her management was blatantly ignored. I asked that she herself contact her superior instead then, but was ignored. My request for a direct line to customer service was denied, and I was instead given the generic, automated line where you have to sit through 30 minutes of pre-recorded nonsense. This got me nowhere and I gave up.- She requested that I show her an email confirmation to prove it belonged to me. I did not have an email confirmation because this was a personal package sent from a friend. We don't use commercial shipping software or send each other confirmation emails! - Ultimately, for her to *finally* believe it was my package, I had to show her a PERSONAL EMAIL CONVERSATION between myself and the sender. This is blatantly intrusive and unprofessional, but I saw no other choice. So nearly an hour after I arrived, she had finally relented the parcel to me... right before telling me to "have a great day" in a sarcastic tone. I happen to manage a large commercial shipping department, and I've dealt with all manner of mishaps, shipping errors, and customer service problems. But this simple little personal delivery trumps them all. I'm discontinuing my company's use of Purolator based on this experience. The shipping world is extremely competitive, and if this is how Purolator does their business, its a wonder they still exist in a free market.Avoid at all costs.Date of experience: June 30, 2016

Name: Neil
Review: Is this your first day, Purolator?Purolator called to say they can't deliver my package without a unit number in my address..I live in a house.Been on hold for 25 minutes trying to rectify this issue.Date of experience: June 29, 2016

Name: dreams
Review: Bad Bad Bad customer servicePurolator is a nightmare to deal with. I sent a projector that was 4 years old for repairs and packaged it to the Purolator specs, the package got damaged during shipping and won't cover the cost because it wasn't in the original box that I purchased the product in??? Who keeps the original packaging for all their products?? But they can leave your products on a door step and walk away and leave your products to be stolen. Absolutely disgusted with them. I will never use Purolator ever again. I will never recommend them for anything, I wouldn't use them to send dog food. They are the most useless company out there.Date of experience: June 28, 2016

Name: Mr. Not Amused
Review: Lost Shipment Worth Nearly $300Purolator has lost my shipment and refuses to take any responsibility for it. I bought a TV monitor on Amazon.ca and the shipping was supposed to be done by Purolator.  I took an entire day off so I can receive it personally and I was periodically checking the tracking number online.At around 14:00, I saw that the shipment was supposedly delivered at 12:37, so I went outside to check if it was unceremoniously dumped on my doorstep, but there was nothing there.  I immediately contacted their Customer department and was assigned a tracking case. I was told that their "tracking specialist" Mary Leblanc will send me an email soon.When I finally received her email, I noticed immediately that she barely could speak English. She told me that she will contact the driver as soon as possible. It took an entire week to get a reply from her, and when she did, she told me that the driver delivered the shipment to the proper address and the case is closed. Even if the driver told the truth (which is doubtful) and he did deliver the shipment to my address, he never notified me in any way. There was no doorbell or even a knock on the door.  In the 1.5 hour window between it was supposedly delivered and when I checked the front door, someone apparently stole the shipment. So someone else has my TV and I'm $300 in the hole, but Purolator isn't to be blamed. Never do any business with this irresponsible and unprofessional company.Date of experience: June 28, 2016

Name: Moe
Review: TOTAL lack of service!!!My husband ordered medical supplies on MONDAY that Purolator was SUPPOSED to have delivered TUESDAY.........of course they DID NOT arrive.  Checked and found out that Purolator dropped the parcel off at Canada Post??? (a 2-hour return trip from our home) instead of dropping it off at the 'confirmed drop off location' which is about 10 minutes from here????  My husband is in quite a bit of pain and discomfort and now has to wait for Canada Post to deliver the parcel which MAY arrive by THURSDAY!  Totally UNACCEPTABLE service (or rather, disservice).  This is not way to run a business!  Why did Purolator decide to drop it off at Canada Post rather than drive that extra hour to a much more convenient (for us, the customers) location??  OH.....tacking # is 330752553488. When I checked the Tracking option of Purolator, they said the parcel was picked up on MONDAY, June 6th at 14:53.  The pick up point is approximately a 3-hour drive to our location and we are STILL waiting.  Also, no mention was made on your tracking site of the fact that Purolator 'dropped the parcel off at Canada Post. And for approx delivery date - that was left blank........well, OF COURSE it was........they ARE NOT THE ONES DELIVERING.   Is Purolator owned/operated by Canada Post?  I am not at all impressed with your lack of service.  I wouldn't use Purolator to deliver the weather report!Date of experience: June 08, 2016

Name: Xinchu Yu
Review: Unreasonable policies and unacceptable customer servicesI had a package delivered to my rental place where I just moved in. However, the driver did not knock the door and he just dropped the note for me to pick up while I was in my room. When I went to pick up the package with my driver's license and the pick up note, the clerk said that my address on the license did not match the one written on the package. I said I just moved in and I haven't got to change my address on the license, but with the matching name and my photo it should be oaky because it would work for EVERY OTHER COMPANY. The clerk kept asking me to show a prof of billing information which with my name and address, but I didn't have any since I JUST MOVED IN. So she refused to give me my package. She said even with my landlord's photo ID with her address on it and my ID with my name would not work. I knew it was not her fault but I just felt their rules were crap. Seriously, what kind of person would take other people's delivery note and it happens to be the same name. I understand it is for security purpose but it is not necessary and waste of my time.Date of experience: June 03, 2016

Name: Sofia
Review: Not happy with PurolatorI'm not happy with their customer service, nor their courier service. Both are seriously flawed. I would never order from a company that uses Purolator again. Canada Post is much more reliable.Date of experience: May 31, 2016

Name: Christopher Turner
Review: Horrible ExperienceOver the years I've had many problems with Purolator. There's the socially-inept driver who intentionally slipped the paper into my window saying I wasn't home for a delivery while I was in the kitchen, once. I watched him come up, and just put the "Missed you, come get it yourself" paper in the door. I yelled "Hello! I'm here!" and he RAN OFF. I had to chase him across the parking lot, and get in front of the truck to get him to actually give me my delivery!!!! I'll say it one more time: He, instead of just giving me my package, intentionally tried to slip a note in my door and when he actually saw me coming over to get my package he RAN. I wasn't angry or anything, no idea why he would act this way. Let's see, the other time is when I wanted a two day delivery for my very important PC gear from Korea, as I had a course I was starting and needed it for. Well, it took over a month. Not only that, but it was held for a little bit in Canada Customs, and when this happens Purolator just loses track of it altogether, and doesn't know how to get it back. I spoke with Canada Customs about it - all they had to do, since they were the agents, was to contact them and continue the process. Well, they never did, they just kept asking ME who was my shipping agent. I'll repeat that - I called Purolator about my package, and they asked who was handling the shipping. That'd be you, Purolator.... So I had to go get it myself. I had to basically cancel the delivery so that I could go down to customs, in the winter, and pick it all up myself. Guess what? Loads of stuff missing from it. After going over this with Korean and Canadian Customs the blame was placed on Purolator's staff. Purolator, naturally, did nothing about it. So not only did it take over a month, not only did I have to pick it up MYSELF, but a bunch of stuff off of the list was missing and Purolator was refusing to pay for it. Purolator came by FOUR MONTHS LATER to ask for payment, saying I was late in paying. Funny, I'd explained quite clearly on the phone more than once that I wasn't paying for such a botched delivery.  Don't. Use. Purolator. They will let you down.Date of experience: May 29, 2016

Name: michael
Review: CanT deleiver in timei pay en extra for faster shipping but its make 3 day from ontario to quebec.... DHL made  San francisco to my house in 24hour.....each time i orderDate of experience: May 26, 2016

Name: Ritesh Ahire
Review: Terrible Customer ExperienceDo Not Use - UPS, Canada Post or Fedex is more reliable Sent a expedited package to Edmonton on Friday and paid extra for delivery on Saturday. The package showed failed to deliver on Saturday; even though we were home. We have a security camera that does not show a truck or a person attempting a delivery. Purolator has no idea where their own package is and their tracking is non-existent. We called them repeatedly on Saturday; only to find out that the next time they can deliver is Tuesday.Waste of time and money. Also they do not offer a refund for failing to deliver the package within the time limitation provided.Date of experience: May 21, 2016

Name: Calvin Stevenson
Review: I didn't receive my parts yetThere one of the worst company's next to Canada Posts laziness of doing door deliveries I will share my experience with you with all the delivery companies I've gone through starting with: Purolator:- They don't knock on the door they just drop the package and leave.-They throw packages around as I've seen happen at my place of work people wonder why their packages have broken items in them thats why.- Late for deliveries-Packages miraculously get lost Canada Post:- They will leave a attempted delivery notice 70 feet from your house in the street boxes rather than knock on your door to deliver the package. This happens numerous times as I have called head office on this and they said their supposed to knock on the door prior to leaving the notice card. They still do it nothing come of it. - The package date of arrival is always the next day if Canada post is delivering it I've never received a package that come on the day it's supposed to. Canpar:-Now this is a good one, I have a beef with them. The delivery driver went to my neighbours place to drop off my package because he couldn't obviously read my address. he was sooo lazy he said to her "can I leave the package with you?" my neighbour said "uh no, I'm sure there home". He said "are you sure? I can't leave it with you". She again said "no". Sure enough he knocked and I signed for my package but the nerve to leave it with a stranger that I hardly even know. She had told me the next day when I was cutting my lawn. Good neighbour  FED EX:- They will leave packages at the door when nobody's home They do knock on the door, have yet to lose any of my packages, They do deliver that same day. Never really had a problem with them as of yet.Date of experience: May 07, 2016

Name: kasra asadzadeh
Review: Worst experience everI wished I could put zero stars, but it didn't let me go below 1 star. Anyways, this has been the worst experience ever. They first sent the package to a different depot, and took them 2 days to fix the address and finally scheduling a delivery. However, they didn't deliver it although I made arrangements to be at home to open the door. The funny reason for this was "they couldn't find parking spot". With all this hassle, I called and asked them to make it available for pickup at their depot next day although it was 10 km drive each trip, but they scheduled for a re-delivery without my knowledge and no one was home to get the package. Now after 7 days from my purchase date, I don't even know where the package is and what is their next move.Date of experience: May 06, 2016

Name: Warren Campbell
Review: Zero Customer ServiceThey misplaced a couriered client cheque for 6 days. No apology and refused to try and help us explain that it was their error to our client. Still waiting to hear when it gets dropped off.Date of experience: May 05, 2016

Name: Boryana Parvanova Ivanova
Review: Delivery at door without signitureMy package was gone when Purolator driver delivered at door when i wasn't at home without call me and without the signature.And this is successful delivery according to them. Now, anyone isn't responsible for that and i don't have  the package and i don't have the money for this package. I can't understand their idea for the successful delivery when the customer don't receive the package. I will file a claim in court.Date of experience: May 03, 2016

Name: Rehman Ahmadzai
Review: WORST COURIER EVER!Ordered a motherboard from newegg, I was supposed to get it the next day (Friday) I checked next day, and tracking says invalid address, I called them and told them my address is correct, then they said they will deliver it on monday, monday came, waited whole day, checked tracking again, and it said receiver unavailable when I was sitting home the whole day, I called them again, then they had sent it to a depot for pickup without my permission so I had to go to the depot and pick it up myself. WORST COURIER EVER! STAY AWAY FROM THEM.Date of experience: May 02, 2016

Name: Craig Martin
Review: Broke partsSent a bed extender to a friend in the US from here in Canada. It was a large package. I was told it wasn't going to be going through the "automated" system and that a driver would be handling it by hand. I get a message from the my friend saying the tracking information says that it was damaged! Now my friend has a damaged useless piece for his truck, I'm out the money I spent to get it there and the money he gave me because I need to give it back to him! Waiting to see if they decide to play nice and refund me the total amount.Date of experience: April 30, 2016

Name: Marie Dyer
Review: I wish I could give zero stars!!Wow! I wish that I had seen these reviews before I placed an order with a company (Toys R Us) that uses Purolator. I too got an "attempted delivery" notice when I checked the tracking online. Not only did they try to blame ME, but they also completely LIED about the delivery attempt. I was awake very early in the morning, and I never left my place!  I live in a ground floor apartment where my living room window is directly beside the building's front door...NOBODY showed up! They (or their driver) lied to me, and to Toys R Us, giving us each a different story! Horrible customer service to blame the customer!! Maybe, Purolator, you should keep a closer eye on your delivery guys! Obviously, I am one of several people to have the EXACT same issue!! I will NEVER personally deat with Purolator again, not will I purchase items from vendors who use Purolator as their delivery service! IF my package comes tomorrow, as they stated - I will have wasted 2 days waiting for 1 package. I agree with several of the other posts I have read...HOW ARE THEY STILL IN BUSINESS??!! I will NOT make the same mistake twice!! I too wish I could give zero stars! Pathetic!Date of experience: April 14, 2016

Name: A Pelletier
Review: No notice of a very early delivery attemptI was expecting a Dell computer today. Found a notice on my door that they were here at 7:30am. We are aged 68 to 91 in this home, and don't use alarm clocks. I called and asked why they didn't give us a prior notice for such an early delivery (they have our phone number and email) so that I could have been up, and waiting. I was told that most people are up at that time of day. Welcome to retirement!!! Wonder if the lady, that I talk to, sets her clock for 6am when she is on vacation, just in case a delivery truck shows up?  Lord knows when I will get my package. I was told that "it could" be available for pick up after 4pm today, but no guarantee. After my complaining, I doubt very much I will see it till Monday the 4th. I know the driver is probably just around the corner somewhere (this is a small town) but I will have to wait. I hate that company and will never deal with a business that uses Purolator and that includes Dell!!! Purolator would save themselves a lot of money if they used the phone and talk to their customers.Date of experience: April 01, 2016

Name: Ed Comsa
Review: Worst service ever!Reading the other reviews, it was like deja vue! Driver's lying that they rang the door bell, missed deliveries etc. I ordered some items from Blackberry and I was not home. I called to reschedule and I was told that it would be the next day between 8:00AM and 6:30PM and no, they would not be able to say when, even a 2 - 3 hour window. So, I have decided to refuse the shipment. I refused 3 shipments from Dell and told Dell the reason why and from now on, I would ask if Purolator is their delivery company and not buy from them and tell them why. I cannot believe that they are still in business. Maybe being owned by Canada Post has a lot to do with it. Maybe they are unionized and the workers do not care about customer service. Let the taxpayers  subsidize them!Date of experience: March 30, 2016

Name: Josh Lavers
Review: Hope I never have to deal with Purolator again.Today I was to receive an important item needed immediately (replacing broken recording equipment necessary for a travelling client booked for the weekend, today was Friday). I knew the parcel was expected today so traded my shift at work to have the shift off and watched movies in my living room waiting of it to arrive. Shortly after 12pm I received an email that a delivery had been attempted and I had missed it. The entire time I was home there was not a single knock on the door or doorbell wrung. At the bottom of my stairs was the attempted delivery notification (clearly they hadn't walked up the stairs to the door). I was a little frustrated at this point but figured the worst case scenario was that I could pick it up sometime in town that afternoon. After calling I was informed the earliest I could get it was Monday and I would have to either drive to a town roughly an hour away (3 days after it was suppose to arrive) or pay a fee to have it delivered sometime next week. This was a very important item and I felt I took all the steps necessary on my end but to me it seems as though Purolator values slapping on ridiculous fees with longer delivery times over even trying to make their customers happy.Date of experience: March 04, 2016

Name: MB
Review: Can’t stress enough...Avoid at all cost.I don’t even need to re-write what everyone else wrote below me, as the exact same scenario happened to me twice in 2 weeks (no notes left, no delivery attempts made, etc...). Next time you buy from an online retailer, make sure to verify if they are using Purolator, and if they do, buy elsewhere. Otherwise, if you’re like me and don’t drive, it might cost you around $100 of Uber for a round trip to Purolator’s Lachine distribution center depending on where you are.Date of experience: March 04, 2016

Name: Michael Palladini
Review: Epress delivery paid for, no delivery attempt madeVideo camera's don't lie, no driver ever attempted delivery of my product or leave a note on the door. Purolator's site reports the failed delivery but no note/card was ever left on the door or driver ever appeared on camera.Express deliver means take a day off work to drive 1 1/2 hours away to pick up your parcel at their depot, which according to the useless representative I spoke with may or may not be there...Providing them your phone number to call you when the product is there is futile as they will not call. At the time of this, i paid for a service and I have no idea where my package is or how to get it..Date of experience: March 01, 2016

Name: Jason Quinn
Review: Unbelievable company is in businessThe driver didn't actually deliver package to my house. I was home all day, and was actually in the yard letting my dog out when the supposed delivery took place. No slip was left in the box.  The business model seems to be that they don't actually do home delivery they simply say you weren't home and leave the package at a Depot for you to go get yourself.  Customer service is poor and doesn't take complaints seriously. I would think that an accusations that the driver is lying about even attempting deliveries would be taken seriously, but instead it's just ignored.Date of experience: February 24, 2016

Name: Ed Wyroba
Review: Choose Elsewhere!No one  at Purolator is willing to be responsible for the failure of the driver to actually deliver the package!  There was no delivery to my address, and only a series of excuses why he ( it was always someone else ) did not actually do their job.  There is no customer service with this company.  If you have an option CHOOSE ANOTHER CARRIER.  I will be contacting Westin Hotel to direct further shipments from them be sent through an other means.   I trust others can learn from the serious indifference of Purolator employees and we can move our business to those who value it.Date of experience: February 20, 2016

Name: Maya Yanda
Review: Horrible delivery serviceI purchased from Shopping Channel for the first time. They use Purolator.I was home for delivery and the office of the apartment blding I live in called and said the delivery guy was coming up. Even though he knew I was there, he didn't come up but left with the packages. I called their customer service who said they'd send him back. I called the office right away and they said the guy was there and was coming up. HE DIDNT AGAIN. HE LEFT WITH THE PACKAGES. He told the office that he didn't come up because the bldg was too big..... Stupid. Can you imagine the stupidity of this guy. It was 34 steps from the office to the elevator and then 1 minute from elevator to my apartment. So then I called their customer service and told them to ship parcels back to the Shopping Channel. They shipped one back and left the other one at a pickup point but didn't leave me any notice. I WILL NEVER EVER ORDER ANYTHING THAT IS SHIPPED BY PUROLATOR.Date of experience: February 10, 2016

Name: Joshua
Review: Great Service! Lucky Maybe.Ordered spmething form  Newegg yestauday and came today afternoon. It starting moving right when shipped and everything went smoothly. It may have just been because it was a company which sent it to me. But so far had a great experience with them!Date of experience: February 10, 2016

Name: Jeff Bowes
Review: horribleDon't use Purolator for residential deliveryDate of experience: February 06, 2016

Name: Brianne
Review: Unacceptable Customer ServiceThe customer service is not very helpful at Purolator. I can understand a 1 time thing.... but the fact of the matter is, the last 4 times I have tried to get help from customer service they have been so unhelpful! Its like they go through a course to be rude and condescending. Not only are they unwilling to help you through an order, they give you the wrong information. I had called to schedule a rush pick up and they told me I had to do it online. Turns out that they only showed me how to create a shipping label and NOT actually schedule the pick up. When i used the online chat help to find out why my package wasn't picked up, the girl didn't give me any information but to contact same day service. I then asked her another question which she didn't answer and closed the chat box on me, ending the conversation. I didn't get a  "do you have any more questions", or "is there anything else I can hep you with" OR "thanks for using Purolator", not even a simple "Goodbye". Then once i contacted same day service I asked if I had a package picked up at 8am if it was possible to have it delivered by Noon.... She laughed, and not even just a slight chuckle... a full on laugh and through her laughter she said "uh no, same day delivery takes a MINIMUM of 7 hours". Glad I could brighten her day.   On another occasion I had shipped a very delicate parcel, packaged it with PVC pipe *incredibly hard to bend* and it came back 5 times damaged and mangled! FIVE TIMES! Every time taking more caution to package it well.  When i called purolator...in regards to the package that was very well marked FRAGILE. I was told that i "obviously didn't package it properly" and that its "out of their control". That marking a package fragile means nothing, because it goes on a conveyor belt and gets tossed around....Needless to say we had to pay for each shipment that came back destroyed. I have been in customer service for over 15 years and never have i treated people the way the customer service staff do at Purolator!Date of experience: February 05, 2016

Name: Khalil Minhas
Review: My TV shipment damaged and claim never paid with rude reply that it was a shipper's risk and I was never compensated.Please trust my words and use some other company for your shipment. Never ever use Purolator. I moved to US and shipped my 55 in Samsung TV through Purolator. My TV was first delivered to wrong address and a different US State. When I looked online and phoned to inquire then I was told that someone phoned and changed the address while I was still waiting at my address mentioned on the receipt. When I received my TV the screen was broken/cracked diagonally and missing screws. When approach claim department and sent the pictures and purchase receipt then I received a rude email that it was shipper's risk and Purolator will not pay any damage. I was never told at the counter and even my receipt does not show on the fine prints that it was shipper's risk.  I had the worst experience with this company.Date of experience: January 20, 2016

Name: Cr
Review: You should change your company nameTransportation is very slow. The company should change its name into pure-later.Date of experience: January 15, 2016

Name: Draco
Review: Inaccurate rating, was going to give 0 star but the system doesn't allow me to do so.Worst tracking system ever, you can't be able to get any updates or information from it. If you are choosing Purolator to be your delivery company, you will only feel angry, desperate.Date of experience: January 12, 2016

Name: Santhosh
Review: Why are they still in businessAfter days of following up with rude customer service agents, chats, phone calls, my package arrived two weeks after shipping ... all tattered, crushed, broken! ... and all that while, the status showed as "Delivered"! ... look at the tracking history... and they are still in business !!! __________________________________________Jan 7, 2016	7:46 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	On vehicle for deliveryJan 5, 2016	10:00 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	Shipment delivered to BUMPJan 5, 2016	8:16 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	On vehicle for deliveryJan 4, 2016	12:44 p.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	Delayed in transit due to missed connectionJan 4, 2016	10:00 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	Shipment delivered to BUMPJan 4, 2016	7:38 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	On vehicle for deliveryDec 31, 2015	8:07 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	Delayed in transit due to missed connectionDec 30, 2015	10:28 a.m.	Mississauga (west/ouest), ON	Delayed in transit due to missed connectionDate of experience: January 07, 2016

Name: Daci Mvrl
Review: joke of a company2 falsified delivery attempts, no slips left, I just want my stuff, why is this so hard?  I even have security footage to prove that they didnt even come by.  For your sanity, avoid like plague!!!Date of experience: January 07, 2016

Name: Fan
Review: Unreliable and Unable to Meet GuaranteesWe were thoroughly disappointed with our first (and last) experience with Purolator's express shipping services. We needed an important envelope delivered by 9:00AM and Purolator guaranteed that it would arrive on time. The evening of the day our envelope was due to arrive, we received notification from Purolator saying that it, among countless others had missed its connection and was still sitting at the local warehouse. We contacted customer service and ran back and forth between shipping centres to ensure that the envelope could instead be shipped as soon as possible. We were promised that we would receive a full refund, as Purolator was unable to meet its promise, after the envelope had been delivered, but when we went to collect the refund, we were told that we couldn't have our money back because although our shipment was over a day late, it did still arrive. Do not ship with Purolator. Their service is unreliable and they are unable to follow through with their guarantees.Date of experience: January 06, 2016

Name: John  B
Review: I cant believe they get away with this !!!3 weather delays (been sunny for a week with clear roads here) and now a mechanical delay, Looks like they are stretching the limits of their arsenal of codes (excuses) of why they cant manage their packages in a timely manner.Heaven forbid they go past 5 pm deliveries, wish more online companies used UPS rather than this pathetic excuse for a courier. Bill R Jan 5, 2016	4:38 p.m.	K, NS	Mechanical delayJan 5, 2016	8:56 a.m.	K, NS	On vehicle for deliveryJan 4, 2016	5:06 p.m.	K, NS	Weather delay - service will resume weather permittingJan 4, 2016	9:23 a.m.	K, NS	On vehicle for deliveryDec 31, 2015	3:09 p.m.	K, NS	Weather delay - service will resume weather permittingDec 31, 2015	8:54 a.m.	K, NS	On vehicle for deliveryDec 30, 2015	4:14 p.m.	K, NS	Weather delay - service will resume weather permittingDec 30, 2015	9:19 a.m.	K, NS	On vehicle for deliveryDate of experience: January 05, 2016

Name: Howard
Review: 0/5 starsNo actual delivery attempt was made, but they say they did. Also no notice of delivery slip was left. Then my package has sat idle for days as i expected them to make another attempt, which was my mistake. Why would a delivery company actually try to get the job they were hired for finished since they've already been paid? I've had to reach out and contact them, which they may take up to 48 hours to even reply, let alone get the job done. Amazing. 1  star is being quite generous, but i am unable to give them the 0 they deserveDate of experience: January 04, 2016

Name: Jonatas
Review: 5 times in 5 a bad experiencePurolator was used 5 times now on different shops I bought something online.  All 5 times I had problems : Lost package, package delivered many days after scheduled date and note saying nobody was at home when I was inside my house the whole day. All the time the answer is to deliever to their warehouses and making me go get it, which defeats the purpose of buying online, I could go to the shop and build it in person. Now this last time today, again, same problem and same answer. 5 times in 5 that I had a problem with Purolator, so I can't really recommend it.Date of experience: December 31, 2015

Name: VM
Review: Does it even matter?I'm sure you can find some of the reasons for my rating in the hundreds of other 1 star reviews. Pathetic company.Date of experience: December 30, 2015

Name: Matthew Miller
Review: The worst courrier service ever! Do not use.TO start, no one ever knocked on our door or rang our door bell. They just left a not saying we needed to drive 40 min. away to pick it up. This happened TWICE! and then Someone else signed for a gift we "apparently" recieved in the mail.Were still trying to get that item. Purolator didn't care one bit.Date of experience: December 29, 2015

Name: Jk
Review: Unbelievable customer servicesAfter 7 days delay, and 3 times of "missed delivery"(they didn't even come bc of "the high volume",) I was so disappointed and have to call them everyday to urge the delivery. They always said that you will receive it tomorrow. The Richmond local customer service called me this morning to schedule a delivery time, which has to be tomorrow again. I was so shocked and asked her why it's been delayed for one week and I have to wait for tomorrow again. She started to raise her voice and said that's not my problem it's the drivers problem. Are you kidding me??? She said I was being rude. I asked what is her name She just hanged up the phone on me. Who was the one being rude? I didn't use any harsh words to her and she's the one didn't let me finish talk. Such a unbelievable experience with customer service. I'm sure this is not the first time they did this to customers. Maybe it's just the culture of this company. Just never use this company and try to avoid any website that uses purolator!! I don't understand why those decent companies still use them and let Purolator destroys their names.Date of experience: December 10, 2015

Name: Roopesh
Review: Worst delivery service to use. Dont buy your item if this is the only company to deliver it.Estimated delivery date was Thursday. Did not end up showing up, giving no reason why. I waited until the next day. Mind you I have a camera in the lobby of my building and I am watching for this delivery person. All day. He shows up with three packages in his hand. Does not use the buzzer to gain access to the building. He gains access to the building via somebody leaving the building therefor opening the door for him. I wait and no delivery arrives at my door. An hour later there's an update on my tracking status saying he had no access because I did not provide a buzzer. My buzzer does not work and that is why I did not provide one, and I explained this to them. He did not use the buzzer to enter the building, so his statement of "No access" is a lie. I call them and discuss the matter. I experience a rude phone call with a woman from the company. She ends up telling me "ok we'll delivery again monday bye" and hangs up on my rudely. Monday comes and here I am watching the camera for 2 hours (within this time the driver claims to have showed up). He says he could not gain access to the building. As I said i've been watching the camera, and this time there was NO delivery person to show up at all, rather just claiming he tried and couldnt gain access. This company is completey unreliable. I had to call them and tell them just drop off my package at the nearest pick up location since their service is a joke. You'd be better off asking a five year old to make a paper airplane and put your package on top of it and ship it that way.Date of experience: December 07, 2015

Name: Lisa
Review: Never had any major troubleWell let me first say if you rely on their tracking service to tell you where the package is, don't. My package got delayed because of the weather and it took 3 days to tell me on the tracking. But it did arrive in 5-7 days (I used putolator ground service). If you wanna know where your package is you can call and ask them. They seem to have an updated version. The delivery man knocked on my door and was friendly. I heard a lot of bad things about them but I personally didn't have a big issue. Maybe because I don't live in a busy city. I'd use them again.Date of experience: December 07, 2015

Name: C30
Review: Unacceptable customer serviceThe absolute worst.  Find another company, use a carrier pigeon if you have to!  This place has the worst service out there.  The driver couldn't find my street and did not leave a slip on my door, but did call to let me know that and that I would need to go to the office to pick up the package.  So I went to the office and as I started to give my name to the lady at the counter, she very rudely cuts me off and says "can't look anything up by name, need the slip."  I very politely explain to her that I received a call that the driver couldn't find my address and didn't leave a slip.  She then says "Too bad, can't help you" and walks away.  Are you kidding me?  But yet somehow, magically, they could call me to let me know the driver couldn't find my house.  I get that things happen, I own a business myself, and it wasn't so much the fact the driver couldn't find my place, it was the level of customer service when I went to retrieve the package. She didn't offer any type of assistance, and was extremely rude.  If I found out one of my employees was treating customers this way, they wouldn't have a job.  Completely unacceptable.  A man working in the back came out and told me I could try contacting the company I got the package from to see if they have any tracking info. They did - and I got the package.  She could have easily told me that as opposed to giving me attitude, acting annoyed and not taking ownership what so ever.Date of experience: December 05, 2015

Name: Reg
Review: Horrid Delivery ServiceI've been waiting to receive a package I ordered that was being shipped by ground (i.e., the slow way). The package has been in my city (Vancouver, Canada) for 5 days. They noticed a mistake on the address 5 days ago but, when they shipped it out on the truck for delivery this morning the address apparently had not yet been corrected. They made no attempt to contact me to verify the address and exercised absolutely no common sense. The postal code and building number alone should have been enough to confirm the address. They could have verified this by requesting ID when they dropped off the package or, even better, use one of those new-fangled telephone devices to check first. Also, their shipment tracking system is useless. The messages it gives probably make sense to people who work with it all the time (i.e., their staff, shipper-receivers for businesses) but not to someone who has something delivered once in a while. I'm going to ask the company that I bought this product from to switch to FedEx. I don't know if they're better but I doubt could be worse. Thanks Purolator for taking a package delivery I was rather excited about and turning it into a pain in the butt.Date of experience: December 02, 2015

Name: K. W.
Review: Worst delivery companyFor last two days I stayed home and waited for a very important package. Every time I checked the tracking number I was given a delivery before 18:00. After two days waiting at home I called to complain and was told that the truck attempted deliveries two times but the road was closed.  My husband keeps traveling those roads back and forth and none of the roads were closed.  When I told that to the agent she was unpleasant and I wish I didn't have to deal with Purolator but my business deals with them.  There is no way of knowing when the delivery will be it could be early am or 6:00 pm, they could not help in any way.  This is second time I am dealing with Purolator with the same matter.  Last time I had to drive 1.25 minutes to retrieve my parcel (different business). What I think is that they are lazy and don't come to certain rural areas and lie about road closures. What's the chance that every time I deal with them it is the same problem?Date of experience: November 26, 2015

Name: Nate
Review: WeakHave been waiting for a package for a week or 2 now, checked their website with the tracking numbers found on the ebgames.ca website and noticed that the item had attempted delivery twice, and were now being sent back to the sender. I never received notice of any kind that delivery had been attempted. I opened a chat on the purolator website to find out what the deal was, and found that the driver "did not have your phone number or buzzer number." my phone number is clearly stated on my shipping and billing address, so maybe ebgames did not include it. My problem is that I mentioned that there was no notice on the door of my building to let me know delivery had been attempted, and was told by the chat personnel that "purolator does not use door notices due to security concerns." Funny, every other delivery company seems to be able to use them no problem! So, packages have been returned to the sender. Weak attempt, purolator, will not be using you again if i can help it.Date of experience: November 26, 2015

Name: Darren
Review: Worst delivery company in the world!!!!!!!!!!!Stay away from this company they don't know where or why packages are ever no date is ever set in stone. If you get it you are lucky I have been waiting for packages from the usa and they never arrive This company sucks customer service lies every day oh it will be there tomorrow and so on and so forth this company should be shut down!!!DO NOT USE THEM AT ALL EVER !!!!!!!!!!! Again someone send a letter to me registered and I must sign purolator delivers to my house no one home leaves a card where to pick up same day not arrived yet the place says it will be tomorrow next day I drive 25 km to go get the envelope nothing there I call customer service they say its at another location now I have to drive another 50 km to go get it I call customer service file a complaint They say a manager will call you nothing waited over 3 weeks. Now ordered something else online waiting to see if the can get it right this time probably not strike 3 your out !The only reason this company is still in business is that canada post the government owns it! Who should be fired?Date of experience: November 25, 2015

Name: Mauricio D. Ricaldi
Review: unprofessional companyvery sloppy and unprofessional company, waited for a week for a package that they said that the address was wrong, when contacted to customer service, "somebody" forgot to print the label on the package!.Date of experience: November 23, 2015

Name: Nikkie
Review: The worst company ever !The drivers are stupid, can not find the address easily, put the package to other vehicle and etc.  The employees are liar. they promise your package deliver on time,  but every day you have problem. It is already 10 days they promoise me to delier my package, but I am still waiting. NEVER USE THIS COMPANY ! NEVER ! Just know you will have more & more problems !Date of experience: November 23, 2015

Name: Mina
Review: 2/5 package failed in 3 weeks.1: First package got sent across border to Seattle for some fabulous reason. Been delaying for 2.5 weeks now, still haven't received the package. 2: Failed to leave tracking number in my voice mail. Called Customer Service but nothing happened.  2/5 package delivering has failed in three weeks.  NEVER USE PUROLATOR.Date of experience: November 20, 2015

Name: Sherri
Review: Have dogs, No delivery - Rural People BewareWe have had Purolator deliver for my husband for his work for many years. So much so we got the system set up where we don't have to sign for the package. We've lived where we are for 14 years and have had our dog for 13 of those. Never a problem. Now they tell us that because we have a gate and we have dogs they will not deliver unless the dogs are inside and the gate is open. We live in the country and the dogs live outside. This was never a problem before as anyone unsure would call us and we were happy to come to the gate to receive our package. Now they are not allowed to carry cell phones because they can't trust their drivers to not drive distracted. That doesn't say much for their drivers. So now they want me to keep dogs inside on the off chance I have a package arriving. The least they could do is call me from their depot and tell me they are in the area so I can prepare for them as FedEx has told me they would do. I will be trying not to order from anyone using Purolator from now. Unfortunately Toys r Us uses them and it is getting closer to Christmas.Date of experience: November 05, 2015

Name: matthew theilade
Review: Bad performance on several orders.First and Second shipment had the most useless tracking information I have ever been provided with. Their website only shows that the item has left, and when it has been delivered. Something like expected delivery date is never provided on the site, and requires taking the time to contact them.  The third shipment was lost completely. They provided the retailer with a tracking number, which was emailed to me by the retailer. When it didn't arrive, they claimed they never did anything with that tracking number. I asked 'why did I get a tracking number then', and I was ignored. The retailer investigated and purolator had it in a warehouse.  Horrible service. Will never use them if I can help it.Date of experience: October 23, 2015

Name: canada12
Review: Bad attitude customer serviceLiar and bad attitude employee.I called to ask about why the delivery person did not put a ticket that he attempted to deliver, the reply was that it is for security reason....what a lie!I ask the person to send my package to nearest puralotor store and she did but she failed to tell me that they close on weekend. They are worst courier on earth and dell the company i bought from should not be dealing with them. RegardsDate of experience: October 17, 2015

Name: Hanshu
Review: LIARS and shocking customer service!Purolator said that they delivered a $1000 ceiling lamp in front of my door when I was at home the whole day. Tried calling customer service and got through to Cindy who opened a case file and cannot do anything until "tomorrow". Tomorrow comes and I call again to follow on my order and get through to Joanne who was unbelievably rude and tells me that she cannot do anything and "the person is still working on it". When I ask to speak to "the person" she says she doesn't know who is taking care of my case number. And started raising her voice at me. I simply cannot deal with such rudeness and attitude with people who are suppose to work in customer service! Please do yourself a favour, avoid using this company! FYI- bought a lamp on canadianlightingexpert, they use purolator- so all in all avoid the website as well since you will never get any delivery!Date of experience: October 15, 2015

Name: Simon Topliffe
Review: worst ever x31st attempt the guy didn't ring our intercom (caller ID) and yet a failed delivery slip was at our door. This slip said to pick up locally the next day. When we went the next day we were told it wasn't there as it was to heavy. Phone call to customer service and told that it would be delivered the next day. The next day we waited 9 - 5 no package. Upon calling we were told that it was still in storage and wouldn't be delivered until next week (5 days away). The guy had no explanation of why it wasn't delivered. When I told him that I would have to take another day off he said "that is correct".  Please avoid!!!Date of experience: October 09, 2015

Name: Ren Rampage
Review: LazyThey don't even try to deliver packages. I don't have a car so it has cost me a lot to pay for a taxi to pick up my packages. The first package i had from them,  i was home all day and never heard a knock once. It was a quiet day. I can hear a lot from the hallway. I went to go to the vending machine and saw a ticket on my door saying attempted delivery. Next one was kind of my fault. I had my buzzer code changed. I sent them am email and they replied saying that it was forwarded to the delivery people. Phone never rang,  nothing,  and suddenly i have a message saying my package is at purolator for pickup.they are lazy and don't even try. I know the security down stairs would have even let them in. They let the pizza guy in all the time. .. will not be using them. Will order from places that use a different delivery serviceDate of experience: October 09, 2015

Name: Jason
Review: The biggest scamming company that is legalPurolator is in it only for themselves. We unfortunately have to use them in certain circumstances. This company is all about themselves and not their customer. We repeatedly get smashed products when shipping back and forth. After many frustrating calls I am resorting to tell the world BEWARE OF PUROLATOR. Ohhhh you wanted it there in one piece? well that's extra. You need to have $$insurance.. really? Insure you do your job and get the package from point A to point B? OK so I insure and it gets smashed again. Sorry they say, you need to have $$special handling on the weighbill. If you don't pay the nickel and dime on the package you get Drop kick service. So you do all that and then your bill comes in a lot higher than they quoted on the webship, why? oh well your weight that you declared isn't the same as the $$cube weight. But if you accidentally put too much weight and it s higher they will not adjust it down. What a scamming company. Borderline fraud. Also BEWARE don't have a fragile sticker or leave an old air tag on the box or they will just $$Charge you more again for this. $Special handling automatically for a old fragile sticker. or Worse $$$Air freight for an air sticker. Even though you specifically did not sign up for that when prepping the shipping bill. AVOID. Use Greyhound for western Canada - They are great and half the price. I HATE Purolator.Lastly - if your a small company and use Purolator you LOSE. You have to be a big company to get discounts depending on how much you ship. If your small and are trying to compete with a big box store. You cant. Purolator sucks up the potential profit. Small company ships $100.00 Big Company ships same thing same circumstances they pay $10.00. What a bunch of fraudsters. STAY CLEAR OF THEM!!!!!! I took the time to complain here and write this review. I likely represent a 1000 others who don't.Date of experience: October 02, 2015

Name: Ram
Review: "Delivery Attempted"I've only had bad experiences with Purolator. The last one just happened a few hours ago, and it is the second time that it's happened (different orders). I've been at home all day, the buzzer never rang, and no one ever knocked on my door. Yet on the tracking status, it said delivery attempted.When I told them about it over live chat, all they told me was "oh but the driver tried delivering it". Yeah right.Every time I see that Purolator will be delivering my stuff, I know there will be a problem. AVOIDDate of experience: September 30, 2015

Name: Will Scott
Review: Delivery attempted??Waited for my package the whole day and tracked it online. In the late afternoon it said online "delivery attempted" but no one had rang the bell or knocked. What are these drivers doing?? Companies - please choose another delivery service!Date of experience: September 10, 2015

Name: Nick Di Fabrizio
Review: Purolator The Lazy CompanyI was coming out of my garage yesterday and I saw the Puolator driver walk away from my home. I called him back and asked if there was a parcel for my address destination. He answered ''Yes'', then I asked him why he didn't drop off the package. He answered that there was no answer. I quickly call my daughter inside from my cell and asked her if the door bell had rang. ''No never'' she replied.....this didn't surprise me at all. The best part is that there is never a second or third attempt like the other courier companies. The driver began to curse and raise his voice after he entered his truck but never made facial contact at this point with me. In the past every time I received a parcel from Purolator, I always had to drive 20 kilometers to pick it up. Don't waste your time putting out a complaint to a manager they have a great team of spin doctors. My mother (70 years old) who lives at a different address in the city had her parcels returned to the sender because she had no way of reaching the Purolator depot in time.''Purolator'' COST SAVING'S ALTERNATIVE IS AT THE CUSTOMERS EXPENSE !This is not a sincere courier company.......there are better courier companies that serve you right. kind regardsNickDate of experience: August 23, 2015

Name: fazlay
Review: 2 DELAYS AND 1 ADDRESS CORRECTION FOR 1 SHIPMENT!I bought some computer parts off newegg.ca and was very excited for them to arrive. In the first day there was some error that they couldnt "Find" my address, like im hiding from them lol. Then the next day there was some sorting error, and I contacted them again and they said that itd be here on monday (a week has already passed since i ordered the parts) Monday comes and yet ANOTHER delay has come forth. Apparently they put my shipment onto the WRONG truck, what kind of guys do these people hire?? SO now i am here writing about my bad experience with this horrible company. Dont use this shipping company if u want your package on time UPS is much better in my experience.Date of experience: August 10, 2015

Name: Marie-Noelle Desbois
Review: Not suitable for home deliveryIt was my first and last time dealing with this company (I hope). I find their ID policy quite abusive. As a working person, I'm mostly not at home weekdays during their delivery time. I also live in Montreal. After work this Friday I went all the way to Anjou to retrieve a package with the slip. I also brought my government issued photo ID. I thought it would be sufficient, as it is with Canada Post or UPS. I should have read the slip better. Anyways, I understand it's my mistake that I didn't bring a government issued bill with my address and that policies are policies,but my name is on the slip, my name is on the package, my face and my name are on my government issued ID, and I am here flesh and bones. I travelled 1h30 to get here, I want my package. All that rant and the fact that I had to commute 3 hours to retrieve my parcel beats the purpose of convenience of online shopping.Date of experience: July 17, 2015

Name: Lat Latitude
Review: Best Buy PurchaseI Just yesterday purchased a Power Wheels Cadillac for my toddler. Big Giant thing Box is huge. Best Buy uses Purolator to ship. Delivery guy was super nice Package arrived at my door withen 24 hours from Toronto, I'm in Ottawa... Very impressed with the level of service from Best Buy and Purolator. Great Job!Date of experience: July 17, 2015

Name: Sujo
Review: Will NEVER use this serviceI ordered a package in forever21.com, and unfortunately it was shipped with purolator.com. This is by far the worst experience I've had using a shipping company and I have filed a complaint with Forever21, as I will not be making any other purchases from them if they continue to utilize this provider.  Issues:-They only ship Mon-Fri between 8am-8pm and they cannot contact you nor leave a notice of attempted delivery(so I guess you're supposed to sit and wait at the front door for 12 hours until they arrive).-I contacted customer service twice regarding my delivery instructions...none of which were done!!!! The customer service representatives are extremely unreliable!-On the final attempt I checked the website to confirm whether my package was delivered, and to my surprise the website stated that the driver just attempted to deliver the package which was very strange to me as I had been outside in front of my building for 45 minutes enjoying some sun and NO ONE attempted to deliver a package.  I would never utilize this service nor recommend it to anyone and I urge companies that utilize this service to desist from doing so as they will begin to lose a lot of business.Date of experience: July 10, 2015

Name: Guy Fortin
Review: They bulls*** meWas supposed to be delivered in Manila Monday morning... Still in Montreal... fu**ing liars ...Date of experience: July 06, 2015

Name: Rana
Review: Please don't lose my $1800 computerTried to track my order, called the number, after attempting a few times to get past the annoying voice password, I was redirected to an annoying human who said my order was not checked yet even though it said on the status that it was. The company which I bought the product that needed to be delivered shipped around 2-3 PM, it's past 9 and I haven't been told when I'll be receiving my $1800 package. Apparently they're allowed to leave packages outside your residence if they think its safe... this policy is wrong on so many levels.Date of experience: July 03, 2015

Name: Carol
Review: Purolator desk in StaplesI would have found it convenient to use Purolator if I could have had a better response when I used their local Staples location.  There was no Purolator employee there and no one who worked for Staples would sign a receipt acknowledging that my parcel had been dropped off.  An instruction to "just leave it laying on the counter" is not adequate.  Anyone, customer or employee, could pick it up and I would have no proof that it had been left there.  Poor service, inadequate!Date of experience: June 30, 2015

Name: Debbie Morrow
Review: Unreliable!I have had it with Purolator!  Paid an extra fee for Saturday delivery and it didn't happen.   Phoned and they were supposed to be paging the driver and calling me back.  That never happened.  I called back and they said the delivery was most likely not happening today so I can expect it Monday.  They did say I will receive a credit since I was not going to receive it on time.  If I wanted it Monday I would have paid regular delivery charges.  So not impressed!Date of experience: June 27, 2015

Name: Joe
Review: Better Off Flying To Get Your PackageThis company is so unbelievably incompetent in doing anything you pay them for. I ordered a package over a month ago, and just now it's in the "ATTENTION" status, meaning they attempted to deliver but I wasn't home. Which is complete bullsh*t, because I don't leave my house. I live off the main road a ways, so I expect they skipped me. DO NOT USE Purolator under ANY CIRCUMSTANCE.Date of experience: June 20, 2015

Name: Steven
Review: Dont use Purolator serviceI ordered Hollister product shipped by Purolator. I checked on website "Shipment delivered at: AT DOOR" when i even wasn't at home. ( I am living in an apartment) The driver put the package at the door of building without me. Then my package is gone b/c someone stole it. I called Purolator to complain and want to contact to the driver who delivered my package, but they say i should contact to Hollister. Even no compensation, no reason. WTF Purolator?? worst service. Purolator should close down as soon as possible.Date of experience: June 13, 2015

Name: Tom
Review: A sad joke of a companyThis company is terrible had them attempt to deliver twice already the second time the guy didn't even give me a chance to answer the door before he drove off rang the door bell once. Then I went to the depot where I asked if they could call me when the truck comes back so I could personally come and pick it up myself. To no surprise they failed to even do that I do not know how these guys stay open Canada post does a better job then these clowns ever could.Date of experience: June 12, 2015

Name: Mickey  Li
Review: Bad serviceTwo time bad experience with this company.1.  I stay home all day, but they delivery the parciel without ring the bell       and left it in front the door  2.  Received the parcel was wet with water inside, so crazy. That is their professional of the services???Date of experience: June 07, 2015

Name: Omer
Review: Why do big companies still use Purolator?I have ordered an item online. It was supposed to arrive today, but after checking the tracking details, I saw the note " Address correction required - address not found " :@... I have been using the same address for my other orders too, and never had a problem before, but when it comes to purolator it did not worked out for some reason!Date of experience: May 21, 2015

Name: Alex
Review: Worst Shipping CompanyWho thought it was a good idea to make it a policy not to leave delivery slips? Thanks so much, Purolator, for not telling me that my shipment was in ever, letting it sit at the [far away] depot for the normal 5 days (which is incidentally shorter than any other company) and returning it to sender! I only noticed when I looked up the tracking number, because nobody told me a thing. When I called in it hadn't been delivered back yet, but they said that there was nothing they could do and I just needed to contact the company I ordered things from. This is my second bad experience with this company; I have had no good experiences. I hate Purolator. I don't ever want to buy from a company that requires me to ship through them again.Date of experience: May 14, 2015

Name: Val Hoenecke
Review: BrutalMay 1st sent a parcel which is a 7-hour drive by car. I am writing this review on May 7, the parcel is still not there. I should have walked it there!Date of experience: May 08, 2015

Name: Adrien
Review: Never going to use againSince I'm a working man, I'm rarely home when delivery's are happening. This is no problem with any other delivery company, I get a notification slip, and they bring my package to the post office that's 2 blocks away. Not with purolator though. First off, instead of bringing my package to the post office, they bring it to the "purolator hub" that's an hour away. Second off, no notification slip. I didn't even know I needed to go to the hub until I checked my tracking online. Purolator is just awful. Never going to use them again.Date of experience: May 03, 2015

Name: Niglin B.
Review: UntrustworthyThere is a known problem with Purolators laser arc system, on line at their depots (current), this results in you PAYING MUCH MORE. RE: Do you see 'adjusted weight' on your invoices? This means you are paying them more, than what you were told/saw online, and in Eship, result, you lose money; and lots of it. Example, I send a package that weighs 8 lbs, now the calculated cubed weight is actually 27.34lbs  in box with the dimensions of 21x15x10". But, because Purolators scales/system is messed up the laser arc somehow calculates 32x22x10". So instead of the cost being $59.34, you end up paying $115.95. This means you are out some $60 xx. This may be more of an extreme example, but it happens, and more often than you think. Anything where you see 'adjusted weight' on your invoice, means your paying more for shipping than you were told. I suggest you use another courier like Loomis etc.until they fix this problem. To date I am still battling with them on this, and they refuse to give us credits for their errors; we have lost thousands of dollars, even though I have it in writing that we will be reimbursed on adjusted weights dating back to the beginning of January 2015. PSMaybe the worst part is that they are downplaying and denying and wrong doing, the salesperson is the worst **** ever, and their billing dept. simply won't help you out.Date of experience: April 30, 2015

Name: KB
Review: The worst delivery company in AlbertaI've dealt with Purolator for many years.  I never thought there would be a difference between the provinces.  I am in Ontario and every driver has been courteous and helpful, but when I have to deal with a shipment coming out of Alberta, there's always some kind of problem.  If a waybill hasn't been filled in, the driver leaves.  Yet in Ontario, if I don't have a waybill, the driver politely goes to his truck and brings one to fill in.  If you live in a condo or apartment in Alberta, good luck getting your delivery.  I've had people wait in all day for a delivery, only to be told they weren't home when Purolator delivered.  It's just that those delivery people don't like apartments.  It's ridiculous!  So now I ship to the depot closest to the person for pick up there.  If someone could recommend a delivery service it would be appreciated because I prefer to stop using Purolator.Date of experience: April 17, 2015

Name: Shawnalea Buck
Review: I feel like a carrier pigeon is more effectivethe worst service ever !!!!  every time I deal with them there is an issue. I wish I could pick which company my online purchases were delivered though but unfortunately I can't. so I am forced to deal with these incompetent people on a regular basis. had the same issue as Brian. I was in the process of moving and changing over my license.  I ordered a package that had my old address on it. I showed the lady at the desk my tracking number, multiple pieces of picture ID in addition to multiple bills with my old address and one piece of mail with my new address. i even showed her the piece of paper you get from the registration office stating that I was changing my address/my temporary drivers license. after arguing with this "customer service" rep for an hour she reluctantly gave me my package. don't worry lady I have better things to do with my time rather then steal someone's candle order.  the staff is rude, they always state they have "attempted delivery" when they haven't, I never get a phone call when they have apparently brought my package back to their depot. the list of issues goes on and on. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER.  I would rather deal with telemarketers every day then have to deal with these people once a week.Date of experience: April 04, 2015

Name: Michael
Review: Absolutely Useless Company8 out of 10 shipments from other shippers via Purolator this year have have major delays and problems, Absolutely useless transfer infrastructures causing delay delay delay, They won't even let you pick it up if its in your home base warehouse, seems to be too much work.  Would never recommend to anyone, and i have even gone as far to request my packages do not ever come Purolator anymore. i would rather pay 15-20 more to get it via Fedex or UPS or even Dhl. Unequivocally frustrated and disgustedDate of experience: April 02, 2015

Name: Kat
Review: terrible service!!If I could give them no stars I would! I had to send a package out from Edmonton to Sturgeon County (which by the way both places are in Alberta!! Within 30 minute distance). They delivered it to Yellowknife, NT! Then I was waiting for another very time sensitive package and delivery was from Edmonton to Edmonton! And they delivered it to Winnipeg!!!! Come on people?!? It's within the same city!! You have one job Purolator and you manage to screw it up. It seems to be a regular occurrence for Purolator. Smaller companies will eventually take over all your business! Worst delivery company ever! I warn anyone who decides to choose Purolator to courier their packages as it may never even get there! They also like to feed customers lies about the deliveries and the whereabouts of these packages. Customer service sucks! Purolator you guys suck!!!!!!!!Date of experience: April 01, 2015

Name: Ashley
Review: WORST DELIVERY SERVICE EVER!!!!! DO NOT EVER DO BUSINESS WITH THIS USELESS COMPANYI wish I can give Purolator no star.. Not even 1 for bad Cuz they are beyond TERRIBLE... So first of all.. Purolator is such a liar, I sat at home ALL DAY waiting for my package, then I go check the status and see it said "attempted delivery..failed" EXCUSE ME.. I SAT NEAR THE DOOR ALL DAY AND HEARD NOTHING! They never came up nd claimed that they did. THEN I call Purolator and Ofcourse the service on the phone was awful as well. This lady had no idea what she was saying, and promised that she made a note and it was rescheduled for the following day... NEXT day comes nd I find out she did no such thing! And it was sitting at the Purolator office that 30 mins away from.. How nice.. Even tho I told her the office was far from nd I am unable to go, she still managed to lie to me nd make a mistake and say she fixed my issue.. Then the next day I call them and I had RESCHEDULE ONCE AGAIN...
