They need to be put out of business . The BBB is my next step.Date of experience: June 21, 2023

Name: Benjamin Wright
Review: Absolutely horrific serviceAbsolutely horrific service, they promise to deliver on a date, they don't deliver on a date, they blame you, then tell you to be home, take the day off, its coming that day, it doesnt come that day, this process repeats, and nobody cares about the time you are wasting of your clients. Nobody calls, nobody cares, and the product still isnt delivered, at this time, I have wasted 3 full days at home on days I was told it was coming, and nobody seem to give a crap. How is Purolator still in business with this level of service.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Gordon
Review: ABYSMALPurolator has consistently failed to deliver on time. Complaints fall on deaf ears. Offer and charge for express service (early AM delivery) to areas that THEY DON'T DELIVER TO, only to hand off to a local carrier without daily service. Latest issue - Early AM delivery from Mississauga to Toronto. End of the day, and it's not delivered. Tracking is useless. Virtual assistant is worse. Phone call isn't answered. Requested a call back which hasn't happened. This is the last straw. I will not pay the invoice, and I've instructed my staff to use ANY courier but Purolator in the future.Date of experience: June 15, 2023

Name: Carlos Carvalho
Review: Puro-late packets, always delayed, always missed, no deliver around the time they update the status.I am tired of getting packets delivered by this company, getting a message on their web site saying "missed delivered" when there was NO delivery attempt. I work from home, I sit facing my building entrance and there was NO Puro-late truck within hours form the moment they updated the status on their website. I don't recommend.Date of experience: July 05, 2023

Name: NA
Review: I just want to give negative starI am extremely dissatisfied with the services provided by this company and would rate them poorly. The behavior of their drivers is consistently rude, often leaving as soon as they hear someone approaching the door. It seems they have no interest in fulfilling their duty to deliver packages and have even suggested that I retrieve my own items from their truck. Such a lack of commitment is unacceptable for a delivery service. I strongly advise against using this company's services. It is disheartening that a significant portion, 90%, of this company is owned by Canada Post. This reflects poorly on Canada as a whole. It would be in everyone's best interest to reconsider its operations and not waste taxpayers' hard-earned money. The quality of service provided is far below what Canadians deserve.Date of experience: May 01, 2023

Name: Érica van Hellsing
Review: Only deliver when ou are at workOnly deliver when ou are at work, when (of course) ou are not home, they leave you parcel to some shop of their choice ... which opens only when ou are at work !They may be good with business deliveries, but the are awaful with normal peopleDate of experience: January 09, 2023

Name: Prachi P
Review: Most unreliable delivery serviceWaiting for delivery at home for entire but the delivery person did not call. Without any attempt to deliver, it was update as receiver not available.Called three times, escalated the issue but still no action and no updates at the end of the day for delivery. I have no clue when I will get my parcel. On their website they promise one day delivery. Do not charge customers if you cannot keep your promises. Most unreliable delivery service.Date of experience: June 29, 2023

Name: Silvana Mascitelli
Review: Scored a 1 for all the good employees…Scored a 1 for all the good employees who still have a work ethic that are unfortunately stuck working alongside the rest of this disgraceful team. This delivery service has gone down the tubes over the past couple years. The absolute worst.Date of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: erwin pondevida
Review: Bad delivery habit …Waiting for delivery but the delivery person did not call. The number was provided. The provided number was correct since they sent message after 5 pm to instead pick the item. No fail delivery slip left to inform us what to go next. For me, will not do business with Purolator.Date of experience: June 27, 2023

Name: Chris Chebry
Review: SCAM TAXATION CHARGESNo matter how many times I write to Purolator regarding incorrect tax billings, they DO NOT LISTEN!!!  They charge an Alberta based company HST?!  No matter where I send my products, even within Alberta, they charge HST?!  Alberta DOES NOT HAVE HST stop charging me 13% tax on my invoices!  I have contacted Purolator three times in this regard, so their response is useless.  I have emailed and talked to a customer service rep on the phone ..... they continue to charge HST.Date of experience: May 31, 2023

Name: anees jameel
Review: Bad company my package moss be arrive…Bad company my package moss be arrive yesterday, but nothing is coming. I call the customer service I hold in the line 1 hour. No body answer me. I advise people not to deal with themDate of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: Maqsood Syed
Review: Pathetic service. Never againThe package was returned and the reason stated was “No buzz code”. They probably don’t know that something as simple as a phone call works. All the driver had to do was give a ring to ask for the buzz code, but no. They actually didn’t even attempt the delivery, because the main door was open all day that day because of some maintenance and it didn’t even need a buzz code. When I checked with the customer care agent, they updated the buzz code and said it would take 3 business days for it to be updated. Also, i was told their drivers don’t have phone. And they expected me to believe it. Just Purolator things. Never ever use their services again.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: James McCleave
Review: Very Very Poor Service & DeliveryIf I could pick no stars that would be it. You claim I couldn't be reached to deliver my parcel (ink) from Epson. Shouldn't be any need, address & phone number on order. Various excuses on tracking number over a 2 week period. Now want me to pick up.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Ohemaa Amponsah
Review: terrible delivery companyterrible delivery company! received an email that package was unable to deliver (the driver did not even attempt to contact me my buzzing my apartment number) and when i called customer support, and waited 30mins, KIM (the agent) hanged up on meDate of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Julia Jones
Review: Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a…Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a modum. Supposed to be delivered Monday,tracking number didnt work,finally wednesday it worked,parcel delivered Tuesday..no sign of it. Hate their service,spent hours searching for my parcels,even found one THROWN AT  BURNT OUT HOUSE DOWN THE ROAD.Date of experience: June 20, 2023

Name: Kayli Mejia
Review: Do not use this company they will lose your packageThey refused to deliver my large package for 2 weeks trying to get me to pick it up they then lost it claiming someone picked it up with valid ID when that is impossible. Do not use this company they will lose your package then tell you theres nothing they can do.Date of experience: June 23, 2023

Name: Joseph
Review: WORST COURIER SERVICE EVERAll my experiences with this courier service has been nothing but terrible..From fake delivery attempt to bad customer service.. They will never call or message you to notify you that they will be coming to deliver your package, then you will get a meaage to come over to their office for pickup (For God sake I paid for delivery).. One of their drivers once told me once that they don't make any delivery attempt once you get a message of failed delivery attempts.. This company shouldn't be in business..Date of experience: June 06, 2023

Name: D D
Review: Way to go Purolator!Ran into the Purolator driver today and he helped me out with a no signature sticker for my deliveries. That was really cool of him as he mentioned he hated leaving the stickers on my door. I appreciated what he had to say and made things positive for me today. Again I still think Purolator needs to change their policy on signatures all the time for deliveries and do not hold the driver responsible for that. Never did as I know it comes from the top. Anyway,Thanks to the driver on making my experience positive today.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Phoebe Smith
Review: If I could give this company 0 stars I…If I could give this company 0 stars I would it. Is the worst possible shipping company in the world? I have a fairly long driveway which I would like to say. Every other shipping company is able to navigate however purelator finds it better to leave my parcels in the dirt on the side of the road nowhere. Near my property. When I said I would like to actually receive my parcels so could they hold them at the access point? They then give me no notification of the parcel being held and if I do not pick it up within 5 days they send it back have never had. A good experience to this day my parcels are either lost stolen or left in the dirt.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Yuri Kytsenko
Review: Not delivered package after double delaysPaid $2 for each of 10 km of express delivery, Distance 475km, promised time- within 24 hours. Receiver all time stayed at home but after 44 hours driver has not delivered package, not left any message,  but reported absence of receiver.  There is a Purolator's outlet in delivery town but instead of leaving package there I received a note in tracking: Wed. June 21, 2023 - 2:05 p.m. CRANBROOK, BC (108 KM from RECEIVER!) Available for pickup for 5 business days from arrival date at the counter. According to Purolator's request for NOT delivered package people need to drive 216 km to pick up their EXPRESS package. No response to my complains Case 200912981, no apology, normal practice for Purolator. After several calls to Purolator, package was left in town delivery outlet to pick up by senior receiverDate of experience: June 18, 2023

Name: Merrily MacIntosh
Review: WorstWorst, worst, worst courier company EVER!!! I have had nothing but problems with this ridiculous company. They take packages Willy-Nilly to places nowhere near where they say they’ve dropped it off for pick up …beyond stupid! And, absolutely impossible to get an actual human on a chat or the phone. They need to be put out of business . The BBB is my next step.Date of experience: June 21, 2023

Review: Absolutely horrific serviceAbsolutely horrific service, they promise to deliver on a date, they don't deliver on a date, they blame you, then tell you to be home, take the day off, its coming that day, it doesnt come that day, this process repeats, and nobody cares about the time you are wasting of your clients. I work from home, I sit facing my building entrance and there was NO Puro-late truck within hours form the moment they updated the status on their website. I don't recommend.Date of experience: July 05, 2023

Name: NA
Review: I just want to give negative starI am extremely dissatisfied with the services provided by this company and would rate them poorly. The behavior of their drivers is consistently rude, often leaving as soon as they hear someone approaching the door. It seems they have no interest in fulfilling their duty to deliver packages and have even suggested that I retrieve my own items from their truck. Such a lack of commitment is unacceptable for a delivery service. I strongly advise against using this company's services. It is disheartening that a significant portion, 90%, of this company is owned by Canada Post. This reflects poorly on Canada as a whole. It would be in everyone's best interest to reconsider its operations and not waste taxpayers' hard-earned money. The quality of service provided is far below what Canadians deserve.Date of experience: May 01, 2023

Name: Érica van Hellsing
Review: Only deliver when ou are at workOnly deliver when ou are at work, when (of course) ou are not home, they leave you parcel to some shop of their choice ... which opens only when ou are at work !They may be good with business deliveries, but the are awaful with normal peopleDate of experience: January 09, 2023

Name: Prachi P
Review: Most unreliable delivery serviceWaiting for delivery at home for entire but the delivery person did not call. Without any attempt to deliver, it was update as receiver not available.Called three times, escalated the issue but still no action and no updates at the end of the day for delivery. I have no clue when I will get my parcel. On their website they promise one day delivery. Do not charge customers if you cannot keep your promises. Most unreliable delivery service.Date of experience: June 29, 2023

Name: Silvana Mascitelli
Review: Scored a 1 for all the good employees…Scored a 1 for all the good employees who still have a work ethic that are unfortunately stuck working alongside the rest of this disgraceful team. This delivery service has gone down the tubes over the past couple years. The absolute worst.Date of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: erwin pondevida
Review: Bad delivery habit …Waiting for delivery but the delivery person did not call. The number was provided. The provided number was correct since they sent message after 5 pm to instead pick the item. No fail delivery slip left to inform us what to go next. For me, will not do business with Purolator.Date of experience: June 27, 2023

Name: Chris Chebry
Review: SCAM TAXATION CHARGESNo matter how many times I write to Purolator regarding incorrect tax billings, they DO NOT LISTEN!!!  They charge an Alberta based company HST?!  No matter where I send my products, even within Alberta, they charge HST?!  Alberta DOES NOT HAVE HST stop charging me 13% tax on my invoices!  I have contacted Purolator three times in this regard, so their response is useless.  I have emailed and talked to a customer service rep on the phone ..... they continue to charge HST.Date of experience: May 31, 2023

Name: anees jameel
Review: Bad company my package moss be arrive…Bad company my package moss be arrive yesterday, but nothing is coming. I call the customer service I hold in the line 1 hour. No body answer me. I advise people not to deal with themDate of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: Maqsood Syed
Review: Pathetic service. Never againThe package was returned and the reason stated was “No buzz code”. They probably don’t know that something as simple as a phone call works. All the driver had to do was give a ring to ask for the buzz code, but no. They actually didn’t even attempt the delivery, because the main door was open all day that day because of some maintenance and it didn’t even need a buzz code. When I checked with the customer care agent, they updated the buzz code and said it would take 3 business days for it to be updated. Also, i was told their drivers don’t have phone. And they expected me to believe it. Just Purolator things. Never ever use their services again.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: James McCleave
Review: Very Very Poor Service & DeliveryIf I could pick no stars that would be it. You claim I couldn't be reached to deliver my parcel (ink) from Epson. Shouldn't be any need, address & phone number on order. Various excuses on tracking number over a 2 week period. Now want me to pick up.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Ohemaa Amponsah
Review: terrible delivery companyterrible delivery company! received an email that package was unable to deliver (the driver did not even attempt to contact me my buzzing my apartment number) and when i called customer support, and waited 30mins, KIM (the agent) hanged up on meDate of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Julia Jones
Review: Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a…Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a modum. Supposed to be delivered Monday,tracking number didnt work,finally wednesday it worked,parcel delivered Tuesday..no sign of it. Hate their service,spent hours searching for my parcels,even found one THROWN AT  BURNT OUT HOUSE DOWN THE ROAD.Date of experience: June 20, 2023

Name: Kayli Mejia
Review: Do not use this company they will lose your packageThey refused to deliver my large package for 2 weeks trying to get me to pick it up they then lost it claiming someone picked it up with valid ID when that is impossible. Do not use this company they will lose your package then tell you theres nothing they can do.Date of experience: June 23, 2023

Name: Joseph
Review: WORST COURIER SERVICE EVERAll my experiences with this courier service has been nothing but terrible..From fake delivery attempt to bad customer service.. They will never call or message you to notify you that they will be coming to deliver your package, then you will get a meaage to come over to their office for pickup (For God sake I paid for delivery).. One of their drivers once told me once that they don't make any delivery attempt once you get a message of failed delivery attempts.. This company shouldn't be in business..Date of experience: June 06, 2023

Name: D D
Review: Way to go Purolator!Ran into the Purolator driver today and he helped me out with a no signature sticker for my deliveries. That was really cool of him as he mentioned he hated leaving the stickers on my door. I appreciated what he had to say and made things positive for me today. Again I still think Purolator needs to change their policy on signatures all the time for deliveries and do not hold the driver responsible for that. Never did as I know it comes from the top. Anyway,Thanks to the driver on making my experience positive today.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Phoebe Smith
Review: If I could give this company 0 stars I…If I could give this company 0 stars I would it. Is the worst possible shipping company in the world? I have a fairly long driveway which I would like to say. Every other shipping company is able to navigate however purelator finds it better to leave my parcels in the dirt on the side of the road nowhere. Near my property. When I said I would like to actually receive my parcels so could they hold them at the access point? They then give me no notification of the parcel being held and if I do not pick it up within 5 days they send it back have never had. A good experience to this day my parcels are either lost stolen or left in the dirt.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Yuri Kytsenko
Review: Not delivered package after double delaysPaid $2 for each of 10 km of express delivery, Distance 475km, promised time- within 24 hours. Receiver all time stayed at home but after 44 hours driver has not delivered package, not left any message,  but reported absence of receiver.  There is a Purolator's outlet in delivery town but instead of leaving package there I received a note in tracking: Wed. June 21, 2023 - 2:05 p.m. CRANBROOK, BC (108 KM from RECEIVER!) Available for pickup for 5 business days from arrival date at the counter. According to Purolator's request for NOT delivered package people need to drive 216 km to pick up their EXPRESS package. No response to my complains Case 200912981, no apology, normal practice for Purolator. After several calls to Purolator, package was left in town delivery outlet to pick up by senior receiverDate of experience: June 18, 2023

Name: Merrily MacIntosh
Review: WorstWorst, worst, worst courier company EVER!!! I have had nothing but problems with this ridiculous company. They take packages Willy-Nilly to places nowhere near where they say they’ve dropped it off for pick up …beyond stupid! And, absolutely impossible to get an actual human on a chat or the phone. They need to be put out of business . The BBB is my next step.Date of experience: June 21, 2023

Name: Benjamin Wright
Review: Absolutely horrific serviceAbsolutely horrific service, they promise to deliver on a date, they don't deliver on a date, they blame you, then tell you to be home, take the day off, its coming that day, it doesnt come that day, this process repeats, and nobody cares about the time you are wasting of your clients. Nobody calls, nobody cares, and the product still isnt delivered, at this time, I have wasted 3 full days at home on days I was told it was coming, and nobody seem to give a crap. How is Purolator still in business with this level of service.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Gordon
Review: ABYSMALPurolator has consistently failed to deliver on time. Complaints fall on deaf ears. Offer and charge for express service (early AM delivery) to areas that THEY DON'T DELIVER TO, only to hand off to a local carrier without daily service. Latest issue - Early AM delivery from Mississauga to Toronto. End of the day, and it's not delivered. Tracking is useless. Virtual assistant is worse. Phone call isn't answered. Requested a call back which hasn't happened. This is the last straw. I will not pay the invoice, and I've instructed my staff to use ANY courier but Purolator in the future.Date of experience: June 15, 2023

Name: Carlos Carvalho

Most unreliable delivery service.Date of experience: June 29, 2023

Name: Silvana Mascitelli
Review: Scored a 1 for all the good employees…Scored a 1 for all the good employees who still have a work ethic that are unfortunately stuck working alongside the rest of this disgraceful team. This delivery service has gone down the tubes over the past couple years. The absolute worst.Date of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: erwin pondevida
Review: Bad delivery habit …Waiting for delivery but the delivery person did not call. The number was provided. The provided number was correct since they sent message after 5 pm to instead pick the item. No fail delivery slip left to inform us what to go next. For me, will not do business with Purolator.Date of experience: June 27, 2023

Name: Chris Chebry
Review: SCAM TAXATION CHARGESNo matter how many times I write to Purolator regarding incorrect tax billings, they DO NOT LISTEN!!!  They charge an Alberta based company HST?!  No matter where I send my products, even within Alberta, they charge HST?!  Alberta DOES NOT HAVE HST stop charging me 13% tax on my invoices!  I have contacted Purolator three times in this regard, so their response is useless.  I have emailed and talked to a customer service rep on the phone ..... they continue to charge HST.Date of experience: May 31, 2023

Name: anees jameel
Review: Bad company my package moss be arrive…Bad company my package moss be arrive yesterday, but nothing is coming. I call the customer service I hold in the line 1 hour. No body answer me. I advise people not to deal with themDate of experience: June 30, 2023

Name: Maqsood Syed
Review: Pathetic service. Never againThe package was returned and the reason stated was “No buzz code”. They probably don’t know that something as simple as a phone call works. All the driver had to do was give a ring to ask for the buzz code, but no. They actually didn’t even attempt the delivery, because the main door was open all day that day because of some maintenance and it didn’t even need a buzz code. When I checked with the customer care agent, they updated the buzz code and said it would take 3 business days for it to be updated. Also, i was told their drivers don’t have phone. And they expected me to believe it. Just Purolator things. Never ever use their services again.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: James McCleave
Review: Very Very Poor Service & DeliveryIf I could pick no stars that would be it. You claim I couldn't be reached to deliver my parcel (ink) from Epson. Shouldn't be any need, address & phone number on order. Various excuses on tracking number over a 2 week period. Now want me to pick up.Date of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Ohemaa Amponsah
Review: terrible delivery companyterrible delivery company! received an email that package was unable to deliver (the driver did not even attempt to contact me my buzzing my apartment number) and when i called customer support, and waited 30mins, KIM (the agent) hanged up on meDate of experience: June 28, 2023

Name: Julia Jones
Review: Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a…Waiting for a replacenment from Shaw a modum. Supposed to be delivered Monday,tracking number didnt work,finally wednesday it worked,parcel delivered Tuesday..no sign of it. Hate their service,spent hours searching for my parcels,even found one THROWN AT  BURNT OUT HOUSE DOWN THE ROAD.Date of experience: June 20, 2023

Name: Kayli Mejia
Review: Do not use this company they will lose your packageThey refused to deliver my large package for 2 weeks trying to get me to pick it up they then lost it claiming someone picked it up with valid ID when that is impossible. Do not use this company they will lose your package then tell you theres nothing they can do.Date of experience: June 23, 2023

Name: Joseph
Review: WORST COURIER SERVICE EVERAll my experiences with this courier service has been nothing but terrible..From fake delivery attempt to bad customer service.. They will never call or message you to notify you that they will be coming to deliver your package, then you will get a meaage to come over to their office for pickup (For God sake I paid for delivery).. One of their drivers once told me once that they don't make any delivery attempt once you get a message of failed delivery attempts.. This company shouldn't be in business..Date of experience: June 06, 2023

Name: D D
Review: Way to go Purolator!Ran into the Purolator driver today and he helped me out with a no signature sticker for my deliveries. That was really cool of him as he mentioned he hated leaving the stickers on my door. I appreciated what he had to say and made things positive for me today. Again I still think Purolator needs to change their policy on signatures all the time for deliveries and do not hold the driver responsible for that. Never did as I know it comes from the top. Anyway,Thanks to the driver on making my experience positive today.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Phoebe Smith
Review: If I could give this company 0 stars I…If I could give this company 0 stars I would it. Is the worst possible shipping company in the world? I have a fairly long driveway which I would like to say. Every other shipping company is able to navigate however purelator finds it better to leave my parcels in the dirt on the side of the road nowhere. Near my property. When I said I would like to actually receive my parcels so could they hold them at the access point? They then give me no notification of the parcel being held and if I do not pick it up within 5 days they send it back have never had. A good experience to this day my parcels are either lost stolen or left in the dirt.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Yuri Kytsenko
Review: Not delivered package after double delaysPaid $2 for each of 10 km of express delivery, Distance 475km, promised time- within 24 hours. Receiver all time stayed at home but after 44 hours driver has not delivered package, not left any message,  but reported absence of receiver.  There is a Purolator's outlet in delivery town but instead of leaving package there I received a note in tracking: Wed. June 21, 2023 - 2:05 p.m. CRANBROOK, BC (108 KM from RECEIVER!) Available for pickup for 5 business days from arrival date at the counter. According to Purolator's request for NOT delivered package people need to drive 216 km to pick up their EXPRESS package. No response to my complains Case 200912981, no apology, normal practice for Purolator. After several calls to Purolator, package was left in town delivery outlet to pick up by senior receiverDate of experience: June 18, 2023

Name: Merrily MacIntosh
Review: WorstWorst, worst, worst courier company EVER!!! I have had nothing but problems with this ridiculous company. They take packages Willy-Nilly to places nowhere near where they say they’ve dropped it off for pick up …beyond stupid! And, absolutely impossible to get an actual human on a chat or the phone. They need to be put out of business . The BBB is my next step.Date of experience: June 21, 2023

Name: Benjamin Wright
Review: Absolutely horrific serviceAbsolutely horrific service, they promise to deliver on a date, they don't deliver on a date, they blame you, then tell you to be home, take the day off, its coming that day, it doesnt come that day, this process repeats, and nobody cares about the time you are wasting of your clients. Nobody calls, nobody cares, and the product still isnt delivered, at this time, I have wasted 3 full days at home on days I was told it was coming, and nobody seem to give a crap. How is Purolator still in business with this level of service.Date of experience: June 19, 2023

Name: Gordon
Review: ABYSMALPurolator has consistently failed to deliver on time. Complaints fall on deaf ears. Offer and charge for express service (early AM delivery) to areas that THEY DON'T DELIVER TO, only to hand off to a local carrier without daily service. Latest issue - Early AM delivery from Mississauga to Toronto. End of the day, and it's not delivered. Tracking is useless. Virtual assistant is worse. Phone call isn't answered. Requested a call back which hasn't happened. This is the last straw. I will not pay the invoice, and I've instructed my staff to use ANY courier but Purolator in the future.Date of experience: June 15, 2023

Name: Carlos Carvalho
Review: Puro-late packets, always delayed, always missed, no deliver around the time they update the status.I am tired of getting packets delivered by this company, getting a message on their web site saying "missed delivered" when there was NO delivery attempt. I work from home, I sit facing my building entrance and there was NO Puro-late truck within hours form the moment they updated the status on their website. I don't recommend.Date of experience: July 05, 2023

Name: NA
Review: I just want to give negative starI am extremely dissatisfied with the services provided by this company and would rate them poorly. The behavior of their drivers is consistently rude, often leaving as soon as they hear someone approaching the door. It seems they have no interest in fulfilling their duty to deliver packages and have even suggested that I retrieve my own items from their truck. Such a lack of commitment is unacceptable for a delivery service. I strongly advise against using this company's services. It is disheartening that a significant portion, 90%, of this company is owned by Canada Post. This reflects poorly on Canada as a whole. It would be in everyone's best interest to reconsider its operations and not waste taxpayers' hard-earned money. The quality of service provided is far below what Canadians deserve.Date of experience: May 01, 2023

Name: Érica van Hellsing
Review: Only deliver when ou are at workOnly deliver when ou are at work, when (of course) ou are not home, they leave you parcel to some shop of their choice ... which opens only when ou are at work !They may be good with business deliveries, but the are awaful with normal peopleDate of experience: January 09, 2023
